story:
Born on Kickstarter in 2014, BedJet returns for our most awesome sleep technology upgrade ever. 

 

Simple to use and beautifully designed. The award winning BedJet is the world's first ultra-rapid cooling, heating and climate control system made just for your Bed. It's silky quiet and uses just air.   

BedJet's patented biorhythm temperature technology enables programmable temperature control for every hour of the night to help you get to sleep faster and stay asleep longer.  BedJet 3 obsoletes your noisy alarm clock by hacking into your body's natural biorhythm wake triggers, to wake you up gently and incredibly refreshed. 

BedJet 3 will come upgraded with WiFi connectivity for Alexa voice control and other smart home integrations, an incredible new color screen remote control and a beautiful new iOS/Android App.

BedJet air-based cooling is no more stuffy summer nights waking up too hot in bed. The powerful cooling is awesome therapeutic relief for hot sleepers, night sweats and hot flashes. BedJet cooling helps you cuddle longer and never get out of bed to change the house thermostat.  

 BedJet air-based warming is not your grandmother's electric mattress pad.  It's a personal toasty warm sauna right in your own bed, on-demand in just 60 seconds. The instant and powerful warming forever ends cold feet, cold legs and bundling up with layers of pajamas to get into chilly winter beds.

The BedJet dual zone setup (optional) you can keep half the bed cooled while the other half is warmed, ending the night time battle over the thermostat with your partner.   

 

All this while saving you money on your utility bills! Why heat or cool the whole house at night when all that matters is the temperature between the sheets? 

 

 

We're so deeply grateful to all our prior backers and BedJet owners for enabling the success of BedJet.  In the 3.5 years since we've shipped BedJet v1 to our very first Kickstarters, we rocketed to become:   

  • The No. 1 customer ranked product of any kind for staying cool in bed on all of Amazon 
  •  The No. 1 customer ranked product for powered cooling and heating of a bed on all of Amazon 
  • The No. 1 ranked product of any kind in the entire mattress category on all of Amazon (for products with > 500 reviews) 
  • One of the most successful sleep technology products ever launched out of Kickstarter into commercial production!

Reading the above still makes our engineering team giddy after all this time! Take a minute and read some of the phenomenal life changing customer reviews here.

 

Now BedJet is returning home to where it all began to bring you the BedJet 3, upgraded to become our best BedJet ever!  With BedJet 3, you don't just get a remote control for your bed, but one for your body as well. 

 Sleep Better. Live Better.  

Sleep. It's just as important to our health and well being as exercise and nutrition. We spend 30% of our lives in bed and failure to get regular uninterrupted sleep has been medically linked to heart disease, high blood pressure, stroke, diabetes, loss of libido, depression and impaired cognitive function. Taking over the world, or just walking around with a smile on your face, forget about all of it if your body isn't properly recharged.

 

BedJet has taken a technological leap past sleep sensors that simply monitor and educate on your prior night's sleep.  BedJet was the first product to use muscular bed climate control to hack into your body's own natural pre-programmed circadian biorhythm's to fundamentally alter what your body THINKS it should be doing while you are in bed.  

These sleep science biohacks are the result of ground breaking sleep temperature research sponsored by the National Institute of Health and the Dutch Institute for Neuroscience. The key is that your body's core temperature changes over the night.  Simply put, it's all about being the right temperature AND at the right time of night.    

Remember waking up in the middle night to kick the covers off because you were too hot, falling back asleep and then waking up later too cold? That's interrupted sleep and a reset to your deep sleep REM clock. It's also your body not being allowed to achieve the right body core temperature for deep sleep and your brain making a manual adjustment.

BedJet 3 incorporates these medical studies into our biorhythm temperature technology.  Taking into account your sex, age and body type, BedJet will create a custom sleep temperature profile tailored just for you:

 

Hour by hour, the BedJet will make continuous climate control adjustments in your bed designed to help you get to sleep faster, stay asleep longer and wake up feeling more refreshed.  Sensors will take into account any unusual changes in ambient bedroom temperature over the night and make adjustments accordingly.  

Every person is different and because of this the BedJet can adapt the temperature profiles over time to your preferences. You will also be able to create manual temperature profiles from scratch, to activate different warming or cooling settings over your own customized time scale and recall them with a simple 1-touch memory button.

What Doctors & Professional Athletes Are Saying

 

 

From talking to our customers and reading their reviews, we always knew the BedJet helps people sleep better and more comfortably, especially folks who tend to sleep hot, sweat a lot in bed or have any type of thermoregulation problem. 

We decided to put BedJet to the test with medical Doctors (if you believe those kind of people).  Dr. Jordan Stern, a founding member of the Sleep Technology Council of the National Sleep Foundation just completed a clinical study of the BedJet in 2018 with a demographic of the worst night sweat, overheating and bed time hot flash folks we could find: menopausal women.  

The results were overwhelmingly positive and the BedJet clinical trial study has been accepted for publication in a peer reviewed and prestigious major medical journal this October 2018.  

For the folks who participated in our trial (and we love those Sweaty Betty's!), we are happy to announce BedJet is now clinically proven to:

  • Improve sleep
  • Help you get to sleep faster, stay asleep longer and wake up less frequently during the night
  • Relieve symptoms of hot flahes
  • Improve feelings of tiredness and lack of energy  

We believe BedJet is the first hardware device ever to be able to make all of these medical claims.  If you are a Sweaty Betty or sleep next to one, BedJet is definitely for you!  

But it isn't just women benefiting from BedJet.  Did we mention the New York Jets purchased fleets of BedJets directly from us for their star athletes?  These huge muscled up dude's super high metabolisms make them burn super hot at night when trying to sleep.  The New York Jets have purchased BedJets directly from our company three years in a row now to issue to their best athletes at their summer training camp hotels.

We can't claim any endorsement here (we seriously don't have the kind of bucks for that) -- only the factual repeat and return sale of our equipment directly to the team three years in a row now!         

 End the Daily Alarm Clock Tragedy 

 An alarm clock wakes you up by annoying you. BedJet 3 allows you to program a natural bio-hack wake up time. The wake up feature subtly alters your body's core temperature in the morning at the time of your choosing. Just like bright sunlight filling a bedroom, this will activate a pre-programmed circadian reaction in your brain resetting your internal clock to know it's time to start the day. 

Remember that feeling you had as a kid when you just opened your eyes in the morning full of energy, refreshed and ready to leap out of bed? Yeah, it's like that. BedJet 3 is no more noisy alarm clocks, no more hitting the snooze button four times or dragging yourself out of bed wishing you had just one more hour to linger.

Climate Control Technology  

BedJet invented the entire product category of ultra-fast on-demand air based bed climate control.  We were also the first company to introduce a top-of-bed dual zone climate controlled sheet to keep half the bed warm and the other half cooled.

 

BedJet 3 works on any size bed and any type mattress.  It gives you the ultimate control over your personal sleep environment - feel how you want, when you want and nearly instantly. The BedJet lives under your bed or tucked neatly out of the way at the foot of your bed. 

 

 

Installation of the BedJet 3 onto your bed is incredibly simple and done in minutes with no tools. It's under 6" tall, so it fits under the majority of beds with space underneath so you'll barely know it's there.   

 

Want to use BedJet with your own sheets? Once activated, the patented and acoustically dampened blower, ducting system and outlet nozzle operate at a very specific air pressure to create a scientifically magical event in your bedding. The BedJet quietly generates a small cushion of turbulent air between the upper and lower bedsheets that lifts the top bedding off the bed by a small amount. This tenting effect on the bedding combined with the turbulent air flow enables the air to permeate throughout the entire sleeping area and provide even heating or cooling. Wonder how good that really feels? Check out the awesome customer reviews of our original BedJet v1 and v2 here.  

 

 Dual Zone Climate Comfort

Tired of fighting with your partner over the bedroom thermostat? In 2014, BedJet became the first company to introduce a top-of-bed dual zone climate comfort system using a sheet component.  We got the patent on that!    

Watch on the infra-red camera how quickly each partner gets their own perfect sleep temperature on their own side of the bed with BedJet 3.  We are saving marriages!

 

AirComfort Cloud Sheet

Want the very best BedJet cooling and experience?  Pair the BedJet 3 with our (optional) AirComfort Cloud Sheet.  The patented Cloud Sheet is a performance engineered, luxuriously soft, 100% cotton temperature layer with specially designed interior air flow cavities.  The BedJet Air Nozzle plugs into the Cloud sheet air flow cavities, gently distributing warming or cooling air through the sheet and down into the bed. 

 

The Cloud Sheet replaces your normal bedding top sheet and works underneath blankets, quilts, or regular comforters. Unlike electric blankets, the Cloud Sheet is just pure, soft cotton and like any top sheet, can be washed over and over again. 

The Cloud Sheet enables the most even distribution of BedJet air in the bed and significantly improves cooling performance of the BedJet. It has the feel and quality of 5-star hotel grade bed linens. The engineered Cloud sheet is the most complex product ever manufactured in the entire sheet industry, with multiple weaves of cotton, differing areas of air permeability, unique stitching and special interior baffling for air flow zones. 

 

CLOUD SHEET GUIDE - SINGLE ZONE VS. DUAL ZONE  

Our Cloud Sheet variations cover different types of sleep needs for individuals and couples:  

Single Zone Cloud Sheet: Works with just one BedJet. It will cool or heat the entire bed to the same temperature (or area under the Cloud Sheet if a Twin XL is used on a King for example). Go with this if you sleep alone, or if you are a couple who enjoys the same sleep temperature needs.

Dual Zone Cloud Sheet: The interior flow cavities are split into two halves, one for each side of the bed and each half accepting its own BedJet air supply. 

Dual Zone Cloud Sheet with one BedJet unit: You can cool or heat just your half of the bed without affecting the other side. The side without the BedJet installed will remain un-puffed and look just like a normal top sheet! Get this setup if you are a couple and just one of you needs cooling/heating.  

Dual Zone Cloud Sheet with two BedJets:  This setup is our Dual Zone BedJet bundle.  You get independent temperature control to each side of the bed. Each person gets their own remote control and half the bed can be crisply cooled while the other half is tropical warm! 

New BedJet 3 Features

If there was one thing our BedJetters told us we needed to improve on with the original generation BedJet, it was the very basic remote control that required use of the App for more sophisticated BedJet features.  We took this to heart and got bent on creating the greatest remote control ever made for a bedding and sleep technology product.  We realize we probably went a little overboard, but heck, we're a bunch of super-nerds, we can't help but over-react to critique on our design work!    

 

 

This special upgraded remote was planned to be part of a future higher end BedJet 3s model, but we are including it in this Indiegogo campaign as an extra perk.  It has a full color screen and backlit keys.  A separate remote control without the color screen is also being developed for legacy BedJet owners and prior Kickstarter backers who want to hold onto their v2 machines a bit longer.   

Bluetooth App remote control?  Got that too.  BedJet 3 will come with an improved smart device App built from the ground up with a fresh new UI/UX.  We know the original BedJet App UI/UX needed a big make-over and we're happily making the new App backwards compatible for all BedJet v1/v2 users:

 

Alexa & Smart Home Integrations 

Our plan on first product release is Amazon Alexa as well as IFTTT control integration.  We will continue to look at other smart home platform integrations after release.  BedJet has user update-able firmware, so the great news is your machine will never become obsolete!  

 

Cooling & Heating for Beds 

BedJet is the most muscular climate control product ever created for a bed. It is the first and only product that can both cool you off within 10 seconds and heat the bedding of a king size bed to feel like the sheets just came out of dryer in only 180 seconds. 

How does the air based cooling and heating work? 

Getting too hot in bed never feels good. Body heat and moisture get trapped by your mattress and bedding like an oven. Typical air temperatures surrounding your body under the bedding reach over 90 degrees. Over the course of the night we have measured up to a 20% increase in humidity in the bed from natural body perspiration.  BedJet was the first company's to publicly identify humidity trapped under sheets as one of the primary causes for feeling to hot.  

The BedJet convective and evaporative method of cooling is incredibly effective.  Cooling mode power ventilates your bed by circulating fresh ambient temperature air into your bed to quickly wick out this trapped body heat and body moisture.  You select variable amounts of air flow from the BedJet to get different levels of cooling. Wonder how good it really feels? Check out the reviews here on how well the cooling works from our original BedJet v1/v2 owners here. 

 Please Note: BedJet is NOT a substitute for zero air conditioning in extreme ambient heat (79 degrees+) bedrooms. BedJet is not a portable air conditioner. Room temp needs to be below 79 degrees for best cooling.  

The heating mode lets you choose variable output temperature and variable air flow to help customize what feels just right for you. Turbo-Heat mode gives you a 5-minute burst of extra powerful warming (1500 watts!) to get a cold chilly bed nice and toasty in just minutes. BedJet can raise the temperature of your bedding 30 degrees in 180 seconds! 

 There's no electric blanket and no heated mattress pad in the world that can do that -- they take up to 40 minutes to warm your bed just 20 degrees plus don't provide even heating. BedJet warming is safer, because it keeps electricity out of the bed where it belongs. Take a look below at the infra-red image of an electric blanket in actual operation in a bed vs. BedJet. Apart from uneven heating, those electric wires are laying right up against your body!  

 

Got heavy night sweats that soak the sheets? BedJet 3 has a special temperature neutral sweat drying mode which ventilates the bed, pulling all the moisture off your body but without freezing you or overheating you. We created this unique feature for one our customers who suffered from a medical condition. 

Our Engineering Journey

Technical Stuff on the Inside

  • Acoustic damping technology in the base unit makes BedJet incredibly quiet. The design includes a computation fluid dynamic optimized exit air nozzle for laminar flow (engineering lingo for the exhaust nozzle is a muffler). BedJet sound is only 39dB measured at the bed pillow while in medium settings cool/heat mode typical of all night operation. This makes it quieter than any window fan or air conditioner. Its a wonderful background white noise whoosh that will help put you to sleep! 
  •  20,000 hour wide range digital DC motor to make BedJet last just as long as your mattress
  • Lifetime washable air filter for no dust bunnies in your bed 
  •  Uniquely designed low temperature barium titanate ceramic stone heating element - operates below the temperature flash point of dust to avoid that "electric heater" smell 
  • Super Safe Electric Appliance - BedJet 3 will be certified to the same Underwriters Laboratories standards as electrified hospital beds.
  • Entire enclosure is certified Underwriters Laboratories flameproof plastic 
  • Base unit dimensions: 15.5" long x 10.5" wide x 6" inches tall, fits under most beds 
  • 120V only (North America), this machine is not dual voltage and will not work at 220-240V.  An international model is planned for late 2019. 
  • Update-able firmware so your BedJet will never become obsolete
  • WiFi and Bluetooth chip integrated
  • 2 way 2.4GHz radio chip for wireless remote control 
  • Amazon Alexa and IFTTT integrations  
  • Power consumption Turbo-Heat: 1500 watts max 
  • Power consumption Regular Heat: 150 to 1100 watts 
  • Power consumption Cooling: 10 to 40 watts max
  • Standby power consumption: 1.5 watts

What's that you spied on the backside of the BedJet 3?  Did someone say EXPANSION PORT! We will be releasing an API to qualified developers who want to tinker with their BedJets by adding sensors or other external device innovations.  Who knows, maybe your cool idea might make it into production with us? 

Project & Timeline  

The engineering scope of the BedJet 3 is quite large.  Nearly every single component from our prior generation machine got design upgrades.  The great news is we've already been working on the BedJet 3 for 21+ months now and are nearly complete with the development of the hardware. 

 

We are just now transitioning into manufacturing and developing the more sophisticated software for smart home integrations and the App.    

Timeline & History: 

  •  December 2016 - BedJet founder Mark Aramli says to his chief electrical engineer Peter, "Hey dude, lets start tinkering on BedJet 3!"
  • December 2017 - First new electronic prototype designs are tested and characterized
  • February 2018 - First alpha "Frankenstein" BedJet 3 in a representative enclosure design is cobbled together 
  • June 2018 - Injection mold tooling started 
  • September 2018 - First 30 BedJet 3 units for field beta testing using injection mold parts are be built.  Underwriters Laboratories safe electric appliance certification is started. 
  • November 2018 - Firmware frozen, Alexa integration is functional 
  • December 2018 - Manufacturing started, shipping starts, new App released 

Why We Are Crowdfunding

Letter From Mark Aramli, BedJet Inventor

This is where it all started. In 2014 you supported my vision to make the world’s first ultra-rapid climate control system for a bed. The crowdfunding community and our early adopters believed in us before anyone else even knew we existed. You blew us away with your support and your feedback helped shape what BedJet is today - the #1 brand in America for cooling heating and climate comfort bed systems.  We are winning in every category of performance, power, features, customer reviews and market share.  

It's been a crazy roller-coaster journey along the way for our tiny little start-up.  It turns out the mattress and bedding industry is kind of a hostile place for innovative little start-up folks like us.  

In our first year, some of the big corporate mattress guys (like just two out of the three largest!) didn't like seeing our success and sent threatening letters from their deep pocketed teams of corporate lawyers to bully us.  

Last year we had the biggest "bed-in-a-box" mattress brand (funded by big corporate venture capital) secretly buy a massive order of 20 BedJet products on Amazon, shipped direct to their engineering R&D center in San Francisco.   Reverse engineering? Who knows.  

We even had our first "knock-off" crowdfunding campaign, where a company took some of our concepts and marketing imagery wholesale and launched without even demonstrating a physically believable working prototype.  As of today, they still have yet to deliver to their backers (we don't think that approach is very smart).   

All of this still made us smile, because we knew none of it would be happening if we weren't making waves and doing something right with BedJet.  We also knew we had something on our side none of them had -- you folks! Our backers and supporters.  

During the uncertain and worrisome early days where our company was fighting for a right to exist and I was deathly worried about financial ruin (having invested my life savings in the business), you've always been there for us.  With deep and humble appreciation, I will never forget that and love every one of you for your help.  You helped make my lifelong dreams of being an inventor and successful entrepreneur come true. 

We are still a a small but rapidly growing start-up company.   We are back to our crowdfunding roots for the simple reason that we love being part of the community here.  We just want to design cool stuff that people enjoy and we love you being a part of the journey with us.  Because at the end of each day, success in your next one is all about getting great sleep and waking up feeling good with a smile on your face.

all the best, 

- Mark Aramli

CHIEF BEDJETTER

Rewards

The side without the BedJet installed will remain un-puffed and look just like a normal top sheet! Get this setup if you are a couple and just one of you needs cooling/heating.  Dual Zone Cloud Sheet with two BedJets:  This setup is our Dual Zone BedJet bundle.  You get independent temperature control to each side of the bed. Each person gets their own remote control and half the bed can be crisply cooled while the other half is tropical warm! New BedJet 3 FeaturesIf there was one thing our BedJetters told us we needed to improve on with the original generation BedJet, it was the very basic remote control that required use of the App for more sophisticated BedJet features.  We took this to heart and got bent on creating the greatest remote control ever made for a bedding and sleep technology product.  We realize we probably went a little overboard, but heck, we're a bunch of super-nerds, we can't help but over-react to critique on our design work!                                    Functional remote control prototype, not a CAD model This special upgraded remote was planned to be part of a future higher end BedJet 3s model, but we are including it in this Indiegogo campaign as an extra perk.  It has a full color screen and backlit keys.  A separate remote control without the color screen is also being developed for legacy BedJet owners and prior Kickstarter backers who want to hold onto their v2 machines a bit longer.   Bluetooth App remote control?  Got that too.  BedJet 3 will come with an improved smart device App built from the ground up with a fresh new UI/UX.  We know the original BedJet App UI/UX needed a big make-over and we're happily making the new App backwards compatible for all BedJet v1/v2 users: Alexa & Smart Home Integrations Our plan on first product release is Amazon Alexa as well as IFTTT control integration.  We will continue to look at other smart home platform integrations after release.  BedJet has user update-able firmware, so the great news is your machine will never become obsolete!   Cooling & Heating for Beds BedJet is the most muscular climate control product ever created for a bed. It is the first and only product that can both cool you off within 10 seconds and heat the bedding of a king size bed to feel like the sheets just came out of dryer in only 180 seconds. How does the air based cooling and heating work? Getting too hot in bed never feels good. Body heat and moisture get trapped by your mattress and bedding like an oven. Typical air temperatures surrounding your body under the bedding reach over 90 degrees. Over the course of the night we have measured up to a 20% increase in humidity in the bed from natural body perspiration.  BedJet was the first company's to publicly identify humidity trapped under sheets as one of the primary causes for feeling to hot.  The BedJet convective and evaporative method of cooling is incredibly effective.  Cooling mode power ventilates your bed by circulating fresh ambient temperature air into your bed to quickly wick out this trapped body heat and body moisture.  You select variable amounts of air flow from the BedJet to get different levels of cooling. Wonder how good it really feels? Check out the reviews here on how well the cooling works from our original BedJet v1/v2 owners here.  Please Note: BedJet is NOT a substitute for zero air conditioning in extreme ambient heat (79 degrees+) bedrooms. BedJet is not a portable air conditioner. Room temp needs to be below 79 degrees for best cooling.  The heating mode lets you choose variable output temperature and variable air flow to help customize what feels just right for you. Turbo-Heat mode gives you a 5-minute burst of extra powerful warming (1500 watts!) to get a cold chilly bed nice and toasty in just minutes. BedJet can raise the temperature of your bedding 30 degrees in 180 seconds!  There's no electric blanket and no heated mattress pad in the world that can do that -- they take up to 40 minutes to warm your bed just 20 degrees plus don't provide even heating. BedJet warming is safer, because it keeps electricity out of the bed where it belongs. Take a look below at the infra-red image of an electric blanket in actual operation in a bed vs. BedJet. Apart from uneven heating, those electric wires are laying right up against your body!   Got heavy night sweats that soak the sheets? BedJet 3 has a special temperature neutral sweat drying mode which ventilates the bed, pulling all the moisture off your body but without freezing you or overheating you. We created this unique feature for one our customers who suffered from a medical condition. Our Engineering Journey
 Technical Stuff on the Inside
Acoustic damping technology in the base unit makes BedJet incredibly quiet. The design includes a computation fluid dynamic optimized exit air nozzle for laminar flow (engineering lingo for the exhaust nozzle is a muffler). BedJet sound is only 39dB measured at the bed pillow while in medium settings cool/heat mode typical of all night operation. This makes it quieter than any window fan or air conditioner. Its a wonderful background white noise whoosh that will help put you to sleep! 
 20,000 hour wide range digital DC motor to make BedJet last just as long as your mattress
Lifetime washable air filter for no dust bunnies in your bed 
 Uniquely designed low temperature barium titanate ceramic stone heating element - operates below the temperature flash point of dust to avoid that "electric heater" smell 
Super Safe Electric Appliance - BedJet 3 will be certified to the same Underwriters Laboratories standards as electrified hospital beds.
Entire enclosure is certified Underwriters Laboratories flameproof plastic 
Base unit dimensions: 15.5" long x 10.5" wide x 6" inches tall, fits under most beds 
120V only (North America), this machine is not dual voltage and will not work at 220-240V.  An international model is planned for late 2019. 
Update-able firmware so your BedJet will never become obsolete
WiFi and Bluetooth chip integrated
2 way 2.4GHz radio chip for wireless remote control 
Amazon Alexa and IFTTT integrations  
Power consumption Turbo-Heat: 1500 watts max 
Power consumption Regular Heat: 150 to 1100 watts 
Power consumption Cooling: 10 to 40 watts max
Standby power consumption: 1.5 watts
What's that you spied on the backside of the BedJet 3?  Did someone say EXPANSION PORT! We will be releasing an API to qualified developers who want to tinker with their BedJets by adding sensors or other external device innovations.  Who knows, maybe your cool idea might make it into production with us? Project & Timeline  The engineering scope of the BedJet 3 is quite large.  Nearly every single component from our prior generation machine got design upgrades.  The great news is we've already been working on the BedJet 3 for 21+ months now and are nearly complete with the development of the hardware.  We are just now transitioning into manufacturing and developing the more sophisticated software for smart home integrations and the App.    Timeline & History: 
 December 2016 - BedJet founder Mark Aramli says to his chief electrical engineer Peter, "Hey dude, lets start tinkering on BedJet 3!"

December 2017 - First new electronic prototype designs are tested and characterized

February 2018 - First alpha "Frankenstein" BedJet 3 in a representative enclosure design is cobbled together 

June 2018 - Injection mold tooling started 

September 2018 - First 30 BedJet 3 units for field beta testing using injection mold parts are be built.  Underwriters Laboratories safe electric appliance certification is started. 

November 2018 - Firmware frozen, Alexa integration is functional 

December 2018 - Manufacturing started, shipping starts, new App released 
Why We Are CrowdfundingLetter From Mark Aramli, BedJet InventorThis is where it all started. In 2014 you supported my vision to make the world’s first ultra-rapid climate control system for a bed. The crowdfunding community and our early adopters believed in us before anyone else even knew we existed. You blew us away with your support and your feedback helped shape what BedJet is today - the #1 brand in America for cooling heating and climate comfort bed systems.  We are winning in every category of performance, power, features, customer reviews and market share.  It's been a crazy roller-coaster journey along the way for our tiny little start-up.  It turns out the mattress and bedding industry is kind of a hostile place for innovative little start-up folks like us.  In our first year, some of the big corporate mattress guys (like just two out of the three largest!) didn't like seeing our success and sent threatening letters from their deep pocketed teams of corporate lawyers to bully us.  Last year we had the biggest "bed-in-a-box" mattress brand (funded by big corporate venture capital) secretly buy a massive order of 20 BedJet products on Amazon, shipped direct to their engineering R&D center in San Francisco.   Reverse engineering? Who knows.  We even had our first "knock-off" crowdfunding campaign, where a company took some of our concepts and marketing imagery wholesale and launched without even demonstrating a physically believable working prototype.  As of today, they still have yet to deliver to their backers (we don't think that approach is very smart).   All of this still made us smile, because we knew none of it would be happening if we weren't making waves and doing something right with BedJet.  We also knew we had something on our side none of them had -- you folks! Our backers and supporters.  During the uncertain and worrisome early days where our company was fighting for a right to exist and I was deathly worried about financial ruin (having invested my life savings in the business), you've always been there for us.  With deep and humble appreciation, I will never forget that and love every one of you for your help.  You helped make my lifelong dreams of being an inventor and successful entrepreneur come true. We are still a a small but rapidly growing start-up company.   We are back to our crowdfunding roots for the simple reason that we love being part of the community here.  We just want to design cool stuff that people enjoy and we love you being a part of the journey with us.  Because at the end of each day, success in your next one is all about getting great sleep and waking up feeling good with a smile on your face.all the best, - Mark AramliCHIEF BEDJETTERRewards Will cool or heat the entire bed using your own sheets.
 Will cool or heat the entire bed, or just half the bed, using a single zone or dual zone AirComfort Cloud Sheet. The Cloud Sheet dramatically improves the BedJet experience and performance. You choose when backer surveys come out.
 Will cool or heat the entire bed in two different bedrooms using your own sheets.
 Cool and heat each half of the bed independently. The dual zone Cloud Sheet gives the best possible experience and performance.

story:
Hey Guys!

My name is Janine Dejesus, I currently live in Las Vegas and I am a stay at home mother of two beautiful little girls. My idea and dream to create this app came to me about 2 years ago when we decided to remodel and redecorate our home. I AM your typical online shopper! Being a Mom, whenever I have any moments to myself, I hop online and shop! Lets face it, when you have two kids, the last thing you want to do is lug them in and out of the car seats, from store to store! Also, anyone else's kids start screaming when you even try to stop and look at a rug at a store? So here I was stuck at home with two small kids while my house is being torn apart and I'm already online, shopping for my new bar stools, couch, rug, lighting, you name it! I was on all home design and interior instagrams getting ideas and inspiration. We were on a budget so I couldn't afford to bring in an interior designer or buy all that expensive designer furniture! I started with my instagram inspirations, for example if there was a designer coffee table or rug that I loved, I would have to go from site to site online searching key words to find a similar item at a more reasonable price! That's when it all clicked and under my breath I mumbled, "why isn't there an app where i can just upload this picture and compare similar items and their prices on multiple websites?" We all do it, at least all us bargain shoppers, before we click that, "buy it" button, we have to go back and check other multiple sites to make sure its not on sale or for a lower price on another website. I decided to stop just saying and wishing and just go for it. So thats how I'm here... Creating, designing, coding, and launching this app is expensive! I'm finally in the coding phase, which takes the longest and once thats done we will be ready to launch. And then of course there's marketing costs!This campaign is to help with the costs of getting this app finished and LIVE! I have big dreams for Pic.Shop.it, not only can you upload a photo but you can just launch your camera, take a photo, and SHOP! Let's just say you're at a store and you see a home decor or furniture item you love, but its a little out of your budget. Well with Pic.Shop.it you will be able to just snap a picture of it and find it, or similar items on multiple websites, so you can compare the prices! Help me launch Pic.Shop.it and make it one of the top downloaded and used innovative apps of 2019!!!

story:
Montreal Apartment Fire

June 20th, our apartment was destroyed in a fire, luckily we were out of the apartment with our dog and travel supplies for about a week, unfortunately our lovely cat eve is still lost. The fire department drilled holes in our roof to flood the apartment.

After months of reduced wages and unstable employment, our family has been through a rough series of months, and that struggles continues. The fire was just one more thing on top of already too much turmoil.

Our first step will be to find a place to live, then we will need some appliances and furniture.

If you're able to help us rebuild our lives, we will be grateful for it from the bottom of our hearts.

Please help us.

Lukus, Trevor, Griswold and Eve.

story:
The Affordable Smart Colour Light

'Not another smart LED light' you'll hear the tech reviewers say.

We were really attracted to the idea of changing the decor to suit your mood or set a mood. Being able to dim your lights, set any colour schemes, automate them to come on or off and operate remotely, all at the swipe of an app, with no expensive wiring or controls we believe is something everyone should enjoy.

Ours is an attractive, good quality metal bodied light perfect for exposed fittings and we really rate our app for ease of use, especially the less tech savvy. Not having deep marketing pockets we plan to cut through using low margins and very competitive prices on our quality lights.

Please have a look and see how easy it is to play in this space. Help us be price competition in this space and get more people into colour changing lights sooner at prices many more people can afford.

Save even more with our REWARDS referrals to earn FREE lights for yourself!



Quick and Easy Set-Up - No Extra Wiring Required

Replace your globes with ours, download the app, connect the bridge and you're ready to go. Our lights can still be switched at the wall without losing their settings.

     You need WiFi in your home and a smart device to work our lights.


Choose Any Colour

'You connect' to your mood and choose a colour to match how you feel. You can go from vivid to muted and everything in between in a matter of seconds without leaving your lounge. Find your favourite colour in the RGB spectrum from the more than one million colours available. Game time you can select your team colours.


Set Your Brightness

You can change the light from white to any colour, from dimmed to bright - all done from the app on your device. 
(If you already have dimmer switches they'll need to be set to full)


Plus Five White Tones to Choose From

You can select from cool and bright when you need to see detail, to warm and relaxing when you don't. You can't buy the wrong white with our lights.


Timers & Remote Control

Easily create timer events to turn your lights on and off automatically and control them from your armchair, or even from the other side of the world.  

We let 'you connect' with greater security and convenience.


Kids Love Them (and they're practical too!)

They can have bright cool light for reading or homework, plus 'awesome' colours anytime they want. Our security design means you can easily set them up to access their lights only. 


Power Saving and Long Life LED Technology

We have a two year replacement warranty on our durable lights. With a 25,000 hour LED life rating and a robust construction they will change the way you think about light globes forever.

Needing just 7W of power for nearly 600 Lumens of brightness, these are smart and efficient LEDs.


21st Century Technology in the Classic Globe Shape

We like our classic globe shape with its 21st century technology - it will look far better than most in exposed light fittings and it's long life perfectly suits hard to get to light fittings. Smart LED Lights don't have to look like robots.


Australian Company with a Global Light

We are an Aussie start up and the standard fitting for us is the Bayonet Cap (and we spell color 'colour'). We also have the ES26 Edison Screw, which fits both E26 and E27 sockets and is the main fitting our factory in China supplies. Our lights work on 110-240V inline voltage and 50-60 Hz - if your local power is in this range you can have our lights.

 We can supply these E14 to E26 adaptors - add $4 each . 



Intuitive, Easy to Use App

We want our lights affordable for most people, not just the early tech adopters, so we have made sure our App navigation is very obvious and easy to master. Below is a sample of the screens, and at our website you can test drive our emulator.


If you are not sure what colour you are feeling we have our Every Colour feature, where the light cycles through over 100 samples across the spectrum - you make it Upbeat, Relaxed or anywhere in between.  Get the party started or slow it down - you choose how 'you connect' with your home.

Risks & Challenges

As of June 1st we have now had to confront a second unexpected delay after two problems we did not anticipate.  We are having some communication difficulties with our manufacturing partner in China but nothing we cannot overcome, just not quickly enough nor with confidence of timeline for us.

Accordingly we have offered all Perk supporters a full refund with a commitment to re-contact them when we have our campaign back on track. We will update this campaign when we have full confidence in timelines.

We unreservedly apologise to our supporters and thank them for their support and well wishes. 


Technical Specs

We will supply the appropriate power supply for your region.

Frequently Asked Questions


Why is your funding goal so low?

We have already made the investment in tooling and design, and production samples and full testing, so this project is proceeding anyway. We are inviting people to support us and join our production order at these low prices.

What is different about your lights to others available?
At these launch prices our lights cost much less for full colour and white choice globes. Mood lighting used to be very expensive but now most people can enjoy it in their home. We like our classic globe shape. Best of all you can still use your wall switches if you like, as our lights start up exactly as they were when the power was switched off. Many lose their colour and dimmer settings when they lose power. We have designed our App for all people - a couple more navigation steps than others but really obvious and easy to use as a result.
I use my phone as a 'hot spot' for internet in my apartment. Can I still use your lights? 

You do need WiFi to connect your device to the bridge and then to change the light settings, so the simple answer is no. If you have a WiFi router even not connected to the internet you can use that (i.e. without a plan or sim card or phone line). You can switch our lights normally too on the existing circuits but they always work only at the last settings made when connected.

You need internet to control your lights from outside of your home WiFi network.

Do your lights work outside?

Our LEDs produce virtually no UV light so don't attract bugs. They cannot be used in exposed positions and need to be protected from weather just like other normal light globes. Under verandahs, eaves etc is fine. You can easily dim them so not to bug the neighbours too.

Can I use them in enclosed fittings?

LEDs do not produce any heat from the light source but they do at the solid state junction. All LED lights have a heat sink design to dissipate this heat. Opposite to normal lights the light bit doesn't get hot but the body can. At just 7W ours don't produce a massive amount of heat, especially on colour or dimmed, but to be safe we do not recommend small enclosed fittings, just as most LED lights don't. 

Can I use them with existing dimmer switches?

No, only if these are turned to full power. You can them dim then on the App.

Can I use my existing light switches?

Absolutely, to switch them on and off at the last settings made. Many of our competitors lose their settings when the power is lost - they are designed to work only on their App, or their wall switches. This can be annoying especially if set low in a bedside lamp or similar and you forget to use the app. Switching off at the wall does save a very small amount of standby power, though you probably wouldn't notice. 

Why do you have a bridge and some models don't?

This design keeps the costs lower as each light only needs to communicate with the bridge, and not the devices, reducing overlapping components in each globe. The bridge is small and can be placed out of sight and uses minimal standby power.

How far away from the bridge will a light work?

Approximately 30M which should cover the largest homes. Some construction types may reduce this slightly. An extra bridge can be used if required to overcome this. Each bridge can handle up to 50 lights.

Are the colours as bright as the white lights? (i.e. nearly 600 Lm)

No, the colours are less and vary on the colour chosen. Typically for mood and accent lighting you want these subdued anyway. When photographed the colours appear fuller too but you will find the colour performance very satisfactory, especially in multi globe fittings.

What are Lumens?

Lumens are a measure of the amount of light produced, and the best way to compare all light technologies. All incandescent lights are similarly bright, according to the wattage (power used). LEDs are very energy efficient so Watts are a poor indicator now of brightness for LEDs and CFL (compact fluorescents). 

Can I use multiple devices / instances of Apps to operate your lights?

Yes, and easily so. Our App has a secure sharing method so once one device is set up you can share those settings and groupings across to other devices. You can also set your childrens apps on their iPods or tablets up so only their lights are entered, so they can't be mischievous with yours or their sibling's lights.

Can expect to control Philips Hue lamps or others with yours?

Not at the moment but a future App upgrade could have their sdk integrated. We have considered this and first want to expand the market for RGB globes. If we end up with a large overlap we would have to seriously consider it.

Can we expect any sort of IFTTT integration? (this would be a major plus!)

This will require a firmware upgrade to our bridge and something in our sights. Our first priority is to give a good light experience and we are watching development in this space with interest.

Do your lights have progressive start up to full brightness on timer events?

No. We looked at this function and tested it, and did not see any real effect on our eyes from an instant start up or a gradual 1 second brightening. On just a 600 Lumen light we don't see much comparison with the sun starting the day - and it is nothing like camera flash going off.

How long will your lights last?

They are long life globes and we provide a two year full replacement warranty. The LEDs are rated to 25,000 hours. LEDs are not affected by constant switching and will last  much, much longer than incandescent or fluorescent lights. They are very durable.

Do your lights work on all devices?

Most current devices - you need to have IOS 6+ or Android3 or later.

Please ask any other questions through Comments and I will answer there, and update here for others.

Thank you for getting this far through our pitch and we hope you can support us.

Regards

Chris, Ron, Rina and team.

LEDs do not produce any heat from the light source but they do at the solid state junction. All LED lights have a heat sink design to dissipate this heat. Opposite to normal lights the light bit doesn't get hot but the body can. At just 7W ours don't produce a massive amount of heat, especially on colour or dimmed, but to be safe we do not recommend small enclosed fittings, just as most LED lights don't. 
Can I use them with existing dimmer switches?
No, only if these are turned to full power. You can them dim then on the App.
Can I use my existing light switches?
Absolutely, to switch them on and off at the last settings made. Many of our competitors lose their settings when the power is lost - they are designed to work only on their App, or their wall switches. This can be annoying especially if set low in a bedside lamp or similar and you forget to use the app. Switching off at the wall does save a very small amount of standby power, though you probably wouldn't notice. 
Why do you have a bridge and some models don't?
This design keeps the costs lower as each light only needs to communicate with the bridge, and not the devices, reducing overlapping components in each globe. The bridge is small and can be placed out of sight and uses minimal standby power.
How far away from the bridge will a light work?
Approximately 30M which should cover the largest homes. Some construction types may reduce this slightly. An extra bridge can be used if required to overcome this. Each bridge can handle up to 50 lights.
Are the colours as bright as the white lights? (i.e. nearly 600 Lm)
No, the colours are less and vary on the colour chosen. Typically for mood and accent lighting you want these subdued anyway. When photographed the colours appear fuller too but you will find the colour performance very satisfactory, especially in multi globe fittings.
What are Lumens?
Lumens are a measure of the amount of light produced, and the best way to compare all light technologies. All incandescent lights are similarly bright, according to the wattage (power used). LEDs are very energy efficient so Watts are a poor indicator now of brightness for LEDs and CFL (compact fluorescents). 
Can I use multiple devices / instances of Apps to operate your lights?
Yes, and easily so. Our App has a secure sharing method so once one device is set up you can share those settings and groupings across to other devices. You can also set your childrens apps on their iPods or tablets up so only their lights are entered, so they can't be mischievous with yours or their sibling's lights.
Can expect to control Philips Hue lamps or others with yours?
Not at the moment but a future App upgrade could have their sdk integrated. We have considered this and first want to expand the market for RGB globes. If we end up with a large overlap we would have to seriously consider it.
Can we expect any sort of IFTTT integration? (this would be a major plus!)
This will require a firmware upgrade to our bridge and something in our sights. Our first priority is to give a good light experience and we are watching development in this space with interest.
Do your lights have progressive start up to full brightness on timer events?
No. We looked at this function and tested it, and did not see any real effect on our eyes from an instant start up or a gradual 1 second brightening. On just a 600 Lumen light we don't see much comparison with the sun starting the day - and it is nothing like camera flash going off.
How long will your lights last?
They are long life globes and we provide a two year full replacement warranty. The LEDs are rated to 25,000 hours. LEDs are not affected by constant switching and will last  much, much longer than incandescent or fluorescent lights. They are very durable.
Do your lights work on all devices?
Most current devices - you need to have IOS 6+ or Android3 or later.
Please ask any other questions through Comments and I will answer there, and update here for others.
Thank you for getting this far through our pitch and we hope you can support us.
Regards
Chris, Ron, Rina and team.

story:
Short Summary

I am originaly from the Czech Republic where I developed my love of and spiritual connection to nature.  My passion for photographing animals and beautiful nature is what keeps me going.  I am concerned about the enviroment and protecting wildlife.

I recently lost a few of my jobs as an eco-friendly house cleaner and window washer, so I have decided to pursue my photography  in hopes of building a career and raising awareness about the beauty of nature around us and how it is important to our survival. I would like to share my photos with nature preserves and help them raise money as well as build my career.  Having a sharper lens will help me to capture images in low light which is necessary to capture certain images.  This would really help me to kickstart my career and move forward.

What We Need & What You Get

*$1,000 for a new lens

Your contributions will get you unique nature spirit photos that I have captured!

If I do not reach my entire goal, the money will be saved until I can afford to buy the lens :)

The Impact

My goal is to travel to different places to help people become aware of the beauty that is all around them.  I would like to contribute photos to places like the National Audubon Society and National Geographic so people can see things they don't normaly get the chance to see.  Ultimately, I would like to help protect our wildlife and natural habitats around the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like what I have to say and just don't have the $ to give, please spread the word and share my campaign with others.  Also, you can take a look around you every day and appreciate the beauty all around you :) That would help me too :)

story:
I am Jimmy DeToto. Owner of DeToto Photo. We try to provide things as inexpensively as we can especially when involving children and animals. Too many times i've done the photography at a party that had a moonbounce and seen them ask to get one for their party... just to be told they cant afford it because they are EXPENSIVE to rent from most places. I'd like to help remedy that if i can. All of the contributors to this project will help with this project to be able to get everything set to be able to rent this out to all of the kids. Hoping to do $50 for the first day and $35 for additional days. And depending on the week/month we're having as a company i'd be able to give it out for free at times too with everyones help.

 

What we need is about $2300. About $1700 goes to getting the moonbounce here and then the rest to store it for the year. Everything else will go for maintaining, transporting and getting everything set to be able to rent out. If we do not reach our goal, We will put what we have received into the savings and we will put whatever we can towards the goal to be able to get this done as soon as possible.

 

I am always trying to help out... to make people happier and to provide them with things not normally available because of price. I do this personally and withing my businesses as well. Morals and goodwill to help anyway possible. So this would help alot and because of our prices being so low as well as living expenses, i havent been able to fully get this project set in motion, so i decided to see who was willing to help out. 

 

Thank you for considering this fundraiser. We are all very excited to get this going and will post pictures of all of the happy kids and events! Please share this if you can. Very much appreciated!

 

www.detotophoto.com 

www.facebook.com/detotophotography

DeTotophoto@hotmail.com

story:
Overview

The YoLink Finger and garage door sensor is the best garage door controller set in the market. What sets us apart from other products that allows you to remotely check, open, and close your garage door through an app is that our product is incredibly easy to install and compatible with all the garage door openers on the market. 

 

What makes YoLink Finger unique

  • Easiest to install because you don’t need any tools, wires, ladder - just peel the double glue type and stick the sensor on the top panel of the garage door, stick the Remote Touch on side of your garage door wall controller.

 

  • YoLink finger is 100% compatible with all garage door openers.  You can mount it on  the side of your wall controller or mount it on the side of your garage door remote. In seconds, change all brands of garage door systems to a smart garage door system.

 

 

  • Our long range of the LoRa wireless has a coverage of up to 100,000 square feet, unlike other wireless technologies that only cover inside for small homes. You will never worry about the limited WiFi coverage nor the connection drop.

 

 

 

  • The extremely low power cost; the YoLink garage sensor’s batteries included run more than 5 years of battery life, and the YoLink Finger run more than 3 years of battery life. Other wireless garage door sensor normally run under 2 years of battery life.

 

 

 

How does it work?

  • Download the YoLink App from Apple store or Google Play Store  and register your account.
  • Plug the Hub and connect it to the internet through your router’s Ethernet connector or WiFi network.
  • Scan the bar-code on the sensor and the Remote Touch to add the device to your YoLink App.
  • Peel the double glue types and stick your sensor on the garage and YoLink Touch on the garage controller.
  • You’re finished! Now you can check your garage door status and open/close your garage door from anywhere through your App. You will also be able to receive the alert when your garage door is opened/closed any time and you can check the history as well. 

 

Security

All the YoLink devices’ messages are encrypted with hardware key and AES’s cryptographic algorithms, ensuring that all the YoLink control messages are not re-playable or breakable

 

Affordable smart home whole house solution

Our team have worked in the smart home devices industry for more than 15 years. We are providing reliable, easy to use, high quality, and affordable whole house smart home solutions. 

Most of products are available in Amazon, please search YoLink. For detailed products' information please check:   http://www.yosmart.com

What's next?

We invented the YoLink Finger and have the prototype completed and already used in multiple houses for testing. We are continuously testing and fine-tuning the software, but we already have the working prototype finished. We are preparing the production as well as in the process of receiving the FCC certification, and will ship the perks to our backers start from Mar 2020.

 

Technical Specifications

Hardware:

  • YOLINK SIP which build in the STM32L0 microcontroller and Semtech LoRa Wireless chip and RF circuits.
  • ST lower power accelerator IC for sensor to detect the garage door open/close state
  • 100,000 cycle 3V low power motor for the Finger to click your garage door wall controller or remote.
  • FCC certifications for  garage door sensor, YoLink Finger, door sensors and Hub.

Software:

  • YoLink smart home firmware stack V1.03
  • Open cloud API support Mqtt, http, IFTTT, web soket.
  • iOS 9.0 or higher App and Anroid 4.4 or higher App

story:
Ice Rainbow: The Purest Titanium Double Wall Teacups

Woerden Ice Rainbow Titanium Teacups are a fusion of health, beauty and technology: advanced metalworking techniques that enrich our daily lives. 

The ultimate tea experience!

The titanium crystal colors are created by an anodizing treatment with different voltages. The cups are 100% titanium! Slight shifts in manufacturing conditions result in different surface-textures making each teacup unique and one-of-a-kind. There's no material coating, just a crystalline Titanium array that produces beautiful coloration.

Titanium anodizing voltage and color Guide.

It's an amazing feature of pure Titanium. The beautiful icy colors will never rust nor decay, they are safe, natural, and last forever! 

Why Titanium?

Stainless steel teacups leach Nickel and Chromium into drinks and have an unpleasant metal smell and taste. Glass teacups are usually heavy and brittle. Titanium teacups solve all of these problems.

Each ice rainbow teacup is made of 100% Grade 1 (CP1) Titanium! CP1 is the purest form of Titanium that is the most resistant to corrosion.

  • Retains the original taste of any drink or food. It is used extensively in high end kitchenware
  • The most biocompatible and safe metal for the human body
  • The only element that your body fully accepts - even bone will grow around it
  • Excellent resistance to corrosion, nearly equivalent to platinum
  • Named after Titans of Greek mythology because of its immense strength
  • Less than half the density of steel, perfectly weighted for a quality feel
  • Durable, a true heirloom piece to last generations

A Lifetime Beauty

Each teacup possesses a fusion of healthy, beauty and technology. They have a deep-rooted presence that speaks to the soul of the person holding it.

The snow-like crystal patten on the surface is the result of the unique advanced processing technology. 

The gorgeous Titanium teacups produce impressive glitters, bringing you the ultimate drinking experience!

Vacuumed Double Structure

The double-walled, airless structure design takes the advantage of Titanium features: "biocompatible", "light-weight", "strength"and "rustproof". It enables thorough thermal insulation.

Two layers of titanium surround a vacuumed, airless space. An airless layer between the outer and inner surface plates works as excellent thermal insulation, to a degree which was previously considered unattainable for metal.

Thus, while no condensation occurs on the surface, liquid inside is protected and sustains the heat for an extended amount of time. Just take your time and enjoy the ultimate drinking experience!

Titanium also has antibacterial activity under light, so by just drying it in places exposed to sunlight or fluorescent light you will be able to keep them always clean.

It  gives you a more comfortable and burn-free grip.  Also, there is no need to worry you might leave fingerprints on the surface. 

Specifications

  • Size: Φ53mm X h40mm (Φ2.1 inches X h1.6inches)
  • Capacity:  40ml (1.35oz)
  • Net Weight:  26g (0.9oz)

A Daily Touch

A warm cup of tea will always be there to jump start your morning or calm down your afternoon.​ The teacup’s exquisitely tender touch on skin and lips defines an entirely new drinking sensation! 

Our Titanium teacups maintain the  the truest and purest taste of your tea, and provide you the ultimate drinking experience! 

Each Teacup achieves the standard of quality that Woerden Designs pursues. As a fusion of health, beauty and technology, these Titanium teacups are also perfect gifts for your family and friends.

Each teacup comes with a Titanium (CP1) fruit fork for FREE. Each teacups set comes with FIVE forks! The forks are ONLY free for pledges during the campaign period.

Pledge now and help us bring the Ice Rainbow Titanium Double Wall Teacups to life!
