story: Attachments
story_txt: Attachments

story:
Capture your real image

Zero refraction metal mirror with superior reflective properties.  Handcrafted by some truly amazing artisans, Reflection of tradition and reality.

What is unique about this mirror.

Metal mirror is famous for its unique mirror making tradition where metal mirrors are made from a cast alloy of copper and polished by hand. These auspicious non-glass mirrors are passed down, inherited or given away as gifts  or collectibles.  The magic of the mirror is in the image, considered to be in its purest form; for, unlike ordinary glass mirrors, the light is reflected directly from the mirror’s surface rather than the back – with no refraction. As far as the casting process goes, the alloy is cast no more than 3mm thick as a flat surface that is then polished by hand over many days to obtain a highly flawless reflection.

Zero Refraction

The normal glass mirrors with a reflective back cover will never give the real life image since there is some amount of refraction too. Metal mirror does not have the problem of refraction as there is no glass part and the shining surface is on top itself. A simple experiment can be done to verify this. Just place an object touching the mirror, the reflection of the object will be touching the object. Do this experiment in a normal glass mirror. The reflected image will not touch the object. Reflections in a normal mirror. You will see the gap between reflections.

100% Metal and Handmade

This metal mirror is a front surface reflection mirror, which eliminates secondary reflections and distortions typical of back surface glass-mirrors. The metals used in the alloy are copper and tin, but the process of making this alloy is unknown to public and is maintained as a zealously guarded family secret of artisans; This mirror is polished by hand for several days in a row to achieve their reflective surface. This metal mirror is not mass produced and is only hand made with all its perfections. While commercially available glass mirrors reflect an image, because of a silver coating at its rear Metal Mirror is the only mirror which reflects from the front plane. So, it is only in the metal mirror that your real image is captured.

This is NOT a typical fundraising campaign! It is an exclusive 'presales' event.

You see, we at the masterpiecestores are going to handcraft you some highly unique, specially designed and polished metal mirrors. We sell only one handmade product at a time in our store and select very gifted artisans to make our products. Our products are limited edition products only. Extremely limited edition ONLY available during this campaign and they will NEVER be made again.

That’s awesome—but why am I reading this on Indiegogo?

The “crowd source” website is the perfect way to bring you zero refraction metal mirrors that, well, don’t even exist, Yet. We’re offering you unique zero refraction metal mirrors of various sizes at a special price that is exclusive to this campaign. Direct from us to you. Indiegogo is the platform we’ve selected to facilitate preorder sales of these mirrors. We also added some other “perks” in celebration of our next chapters for those who are interested.

Unique and handcrafted Metal Mirror

The metal mirror will be unlike anything you’ve tried before. Once you try it, you’ll never want to go back to silver coated glass mirrors. 

All the sizes you could dream of.

Size of the mirror is the size of the reflective portion of the mirror and in specified in diameter.  You can purchase 3 Inch,4 Inch,5 Inch,6 Inch ,7 Inch and 12 Inch mirrors.

Powered by people

Crowd sourcing has been the foundation of so many amazing, inspiring and independent products, and what it stands for taps directly into masterpiecestores’s metal mirror. We’re all about the power of people coming together to help build something meaningful. That’s why we’re looking to you, the community, to be part of creating the amazing metal mirror.

Who We Are

We are genuine and curious explorers. We love authentic hand crafted products made by real people and have visited to some of the most remote places on earth, connecting the lives of some of the least known and most imperiled indigenous craftsmen, who are to be prized for their distinctive lifestyles, art and traditions.

Our mission is to preserve the next generation of global craftsmen by uncovering the trapped value in the handmade-economy. 

If you haven’t heard of masterpiecestores.com before, we’re an independent company that believes in innovation through collaboration and built an amazing community 150,000 plus masterpiece stores fans strong and counting. We are completely different to any other company you’ll ever support. All of our customers can have their say on the direction of our products through masterpiecestores.com Help us make the zero refraction metal mirror, and then be a part of making it yours.

              Masterpiecestores.com Founders

How We Do It

Every product on masterpiecestores.com comes with a unique opportunity to link with artisans and their community. It offers a fair chance for unknown artisans to join with worldwide market of unique handcrafted-products.

Why you should support us ?.

You’ll be part of an open community that brings people all over the world something different from the usual players to support artisans from all corners of the world. We want to challenge the big corporates and show them that independence, community and innovation can play a lead role in the world market of handcrafted products.Basically, we want to shake up the handmade products world, starting with metal crafts.

What we will do with your money ?.

Our goal is to bring metal mirror into the hands of even more users. Every single cent from this campaign will go into producing the unique handcrafted and zero refraction metal mirror, with nothing to spare. The process is very time consuming and the technology is indigenous.

Often artisans make 2 to 3 pieces of the mirror to get perfection in reflection and finish, Hence the process is expensive and time consuming.

If there’s enough demand for at least 2,500 units, it’s enough for us to kick-off the project. More importantly, it’ll show us that this is a product you really want bring to life.

Capture Real Image Referral Race.

Share it on Facebook, Twiter, Whatsapp, Linkedin, g+ or any other social networking sites.

Get 5 referrals for a perk and claim one mirror free from the same group.

                                                                      OR
Get 5 referrals from various perks and claim one mirror free from 3, 4 or 5 Inch group.


Metal mirror referral race is on. 

To Participate in Referral Race, No need to contribute money instead  share this campaign in your network to get referrals.

You can check your referrals anytime by logging in to your Indiegogo account, selecting My Profile, and selecting the Referrals tab.

The Referral Race is on until the end of the Metal Mirror Indiegogo campaign. See Terms and Conditions and more detailed instructions here

Risks and challenges

There's always risks that can delay the process before metal mirror gets into your hands. We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we are dealing with.

Manufacturing process: One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the artisans cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by capabilities for mass production by real people.The process is very time consuming and the technology is indigenous. Often artisans make 2 to 3 pieces of the mirror to get perfection in reflection and finish, Hence the process is expensive and time consuming.

Enhancements in production: When in production there are a couple of parameters that can be improved during the process such as the color, reflection, weight, final finishing, Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with metal mirror. We will do everything we can to ensure that mirror ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from artisans or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.

                                                                                FAQ


I forgot to add shipping to my Perk and contributed 20 USD - have I now paid for shipping?

If you have already purchased Metal Mirror Perk, but did not contribute the 20 USD extra needed for shipping at the same time, we recommend you to buy the Shipping Perk separately.

However, if you did not buy the Shipping Perk separately, but made an additional contribution of 20 USD, we will match this contribution with your metal mirror and you don't need to buy the Shipping Perk. This counts as the shipping cost.

I did not choose a Perk when contributing, but I paid the whole sum for the Mirror - do I get a Mirror anyway?

If you made a contribution for the mirror, but forgot to add a mirror Perk, please contact us at,  care <at> masterpiecestores <dot> com.

Will you keep me updated with the progress if I contribute?

Yes! When you contribute to the metal mirror campaign we will ensure that you receive all the latest information about the mirror project as it progresses.

Are shipping costs included in the Perk price?

No, the price is excluding delivery. Please add 20 USD for shipping after you have selected your Perk. For example, if you have selected the Mirror Perk for 199 USD, increase the sum to 219 USD. However you do not have to pay shipping cost for purchases of mirrors with price over 500 USD.

Does the Perk price include VAT or other taxes?

No, contributors must pay any taxes and duties related to the selected destination country. Tax, customs fees and other applicable customs charges are not included in the price of the mirror. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes.

I had problems making a contribution, please help?

If you faced problems when making a contribution, please check common contribution errors.

I made a contribution, but now I've changed my mind. Can I have my money back?

Contributions on Indiegogo are nonrefundable according to the Indiegogo Terms of Use. A contribution is a transaction that takes place purely between the contributor, campaign owner and payment processor. Masterpiecestores.com does not refund any contributions made. However, if you are not happy with the product we deliver, you may return the mirror within 14 days of receiving it. Read more from the Indiegogo Help Center.

I am not happy with the Mirror, can I return it?

You may return the mirror delivered to you within 14 days of receiving it. Please note that return shipping, including any customs or other charges as applicable, will be borne by the sender. Keep in mind that we only accept returns from ship-to countries supported by the metal mirror Indiegogo campaign. 

To request a return please submit a ticket to care <at> masterpiecestores <dot> com.  Please indicate clearly in the subject and body of the message “RETURN”, providing any relevant information including contribution number, contribution date and payment method utilized. Please return the product in good condition.

When will you ship the Mirror?

Assuming the Indiegogo campaign reaches its goal, we aim to ship the first mirrors in 4th week of May 2015. Please note that the delivery date is subject to change. In any event, we will keep you updated on the schedule in our update emails. 

Will the metal mirror be available in my country?

The campaign is applicable worldwide, however, if we cannot ship our products due to any unforeseen reasons we will let you know and refund your money. 

If I take part in the Indiegogo campaign, will I get the metal mirror before others?

You will be among the first ones to get the metal mirror. We'll ship the mirrors in the order of contributions made through Indiegogo.

Will the Mirror be available also for general sale or only through Indiegogo?

If there is demand, we'll consider all options. In any case, the Indiegogo contributors will get the mirrors first and with the lowest price at the time of delivery.

After contributing to the campaign, what happens next? Do you just deliver the mirror to me?

We will keep you updated frequently on the progress of the mirror project by e-mail. Once we get close to the delivery date, we will ask you to confirm your shipping address and we will provide further instructions on handling VAT or any other applicable taxes. 

Want to become a Reseller or purchase in Wholesale quantities?

Always powered, always ready. Looking for corporate promotional gifts, collectibles or custom branding? Are you interested in buying tens, hundreds or thousands of masterpieces?

Please e-mail care@masterpiecestores.com. Learn how you can profit from this opportunity and become a reseller of zero refraction metal mirrors. Please e-mail us with subject RESELLER.

I want to upgrade my perk.

Please contribute the difference and select no perk. We will match up your contribution to the correct perk and will confirm after the campaign.

Problem backing us?

Please contact support@indiegogo.com.
story_txt:
Capture
your real image
Zero
refraction metal mirror with superior reflective properties.  Handcrafted
by some truly amazing artisans, Reflection of tradition and reality.
What is unique about this mirror.Metal mirror is famous for its unique
mirror making tradition where metal mirrors are made from a cast alloy of
copper and polished by hand. These auspicious non-glass mirrors are passed
down, inherited or given away as gifts  or collectibles.  The magic
of the mirror is in the image, considered to be in its purest form; for, unlike
ordinary glass mirrors, the light is reflected directly from the mirror’s
surface rather than the back – with no refraction. As far as the casting
process goes, the alloy is cast no more than 3mm thick as a flat surface that
is then polished by hand over many days to obtain a highly flawless reflection.
Zero
Refraction
The normal
glass mirrors with a reflective back cover will never give the real life image
since there is some amount of refraction too. Metal mirror does not have the
problem of refraction as there is no glass part and the shining surface is on
top itself. A simple experiment can be done to verify this. Just place an
object touching the mirror, the reflection of the object will be touching the
object. Do this experiment in a normal glass mirror. The reflected image will
not touch the object. Reflections in a normal mirror. You will see the gap
between reflections.
100% Metal
and HandmadeThis metal
mirror is a front surface reflection mirror, which eliminates secondary
reflections and distortions typical of back surface glass-mirrors. The metals
used in the alloy are copper and tin, but the process of making this alloy is
unknown to public and is maintained as a zealously guarded family secret of
artisans; This mirror is polished by hand for several days in a row to achieve
their reflective surface. This metal mirror is not mass produced and is only
hand made with all its perfections. While commercially available glass mirrors
reflect an image, because of a silver coating at its rear Metal Mirror is the
only mirror which reflects from the front plane. So, it is only in the metal
mirror that your real image is captured.This is NOT a typical
fundraising campaign! It is an exclusive 'presales' event.
You
see, we at the masterpiecestores are going to handcraft you some highly unique,
specially designed and polished metal mirrors. We sell only one handmade
product at a time in our store and select very gifted artisans to make our
products. Our products are limited edition products only. Extremely limited edition ONLY available
during this campaign and they will NEVER be made again.
That’s awesome—but why am I
reading this on Indiegogo?
The
“crowd source” website is the perfect way to bring you zero refraction metal
mirrors that, well, don’t even exist, Yet. We’re offering you unique zero
refraction metal mirrors of various sizes at a special price that is exclusive
to this campaign. Direct from us to you. Indiegogo is the platform
we’ve selected to facilitate preorder sales of these mirrors. We also added
some other “perks” in celebration of our next chapters for those who are
interested.Unique and handcrafted Metal MirrorThe metal
mirror will be unlike anything you’ve tried before. Once you try it, you’ll
never want to go back to silver coated glass mirrors. All the sizes you could dream of. Size of the mirror is the size of the reflective portion of the
mirror and in specified in diameter.  You
can purchase 3 Inch,4 Inch,5 Inch,6 Inch ,7 Inch and 12 Inch mirrors.
Powered by peopleCrowd sourcing
has been the foundation of so many amazing, inspiring and independent products,
and what it stands for taps directly into masterpiecestores’s metal mirror.
We’re all about the power of people coming together to help build something
meaningful. That’s why we’re looking to you, the community, to be part of
creating the amazing metal mirror.Who We Are
We are genuine and
curious explorers. We love authentic hand crafted products made by real people
and have visited to some of the most remote places on earth, connecting the
lives of some of the least known and most imperiled indigenous craftsmen, who
are to be prized for their distinctive lifestyles, art and traditions. 
Our mission is to preserve
the next generation of global craftsmen by uncovering the trapped value in the
handmade-economy. 
If you haven’t heard of
masterpiecestores.com before, we’re an independent company that believes in
innovation through collaboration and built an amazing community 150,000 plus
masterpiece stores fans strong and counting. We are completely different to
any other company you’ll ever support. All of our customers can have their say
on the direction of our products through masterpiecestores.com Help us make the
zero refraction metal mirror, and then be a part of making it yours.
              Masterpiecestores.com Founders
How We Do It
Every product on
masterpiecestores.com comes with a unique opportunity to link with artisans and
their community. It offers a fair
chance for unknown artisans to join with worldwide market of unique handcrafted-products.Why you should support us ?.
You’ll be
part of an open community that brings people all over the world something
different from the usual players to support artisans from all corners of the
world. We want to challenge the big corporates and show them that independence,
community and innovation can play a lead role in the world market of
handcrafted products.Basically, we want to shake up the handmade products
world, starting with metal crafts.
What we will do with your money ?.
Our goal is to bring metal mirror
into the hands of even more users. Every single cent from this campaign will go
into producing the unique handcrafted and zero refraction metal mirror, with
nothing to spare. The process is very time consuming and the technology is
indigenous.
Often artisans make 2 to 3 pieces of
the mirror to get perfection in reflection and finish, Hence the process is
expensive and time consuming.
If there’s enough demand for at least
2,500 units, it’s enough for us to kick-off the project. More importantly,
it’ll show us that this is a product you really want bring to life.Capture
Real Image Referral Race.
Share it on Facebook, Twiter,
Whatsapp, Linkedin, g+ or any other social networking sites. Get 5 referrals for a perk and claim one mirror free from the same group.
                                                                      ORGet 5 referrals from various perks and claim one mirror free from 3, 4 or 5 Inch group.

Metal
mirror referral race is on. To Participate in Referral Race, No need to contribute money instead  share this campaign in your network to get referrals.You can check your referrals anytime by logging in to your
Indiegogo account, selecting My Profile, and selecting the Referrals tab.
The Referral Race
is on until the end of the Metal Mirror Indiegogo campaign. See Terms and
Conditions and more detailed instructions hereRisks and challenges
There's
always risks that can delay the process before metal mirror gets into your
hands. We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we
are dealing with.
Manufacturing
process: One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality
control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many
reasons why the artisans cooperation will not be easy. We understand that
Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by
capabilities for mass production by real people.The process is very time
consuming and the technology is indigenous. Often artisans make 2 to 3 pieces
of the mirror to get perfection in reflection and finish, Hence the process is
expensive and time consuming.

your experience with metal mirror. We will do everything we can to ensure that

story:
THE WORLD'S FAVORITE FOOT-POWERED WASHING MACHINE.

    • Quick and easy to use
    • Small, compact, and portable
    • Water-saving and no electricity required
    • Only takes 5 - 10 minutes per load
    • Uses 80% less water than standard washing machines

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

       

      Our team has been developing the Drumi since 2013. Since then, we have gone through multiple prototypes, won 5 awards, and gained global recognition. We have worked hard to bring you the best Drumi ever.

       

      What We Need & What You Get 

      Before we enter full production, we need an additional $100,000 in order to improve our tooling and manufacturing process in order to deliver the newest Drumi at the highest level of production quality.

      • Earth's Berries: An Ontario-based organic detergent company. Soap nuts are an eco-friendly detergent that do not require a rinse cycle
      • Drumi: Early Bird. Finally, the Drumi is available for our international friends. Get one for yourself or give one to a loved one for Christmas. We will send you a Christmas gift card before the Drumi delivers in October 2016.
      • Get a Drumi, Give a Drumi: This allows you to receive a Drumi for yourself and we split the cost with you to send one to someone in need.

       

       

       

       

       

      Shipping rates will vary based on your location. If you have any questions about shipping to your area, please email us at info@yirego.com.

       

       

       

       

      What is the Drumi?  

      The Drumi is a foot-powered washing machine that requires minimal amounts of water and no electricity. It is compact and easy to maneuver. 

      What is the maximum loading capacity per cycle?

      Each cycle can hold up to 5 pounds of clothing. This measures up to approximately 5 - 7 personal items (t-shirts, undergarments, etc). We do not recommend towels or bed sheets as they are a bit too heavy.

      What types of clothing can I wash in the Drumi?

      Anything from undergarments to pet clothes, baby clothes, and ordinary t-shirts.

      How long does it take for a cycle with the Drumi?

      It takes approximately 5 - 10 minutes for a wash: approximately 3 minutes for a wash, 2 minutes for a rinse and 1 minute for a spin.

      How much water does the Drumi use per load?

      Approximately 5L - 10L of water is required for a wash and an additional 5L - 10L for rinse. The lid of the Drumi can be used as a way to measure and add water; it can hold 5L at once. 

      How do I get rid of the water?

      There is a twist valve located in the back of the Drumi that will release the water.

      Where does the water go?

      The water is released through the back. The Drumi will include a detachable hose that allows you to channel where the water is released to.

      How wet are the clothes when I'm done a cycle?

      The Drumi spins the clothes, leaving them a little bit damp. They can then be hung to dry.

      Do I need to find a nearby power supply? 

      No, this product does not require any energy consumption and is powered entirely by a foot pedal.

      What is the cost per load?

      The Drumi is very cost-effective. There is no additional cost for energy and the Drumi actually saves the user money. This is because it reduces the use of a standard washing machine. 

      What type of detergents can I use?

      Liquid, powder detergent or any type of detergent alternatives you may use. If the user chooses an eco-friendly detergent, they will have an entirely renewable laundry  experience.

      What are Soap Nuts?

      Soap Nuts are a natural laundry detergent alternative. There are a natural surfactant that separates the dirt from the clothing. 

      If I'm allergic to nuts, can I still use Soap Nuts?

      Yes! Soap Nuts are not actually made out of a nut, but they are an outer shell of a berry. Soap Nuts are a hypo-allergenic, meaning that they are not likely to irritate sensitive skin.

      What is the Drumi made of?

      The Drumi is made of a combination of stainless steel, aluminum, and engineered plastic.

      How can I store the Drumi?

      The Drumi is very compact and portable, making it easy to store in small spaces and areas. Because of its materials, it can be stored in both wet and dry areas.

      Do you offer any different models?

      Currently we are offering the newest version of the Drumi. We plan to develop other models down the road in order to meet the needs for our various user segments.

      What will happen if you don't reach the campaign goal? Will I still receive my Drumi?

      Yes! You will receive your Drumi no matter what. We are doing flexible funding, which means we will receive all of the funds raised regardless if we hit our goal or not.

story:
3 Animals - Endless possibilities

 

 

Developed with children

There's nothing better than working with kids. That's why children have tested each prototype. For every prototype the design has improved, and now children can't keep their fingers off it.

No batteries.

No apps needed.

 

Fueled by imagination.

 

Coming to Life

To celebrate the imagination that comes from creative play, we directed 4 small episodes of FableWood Stopmotion for you guys. Hope you enjoy.

In episode #1, our main character get's mistreated by a fierce bully. But will that stop our main character?

In episode #2 our main character runs into an obstacle that seem impossible to pass. What will he do?

In episode #3 our main character gets a little visit from outer space. What will he do about that?

Now he's fast as heck. But what happens, when he meets an enemy, who doesn't care about speed. Episode #4 is the last and longest episode with a whopping 41 second. It’s called “The Fight”! Enjoy!

 

Meet the Family

 

 

Endless possibilities

 

The Socials

 

Danish Design

Growing up in Denmark, we couldn't help being influenced by the long proud history of Danish Design. The magic of creating your own imaginations of Lego inspired the modular design. The aesthetics of Kay Bojesens minimalistic designs inspired the simple wooden expression. FableWood is our way of creating a toy that is both fun to play with, and a piece of interior design that you can display proudly.

 

Magnetic Assembly

 

The intuitive magnetic interface allows FableWood to practically assemble itself

 

Sealed Magnets

 

The magnets are sealed safely within the wood

 

Double Snap - Double Fun

 

In the earliest prototypes, we found that children got frustrated when experiencing magnetic resistance. So we developed an interface with increased  possibilities of magnetic attraction. That means twice as many possibilities for creating whacky creatures! And the kids? They love it!

 

Perk Chart 

The Team

3 dads! Sure, we're engineers, product developers, designers, toy specialists and craftsmen as well. But everything we do, we do because of the offspring. 

Rasmus, Kristian & Simon.

Behind the scenes

Sure this whole campaign looks great. But to make something look this nice, we had to go through a lot of trial runs. And when you finally make it, all the hard work is suddenly worth it.

 

 

Time plan

Materials

We have carefully selected the best natural materials for our toys. The characteristic wood is North American walnut and ash with a beautiful appearance and durable robustness. 

The magnets, seamlessly sealed inside the wood, are strong Neodymium magnets that provide a satisfying snap when you combine the pieces. Neodymium magnets are lead-free, so that's one thing less to worry about.

The wood is hand polished and surface treated with a mix of natural oils and bees wax for a safe and durable finish. 

Safety

We take safety very seriously and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you.

The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH as well as the equivalent US standards covered by ASTM F963 and CPSIA.

Responsible Manufacturing

Our manufacturer is a responsible Danish-Vietnamese toy manufacturer. Their facilities and working environment live up to Danish standards and they are continuously taking initiatives to reduce their environmental footprint. 

Shipping & Quality Assurance.

As it requires separate safety certifications, in each country we plan on selling to, we have primarily chosen only to ship to USA and EU (Norway is included as European toy standards apply). If you don't reside within these specified countries, hit us an email at shipping@letsgorilla.com, then we'll check if we should include your country!

We want to make sure that every single animal we ship out is in perfect condition. That means we will inspect all individual parts ourselves before shipping out from Denmark. 

Please note: If the shipping address is outside EU customs and VAT may apply!

Risks and challenges

Creating a toy for the first time is a bumpy ride and when you are working with magnets you want to make sure that things are done properly. That is why we have teamed up with a toy manufacturer experienced in delivering quality products that are compliant with the strict European standards. We have also received guidance from the governmental agency for toy safety in Denmark (Sikkerhedsstyrelsen) as well as an independent consumer lab specializing in toy safety.
story_txt:
3 Animals - Endless possibilities   Developed with childrenThere's nothing better than working with kids. That's why children have tested each prototype. For every prototype the design has improved, and now children can't keep their fingers off it.No batteries.No apps needed. Fueled by imagination. Coming to LifeTo celebrate the imagination that comes from creative play, we directed 4 small episodes of FableWood Stopmotion for you guys. Hope you enjoy.In episode #1, our main character get's mistreated by a fierce bully. But will that stop our main character?In episode #2 our main character runs into an obstacle that seem impossible to pass. What will he do?In episode #3 our main character gets a little visit from outer space. What will he do about that?Now he's fast as heck. But what happens, when he meets an enemy, who doesn't care about speed. Episode #4 is the last and longest episode with a whopping 41 second. It’s called “The Fight”! Enjoy! Meet the Family  Endless possibilities The Socials Danish DesignGrowing up in Denmark, we couldn't help being influenced by the long proud history of Danish Design. The magic of creating your own imaginations of Lego inspired the modular design. The aesthetics of Kay Bojesens minimalistic designs inspired the simple wooden expression. FableWood is our way of creating a toy that is both fun to play with, and a piece of interior design that you can display proudly. Magnetic Assembly The intuitive magnetic interface allows FableWood to practically assemble itself Sealed Magnets The magnets are sealed safely within the wood Double Snap - Double Fun In the earliest prototypes, we found that children got frustrated when experiencing magnetic resistance. So we developed an interface with increased  possibilities of magnetic attraction. That means twice as many possibilities for creating whacky creatures! And the kids? They love it! Perk Chart The Team3 dads! Sure, we're engineers, product developers, designers, toy specialists and craftsmen as well. But everything we do, we do because of the offspring. Rasmus, Kristian & Simon.Behind the scenesSure this whole campaign looks great. But to make something look this nice, we had to go through a lot of trial runs. And when you finally make it, all the hard work is suddenly worth it.

 
 Time planMaterialsWe have carefully selected the best natural materials for our toys. The characteristic wood is North American walnut and ash with a beautiful appearance and durable robustness. The magnets, seamlessly sealed inside the wood, are strong Neodymium magnets that provide a satisfying snap when you combine the pieces. Neodymium magnets are lead-free, so that's one thing less to worry about.The wood is hand polished and surface treated with a mix of natural oils and bees wax for a safe and durable finish. SafetyWe take safety very seriously and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you.The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH as well as the equivalent US standards covered by ASTM F963 and CPSIA.Responsible ManufacturingOur manufacturer is a responsible Danish-Vietnamese toy manufacturer. Their facilities and working environment live up to Danish standards and they are continuously taking initiatives to reduce their environmental footprint. Shipping & Quality Assurance.As it requires separate safety certifications, in each country we plan on selling to, we have primarily chosen only to ship to USA and EU (Norway is included as European toy standards apply). If you don't reside within these specified countries, hit us an email at shipping@letsgorilla.com, then we'll check if we should include your country!We want to make sure that every single animal we ship out is in perfect condition. That means we will inspect all individual parts ourselves before shipping out from Denmark. Please note: If the shipping address is outside EU customs and VAT may apply!Risks and challengesCreating a toy for the first time is a bumpy ride and when you are working with magnets you want to make sure that things are done properly. That is why we have teamed up with a toy manufacturer experienced in delivering quality products that are compliant with the strict European standards. We have also received guidance from the governmental agency for toy safety in Denmark (Sikkerhedsstyrelsen) as well as an independent consumer lab specializing in toy safety.

story:
Short Summary

The Cnyf is an all round, multipurpose blade made from 100% Carbon Fiber, even the three cutting edges are carbon. Safer than a metal knife, at a sturdy 6mm thick, the Cnyf is ultra light weight and perfect for having with you on outdoor adventure trips, camping, hiking and for emergencies and self defense, it's also the prettiest knife around!

  • My background is manufacturing unmanned aerial systems so we work a lot with carbon fiber and similar materials. This is my very first crown funding campaign, but I have tons of experience with media, business and making things work! 
  • This campaign is pretty straight forward, I'm a very outdoors person, and I wanted to make a unique knife for my travels and adventures, something lightweight and durable, with features I often use and need when out and about, it's also a really great one to show friends!
  • With your help I can mass produce the Cnyf and share it with others.

What I Need & What You Get

  • I need funding to mass produce the Cnyf, this allows for much better pricing and quality, enabling me to make the Cnyf available to everyone. An estimate of around $ 15 000.00 would work well to get going, covering design and manufacturing costs, as well as shipping and handling.
  • The Cnyf project will have some awesome perks, and if we get enough funding in, I'm offering a seriously cool Ultra Edition Cnyf set and top secret Hatchet!!

The Cnyf

  • With three carbon cutting edges, the Cnyf is a very unique piece of gear
  • A sharp hook can be put to various uses and add's to the aesthetic
  • A long multipurpose clip allows the Cnyf to be secured and also can be used as a tool
  • What piece of kit is useful without a bottle opener ?!
  • Different sized holes for rope, chord and clips along with a very comfortable shape and grip makes the Cnyf your trusty cutting tool out and about.

Risks & Challenges

  • As I have extensive background and experience with design and manufacturing, there are very few risks, apart from the project not being funded.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't back this project please feel free to share it with your friend, I would very much appreciate it!
  • Don't forget about the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you very much for taking the time to rear, I hope to see your name on the shipping list of people soon to receive their very own Cnyf!

story:
What is the Roost Smart Garage Door Sensor?

Have you ever had one of those mornings where you are in a rush to get out of the house and before you know it, you’re a mile down the road wondering if you remembered to close your garage door? Yes, we’ve all been there.

Enter the Roost Smart Garage Door Sensor, a small device that simply mounts on your garage door. The device will send notifications via Wi-Fi to your smartphone to alert you to the state of your garage door; open or closed. We'll even let you know if your door is open before you're a minute down the road!

Features

  • Receive smartphone notifications whenever your garage door is open. 
  • Always know the state of your garage door.  Preset options to notify you if:
    • Door still open before bedtime?
    • Door still open after drive away?
    • Door not opened when kids should be home?
  • Simple setup. Easy, fast and silent connection to home Wi-Fi.
  • Convenient and Easy.  Included simple mounting clip attaches to the inside of your garage door in less than 5 minutes once connected. 
  • Share alerts with your family.  Unique monitoring feature allows other family members to receive notifications on their smartphones.
  • Battery powered.  Lasts for 2 years with replaceable battery pack available from Roost for $9.99.

Key Benefits

  • Peace-of-mind: Roost smart sensors helps to provide you with a greater sense of awareness about the security of your home.
  • Monitor the activity of your garage door openings and closings throughout the day.
  • Ability to tune the frequency of the door notifications to your personal preferences or turn off completely.
  • Roost smart garage door sensor helps you to monitor the "heartbeat of your home."

 

 

How does it work?

Over the last several years, we have worked to create a free mobile app that already has functionality for our earlier two products, the Roost Smart Battery and the Roost Smart Water Leak and Freeze Detector. With more than 100,000 devices in consumer’s homes today across North America and Europe, we have delivered a robust app and cloud solution that reliably sends alerts and notifications to your smartphone. 

With our new Garage Door Sensor, we started with this same Wi-Fi chip, micro processing technology and cloud based platform solution from our existing products. We then built a device where we added a small accelerometer, a 2-year lithium battery and a software algorithm that accurately senses the horizontal and vertical motion of your garage door to determine the state of the door: open or closed.

Whenever the garage door opens, the Garage Door Sensor sends a signal through your home Wi-Fi and then to the Roost cloud. This triggers a notification to your smartphone telling you that your garage is open. By using the app, you can set up how frequently you would like to get these notifications, whether it’s every time the door opens, or just specific times when you want to be notified.  

Note: you must have access to Wi-Fi and a smartphone.

Use Cases

  1. Have you ever woken up in the morning only to realize that your garage door has been open all night long? 
    • We have a unique “before bedtime” app feature that allows you to receive a notification at a time of your choosing if your garage door is still open. 
  2. Have you ever been 5 miles down the road and your spouse turns to you and asks if you remembered to close the garage door? 
    • We have a “door still open” timer feature in our app that allows you to set a time between 1 minute and 10 minutes to automatically trigger a notification if your garage door is left open after driving away. 
  3. Have you ever wondered if your teenagers arrived home during the time period that they said they would? 
    • We have a “door not opened when it should be” feature that allows you to specify a timeframe of when your garage door should have opened. Receive a notification if your teen does not arrive home by that 4pm time you agreed to. 

How do I set up the Smart Garage Door Sensor in my home?

Easily! The process of opening your Roost Smart Garage Door Sensor package, connecting it to your home’s Wi-Fi and installing it on your garage door takes less than 5 minutes. No wires, hubs or professionals needed.

  1. Download the Roost Smart Home App
  2. Follow the step-by-step instructions in the App to connect your garage door sensor to your home’s Wi-Fi.
  3. Uncover the double sided tape on the back of the garage door sensor’s clip and place it near the top your garage door. Or, use the included screws to attach the clip to your garage door.
  4. Set custom notifications within the App to remain “in the know” about the state of your garage door at all times.

A little background on us

Roost is a Smart Home startup based in Sunnyvale, CA that was founded in 2014. Throughout our almost 4 years in business, we have created several products for around your home that help to make your home “smart” while also giving you peace of mind that your home is safe, wherever you are.

We started with a patented smart 9V battery that transforms your existing smoke alarm into a “smart alarm” that sends notifications to your smartphone anytime an alarm goes off and also alerts you weeks before the battery dies so that you can replace it before the annoying 3AM chirp of a low battery starts. We then followed with a smart water leak and freeze detector that alerts you if there is a water leak or a drastic change in temperature/humidity in your home. Think, under your kitchen sink, behind your washer and dryer or next to your hot water heater.

We pride ourselves on being the simplest and most affordable solution in the smart home market with all of our products priced under $50.

A little over a year ago, we switched our go-to-market strategy to focus almost solely on the insurance industry. Today, we sell our products directly to insurance companies around the world who distribute our products to their home insurance policyholders to help decrease claims costs and to also increase customer engagement.

Don’t worry, you’ll always be able to find and purchase our products directly on the Roost website (getroost.com). 

What we need from you

So, you may be wondering why we decided to launch an Indiegogo campaign for the new Smart Garage Door Sensor. Our main goal with this project is to get as much open and honest feedback as we possibly can from you, the people who actually use our products on a daily basis.

We have been working diligently to design a unique product that will make a difference in your every day life at an affordable price.  With that being said, your feedback is very important to us!

As an Indiegogo backer of our campaign, you will get exclusive access not only to our new Garage Door Sensor but also our Smart Battery and Smart Water Leak and Freeze Detector at a discounted rate. We are offering 20%-38% off of our products through our Indiegogo perks – the lowest prices that consumers will ever find our products!!

Like, Comment, Share!

We are so grateful for each and every one of your contributions to help make the Roost Smart Garage Door Sensor as successful as it can be. We will be sharing updates throughout this campaign and our manufacturing process here on our Indiegogo page and also on our Roost social media accounts.

Please like, comment and share your thoughts on our new Smart Garage Door Sensor with your network! You can find us on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and LinkedIn.

story:
MÄNNKITCHEN MK9: The knife that’s not for everybody.

The MK9 is large.  Too large for some.

The MK9 is heavier than most chef knives.

The blade of the MK9 is longer than the standard 8 inches.

It's wide.  So wide you can’t touch your knuckles to the cutting board.

It’s hard.  We chose very hard Nitrogen steel, even though it takes longer to sharpen.

The MK9 was not made for everyone.

Read on to see if it was made for you. 

 

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 1: The Steel 

The MK9 Blade is made of revolutionary X63-Nitrogen Steel. The addition of nitrogen during the alloying process creates a tighter grain structure within the steel, enabling surgical sharpness, exceptional edge retention, improved corrosion resistance, and hardness up to 63 HRC.

X63-Nitrogen Steel is made in the USA. Its special properties allow it to outperform market leading imported steels in edge retention, durability, and corrosion resistance.

In short, it's the perfect knife steel for professional kitchens.  

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 2: The Shape

The MK9 features a Convex Spine Profile.  Unlike most knives, it curves downward at both ends, enabling a more natural wrist position while cutting that reduces wrist strain and helps prevent wedging in large ingredients.

If you spend a lot of time with a knife in your hands, your elbow, wrist, and knife hand will thank you for using an MK9.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 3: Extra Width

Over 2.5 inch blade width at the heel increases knuckle clearance, eases food transfer & extends blade life.  With most chef knives you need to be careful not to scrape your knuckles on the cutting board when you complete your chop.  Cooks compensate by cutting near the counter/table edges to save their knuckles.  With the MK9, that's no longer a concern. 

Wide blade makes food transfer quick and easy.

Plus, there's enough width that you can sharpen it for a generation or two and still have a magnificent blade for your heirs to fight over.

 

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 4: Extra Length

9 Inch blade for improved slicing and making quick work of large ingredients.  The blade features a relatively straight edge for the bulk of its length, with the belly concentrated in the front 1/3.  This enables it to perform well whether chopping or slicing, and it has the length to handle large ingredients quickly.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 6: Extra Comfort

The MK9 features a rounded & polished spine for exceptional comfort in a pinch grip. Cooks often develop a callous on their index finger where the spine presses against the skin.  An unpolished spine with square edges creates friction while cutting, leading to discomfort, blistering, and a "cook's callous".  

Cutting is more comfortable with the MK9.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 2: Exceptional Grip

Ergonomic large handle cradles the hand for an effortlessly firm grip-even for those with large hands.  We eliminated angular edges and added both width and thickness to create a substantial handle that feels like a natural extension of the arm.

Scales are made of indestructible G10, with layers of resin-encased fibers creating a nonslip material (whether wet or dry) that won't swell, shrink, crack, or discolor.  

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 7: Micro Bolster

The MK9 Micro Bolster features all the safety benefits of a full bolster with none of the drawbacks.  A bolster adds stability to your grip and to the blade, while protecting your hand with added width where fingers contact the heel.  While traditional bolsters extend the whole length of the heel to the edge, the micro bolster of the MK9 only adds width where it's needed, allowing easy point-to-heel sharpening.

 

A great chef knife won't transform anyone into a great cook. 

What a great knife can do is turn work into pleasure. We get better at whatever we practice, and we practice more when practice is enjoyable.  

Cutting with the MK9 is fun.   

 

Don't let my expression of intense concentration fool you, I want to have fun and keep all my fingers.  Plus, cutting things in half with a big smile wasn't a good look.

 

"I pick up this knife and feel formidable in the kitchen."

-Captain Alaska (R. Hughey)

Also, MÄNNKITCHEN isn't only about high quality kitchen tools.  You can follow our food adventures, learn how to make meals you want to eat, and share your own kitchen triumphs and defeats with the #mannkitchen hashtag on instagram and at mannkitchen.com.

There's just a few things any of us can teach, but what we can learn together is unlimited.  Seth Godin said "Learning is voluntary. Learning is always available, and it compounds, because once we’ve acquired it, we can use it again and again."

Let's play with fire and sharp objects together. 

Hello, my name is Cleve, and I cook at home.

Learning to cook is an adventure that for me began over 30 years ago with one-too-many bowls of oatmeal.  Along the way, I learned that meals cooked at home are less expensive, more nutritious, and allow greater control over what we consume.   

Every new dish develops and sharpens skills that I can use to serve myself and others. Many of my favorite memories are around a table sharing a meal with friends and family.

And men who know how to cook experience other benefits: 

 

"I do love a man who can cook."

-Emma B. from the Spice Girls

 

“My weaknesses have always been food and men — in that order.” 

- Dolly Parton

 

"I have yet to meet a woman who doesn’t think a man who cooks is sexy.”

-Mary M. from Quora

 

"What's for dinner?"

-My wife

 

The MK9 is function-first kitchen tool. Every detail of the design is functional, from the materials, to the profile, to each contour of the handle and micro bolster. 

 

Size comparison with popular chef knives: 

There are no decorative Damascus patterns or faux hammer marks on the blade, just revolutionary American made Nitro-X63 steel, designed and built to work for generations.  

"My husband loves his new knife-shows it to me proudly every time he uses it!"

-Carol H.

 

NITRO-X63 Details:

NITRO-X63 Composition (Nominal) 0.85-0.95 Carbon, 1.0 Mn, .03 P, .01 S, 1.0 Si, 15.0-17.0 Cr, 0.50 Mo, 0.10-.15 Nitrogen NITRO-X63 is a nitrogen-bearing, high-carbon chromium martensitic steel that is balanced to provide superior hardness capability.  NITRO-X63 can achieve a tempered hardness of HRC 60-63. NITRO-X63 resists corrosion from mild atmospheres, fresh water, steam, ammonia, many petroleum products and organic materials and several mild acid environments. NITRO-X63 is an excellent candidate for cutlery applications that demand high hardness, edge retention and corrosion resistance.  Many of you will recognize this steel by a different name.  There is no subterfuge or tomfoolery. The reason I'm not using the other name is that I was asked (politely) not to.  

So, Better Don't noONE Narc, ok?

 

 

Q&A with MÄNNKITCHEN founder Cleve Oines

Before you part with your hard-earned cash, I expect you have some questions for me, like:

 

Why are you doing this?

I've been frustrated with knives that can't hold a fine edge. Angular handles that look amazing and cause amazing blisters.  Chef knives with small toy-like handles and narrow blades. The emphasis on appearance over function is rampant in kitchen knives.  Does 144 layers of hammered samurai space steel help me make dinner?  No? Then keep it.

I want a knife that is built to work, and was unable to find a chef knife that had all the practical features I wanted.

Guys cook at home now.  Millions of us.  I suspect that others have experienced the same frustrations I have.  

Will the MK9 be perfect for everyone?  No.  

If the features appeal to you, it's for you.

 

Why say it's built for the "man" who loves to cook?

Because it's true.  I'm the man who loves to cook that it was built for. It isn't my intent to exclude anyone, but the knife was designed based on my experiences with many knives, and I prefer a larger handle and blade.   

While all the other features are beneficial to everyone, I wanted to be sure people knew that the MK9 was significantly larger than average because that feature won't appeal to everyone.

 

 

Should I trust you? 

I wouldn't ask you to carry the risk alone. If your MK9 doesn’t arrive before March 1, 2020 you may cancel your order and receive a full refund for undelivered item(s). That's my promise to you.

Look Mom, no risk!

I'm the one on the left, with the amazing lady who taught me to cook.

 

What do you know about kitchen knives?

I started cooking at age 8 using my mom’s carbon steel Sabatier chef’s knives. A knife enthusiast since childhood, I've used many different chef knives as an avid home cook, a cook on commercial fishing boats in Alaska, and in professional kitchens.  I designed and built my first knife when I was 13 years old.

All told, I've spent thousands of hours with a knife in my hand, learning through trial and error which features make a real difference in practical use.  

The design of the MK9 is born from my desire to combine the most useful features into a single cook's knife.

 

Have you ever designed anything before?

Yes, I studied design at university, and have designed dozens of products for clients over the years.  For this project, I also have manufacturing and design partners that specialize in kitchen knives, because I don't know what I don't know.

In the almost 2 years since this process began, I've learned a lot.  The first prototypes were printed more than a year ago.

 

What inspired the design?

The lines of the MK9 are inspired by a famous Norwegian sailing hull design. Capable of slicing through the water at maximum speed with minimal resistance, Norse longboats were the technological advantage that enabled the Viking era.  

With the number of US men who cook at home increasing by almost 50% in the last 50 years, we're in a new era now. Hopefully one with less pillaging.

 

Do I need to have giant Viking hands to use this knife?

No.  The MK9 is comfortable for all adult hand sizes-including those with large hands.

During the testing phase, I had a demo model in my kitchen (still do) that has become the favorite knife of my 13 year old daughter, and she has smaller hands than most men.  

 

Will you actually get the product to me?

Yes. I've worked in eCommerce for over 10 years, and have directly sold millions of dollars worth of goods generating hundreds of 5 star reviews and thousands of happy customers while gaining experience in product design, sourcing, shipping, and customer service.

I’ve had unhappy customers too, and have learned valuable lessons from both* of them.

*There were more than 2. 

 

Will you marry my sister?

I’m flattered that you would ask, and taken completely off-guard by this question.  

Thank you, but I’m happily married.

 

Why are you doing this now?

I was laid off.  Embarrassing, I know. More accurately, my contract was not renewed by a business I helped build over 15 years. I was quite suddenly without my primary source of income.

It was a firm shove into the unfamiliar, and one that I sorely needed.  It's hard for me to change direction when I'm comfortable.  

Very suddenly, I had to adjust to a new reality. My immediate instinct was to leap at the next familiar position that would pay the bills. So I did some interviews. 

In one of the interviews I was asked, "What would you do tomorrow if you could do anything?"  

It's a really good question.

I was still thinking about it later that night.

For me, the answer wasn't to find another position similar to the one I was comfortable in. The answer was to align my experience in design with my natural interest in cooking.

I contacted the company and withdrew my name from consideration.   Of course it could be that they weren't planning to hire me, but to me it was a turning point because I wasn't looking for a J-O-B anymore, I was building something I believe in.

I've always loved creating in the kitchen.  Discovering a new dish and finding a way to make it better (or at least make it at home) fascinates me.  Improving a tool or solving a problem is deeply satisfying.

I like to make things better by making better things.  

While I'm unqualified to solve many problems, I can help some with the problems I've had myself.    

My goal for MÄNNKITCHEN isn't just to sell kitchen tools.  It's to build a community where people who cook at home can help each other make things better.  I hope you'll join me.  

 

Last question: What’s the story with the name MÄNNKITCHEN?

My heritage is Norwegian, and männ is the possessive form of “my” in a dialect of old Norse, so MÄNNKITCHEN = my kitchen.

If you cook, MÄNNKITCHEN is for you.

I'm only cross-eyed when I juggle.

 

Will you do me a favor?

It took a year and a half, countless prototypes, thousands of hours, and more than a few dollars to develop the MK9 into something worth sharing.   

And now I need your help.

The money you pledge will be used to purchase the raw materials, skilled labor and custom tooling needed for a full production run of the MK9. 

You can help make this possible.

 

Supporters will receive the MK9 for 40% off retail.

 

Share this project and earn cash!

I would love to have your help spreading the word about the MK9!

I've partnered with Kickbooster to offer a 10% commission for anyone who would like to share this project.  Click the button below and create your unique affiliate link to share:

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!
story_txt:
MÄNNKITCHEN MK9: The knife that’s not for everybody.
The MK9 is large.  Too large for some.
The MK9 is heavier than most chef knives.
The blade of the MK9 is longer than the standard 8 inches.
It's wide.  So wide you can’t touch your knuckles to the cutting board.
It’s hard.  We chose very hard Nitrogen steel, even though it takes longer to sharpen.
The MK9 was not made for everyone.
Read on to see if it was made for you. 

 
MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 1: The Steel 
The MK9 Blade is made of revolutionary X63-Nitrogen Steel. The addition of nitrogen during the alloying process creates a tighter grain structure within the steel, enabling surgical sharpness, exceptional edge retention, improved corrosion resistance, and hardness up to 63 HRC.
X63-Nitrogen Steel is made in the USA. Its special properties allow it to outperform market leading imported steels in edge retention, durability, and corrosion resistance.
In short, it's the perfect knife steel for professional kitchens.  

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 2: The Shape
The MK9 features a Convex Spine Profile.  Unlike most knives, it curves downward at both ends, enabling a more natural wrist position while cutting that reduces wrist strain and helps prevent wedging in large ingredients.
If you spend a lot of time with a knife in your hands, your elbow, wrist, and knife hand will thank you for using an MK9.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 3: Extra Width
Over 2.5 inch blade width at the heel increases knuckle clearance, eases food transfer & extends blade life.  With most chef knives you need to be careful not to scrape your knuckles on the cutting board when you complete your chop.  Cooks compensate by cutting near the counter/table edges to save their knuckles.  With the MK9, that's no longer a concern. 
Wide blade makes food transfer quick and easy.
Plus, there's enough width that you can sharpen it for a generation or two and still have a magnificent blade for your heirs to fight over.

 
MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 4: Extra Length
9 Inch blade for improved slicing and making quick work of large ingredients.  The blade features a relatively straight edge for the bulk of its length, with the belly concentrated in the front 1/3.  This enables it to perform well whether chopping or slicing, and it has the length to handle large ingredients quickly.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 6: Extra Comfort
The MK9 features a rounded & polished spine for exceptional comfort in a pinch grip. Cooks often develop a callous on their index finger where the spine presses against the skin.  An unpolished spine with square edges creates friction while cutting, leading to discomfort, blistering, and a "cook's callous".  
Cutting is more comfortable with the MK9.

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 2: Exceptional Grip
Ergonomic large handle cradles the hand for an effortlessly firm grip-even for those with large hands.  We eliminated angular edges and added both width and thickness to create a substantial handle that feels like a natural extension of the arm.
Scales are made of indestructible G10, with layers of resin-encased fibers creating a nonslip material (whether wet or dry) that won't swell, shrink, crack, or discolor.  

MÄNNKITCHEN MK9 Difference 7: Micro Bolster
The MK9 Micro Bolster features all the safety benefits of a full bolster with none of the drawbacks.  A bolster adds stability to your grip and to the blade, while protecting your hand with added width where fingers contact the heel.  While traditional bolsters extend the whole length of the heel to the edge, the micro bolster of the MK9 only adds width where it's needed, allowing easy point-to-heel sharpening.

 

A great chef knife won't transform anyone into a great cook. 
What a great knife can do is turn work into pleasure. We get better at whatever we practice, and we practice more when practice is enjoyable.  
Cutting with the MK9 is fun.   


 

Don't let my expression of intense concentration fool you, I want to have fun and keep all my fingers.  Plus, cutting things in half with a big smile wasn't a good look.
 
"I pick up this knife and feel formidable in the kitchen."
-Captain Alaska (R. Hughey)
Also, MÄNNKITCHEN isn't only about high quality kitchen tools.  You can follow our food adventures, learn how to make meals you want to eat, and share your own kitchen triumphs and defeats with the #mannkitchen hashtag on instagram and at mannkitchen.com.
There's just a few things any of us can teach, but what we can learn together is unlimited.  Seth Godin said "Learning is voluntary. Learning is always available, and it compounds, because once we’ve acquired it, we can use it again and again."
Let's play with fire and sharp objects together. 

Hello, my name is Cleve, and I cook at home.
Learning to cook is an adventure that for me began over 30 years ago with one-too-many bowls of oatmeal.  Along the way, I learned that meals cooked at home are less expensive, more nutritious, and allow greater control over what we consume.   
Every new dish develops and sharpens skills that I can use to serve myself and others. Many of my favorite memories are around a table sharing a meal with friends and family.
And men who know how to cook experience other benefits: 
 
"I do love a man who can cook."
-Emma B. from the Spice Girls
 
“My weaknesses have always been food and men — in that order.” 
- Dolly Parton
 
"I have yet to meet a woman who doesn’t think a man who cooks is sexy.”
-Mary M. from Quora
 
"What's for dinner?"
-My wife
 
The MK9 is function-first kitchen tool. Every detail of the design is functional, from the materials, to the profile, to each contour of the handle and micro bolster. 
 
Size comparison with popular chef knives: 

There are no decorative Damascus patterns or faux hammer marks on the blade, just revolutionary American made Nitro-X63 steel, designed and built to work for generations.  
"My husband loves his new knife-shows it to me proudly every time he uses it!"
-Carol H.
 
NITRO-X63 Details:
NITRO-X63 Composition (Nominal) 0.85-0.95 Carbon, 1.0 Mn, .03 P, .01 S, 1.0 Si, 15.0-17.0 Cr, 0.50 Mo, 0.10-.15 Nitrogen NITRO-X63 is a nitrogen-bearing, high-carbon chromium martensitic steel that is balanced to provide superior hardness capability.  NITRO-X63 can achieve a tempered hardness of HRC 60-63. NITRO-X63 resists corrosion from mild atmospheres, fresh water, steam, ammonia, many petroleum products and organic materials and several mild acid environments. NITRO-X63 is an excellent candidate for cutlery applications that demand high hardness, edge retention and corrosion resistance.  Many of you will recognize this steel by a different name.  There is no subterfuge or tomfoolery. The reason I'm not using the other name is that I was asked (politely) not to.  
So, Better Don't noONE Narc, ok?
 
 
Q&A with MÄNNKITCHEN founder Cleve Oines
Before you part with your hard-earned cash, I expect you have some questions for me, like:
 
Why are you doing this?
I've been frustrated with knives that can't hold a fine edge. Angular handles that look amazing and cause amazing blisters.  Chef knives with small toy-like handles and narrow blades. The emphasis on appearance over function is rampant in kitchen knives.  Does 144 layers of hammered samurai space steel help me make dinner?  No? Then keep it.
I want a knife that is built to work, and was unable to find a chef knife that had all the practical features I wanted.
Guys cook at home now.  Millions of us.  I suspect that others have experienced the same frustrations I have.  
Will the MK9 be perfect for everyone?  No.  
If the features appeal to you, it's for you.
 
Why say it's built for the "man" who loves to cook?
Because it's true.  I'm the man who loves to cook that it was built for. It isn't my intent to exclude anyone, but the knife was designed based on my experiences with many knives, and I prefer a larger handle and blade.   
While all the other features are beneficial to everyone, I wanted to be sure people knew that the MK9 was significantly larger than average because that feature won't appeal to everyone.
 
 
Should I trust you? 
I wouldn't ask you to carry the risk alone. If your MK9 doesn’t arrive before March 1, 2020 you may cancel your order and receive a full refund for undelivered item(s). That's my promise to you.
Look Mom, no risk!

I'm the one on the left, with the amazing lady who taught me to cook.
 
What do you know about kitchen knives?
I started cooking at age 8 using my mom’s carbon steel Sabatier chef’s knives. A knife enthusiast since childhood, I've used many different chef knives as an avid home cook, a cook on commercial fishing boats in Alaska, and in professional kitchens.  I designed and built my first knife when I was 13 years old.
All told, I've spent thousands of hours with a knife in my hand, learning through trial and error which features make a real difference in practical use.  
The design of the MK9 is born from my desire to combine the most useful features into a single cook's knife.
 
Have you ever designed anything before?
Yes, I studied design at university, and have designed dozens of products for clients over the years.  For this project, I also have manufacturing and design partners that specialize in kitchen knives, because I don't know what I don't know.
In the almost 2 years since this process began, I've learned a lot.  The first prototypes were printed more than a year ago.
 
What inspired the design?
The lines of the MK9 are inspired by a famous Norwegian sailing hull design. Capable of slicing through the water at maximum speed with minimal resistance, Norse longboats were the technological advantage that enabled the Viking era.  
With the number of US men who cook at home increasing by almost 50% in the last 50 years, we're in a new era now. Hopefully one with less pillaging.
 
Do I need to have giant Viking hands to use this knife?
No.  The MK9 is comfortable for all adult hand sizes-including those with large hands.
During the testing phase, I had a demo model in my kitchen (still do) that has become the favorite knife of my 13 year old daughter, and she has smaller hands than most men.

Yes. I've worked in eCommerce for over 10 years, and have directly sold millions of dollars worth of goods generating hundreds of 5 star reviews and thousands of happy customers while gaining experience in product design, sourcing, shipping, and customer service.
I’ve had unhappy customers too, and have learned valuable lessons from both* of them.
*There were more than 2. 
 
Will you marry my sister?
I’m flattered that you would ask, and taken completely off-guard by this question.  
Thank you, but I’m happily married.

 
Why are you doing this now?
I was laid off.  Embarrassing, I know. More accurately, my contract was not renewed by a business I helped build over 15 years. I was quite suddenly without my primary source of income.
It was a firm shove into the unfamiliar, and one that I sorely needed.  It's hard for me to change direction when I'm comfortable.  
Very suddenly, I had to adjust to a new reality. My immediate instinct was to leap at the next familiar position that would pay the bills. So I did some interviews. 
In one of the interviews I was asked, "What would you do tomorrow if you could do anything?"  
It's a really good question.
I was still thinking about it later that night.
For me, the answer wasn't to find another position similar to the one I was comfortable in. The answer was to align my experience in design with my natural interest in cooking.
I contacted the company and withdrew my name from consideration.   Of course it could be that they weren't planning to hire me, but to me it was a turning point because I wasn't looking for a J-O-B anymore, I was building something I believe in.

I like to make things better by making better things.  
While I'm unqualified to solve many problems, I can help some with the problems I've had myself.    
My goal for MÄNNKITCHEN isn't just to sell kitchen tools.  It's to build a community where people who cook at home can help each other make things better.  I hope you'll join me.

story:
Thank you all for pushing us past our original goal of $75,000, but remember, we need you to push us to $125,000 to help us bring these two beauties to the market!

Share our campaign with your network and lets deliver these babies to the world! 

—

Smarke (pronounced smar-key) is the brainchild of Hady, Charlie and Bassam, three tech entrepreneurs.

Our Story

 

                        Let’s face it, all of us lose things…. but is there anything more frustrating than losing a set of keys? The process of changing all of your locks, the headache of having to issue a new key to your building entrance… we know those feelings all too well and they inspired us to create a smart home access solution that covers any scenario that you might face. Whether you need to enter your building, or your apartment itself, Smarke has a product for you. What’s more, our connected hardware is so easy to install that you can do it yourself, even if you don’t know the difference between a screwdriver and a fork, making our solution perfect for both casual users and tech junkies. We’ve spent three years drawing up designs, tearing them up, and starting from scratch again. Now, we finally have our products ready for the market and we can’t wait for you to see them. See for yourselves:

Basically, keys are out, with this unique setup, you and your guests won’t need these archaic devices to enter your property, whatever the situation.

Our Smart Lock is designed to fit in place of a Euro profile cylinder similar to this: 

 

Smarke is the only keyless entry solution for gates, buildings, and flats.

What will we spend our money on?
It has been an incredible journey so far, and we would love you to be a part of it. With the funds raised we will be able to:

  • Complete the design for manufacture phase
  • Kick off the first manufacturing run
  • Ship all products to consumers 

Back us today to help bring the smartest, most versatile and most secure home access solution to the market

.

Just remember, you can earn great Smarke products for free if you refer our campaign to your network and they end up supporting our campaign. See table below for the $ amount of referred pledges that correspond to the various Smarke prizes:

Risks and Challenges

Delivery

We have set a delivery timeline that is both challenging and reasonable. We have given ourselves adequate time to complete all internal testing as well as beta testing with customers to ensure we commence our first full run of manufacturing with all testing complete. To navigate this process, we have enlisted the help of IDC, whose vast experience will help us foresee and overcome any potential hurdles to stay on track for our September delivery date. We also intend on keeping you all updated along the way.

story:
Are you tired of picking up the pieces of the dog bed scattared all around?

I know how you feel... I was in the same situation.

I'm parent  of an adorable labrador of 2 years old called Nina. 

She destroyed about ten dog beds, and I was tired of buying a new bed every week. I had spent more than 300 euros of dog beds!

What could I do?

I started to search a very resistant fabric and after a lot of tests I found a particulary type of dacron.

 The weak point of every dog bed are the seams.

This type of dacron is sticky, and closing the two sheets with the adesive part, the dog can't open that.

The Indestructible Dog Bed is the first bed that has no seams that the dog can rip.

The fabric is so resistant that no dog can pierce it.

Seams are the weak point of every other dog bed, in fact once the dog can damages it them can open all the rest.

I ask  you something: how many dog beds have you bought until now? How much have you spent?

With this you are sure that you don't need to buy another dog bed in the future.

180 days warranty.

If the dog destroys it, within 180 days from delivery date, you will be totally refunded.  Buying with Paypal you have  180 days for request your money back. If your dog will destroy the dog bed, you will send me a picture and immediately I will refund you. I can do that because I'm sure of my product. Until now I delivered 763 dog beds and only in one case it was destroyed.

It is waterproof and can be used both indoors and outdoors.

It is easy to clean in seconds with a sponge.

The padding is composed of two materials: foam that is resistant and support for the weight of the dog and cotton which makes it soft and comfortable.

If your dog has already destroyed more pillows do not waste any more money: 

The indestructible dog bed is the last one that you will buy.

-The size  XL  measaures 35 inch X 24 inch X 3 inch

- The size  XXL  measaures 45 inch X 24 inch X3 inch

It's avalaible in white.

indestructible

waterproof

save your money because is the last one that you will buy

 

Free shipping in Usa and UK

"Bed is great. I actually have a pet care business, so everything from Irish Wolfhounds and Newfoundlands to Chihuahuas and tiny toy poodles! The labs and the Rottweilers are really the ones I needed it for though!!! Thanks again!"

Rebekah Lease from Minneapolis, Usa
