story:
Introducing Deep Cut

Give your vinyl records the home they deserve up on the wall with a simple, beautiful, scalable, quality shelving system.

 

What's wrong with other record storage and display options? It is mostly glorified stackable milk crates, multi-thousand-dollar consoles, or stuff that doesn't hold much or wasn't really designed for records. And most of it is low to the ground. What's with that? Why can't we get our collection up on the wall at eye level where it is easy to browse and display (without turning to big box store cheap stuff)? And a storage system that looks great and can expand as we buy more records? Because we will buy more records.

But let's back up...

We are two brothers (Clark and Rich) and a cousin (Rob) that love vinyl. We love the ritual of leafing through our collections, whiskey in hand, looking for the perfect record for the moment. We don’t love sitting on the floor or bending down while we make these important choices.  

We grew up together, but then went separate ways (Minnesota, Pennsylvania, DC, Atlanta, New Zealand, and so on) on separate careers. Rob went into construction, carpentry, and woodwork. Rich went down the marketing path. And Clark into corporate finance. We had always talked about combining our powers and starting a business together, but didn’t know exactly what that business would be. Then Rich’s dog got ahold of some of his precious records that were being stored on the bottom shelf of a bookcase. The horror! So he called Rob and asked “Why are my records sitting on the floor? Why can’t I just hang them on the wall, safe where I can see them?” “Give me a couple days," Rob responded. He came back with the design. Clark resoundingly approved. We knew we had our idea.

WARNING: The photo below contains graphic images that may not be suitable for some audience members. The suspect is still at large (though actually pretty small)

After some discussions in the vinyl community, we found others wanted what we wanted: something with a simple and practical design. Something made out of quality materials with a minimalist look. Something easy to install that you could put just about anywhere. Something you could scale up as your collection grows. So here we are. Introducing Deep Cut record shelves.

 

"Why is this so much better than other options?"

Off the Floor: The only wall-mounted system designed for records that is high quality, scalable, modular, and easy to install all at the same time with this kind of capacity. You can only check some of those boxes (no pun intended...okay a little intended) with other options.

Scalable, Modular: Allows for easy additions when you gotta have more space for your collection and simple moves to change orientation when you need or just want to.

Handmade in the US with Care: Solid construction from quality hardwood materials, handmade in the US (Minnesota to be exact). 

Minimalist Design: Clean, simple look that works in a wide range of spaces and decors

Easy: We designed this system to be incredibly easy to install right out of the box (no flat-packing!) in any orientation in virtually any space.

 

So why an Indiegogo campaign?

We are passionate about this product and system, and dedicated to making it all right here in the US. But we need money for space, tools, and materials so that we can scale up production without sacrificing quality. With your help, we can make this business a reality and get more great products out into the world.

 

Ways You Can Help

Well, obviously, backing our campaign would be the absolute best. Hard to ask for anything more. How much should you contribute, you ask? It’s totally up to you.  Every dollar helps, but the more you can support us, the more you get in return.

Want to hang some of these beauties in your home as soon as possible? Back us by “Selecting a Perk” for the color and number of shelves you want.  

Not in the market for shelves at the moment? You can still help out!  Simply click “BACK IT” to provide general support and donate any amount that works for you. How generous and selfless you are!

Here's the other thing: Most crowdfunding campaigns make or break within the first week or less. That's not always the case, but if you don't show that people are interested by then, it can get tough. So, that's another way of saying, if you're going to back us, the earlier the better! Missed that chance? No problem, the "mid-campaign plateau" (e.g. slow in momentum after the initial wave) is also real. Help us get that line to go up again!

 

What Your Support Provides & What You get

What do we do with all the generous support?

Build a business! We need to upgrade the electrical system of our woodshop, install a  dust collection system, purchase tools like edge banders, jigsaws, and routers, and get tables, jigs and fixtures set up so that we can produce at scale without sacrificing quality or losing any fingers. We need equipment to offload wood deliveries and move materials around the shop. But none of this is possible without early-adopter customers like you who love what we're making and aren't shy about it!

What do you get as a backer?

Depending on your contribution, you’ll become one of the first to get these beautiful units and at a nice discount. You get attractive, versatile, scalable shelving that makes your records (or whatever) look great up on your wall. There will be some other surprises along the way, but this is really all about giving your vinyl a better home.

The Impact

If you care about your vinyl, want a simply, stylish way to display it in your home, and want to have an easier time navigating your collection, Deep Cut is  to you. If you like clean, minimalist design and simple, scalable shelving systems that are extra easy to use and install (even if you are not a vinyl person), Deep Cut is for to you. And if you care about where your stuff comes from and how it is made, Deep Cut is for to you.

 

Product Specifications:

​Materials: Initially available in walnut (darker color) and hard maple (lighter), with more varieties to come once we're off the ground.

System: A design-forward version of the age-old French cleat system, using a simple cleat secured to the wall allowing the units to drop on securely.

Capacity: 50 - 65 records per unit (depending on specific records)

Dimensions:

  • Shelf - External: 15 inches tall x 15 inches wide x 13 1/4 inches deep
  • Shelf - Internal: 13 1/2 inches tall x 13 1/2 inches wide x 12 1/2 inches deep
  • Wall Cleat: 4 inches tall (at tallest point) x 17 1/2 inches wide x 3/4 inch deep. Mounting holes pre-drilled 16 inches apart (3/4 inch from each edge) that lines up with drywall studs in most modern construction homes.

Weight: When empty, they are approximately 13 pounds (including wall cleat) per unit. Fully loaded with records, typically 65 - 85 pounds (depending on records) per unit.

Assembly Required: Nope, no flat packing or weird tools. The build is complete. Once the wall cleat is installed (hardware included), you're good to go.

"I'm not a record person": What?!? Kidding, that's okay. These obviously have lots of other uses. They were designed with records in mind, but look great holding lots of stuff:

 

Installation

We set out to make the easiest most straightforward installation process possible for those of us not so DIY inclined (e.g. two members of the Deep Cut team, not naming names...). If you can screw a level board to the wall, you can handle this.

What you get: Wall Cleat, Shelf Unit, and Install Hardware

This example will cover the case of installing the wall cleat into dry-wall studs. Installation on other surfaces will be available on deepcut.co. 

What you do: 

  1. Choose the location for the unit and use a stud finder to locate the studs. In many homes, the studs are spaced 16 inches apart from center which lines up perfectly with the pre-drilled hole (if that's not the case, an included high-grade wall anchor can be used for one of the sides). 
  2. Hold the wall cleat to the wall at the location you wish to place it and make sure it is level, using a level, then mark the spots with a pencil (or pen or screw).

  3. Screw the provided screws through the pre-drilled holes at the pre-marked locations into the drywall studs until the wall cleat is secured to the wall (preferably with a power drill).

  4. Then, simply drop the unit on with the cut-out cleats dropping over the wall cleat, letting gravity do the work. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Building shelves isn’t rocket science. Our main risks are demand and production scale. If we don’t get enough capital to invest in our space, the right tools, and necessary materials and inventory, we may struggle to produce units. If we get too many orders, we may struggle to produce units quickly enough to fill them.

This is what we have done to mitigate the risk: We did a thorough analysis of our production time when we built the prototype. We built our crowdfunding goals and schedules around volumes we know we can produce. We have planned for scenarios where we are not able to purchase key pieces of equipment (production would be slower, but demand would be lower). We've got contingency plans. We've got contingency plans for out contingency plans.  Any way it goes, though, we are committed to transparent communication and doing right by our backers and customers and not putting anything substandard out into the world.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute or if our product is just not for you, we get it. But if you like what we're doing and you want to help in some way, these are other things you can do that actually make a huge difference in us achieving our goals:

Follow us on social! Any and all of the socials you like. Don't be shy, get in there and comment, like, share, and all that good stuff. Shout us out. Tell us what's on your mind!

Tell people about us! Do it in person. Do it on social (use the Indiegogo share tools) And do it early in the campaign and often. We’ll love you for it

Sign up for our email list! You can do that here. And when it comes, take a look, share it round.

Tell more people about us! Seriously, like if you know someone who owns a record store, or you write a blog, or you host a podcast, or you’ve got a crazy idea to help us get some attention. Tell them. Tell us. Help us get this moving!

Thanks

The fact that your even here reading (or skimming) all of this, we're grateful for that. We're trying to live a dream, to make something, and to build something. No one owes us anything, so thank you for taking even a few minutes to look. Hopefully, we can at least count you as a friend of Deep Cut.

The Deep Cut Team, 

Rob, Clark, and Rich
story_txt:
Introducing Deep Cut
Give your vinyl records the home they deserve up on the wall with a simple, beautiful, scalable, quality shelving system.
 
What's wrong with other record storage and display options? It is mostly glorified stackable milk crates, multi-thousand-dollar consoles, or stuff that doesn't hold much or wasn't really designed for records. And most of it is low to the ground. What's with that? Why can't we get our collection up on the wall at eye level where it is easy to browse and display (without turning to big box store cheap stuff)? And a storage system that looks great and can expand as we buy more records? Because we will buy more records.
But let's back up...
We are two brothers (Clark and Rich) and a cousin (Rob) that love vinyl. We love the ritual of leafing through our collections, whiskey in hand, looking for the perfect record for the moment. We don’t love sitting on the floor or bending down while we make these important choices.  

We grew up together, but then went separate ways (Minnesota, Pennsylvania, DC, Atlanta, New Zealand, and so on) on separate careers. Rob went into construction, carpentry, and woodwork. Rich went down the marketing path. And Clark into corporate finance. We had always talked about combining our powers and starting a business together, but didn’t know exactly what that business would be. Then Rich’s dog got ahold of some of his precious records that were being stored on the bottom shelf of a bookcase. The horror! So he called Rob and asked “Why are my records sitting on the floor? Why can’t I just hang them on the wall, safe where I can see them?” “Give me a couple days," Rob responded. He came back with the design. Clark resoundingly approved. We knew we had our idea.
WARNING: The photo below contains graphic images that may not be suitable for some audience members. The suspect is still at large (though actually pretty small)

After some discussions in the vinyl community, we found others wanted what we wanted: something with a simple and practical design. Something made out of quality materials with a minimalist look. Something easy to install that you could put just about anywhere. Something you could scale up as your collection grows. So here we are. Introducing Deep Cut record shelves.

 
"Why is this so much better than other options?"
Off the Floor: The only wall-mounted system designed for records that is high quality, scalable, modular, and easy to install all at the same time with this kind of capacity. You can only check some of those boxes (no pun intended...okay a little intended) with other options.
Scalable, Modular: Allows for easy additions when you gotta have more space for your collection and simple moves to change orientation when you need or just want to.
Handmade in the US with Care: Solid construction from quality hardwood materials, handmade in the US (Minnesota to be exact). 
Minimalist Design: Clean, simple look that works in a wide range of spaces and decors
Easy: We designed this system to be incredibly easy to install right out of the box (no flat-packing!) in any orientation in virtually any space.
 

So why an Indiegogo campaign?
We are passionate about this product and system, and dedicated to making it all right here in the US. But we need money for space, tools, and materials so that we can scale up production without sacrificing quality. With your help, we can make this business a reality and get more great products out into the world.

 
Ways You Can Help
Well, obviously, backing our campaign would be the absolute best. Hard to ask for anything more. How much should you contribute, you ask? It’s totally up to you.  Every dollar helps, but the more you can support us, the more you get in return.
Want to hang some of these beauties in your home as soon as possible? Back us by “Selecting a Perk” for the color and number of shelves you want.  
Not in the market for shelves at the moment? You can still help out!  Simply click “BACK IT” to provide general support and donate any amount that works for you. How generous and selfless you are!
Here's the other thing: Most crowdfunding campaigns make or break within the first week or less. That's not always the case, but if you don't show that people are interested by then, it can get tough. So, that's another way of saying, if you're going to back us, the earlier the better! Missed that chance? No problem, the "mid-campaign plateau" (e.g. slow in momentum after the initial wave) is also real. Help us get that line to go up again!

story:
What the heck is RentSpek?

Everyone has been through the awful process of hunting for a new apartment. On the surface everything looks great, but after you sign the lease you begin to realize the place wasn't really what it seems.

Renters don't get the luxury of home inspections prior to signing on the dotted line. So we decided to change that.

RentSpek is the product of extensive amounts of research. We analyzed the same home inspections you would use when buying a home to develop a patent pending method of inspection that would be beneficial to a short term living situation. 

RentSpek factors in everything from the life of appliances, physical condition, signs of water damage and many other factors including the users opinion on various aspects of the property.

The app walks users through a house or apartment and asks questions about all those factors and uses the an algorithm we designed to scored and determine a letter grade of A through F. 

What else canRentSpek do?

  1. Use your smartphone to add pictures to your Spek
  2. Share the a completed Spek with someone (like a roommate or spouse) through email or SMS
  3. See other Spek that have been completed nearby
  4. Email the Landlord a rental application
  5. Convert photos of rental documents into PDF's & store them on your user dashboard for safe keeping.
  6. Take, share & store photos of the move-in condition to avoid landlord/tenant disputes later

RentSpek will initially launch as web application on November 1st. 

There are additional features being developed for Landlords and Property Managers to become "RentSpek Certified". Doing this will help give renters more information, streamlining the rental process.

RentSpek is a great way for tenants and landlords to "Rent with Confidence".

What We Need & What You Get

The web & mobile web aspect of RentSpek will launch on November 1st.


Because we're a small operation, we don't have the resources to build the app in house, we began soliciting quotes from app developers in Chicago & New York to see who would be the best fit for this project.

The average quote for building a dynamic app like this was in the $50,000 range, which is where we got our goal number from. While that is an enormous amount of money it's a stretch goal.

  1. If we can reach 12% of the goal or about $6000, we can build all of the basic scoring features into the app & allow users to save & share their Speks.
  2. At 25% or about $12,500, We can add the ability to convert photos of rental docs to PDF and store pictures of move-in condition to your user dashboard
  3. For 50% or $25,000 the Landlord communication functionality gets added. You can apply for apartments, share docs and pics with the Landlord.
  4. When we hit 100% of the goal, all of this gets GPS functionality including maps of where the unit is located and what Speks have been done nearby. We'll also be adding things like where grocery stores, restaurants, public transportation and other fun things are in relation to the property.

Remember that this is being designed as a FREE app. We don't charge you to download it or use any other the features.

We do have plans to eventually monazite the app through advertising. So the stores & restaurants that you'll see on the maps will be sponsored by those places. Don't worry, we're not selling you information. But we will be talking about how many of you use the app.

Why are we doing this?

We're renters too. And we got tired of how little information is available about rental property. By backing this project you're helping us fulfill our goal of getting more transparency in the housing rental industry. 

Tools like this help both Landlord and Tenant rent more efficiently and eliminate all of the hassles involved in renting 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can’t contribute? Well you can still help:

  • Help get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Cleaning Consciously with ThreeMain

Many green cleaning products in the market today don’t thoroughly clean your home. Some even have unsafe ingredients that cause allergies or other harmful side effects, lack antibacterial properties, and are overpriced. Often these products fail to the job, so most of us continue purchasing more and more cleaning products searching for a solution that will work and that will protect our home, health, and loved ones. 

 

The average household spends over $500 in cleaning supplies each year.  

With ThreeMain, you’ll receive the cleaning products you need to maintain a clean and healthy home and more, for a fraction of the cost.

Take advantage of our preorder rates for our newly developed non-toxic cleaning products:

That's just $13-$17/month for cleaning supplies, compared to the average of $42.

ThreeMain's Blue Membership: By supporting our campaign, you will be among the first Blue Members ever! As a member, you will have first access to our cleaning products, new formulas that we launch, our reusable packaging, and more, delivered right to your door.  Every bottle/pouch comes with 16 oz of our formulas.

WE INCLUDE FREE SHIPPING IN THE US! ThreeMain uses eco-friendly recycled cardboard boxes and sustainable packing materials to keep your products safe and stable during transport. The option to renew your membership will be available upon redeeming your reward.

 

We developed biodegradable, safe and non-toxic cleaning products that have 100% sustainable ingredients you can trust.

The first line of cleaning products we have created will include the following:

 

How our cleaning formulas perform.

Through a series of independent lab tests against top green cleaners on the market, it’s been proven that ThreeMain’s Bathroom Cleaner and Multi-Surface Cleaner:  

 

We shared our cleaning products locally so we could start getting feedback as early as possible. Here's what people had to say!

 

Smarter Packaging, Cleaner Oceans.

The US consumes more plastic per capita than any other country, at nearly 150lbs per person recorded in 2014.

ThreeMain is the first in our industry to strive for zero impact from the start, across our entire supply chain. With our lightweight, reusable aluminum [the most recycled material in the WORLD] bottles, you will NEVER need to buy another plastic bottle again! Should your bottle break during the duration of your membership, we will replace it at no charge to you. 

 

Our Refill Model

ThreeMain utilizes flexible packaging and a refill model that helps to eliminate more than 80% of plastic, energy, and water compared to conventional cleaning bottles.

With every delivery, you’ll receive a recycling shipping envelope and access to a complimentary shipping label. As you refill your bottles, store your used pouches in the envelope and ship it back to us to be recycled once it’s full.

 

Make an impact with ThreeMain!

Every ThreeMain bottle includes a message to help remind our members why our mission to reduce plastic waste is so important.

 

ThreeMain in the news!

 

 

 

Plastic or Planet. 

National Geographic's Planet or Plastic campaign, a multi-year initiative aimed at raising awareness of the global plastic crisis and reducing the amount of single-use plastic that is polluting our world's oceans.

 

 

Meet our Founding Team!

 

Help us make a bigger impact! Share our campaign with friends and followers!

 

 

   

 

        

For Media Inquiries: Kyla Ruane, kyla@buzzhousepr.com

Like ThreeMain on Facebook.

Follow ThreeMain on Instagram.

Follow ThreeMain on Twitter.

Follow ThreeMain on Pinterest.

 

A Big THANK YOU to all of our backers who are helping to bring ThreeMain to life. 

We are so inspired by all of the people who want to help protect our planet and the people and places we love. 

We hope you will join us and become an active member of a community that’s transforming how we clean our homes and our planet. 

A BIG THANKS TO OUR PRODUCTION TEAM, BEATT PRODUCTIONS, & OUR BEACH CLEANUP VOLUNTEERS IN MANHATTAN BEACH!

Beatt Productions is a small, boutique video production and photography studio servicing Boston and the greater New England area. We specialize in creating visually stunning content to help you or your company tell your story.

Share our campaign with friends and followers!              For Media Inquiries: Kyla Ruane, kyla@buzzhousepr.comLike ThreeMain on Facebook.Follow ThreeMain on Instagram.Follow ThreeMain on Twitter.Follow ThreeMain on Pinterest. A Big THANK YOU to all of our backers who are helping to bring ThreeMain to life. We are so inspired by all of the people who want to help protect our planet and the people and places we love. We hope you will join us and become an active member of a community that’s transforming how we clean our homes and our planet. A BIG THANKS TO OUR PRODUCTION TEAM, BEATT PRODUCTIONS, & OUR BEACH CLEANUP VOLUNTEERS IN MANHATTAN BEACH!Beatt Productions is a small, boutique video production and photography studio servicing Boston and the greater New England area. We specialize in creating visually stunning content to help you or your company tell your story.

story:
CHANGING A DUVET COVER WAS SUCH A CHORE!

 

Did you know that the duvet dates back to the Middle-Age ? The custom required that we give a sac full of goose down to the newlyweds. However, nothing has been invented yet to change the cover. We found the solution !

After 2 years of development, we proudly present Hopoli, the first 3-in-1 solution to :

  • Put on a duvet cover
  • Uncover a duvet
  • Fold the bed sheets

Either you call it a duvet or quilt or comforter or doona, you will love Hopoli.

With Hopoli you have 4 hands to change your bed sheets !

 

We have made 28 prototypes before finding the perfect formula : a reliable and strong tool that answers a big problem !

 

Hopoli is the solution to an universal problem!

 

Young, not so young, women, men, tall, short, we all already got angry at a duvet cover that makes creases inside its cover, or at corners that never stay still. It's now over.

 

 

 

You'll never be on your own again to change your duvet cover!

FUNCTION #1 : CHANGING A DUVET COVER

In a few steps you put on a duvet cover on its duvet, getting rid of the efforts !
Thanks to the manual that you will receive and to the video tutorial on Youtube, you'll be guided to learn how to use Hopoli.

 

FUNCTION #2 : REMOVING A DUVET COVER

With Hopoli, you will remove your duvet cover in less than 10 seconds!

 

 

FUNCTION #3 : FOLDING SHEETS

Here again, it's very easy to fold your bed sheets thanks to your 4 hands. Someone just had to think of it ;)

 

 

 

 

Hopoli is perfect for your original gifts

 

You sleep in a bed ? Hopoli is made for you! :)
You are an Airbnb host ? You will love Hopoli!
You own a hotel ? A gite ? Hopoli is a strong ally to hospitality professionals, thanks to its large time-saving trick, and a reduction of the MSDs (Muskulo-Skeletal Disorders) of room attendants.
You are hawker on fairs and markets ? Be different with an innovative product that everyone needs!
You clean houses ? Simplify your life!

With Hopoli, everyone can change a duvet cover, individuals AND professionals!

 

 

 

 

A recent YouGov poll shows that 64% of us change their duvet cover every 2 weeks or more. But experts are unanimous : for our health, it's better to change it every week!
According to doctor Stéphane Gayet, "in optimal conditions, there can be millions of acarids in a mattress.

 

Up to 10 millions acarids in your bed!

 

According to America’s Environment Health and Safety Online's estimation, there would be 100.000 to 10 millions acarids that sleep next to you every night. They are responsible of many diseases : rhinitis, asthma, eczema or digestive disorders. By changing your bed linen more often, you will sleep more calmly and your health will thank you.

 

 

 

 

Change your duvet cover, and HOP-O-LI (Hop-in-the-bed in French)

 

We particularly took care of the design part as we wanted Hopoli to fit every interior. It is aesthetic, ergonomic, functional, and we designed 5 colors to fit easily you room.

 

 

 

Hopoli's body is 100% made of steel, very strong !

Change any duvet cover: From single to king-size, Hopoli handles absolutely any size of duvet!

Fits most: The height of the tool has been precisely calculated to be usable by a large majority.

Research condensed: You get it, we took a long time to create a reliable and adapted tool. A tool that fits our expectations, and yours too. We extended the R&D phase a couple of times because we weren't satisfied enough about Hopoli.

 

 

 

Let's start the Hopoli revolution!

 

 

Hopoli has been crowdfunded in December 2017. Following your advices, 2 modifications have been brought to the product since then :

  • The colored hook is now made of steel in order to guarantee an excellent sturdiness. In other words, we are far away from foreseen obsolescence.
  • A non-slip feature has been added to the pliers in order to increase adhesion. Result is better than what we expected.

We have already shipped hundreds of Hopoli around the world and the product will soon be commercialised.

 

 

We started an adventure. Our first goal is to offer you a efficient tool that solves the problem of changing a duvet cover forever.

But we don't forget our mission of responsible company. That is why the assembly of Hopoli will take place in a structure that employs people with disabilities.

We have put our whole heart in order to offer you a proper innovative invention. After spending hours to research, we can guarantee you that no other innovation is as simple and efficient than Hopoli.

28 prototypes before the final version :

We tried to think about everything, but if you have a question or if you feel that something is missing, please ask us in the FAQ or on our social medias (links down the page). We will answer you ASAP.

 

 

The road has been thrilling. We went through so many steps... Here is a best of:

 

Innovation Prize, Plug & Start 2017:

Jury Prize + Public Prize, Business Dating 2017:

 

 

 

To give birth to Hopoli, we gathered many reliable and strong partners. It's thanks to them that we can offer you the best quality. We want to thank them warmly :

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CHANGER LA HOUSSE DE COUETTE ÉTAIT UNE CORVÉE !

 

Saviez-vous que l’origine de la couette remonte au Moyen-Age ? A l’époque la coutume voulait qu’on offre un sac rempli de duvet d’oie aux jeunes mariés. Pourtant, rien n’a encore été inventé pour en changer la housse. Nous avons trouvé la solution !

Après 2 ans de développement, nous vous présentons Hopoli, la toute première solution 3-en-1 pour :

  • Enfiler une housse de couette
  • Déhousser une couette
  • Plier les draps

Avec Hopoli vous avez 4 mains pour changer votre housse de couette !

Nous avons réalisé 28 prototypes avant de trouver la formule idéale : un outil fiable et solide qui répond à un problème fort.

 

Hopoli, c'est la solution à un problème universel !

 

 

Les jeunes, les seniors, les femmes, les hommes, les grands, les petits, nous avons TOUS déjà râlé contre une couette qui fait des plis dans sa housse, ou contre les coins qui ne restent pas en place. C'est maintenant terminé.

 

 

 

Vous ne serez plus jamais seul pour changer votre housse de couette !

FONCTION #1 : CHANGER UNE HOUSSE DE COUETTE

En quelques étapes vous enfilez une housse de couette sur sa couette, en vous débarrassant des efforts physiques ! Grâce à la notice papier ainsi qu'au tutoriel vidéo sur Youtube, vous êtes guidés pour apprendre à utiliser Hopoli.

 

 

FONCTION #2 : DÉHOUSSER UNE COUETTE

Avec Hopoli, vous déhoussez votre couette en moins de 10 secondes !

 

 

FONCTION #3 : PLIER DES DRAPS

Là encore, avec Hopoli il est très simple de plier les draps puisque vous les pliez avec vos 4 mains. C’est très simple mais il fallait y penser ;)

 

 

 

 

Pensez à Hopoli pour vos cadeaux originaux

 

Vous dormez dans un lit ? Alors Hopoli est fait pour vous ! :-)
Vous louez votre appartement sur Airbnb ? Vous allez adorer Hopoli !
Vous avez un hôtel ? Un gîte ? Hopoli est un allié des professionnels de l'hôtellerie, grâce à un gain de temps important et une réduction des TMS (Troubles Musculo-Squelettiques) du personnel de chambre.
Vous êtes vendeur sur les foires et marchés ? Différenciez-vous avec un produit innovant dont tout le monde a besoin !
Vous faites des ménages à domicile ? Simplifiez-vous la vie !

Avec Hopoli, tout le monde peut changer une housse de couette, particuliers ET professionnels !

 

 

 

 

 

Une étude britannique menée par YouGov vient de démontrer que 64% des personnes changent leurs draps toutes les 2 semaines ou plus. Or, les experts sont unanimes : pour notre santé, nous avons tout intérêt à les changer chaque semaine ! Selon le médecin Stéphane Gayet, "quand les conditions sont optimales, il peut y avoir plusieurs millions d'acariens dans un matelas".

 

Jusqu'à 10 millions d'acariens dans votre lit !

 

Selon les estimations de America’s Environment Health and Safety Online, il y aurait 100 000 à 10 millions d'acariens qui dorment avec vous chaque nuit. Ils sont responsables de nombreuses maladies : rhinite, asthme, eczéma ou encore troubles digestifs.

En changeant vos draps plus souvent grâce à Hopoli, vous dormirez plus sereinement et votre santé vous remerciera.

 

 

 

 

Changez votre housse de couette, et HOP...AU-LIT !

 

Nous avons particulièrement soigné la partie design pour que Hopoli convienne à tous les intérieurs. Il est esthétique, ergonomique, fonctionnel, et nous l'avons décliné en 5 couleurs pour qu'il s'adapte facilement à votre chambre.

 

 

 

Le corps de Hopoli est 100% acier, donc très résistant !

Changez toutes les housses de couette : De la couette simple à la couette maxi, Hopoli prend en charge absolument toutes les tailles de couette !

Adapté au plus grand nombre : La hauteur du dispositif a été calculée précisément pour être utilisable par la très grande majorité des personnes.

Un concentré de recherche : Vous l'avez compris, nous avons pris beaucoup de temps pour arriver à créer un système qui soit fiable et adapté. Un produit qui réponde parfaitement à nos attentes, et donc également aux vôtres. Nous avons volontairement rallongé à plusieurs reprises la phase de recherche et développement tant que nous n'étions pas pleinement satisfaits de Hopoli.

 

 

 

Démarrons la révolution Hopoli !

 

 

Hopoli a été financé en décembre 2017. Depuis, 2 modifications ont été apportées au produit en suivant vos conseils :

  • Le crochet coloré est désormais en acier, comme tout le reste du produit, afin de garantir un excellent niveau de solidité. Bref, nous sommes loin de l'obsolescence programmée.
  • Une fonction antidérapante a été apportée à la pince pour augmenter très largement son adhérence. Le résultat est au delà de ce que nous espérions.

Nous avons déjà livré des centaines de Hopoli à travers le monde et le produit sera bientôt commercialisé.

 

 

Nous nous sommes lancés dans une véritable aventure. Notre première motivation, c'est de vous apporter un outil efficace, qui règle le problème du changement de housse de couette pour toujours.

Mais nous n'oublions pas aussi notre mission d'entreprise responsable. C'est pourquoi l'assemblage de votre Hopoli sera réalisé par un établissement faisant travailler des personnes en situation de handicap.

Nous avons mis tout notre coeur pour développer Hopoli et nous pouvons vous garantir qu'aucune autre innovation n'est aussi simple et efficace.

Les 28 prototypes avant la version finale :

Nous avons essayé de penser à tout, mais si vous avez une question n'hésitez pas à la poser dans la FAQ ou sur nos réseaux sociaux (liens en bas de la page). C'est avec plaisir que nous y répondrons au plus vite.

 

 

Le chemin a été passionnant. Nous sommes passés par énormément d'étapes... Voici un best of :

 

Prix de l'Innovation Plug & Start 2017 :

Prix du Jury + Prix du Public, Business Dating 2017 :

 

 

 

Pour faire naître Hopoli, nous nous sommes entourés de partenaires fiables et solides. C'est grâce à eux que nous vous offrons aujourd'hui la meilleure qualité possible. Nous tenons à les remercier très chaleureusement :

story:
Short Summary

World is currently facing one of the biggest human tragedies in modern history. Hundreds of thousands men, women and children are leaving their homes in Middle East in search of safer and better life. They are traveling for months in hope to find  a better place for themselves and their kids.

Help these who need it most

Most of the refugees are traveling across Serbia, Hungary and Austria. Every day thousands of new immigrants enter Serbia. Our government set up a few camps for them so they can at least take some rest on their way. Many of them are exhausted and hungry. People are trying to help as much as we can, but we could use a hand. We are collecting stuff (food and clothes) to cover their basic needs. People are donating food and giving away clothes they don't need anymore, but there is problem with diapers for the youngest

You can help too

Help us buy diapers and clothes for the youngest refugees. 

We can't get their homes back, but we can bring them hope. 

They would appreciate your help

We can't get their homes back, but we can bring them hope. 
They would appreciate your help

story:
The Cora Coffee Brewer is a ceramic brewing Carafe perched on a precise Bluetooth Smart Scale.

 

 

SMARTER COFFEE

Cora didn't materialize overnight. The idea for a compact and modular pour over coffee brewer came from large coffee equipment consuming precious counter space in small apartments. We wanted to create a compact appliance that also made a statement-- a meaningful vessel to be proudly displayed, rather than hastily stashed in a cabinet.

Nearly two years of refinement have delivered the Cora Coffee Brewer. Her gentle form and premium materials define the essence of good coffee. Gently tucked within these organic materials lies an extremely efficient Bluetooth connected scale, so amazing coffee can be made at home.

Her name is a portmanteau: coffee + aura. We want Cora to give your home the aura of perfect coffee every morning. 

 

SMART SCALE

Say goodbye to plastic, batteries, and buttons. Each Smart Scale is unique-- CNC milled out of a solid piece of cherry hardwood. Powered by Bluetooth Low Energy, the scale seamlessly links with iOS and Android devices to display real-time weight in grams or ounces. The bottom of the scale is covered in laser engraved vegetable-tanned leather for a gentle and beautiful base. Magnetically clip the scale to the Cora Coffee Brewer Carafe, or use it for tea, shipping, cooking, and more. 

Smart Scale is included with Cora Coffee Brewer, or available separately. 

 

Coated laser engraved leather covers the bottom of the Smart Scale, providing a gentle touch with counters and table tops. 

 

SPECIFICATIONS 

 

CORA APP

The Cora App seamlessly connects to the Smart Scale via the latest Bluetooth Low Energy technology. Real-time weight is displayed to the Cora App for the most precise brew possible. A timer functionality lets you dial in your brew to perfection. Available for iOS and Android

 

FEATURED BY

"You can brew yourself the perfect cup of coffee without the clutter and hassle that typically accompanies manual pour over coffee brewing."

— James Oliver, IPPINKA

 

STRETCH GOALS

PRODUCTION TIMELINE


 

Who We Are

Cora was started by Aaron Freyer, an industrial designer based in San Jose, California. The Cora Coffee Brewer was realized through a love of coffee and a passion for elegant design that solve problems. Teaming up with engineers, developers, entrepreneurs and marketing experts, the Cora Coffee Brewer has been taking shape over the past two years. They are now excited to bring the Cora Coffee Brewer to the public.

 

Shipping

We provide shipping to USA and international locations. Orders shipping outside of the United State will be subject to additional shipping charges and possible import/duty taxes or fees that are to be covered at the expense of the receiver. 

 

Risks & Challenges

Nearly every component of the Cora Coffee Brewer is completely custom built from the ground up. The product is completely manufacture ready, with suppliers selected and in place take the product to production promptly. The unlikely potential of slight design changes and timeline adjustments in the "Manufacturing" phase is possible.

Our shipping date estimates have a built in safety margin. You can rest assured that the Cora Coffee Brewer will not ship until it is 100% ready for our backers to enjoy.

Please feel free to contact us with any questions about the product, the timeline, or the production of the Cora Coffee Brewer. Our supporters will be kept frequently updated on progress.

 

We need YOU to share this project!

If you've supported this project, or even if you just think it's cool, we need you help to spread the word. Without you we cannot bring the Cora Coffee Brewer to market. Please use the social media share buttons at the top of this page.
story_txt:
The Cora Coffee Brewer is a ceramic brewing Carafe perched on a precise Bluetooth Smart Scale.
 


 
SMARTER COFFEE
Cora didn't materialize overnight. The idea for a compact and modular pour over coffee brewer came from large coffee equipment consuming precious counter space in small apartments. We wanted to create a compact appliance that also made a statement-- a meaningful vessel to be proudly displayed, rather than hastily stashed in a cabinet.

Nearly two years of refinement have delivered the Cora Coffee Brewer. Her gentle form and premium materials define the essence of good coffee. Gently tucked within these organic materials lies an extremely efficient Bluetooth connected scale, so amazing coffee can be made at home.

Her name is a portmanteau: coffee + aura. We want Cora to give your home the aura of perfect coffee every morning. 

 
SMART SCALE
Say goodbye to plastic, batteries, and buttons. Each Smart Scale is unique-- CNC milled out of a solid piece of cherry hardwood. Powered by Bluetooth Low Energy, the scale seamlessly links with iOS and Android devices to display real-time weight in grams or ounces. The bottom of the scale is covered in laser engraved vegetable-tanned leather for a gentle and beautiful base. Magnetically clip the scale to the Cora Coffee Brewer Carafe, or use it for tea, shipping, cooking, and more. 

Smart Scale is included with Cora Coffee Brewer, or available separately. 

 

Coated laser engraved leather covers the bottom of the Smart Scale, providing a gentle touch with counters and table tops. 
 
SPECIFICATIONS 


 
CORA APP
The Cora App seamlessly connects to the Smart Scale via the latest Bluetooth Low Energy technology. Real-time weight is displayed to the Cora App for the most precise brew possible. A timer functionality lets you dial in your brew to perfection. Available for iOS and Android

 
FEATURED BY

"You can brew yourself the perfect cup of coffee without the clutter and hassle that typically accompanies manual pour over coffee brewing."
— James Oliver, IPPINKA
 
STRETCH GOALS

PRODUCTION TIMELINE
 
Who We Are
Cora was started by Aaron Freyer, an industrial designer based in San Jose, California. The Cora Coffee Brewer was realized through a love of coffee and a passion for elegant design that solve problems. Teaming up with engineers, developers, entrepreneurs and marketing experts, the Cora Coffee Brewer has been taking shape over the past two years. They are now excited to bring the Cora Coffee Brewer to the public.
 
Shipping
We provide shipping to USA and international locations. Orders shipping outside of the United State will be subject to additional shipping charges and possible import/duty taxes or fees that are to be covered at the expense of the receiver. 
 

Risks & Challenges
Nearly every component of the Cora Coffee Brewer is completely custom built from the ground up. The product is completely manufacture ready, with suppliers selected and in place take the product to production promptly. The unlikely potential of slight design changes and timeline adjustments in the "Manufacturing" phase is possible.
Our shipping date estimates have a built in safety margin. You can rest assured that the Cora Coffee Brewer will not ship until it is 100% ready for our backers to enjoy.
Please feel free to contact us with any questions about the product, the timeline, or the production of the Cora Coffee Brewer. Our supporters will be kept frequently updated on progress.
 

We need YOU to share this project!
If you've supported this project, or even if you just think it's cool, we need you help to spread the word. Without you we cannot bring the Cora Coffee Brewer to market. Please use the social media share buttons at the top of this page.

story:
STEMosaur is a family-friendly smart toy that engages kids with science, technology, engineering, mathematics and coding-basics in a new and fun way. We are changing the way kids learn forever!

Learning begins with a hands-on construction exercise that allows children to understand and enjoy the process of assembling their STEMosaur. Once assembled, STEMosaur is immediately capable of holding conversation, telling jokes, and playing games that inspire imagination and creativity. 

STEMosaur engages users with kid-friendly content that is educational and fun. Kids can play games with their STEMosaur, ask it endless questions and even try meditation.  As kids get older, their STEMosaur will grow with them, adapting to their unique learning level to ensure that they are consistently challenged on a wide range of subjects.

With STEMosaur, our team focused on finding the perfect intersection between having fun with your kids and actively helping them learn important skills such an coding, engineering and more. Being actively engaged and having fun while learning has a positive effect on motivation levels, determining what we learn and how much we retain from those experiences. Learning isn’t a one-way street. It requires repetition, motivation and dedication.

If the experience is fun, kids will stay curious and keep coming back for more. We designed STEMosaur with this exact principle in mind. We want to get kids excited about learning, while having fun doing it! 

 

 

STEMosaur is ideal for kids ages 7 and up, but younger children can also enjoy STEMosaur’s educational benefits with the help of a grown-up. The toy is fun for the whole family, engaging parents and kids alike in interactive STEM learning.

Everything from STEMosaur’s simple assembly instructions to its built-in coding kit are made especially for kids, creating a multi-dimensional learning experience that helps children to develop positive associations with STEM subjects right from the beginning.

Our creative team here at CogniToys, along with our network of educators, keeps educational learning fresh and exciting through our ever-growing content base so the fun never ends.

STEMosaur automatically receives updates through its cloud-based software  on a weekly basis. No additional action is required for these updates by the parent or child. All you need to do is connect your STEMosaur to Wi-Fi during the initial  setup of your toy.

 

On average, kids ask more than 300 questions per day. STEMosaur helps to satisfy this endless curiosity by engaging users in intuitive conversation, as well as reinforcing conversational confidence. This interactive smart toy can answer all kinds of questions on subjects like math, science, geography and astronomy so kids can learn while they play.

As your child learns and grows, so does their buddy! STEMosaur can advance with the learning curve of your child so content remains relevant, engaging and age appropriate. It’s like having your own personal tutor to learn from and play with—ensuring a positive educational experience at all times.

 

From its very first interaction, STEMosaur teaches children fundamental engineering principles. Through the toy’s construction kit, STEMosaur makes learning about engineering and construction an exciting and rewarding experience.

Set-up is easy with our kid-friendly  construction guide. With the help of an adult, your STEMosaur will be up and roaring in no time!

 

Research has shown that STEM education at an early age nurtures critical thinking skills and lifelong civic engagement, regardless of future career paths and education plans. These lifelong benefits are reinforced by STEMosaur, a playtime buddy that gets your child excited about discovering  STEM subjects, like coding.

STEMosaur’s coding panel enables kids to code content into their very own toy. By enforcing correct engagements, the panel helps children to figure out what they are doing wrong if they make mistakes—allowing for trial and error in a fun and friendly way.

STEMosaur’s easy-to-use coding panel teaches graphical programming and computational fluency while allowing kids to unleash their creativity and program their STEMosaur to tell unique jokes and new stories of their own making.

When kids apply the code they’ve created to their STEMosaur , they are rewarded with new conversations and possibilities—providing early learners with the perfect way to stay engaged and excited about  education!

The parent panel makes it easy for parents to be a part of the learning journey every step of the way. This secure, web-based dashboard provides insights into what kind of questions kids are asking their STEMosaur, and even enables adults to customize bedtime settings and monitor usage patterns.

Parents can also  play a part  in their child’s education by contributing to the development of STEMosaur by submitting content ideas and other recommendations through the parent panel.  

 

STEMosaur is powered by Elemental Path’s proprietary Friendgine technology - the only A.I. built specifically for kids.

  • Speech Recognition allows STEMosaur to understand and process a child’s speech.
  • Child-friendly filters are used to protect kids from inappropriate content. Real-time processing generates responses quickly to ensure lifelike interactions, offering personalized replies when possible.

User experience is enhanced by features such as:

  • Cloud-based and Wi-Fi enabled, STEMosaur is constantly updated with fresh content and real-time improvements to keep your child interested in endless educational content.
  • Seamless on-boarding with iOS or Android devices for quick and easy set-up.
  • Multicolored indicator lights that brighten up playtime and learning time whenever your buddy speaks!

Meet the DINOmite team that developed STEMosaur! These learning lovers and toy-building experts put their heads together to bring this conversational, fun and educational toy and its “Friendgine” technology to kids and their families everywhere.  

 

Thanks to the support of people like you, STEMosaur is already in production. Here's a quick look behind the scenes at our new packaging. Our creative team at CogniToys thought long and hard before creating the final version you see below, so we hope you love it as much as we do!

 

What is the recommended age range for STEMosaur?

We recommend STEMosaur for kids aged 7 and up. However, with the help of an adult, a child younger than 7 will also enjoy the toy.

 

Do I need to be connected to wifi to use my STEMosaur?

Yes, you need to be connected to wifi when you are using your STEMosaur. However, once your toy is set up it will stay connected to your home network so you don't have to go through the process of connecting your STEMosaur all over again.

 

Via app - available via iOS and Android

 

What are the STEMosaur's dimensions?

5.5” L x 4” W x 7” H

 

How much does it weigh?

Approx. 1lb

 

Is my STEMosaur listening even when my child isn’t playing with it?

No! A child must press the toy’s Belly button in order for it to be capable of listening. So if you’re speaking while STEMosaur is in the room, but no one is holding the button, the toy will not pick up on anything being said.

 

How does my child gain access to new content?

Every week our in-house content team sends new content via over-the-air-updates that will update automatically when a child turns on their STEMosaur. No additional action is required for these updates by the parent or child. We regularly add new stories, jokes, games, and more to keep the toy interesting.

 

Does STEMosaur speak any other languages?

Currently, STEMosaur only speaks and understands English.

*STEMosaur also caters for variances in accent via our speech recognition software e.g. British, Australian, etc.

 

Can two or more kids share one STEMosaur?

Absolutely! STEMosaur makes playtime fun for everyone. However, please keep in mind that STEMosaur cannot differentiate between voices and only retains information for a single user.

 

What will the STEMosaur do if a child asks an inappropriate question or uses profanity?

“It’s not polite to say that!” - Our child-friendly filters ensure each and every STEMosaur protects kids from content that is unsuitable and inappropriate.

 

What is the Parent Panel?

The Parent Panel is a secure, log-in only dashboard where parents can view learning metrics, edit account settings and access the coding panel. In the not so distant future parents will also be able to add additional product features through the parent panel.

 

Do CogniToys collect kids’ data? How safe is the toy?

Privacy is our top priority. We collect only the information necessary to improve the overall play experience. For example, when kids ask questions the STEMosaur doesn’t know, our content team receives an anonymized report to ensure that answers for these questions are added in the future. Data obtained from children is only retained for the amount of time necessary to improve the STEMosaur play experience. It is then deleted, though the statistical analysis remains. Parents can always remove all data collected at any point by resetting the toy through the CogniToys App. We do not sell any information, whether child-generated or received from parents, to 3rd parties.

 

Does my child need to know how to code to use the coding panel?

No - no previous coding experience is required to use and enjoy the coding panel. The coding panel is easy to navigate and contains instructions and examples to help kids learn how to code content into their very own STEMosaur.

 

Does my child need access to a computer to use the coding panel?

Yes, a computer with working wifi is required to access the coding panel.

The coding panel can be accessed through the parent panel.

 

How difficult is it to construct STEMosaur?

Kids can build their STEMosaur from scratch with help from the construction guide included. However, STEMosaur is a toy for the whole family and we encourage parents to actively engage in the construction and use of STEMosaur.

 

Is it easy to connect STEMosaur to WiFi?

If you have any trouble we have easy to follow guides and videos on our website.

 

Do you ship internationally?

Yes. Shipping costs vary depending on the country, but we do ship internationally.

 

Does STEMosaur come with any other voices?

We plan to allow a child to choose a custom voice for their STEMosaur from the coding panel. *This feature may be rolled out after our Indiegogo campaign.

 

What will my child learn from their STEMosaur?

In addition to engineering and coding, STEMosaur helps kids learn everything from math and science to geography and history. Our experienced content team also send out weekly updates with new and relevant content to ensure your STEMosaur gets smarter with every update. You can also learn more about how to play with your STEMosaur on the Commands page on our website.

 

Does STEMosaur come in any other colors?

Not right now.

 

Can STEMosaur be taken apart once built?

To avoid excessive wear and tear we do not recommend that STEMosaur be taken apart once assembled.

 

Do you have helpful advice on how to troubleshoot?

We have many ways for you to learn about your STEMosaur - from the FAQ section on our website to our friendly customer service team who can be contacted at info@elementalpath.com. Be sure to also check out the Quick Start Guide included to learn more about what your CogniToy is doing.

story:
[Please find English version below]

Szia, Bedő Marcinak hívnak és az Óbudai Egyetem mérnök informatikus hallgatója vagyok.

Budapesten élek, de az őszi szemesztert Lengyelországban töltöm Erasmus programon. Itt egy koliszoba az átmeneti otthonom. Február elején költözöm vissza Magyarországra.

Öt éve önállóan háztartást próbálok vezetni, és azóta dolgozom is, hogy fedezzem ennek költségeit. Ez akkor sem lesz másképp, ha visszamegyek.

Az elmúlt hónap nem alakult túl szerencsésen. A számítógépem végérvényesen tönkre ment, és még a szakdolgozatom egyik főszereplője, egy fontos mikrokontroller is elromlott.

Az Erasmus félév alatt elhasználtam minden tartalékolt pénzem. Ahhoz, hogy dolgozni tudjak, számítógépre van szükségem, de egy új beszerzését most nem engedhetem meg magamnak.

Kérlek, segíts abban, hogy megvehessem a munkaeszközömet, és dolgozhassak vele. Máskülönben nem tudom fedezni a kiadásaimat.

Készítettem viszont néhány pólótervet, amiket lengyelországi élményeim inspiráltak. Támogatásod jutalmául ajándékba küldök neked egy pólót a neked legjobban tetsző, általam készített grafikával. Minden egyes póló elkészítése és postázása körülbelül 10 dollárba, azaz 2500 forintba kerül. Az ezen felüli adományod lenne a támogatás, amit a laptop megvásárlására tudok költeni.

Ha támogatásod meghaladná a 10.000 forintot, és briliáns elméd nem cimborál a meglévő alkotásokkal, bármilyen általad kiötlött grafikát elkészítek számodra.


Köszönöm figyelmed.

További lengyelországi kalandok: wroclaw.bedomarci.hu

Legyen szép napod!

[A pólóterveket a galériában találod.]


ENGLISH VERSION:

Hey, my name is Marci Bedő and I’m a student at the University of Óbuda.

I live in Budapest, but I am spending this semester in Poland as an Erasmus student. At the moment, this dormitory is my home.

I’m moving back to Hungary in about a month.

I have been trying to live on my own for 5 years now and in order to be able to provide for myself I have also been working the whole time. This will not be any different when I move back.

The past month hasn’t been the luckiest one for me. My computer broke and the protagonist of my thesis - a microcontroller also passed away.

During this semester in Poland, I used up all my savings. In order to be able to work, I need a computer, but I can’t afford a new one at the moment.

Please, help me buy my new laptop, so that I can continue working - otherwise I will not be able to cover my expenses.

I designed some T-shirts inspired by my experiences in Poland. If you support me,  as a thank you I'll send you a T-shirt with the graphics you like the best. Each T-shirt costs about $10 - post included. Any other cents above this price would be your support for the new laptop. In case you decide to help me with more than $40, and you can't make up your brilliant mind regarding the graphics, a special T-shirt with your ideas can be made for you as well.

Thank you for watching my video.
[T-shirt designs are available in gallery.]

story:
Everyone needs the perfect table for their living room and bedroom. A fine wooden table may be the traditional choice, but why not make a modern choice for your home? Coosno is a smart coffee table designed for the future. It’s a statement piece that demands attention and delivers incredible performance.

This shining, futuristic, and sleek coffee table serves as a sound system, refrigerator, party hub, and storage space for any room in your home. 





 






 


 

  • Built-in Fridge
     

​

 

Coosno solves the age-old dilemma of having to leave the couch and walk to the fridge every time you want a fresh cold one. It has a built-in refrigerator, which allows you to grab a chilled beverage without ever missing a single moment from your TV or guests. 

The built-in fridge can hold up to 68 cans of beer.  The cooling temperature is adjustable from 33.8℉ to 44.6℉ (1℃ to 7℃).It can also hold plenty of juice, snacks, goodies, and did we mention wine? You can now sip on a brew, tip a glass of vino and listen to Billie Eilish without ever leaving the couch.

  • Voice Control
    ​

​

 

Take control! You can command the cooler to pop up or wind down with a simple voice instruction. Coosno adds convenience and ease while entertaining your friends.​


 

  • 360° Surround Sound for Party-ready
    ​

​

 

Add life to any party and experience the rich sound of your favourite music with the built-in Bluetooth stereo speakers. Pair Coosno to your smartphone app and play the music from your phone or favourite streaming service. Use the voice controls to DJ any gathering and keep the party going.

  • Aurora LED Tabletop and Nightlight with 160,000 Colors​

​

 

​An incredible glowing LED tabletop has nearly infinite colors. Add ambiance to the room and watch a halo of LEDs phase, pulse, and shine in perfect synchronicity to the rhythm of the music. Coosno is the perfect centerpiece for any event.

  • Smart Control 

​

 

​Get your Coosno totally under control with a powerful smartphone app! Synchronize your music, open the fridge. and customize full-color spectrum lighting for the LED top. The app, LED Chord, will be available on both the Apple Store and Google Store and gives you fingertip control of Coosno.

 

 

Coosno also has Google assistant built-in. Using simple voice commands, you have access to virtually any information instantly. Enjoy Spotify or other streaming services, set your calendar, control lighting and smart home features, check the weather, order food, set reminders, and more. With Coosno, you have a helpful home assistant ready to serve you anytime.

 

 

  • Wirelessly Charging
     

​

 

Two wireless charging pads are built into the top of Coosno and the drawer below respectively. There are also built-in outlets for laptop, smartphone, and other devices, 2 USB 3.0 ports are inside the drawer to keep messy wires out of sight.

  • Plug and Play

​

The Coosno coffee table is designed to be plug and play. Simply plug the Coosno into a wall outlet and you’re all set.

There’s no assembling drawers or building furniture, just simply unbox your package and plug it in. Open the App and begin using Coosno right away.

 

​

 

 

Store all your remote controls, snacks and magazines out of sight in the lower drawers. The round, sleek, Coosno coffee table makes your home more convenient and organized!

 

 

Coosno is available in two colors (gray & white) and two sizes (50 & 70cm diameter/ 19.7 & 27.6 inches diameter) two sizes make it perfect as both a side table and coffee table, and its modern, contemporary design fits any home decorating style. Coosno Home holds 32 cans of beer/38 bottles of water, while Coosno Bar holds 68 cans of beer/75 bottles of water.

 

 

Use the larger Coosno Bar in your homes bigger spaces as a coffee table, sound system, party bar and centerpiece to take your home and social life to the next level.

 

 

Use the smaller Coosno Home in bedrooms and offices as a side table, voice assistant, organizer and snack fridge. Coosno adds form and function to any room in the house.

 

 


 

 

Where Are We Now
 

 

 


 

Risk and Challenges

With our years of experience in the furniture industry, we are very confident with our process and production schedule for Coosno.

However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them. 


For instance, our product is quite heavy, which makes it more difficult to ship. In order to ship products safely, it takes a bit more time. Also, the speed of the shipping may vary from different countries. Our team is making arrangements to expedite shipping now so that we can provide the best service for our backers when we reach our funding goal.

story:
What is sLAMPS?

sLAMPS is an open design for a 3d SL (Stereo Lithography) resin printer.  I've been working on it for the last few months and have gotten it to the point where it is ready to print -- once I get a good supply of resin.

How does it work?

The printer works using a galvanometer and mirrors to steer a laser into a cured vat of resin.  The resin cures at 405nm (which the laser puts out) and turns the liquid pool (Of Zero VOC Environmentally friendly resin) into little Yoda heads and Pink Panther Ladies.

Why do I need funding?

I'm seeking funding for two reasons:

1) To be held accountable for my design to ensure that this design makes it into your hands before people are mistaken into spending a lot of money on something that doesn't need to be that expensive.

2) To accelerate my prototype.  Rather than developing pay-check to pay-check, I could make several big investment purchases that would speed up my development.

Big purchases? Like what?

Well, the funding, if received, would go towards:

* Resin Development / Manufacturing / Supplier. Most resin from commercial suppliers is sold in quantities that make protyping cost prohibitive.  In order to find the perfect resin, that is affordable -- I need to try a few suppliers, which gets expensive fast.

* Laser Cutter.  Currently, I spend A LOT of money on laser cutting service.  If I had a laser cutter in my shop, I would be able to save myself a lot of time and money in getting this printer to a shareable state.

Why aren't you selling lots of full, assembled printers?

The printer in its current state is still very much a beta.  The preference is to only sell printers & kits at this stage to people who want to put in the elbow grease to continue to push Open SL printing futher.

The printers we are selling are put together and calibrated by hand here in our workshop, and done without bulk manufacturing.  Therefore, we have priced the printer accordingly.

What have you done so far?

* Designed and Tested 1.0 Electronics: Laser is processing G-Code and simulating prints wonderfully

* Designed and printed several interations of plastic parts for the printer

* Designed and Assembled 1.0 version of the printer.

* Built sLAMPS 1.0

What's left?

I need to continue testing the printer.  Currently my focus is on getting the right vat coating and build platform to get good adherence during printing.

  • Design (done) and Test and Prototype Version two of Electronics
  • Get Build Surface Adhesion (done)
  • Get First Print (done)
  • Enhance printer and software (in progress)

What are the risks?

Risks: I get hit by a car... 

Risk Avoidance: Don't get hit by a car.

Since I'm selling kits to other makers -- the risks are low low low.  I can already purchase / source all of the parts -- but will be holding off until the end of the campaign incase I can do a bulk order to get more parts for the same cost.  This way we can develop more prototypes, and get things up and running even faster.

JOIN THE REVOLUTION!!

story:
Stop Compromising

Do you cherish the time you spend with your family and try hard to get things done like a good parent? Sometimes it is hard to satisfy everyone no matter if you are a rookie or an expert in  the kitchen, Designing products to help work alongside you might be the factor to help improve your experience in the kitchen.

Now Imagine you have an all-in-one knife and utensil care  device that enables you to work quickly and with ease so you can finish those pesky chores and get a few more minutes or even hours to spend with your family. 

Mliter S20 Smart Knife Care System is the most intelligent kitchen device on the market.  With cutting-edge technology and user-friendly design. It’s more than a simple sterilizer, knife holder or an electronic knife sharpener, but a trusted friend that frees you from the tedious chores in the kitchen after a long day.   

                            

                                                                               Featured In

Store>> 6 Perfect narrow and wide blocks for all sizes of knives forks and spoons.                   

Sharpen >> Equipped with an AC foldable space-saving sharpener, knife sharpening is now quick, simple and safe in just a few seconds.

                         

The knife sharpener is made up of the motor,  spindle, grinding wheel, bearing and sharpening shell. Driven by the motor as the driving wheel assembly rotation, it's never a problem to achieve the most high-efficient knife sharpening result without any manpower. The hard pasted steel wheel is equipped with the high degree of wear-resistant features;making the sand on the surface tough and sticky enough to work for many years to come.​

Dry >> Able to dry all utensils placed in the machine with the push of a button.

Worry-free to store and dry spoons, scissors, knives and forks made of wood, silver, stainless steel and the likes providing strong safe protection.           ​          

Sterilize >>  Built-in ozone ultraviolet lamp, UV radiation and ozone helps to achieve a double sterilizing result.                                                                                                                                                                                

Up to 99.98% sterilizing rate and force bacterial and fungal, like Staphylococcus aureus, Escherichia coli, Staphylococcus aureus, Bacillus subtilis, Salmonella typhi, Aspergillus niger, Hepatitis B Surface antigen HBXAg have place way to hide.  

 

Other Features

 

Excellent Details in Every Corner

Water tray at the bottom  makes it  easy to discharge the settled water from the dried utensils.

High-quality medical grade stainless steel and Top level ABS repay you with its world-class comfort and romance.

Highlighted Blue indicator light with Auto power off release you from the sack experience of too much pointless focus. Press the UV Disinfection/Dry/Sharpen button, the light would turn on and work as instruction for 30 minutes and then the light goes off automatically when the action is finished.

Powerful & Affordable>>Portable 4-in-1 multifunctional knife care system beats the most powerful single-use knife holder/sterilizer/knife grinder in the consumer market.

Now  Mliter S20 4-in-1 knife care system with drying, sharpening, sterilizing and storage function will surpass all your expectations at a fraction of the cost half of the price!

What It Is In Box

Package Includes

1*Mliter S20 Knife Care System

1*Charger 

1*User Manual

 

1.What is your returns & exchanges policy?
If you receive a defective or broken unit, we will resend a unit or process a full refund to you. We will help process exchanges as long as we have inventory–if not, we’ll send you your money back.

2.When will I receive my product? What if I receive it past the listed date?
We have experience with production runs of up to 3,000 units at a time with other products we’ve made in the past, meaning that we’ll put in the order as soon as we finish the campaign. From that time, it will take 1 month until we can get it across the sea and to your door.

We will honor our timelines as best as we can and for the first bulk aim to ship out to you by Christmas. December generally is a busy time to be shipping due to the holiday–if we hear of any delays on the shipper’s side, we’ll notify our backers immediately. We won’t be able to refund you for shipping delays, but if you decide to cancel your order before we put the order in for a product run, you’ll get 100% of your money back. 

3.What happens if I never receive the product?
We’ve already done a production run of 500 units to test for defect rates (we have photos and videos to prove this). Things are looking great so far. We do not foresee any challenges in scaling up the production quantity. If we aren’t able to ship to you, we’ll refund your money. 

4.What’s the shipping fee?

The shipping cost for a single Knife Care System is $18 globally （Avaible for  US/UK/DE/FR/ES/AT/IT）

5.Why should I order now？

By backing Knife Care System now you'll get to own one of the very first Knife Care System off the line, plus you’ll get exclusive access to special offers only available during the Indiegogo campaign.

6.What is your refund policy?

You can get a refund anytime before the campaign ends, please follow the steps on How to Request a Refund. As we need to lock orders in to go into production and shipment, we will not be able to offer refunds on orders after they've been shipped.

7. How long is the warranty?

This item is backed by a 12-month warranty.

8.How do I contact someone on the team?

For your convenience, you can ask questions or leave your feedback in the “comments” tab of our Indiegogo page. You can also feel free to send us a message at support@mliter.com. We will get back to you as soon as we can.

9.Does this item come in any colors besides black?

Currently, we have only prepared a black version but we plan to add other colors in our amazon stores in the near future.just keep follow us our social media which can be founded on the page！
