story:
Get prepared for a good night’s sleep

Traditional mattresses are delivered with a specific firmness degree. COSY CLASSY, on the other hand, comes with exchangeable fiberglass bars - called FLEXBONES - which affect the hardness of the mattress. They can be pushed into openings, provided in the foam layers. Whether shoulder, back or leg area – just zip the cover up, select the right amount of FLEXBONES for each zone individually, push them in, close the cover and test your personal sleeping comfort. Not just for ten hectic minutes in a stressful shopping situation, but for many relaxed nights.

 

 

Groundwork for a restful night

Some people may have a difficult time falling asleep or they wake up feeling extremely tired in the morning. Although causes for sleep disorders differ, especially pain or discomfort during night increase sleeplessness. COSY CLASSY exactly reduces these issues. It is the first mattress that adjusts to every human body and sleeping habit: whether you are a back, a side or a stomach sleeper. Whether you are stretched out or curled up like an embryo. Whether you or your partner suffer from back pain, serious snoring or pins and needles sensations.

 

Sleeping on COSY CLASSY means

  • Optimal body and spine support without pressure
  • Evenly spread body weight for side, back and stomach sleepers
  • Higher level of deep sleep, less sleep interruptions
  • Consistently restful nights for a perfect start into the day

 

How to setup your COSY to your individual preferences

Simply open the zipper, slide the FLEXBONES into the openings depending on the desired firmness and you have adjusted the firmness of the mattress!

Listen to your body, even after years

More softness for the legs? Or firmness for your back or head? The more FLEXBONES you use, the more body support you get. From the outside you can see: nothing. The openings in the mattress hide behind a comfortable high-quality cotton cover. And after the first setup, you can flexibly adjust COSY CLASSY whenever you want and need. Because life situations change, and so does your body.

 

 

COSY CLASSY at a glance

  • Exchangeable FLEXBONES (fiberglass bars) in three different strengths
  • Individual firmness for shoulders, back and legs
  • High quality foam layers made in Germany
  • Triple-layer design with optimum ergonomics and hygiene
  • Washable comfortable cover, removable with zipper
  • Flexibility for a lifetime of real happiness
  • Give your body, soul and mind a good rest.
  • COSY CLASSY is made of pure high quality materials. It was developed and manufactured under scientific supervision in Germany.

 

 

Quality Made in Germany

Our mattress is assembled out of 3 different foam layers: 

  • The top layer is made out of 5cm of Gel foam, being there for giving you a pleasant and soft lying comfort.
  • The middle layer is made out of 10cm cold foam (blue), which  is very soft to produce the correspondingly soft firmness without our FLEXBONES.
  • The bottom layer is also made out of 10cm cold foam (grey), but is harder than the middle layer, to get enough firmness from the bottom. From the top it serves as a "support" for the FLEXBONES, so they don't sink in too much and give the support they are designed for.

 

How we produce our COSY CLASSY

We developed the COSY CLASSY with one of the leading manufacturer of mattresses in Germany, so we can provide the best possible outcome for YOU!

The foam pour - the foam will rise from about 2cm height to over 1 metre of height.

After the foam rises, the foam loaf is cut into smaller blocks, so we can cut the precise height and length we need for our COSY CLASSY layers.

After all layers have been cut in the correct size, they get glued together. The glue is a water soluble, environmentally friendly adhesive.
As you can see here, our machine is putting on the glue in the same positions and amounts, so that we can provide a constant high quality assembling.

The mattresses get their cover afterwards, get vacuumed, rolled and put into the box and are ready to ship. 

 

How we are able to offer such low prices

We don't sell the COSY CLASSY to any distributors, mattress shops, online shops... so you can test your mattress without any pressure.

We are planning to launch our own online shop at the end of the year, selling our mattress directly to the customer, avoiding additional charges on the mattress and providing a simple checkout and fast shipping.

 

Why we need your support

We need YOU to support us, so that we can start producing our COSY CLASSY in higher numbers.

Additionally we're already planing to develope some new products inside our COSYWORLD - products that will furthermore increase your sleeping quality to the maximum - giving you even more comfortability and better sleep.

We're already testing different fabrics with diverse characteristics to create blankets, that will either keep you cool during the summer or keep you warm during the winter.

So please - support us, help us reach our goal and make sure you subscribe to our social media channels and stay updated about new products and product improvements!

Please keep in mind that the product you get may vary in colors or looks.
story_txt:
Get prepared for a good night’s sleepTraditional mattresses are delivered with a specific firmness degree. COSY CLASSY, on the other hand, comes with exchangeable fiberglass bars - called FLEXBONES - which affect the hardness of the mattress. They can be pushed into openings, provided in the foam layers. Whether shoulder, back or leg area – just zip the cover up, select the right amount of FLEXBONES for each zone individually, push them in, close the cover and test your personal sleeping comfort. Not just for ten hectic minutes in a stressful shopping situation, but for many relaxed nights.  Groundwork for a restful nightSome people may have a difficult time falling asleep or they wake up feeling extremely tired in the morning. Although causes for sleep disorders differ, especially pain or discomfort during night increase sleeplessness. COSY CLASSY exactly reduces these issues. It is the first mattress that adjusts to every human body and sleeping habit: whether you are a back, a side or a stomach sleeper. Whether you are stretched out or curled up like an embryo. Whether you or your partner suffer from back pain, serious snoring or pins and needles sensations. Sleeping on COSY CLASSY means
Optimal body and spine support without pressure
Evenly spread body weight for side, back and stomach sleepers
Higher level of deep sleep, less sleep interruptions
Consistently restful nights for a perfect start into the day
 How to setup your COSY to your individual preferencesSimply open the zipper, slide the FLEXBONES into the openings depending on the desired firmness and you have adjusted the firmness of the mattress!Listen to your body, even after yearsMore softness for the legs? Or firmness for your back or head? The more FLEXBONES you use, the more body support you get. From the outside you can see: nothing. The openings in the mattress hide behind a comfortable high-quality cotton cover. And after the first setup, you can flexibly adjust COSY CLASSY whenever you want and need. Because life situations change, and so does your body.  COSY CLASSY at a glance
Exchangeable FLEXBONES (fiberglass bars) in three different strengths
Individual firmness for shoulders, back and legs
High quality foam layers made in Germany
Triple-layer design with optimum ergonomics and hygiene
Washable comfortable cover, removable with zipper
Flexibility for a lifetime of real happiness
Give your body, soul and mind a good rest.

COSY CLASSY is made of pure high quality materials. It was developed and manufactured under scientific supervision in Germany.
  Quality Made in GermanyOur mattress is assembled out of 3 different foam layers: 
The top layer is made out of 5cm of Gel foam, being there for giving you a pleasant and soft lying comfort.
The middle layer is made out of 10cm cold foam (blue), which  is very soft to produce the correspondingly soft firmness without our FLEXBONES.
The bottom layer is also made out of 10cm cold foam (grey), but is harder than the middle layer, to get enough firmness from the bottom. From the top it serves as a "support" for the FLEXBONES, so they don't sink in too much and give the support they are designed for.
 How we produce our COSY CLASSYWe developed the COSY CLASSY with one of the leading manufacturer of mattresses in Germany, so we can provide the best possible outcome for YOU!The foam pour - the foam will rise from about 2cm height to over 1 metre of height.After the foam rises, the foam loaf is cut into smaller blocks, so we can cut the precise height and length we need for our COSY CLASSY layers.After all layers have been cut in the correct size, they get glued together. The glue is a water soluble, environmentally friendly adhesive.As you can see here, our machine is putting on the glue in the same positions and amounts, so that we can provide a constant high quality assembling.The mattresses get their cover afterwards, get vacuumed, rolled and put into the box and are ready to ship.  How we are able to offer such low pricesWe don't sell the COSY CLASSY to any distributors, mattress shops, online shops... so you can test your mattress without any pressure.We are planning to launch our own online shop at the end of the year, selling our mattress directly to the customer, avoiding additional charges on the mattress and providing a simple checkout and fast shipping. Why we need your supportWe need YOU to support us, so that we can start producing our COSY CLASSY in higher numbers.Additionally we're already planing to develope some new products inside our COSYWORLD - products that will furthermore increase your sleeping quality to the maximum - giving you even more comfortability and better sleep.We're already testing different fabrics with diverse characteristics to create blankets, that will either keep you cool during the summer or keep you warm during the winter.So please - support us, help us reach our goal and make sure you subscribe to our social media channels and stay updated about new products and product improvements!Please keep in mind that the product you get may vary in colors or looks.

story:
DEMO


SUCCESS METRICS

WHAT PEOPLE SAY ABOUT TEPLO

THE PRESS:

INTRODUCING THE WORLD'S FIRST SMART BOTTLE FOR TEA LOVERS

Teplo is a revolutionary smart bottle that allows tea drinkers to brew the perfect cup of tea by tracking and controlling brewing temperature and time, via a mobile app and extracts maximum health benefits from your tea. 

Instead of letting your tea get cold, a rechargeable battery hidden in the base of the bottle keeps the beverage at the preferred temperature for as long as 4 hours. Plus users can personalize their tea blends based on health and taste preferences, and order premium teas from all over the world on Teplo’s app.

THE PROBLEM:

Tea is the most popular drink in the world yet many tea drinkers don’t realize that getting the perfect cup of tea is actually quite complex and difficult; tea is extremely sensitive to temperature and brewing time. Compared to the way most typically brew tea: by simply throwing a tea bag in hot water and start drinking, we are ignoring taste, flavor, color and even the correct drinking temperature of the tea. 

The Teplo team spent the past year carefully engineering both the bottle and the technology that powers it and are excited to unveil our product and bring it to tea lovers around the world. Introducing the world’s smartest bottle for tea drinkers - simple and elegant!

THE SOLUTION:

Teplo combines technology with its unique design to allow for the most perfect tea drinking experience, unlike anything else.

The glass bottle allows tea enthusiasts to appreciate the color of the tea, as well as to maintain the perfect temperature for a long period of time.

HOW IT WORKS

Select the type of tea to brew.

The app will notify you when to put the tea leaves at the right brewing temperature.

App will notify when to remove the tea leaves after the required brewing time is complete.

After the drinking temperature is reached the bottle will maintain that temperature for 4 hours.

TEA PERSONALIZATION:

Answer a few simple questions and get your own personalized tea to suit your taste and health preferences right at your door step using our app using our tea subscription package.


THE SPECS:

Teplo’s innovative design consists of a glass bottle with a thermo sensor, heater, Bluetooth communication module and two batteries. An internal battery is used to communicate with smart devices, and has an all-day battery life. An external battery maintains the drinking temperature for as long as four hours.

THE APP:

Teplo will provide a mobile application for iOS and Android, available from the App store and Google Play.

R&D:

We develop our technology in our in house R&D lab. We also leverage our capability by partnering with manufacturers across the world.

THE TEAM:

Kazunori Kawanobe (CEO, co-founder)

Abhinav Sureka (COO, co-founder)

Mayuresh Soni (CTO, co-founder)

Marissa Goldstein, CMO

Bill Phelps, Ideastorm Inc., Design Partner

Tetsuo Hitomi(tet.hitomi@gmail.com), Logo Design Partner

Mai Usami(sammy.mu@gmail.com), Logo Design Assistant

LemonLight Media, Video Production

Adam Goldstein, Timroon, Manufacturing Partner

OUR STORY:

We are three friends who came to the US to get our MBA’s at Babson College. Coming from Japan and India, tea is really important to our culture. With a growing tea market in the US of $2.4B, we thought that there must be a better way to use technology to create a better tea drinking experience. So, after discussing together, we decided to create Teplo, a simple yet elegant solution that combines modern technology with traditional tea drinking.

We’ve spent the past year designing and building both our hardware product as well as the technology that powers it. We’ve gone through countless prototypes and have tested it out on our classmates, who come from all over the world.

Now we are ready to launch Teplo and get it into the hands of tea enthusiasts all over the world and we need your help. With the money we raise from this campaign, we will be able to purchase tooling and thus kickstart the manufacturing process. We have the prototypes, have identified our suppliers and just need the capital to manufacture.

PHOTO GALLERY:

TIMELINE:

RISKS AND CHALLENGES:

Bringing any product to market can present challenges and unfortunately delays can occur due to unforeseen circumstances. We give you our promise to do our best to make sure that the production process is done efficiently and effectively. Through the help of Timroon, we’ve already identified our manufacturing partners and our production timeline has been established. We are excited to bring Teplo to life and thank you for your support!

story:
What is Egloo?

Egloo is conceived for contrasting continuous waste of electricity used for warming domestic environment, offering, as a option, a candle-powered way that provides a cheaper and more ecological energy, taking advantage of features of terracotta that stores the heat and slowly and gradually releases it by radiation, even after it blows out.

 

How to use it

Using Egloo is simple. It takes only the positioning of the three candles on the base and the insertion of the grill on which the domes must be placed.  After only five minutes Egloo is ready.

 

How does it work

Once you light it up, Egloo needs 5 minutes to get to the right temperature. Once the candles are lighted up, they will warm up before the thinner chamber storing a high rate of heat (between 140° and 180° degrees). The warmth is then conveyed to the external covering (between 30° and 50° degrees).

 The air intake of the external dome facilitate the outgoing of the warm air stored between the covers, allowing thermal exchange with the room environment.

After only 30 minutes the temperature of the environment surrounding the Egloo will be increased between 2° and 3° degrees.

 

How is it made?

 

Egloo is composed by four elements: the base, the grill and the two domes. The base offers a space for the positioning of the candles that, once you light them up, will warm the domes up. There is a metal grill placed on the base, serving as a support for the domes. It makes a space to let the air in, necessary for the combustion of the candles.

The thinner dome, placed centrally on the base, stores a high rate of heat, that is conveyed to the external dome; the dome's air intake facilitate the outgoing of the warm air stored between the covers, allowing thermal exchange with the environment.

 

Technical feature

Egloo has a simple and compact shape. It can adapt to every kind of place, with a overall weight of 1 kg.

Egloo is a useful utensil to warm average rooms up with a very restrained cost, needs 3 candles for a complete refill, enough for warming up a 20mq environment. Each refill has a life of 5 hours with less than 10 cent.

 

Design process

Egloo project was born three years ago with the express purpose of giving everyone a useful, beautiful and effective product. 

Since then many things have changed and now finally, thanks to the suggestions of our customers and to your help, will be able to produce this new model of Egloo. 

We conducted a year of laboratory tests to create a new composition of terra-cotta hydrophilic which is able to withstand high temperatures, much more resistant and that releases much more heat than before. 

We have completely redesigned the grill and the domes changing the form, height, thickness and even the hole of the small dome.

 

 

Designed for everyone!

Egloo is available in various versions: Natural, coloured and glazed.

 

Egloo - Natural

Egloo - Coloured Red​

 

Egloo - Coloured Blue​

Egloo - Coloured Beige

Egloo - Coloured Black

Egloo - Glazed Black​

 

Egloo - Glazed White

 

Egloo - Metal Black

 

Egloo - Metal Gray

 

Egloo - Textured Orange

Egloo - Textured Violet​

Egloo - Textured Turquoise​

By popular demand, we have introduced two new colors : Tiffany and crazy green ! Your suggestions are important to us.

Egloo - Coloured Tiffany

Egloo - Coloured Green

 

 

Risks and challenges

The first prototypes were built handcrafted, in order to assess the efficiency according to the shape and volume, and then be painted and glazed by hand. We are already in contact with the various suppliers, for the production of individual parts, and with a network of international shipments, which will not go beyond the deadline. In large scale production the final color will be directly mixed with the terracotta da fiamma to the liquid state in order to have a perfectly homogeneous coloring and more resistant components to high temperatures.

It's advisable to use a maximum of 3 candles to avoid that concentrates a high level of temperature in the lower part. Do not use candles of low quality because of possible emission of harmful substances into the wax.

Keep away from children when Egloo is in operation: the temperature of the outer dome reaches temperatures between 30-50 C° degrees. We recommend Egloo handle with care and do not move when in use.

Badger Box hand picks 4-6 items from Wisconsin and delivers em' right to your door! 

If Wisconsin culture is important to you, this will be the best subscription box you will ever get! 

Reward 1: 

Reward 2: 

Reward 3, 4, 5, 6: 

             (Each box will contain at least $40 worth of products)

What's better than living in Wisconsin!? 

(Besides the weather.. lol) The culture here is amazing, and there is nothing quite like it anywhere else! My goal with Badger Box is to bring some of that culture to you, no matter where you are located in the United States. 

Badger Box Is Perfect For:

  • Those who currently live in Wisconsin, but don't want to travel the state to find cool products and gifts. We'll find the products for you, package them up in a subscription box and deliver them to you each month. 
  • For those true Wisconsinites who left the state, but the state never them! We want you to feel like you're getting a box full of items from home each month. So if you grew up in Wisconsin, and don't get to experience the culture, we want to help you with that! 
  • Badger Box makes a great gift as well! If you have a teenager who is going off to college, this would make a great care package each month! or.. if you have friends or family who moved out of state; send them a Badger Box and give them a little piece of Wisconsin! 

Make sure you don't miss the exciting launch and follow us on social media! 

www.facebook.com/BadgerBoxCo

www.Instagram.com/BadgerBoxCo

www.Twitter.com/BadgerBoxCo

story:
When a lamp is no longer just a lamp.

MEDIA

 

Let glow levitate and light up your room, restaurant, or cafe.  Don't forget to have glow to set the the mood for a romantic night.  

 DESIGN MEETS TECHNOLOGY

Contemporary lamp inspired by the geometrical structures found in nature. Combining an original elegant design with leading edge technology, we have been able to present the lamp completely free from supports, levitating and rotating in the air. 

Never see light the same way ever again. The amazing crystalline Glow lamp is fitted with a high-strength neodymium magnet that allows it to levitate and spin in mid air. By using a synthetic material for the crystal, it's able to illuminate an ethereal glow.

 

MULTI LIGHTING MODES

Simply touch the top of the crystal to turn it on/off and change between lighting modes.

SOFT MOOD LIGHT Emits a soft warm glow, great to use as a bed-side table light, romantic light or just for setting the atmosphere. This mode is very energy efficient and can last up to 80 hours after a full charge.

 

FULL POWER TASK LIGHT This mode is bright and useful for many tasks such as reading, studying, or lighting up a small room. (350 lumens: close to a 30W bulb) 

 

WIRELESS LAMP

Grab it from the base and it becomes your mobile friend, meaning you can take it anywhere. Great to use at garden parties, on the balcony or at the beach. Also, great for guiding your way while walking in the dark.

EASILY ATTACH IT TO ANY METAL SURFACE: The crystal is installed with a strong magnet, so you can stick it to almost any metal surface.

 

BASE SYSTEM

WHITE ACRYLIC - For a modern minimalist feel

 

PRESS KIT

https://goo.gl/PcTOCf

 

SPECIFICATIONS

Crystal Dimensions: 12cm (outer most diameter) 

Crystal components: 12 attachable pieces -100% recyclable, water resistant polypropylene 

Base Dimensions: 11cm width, 2.7cm height 

Base finish: White acrylic 

Magnets: Super strong Neodymium magnets 

Light source / brightness: High output LED / 350 lumens 

Light temperature: 2700K (warm white) 

Battery specs: Rechargeable Lithium Ion 

Battery life full power mode: 8 hours battery life with constant use 

Battery life soft glow mode: 80 hours battery life with constant use 

Crystal lamp power: Universal USB charger 

Base power: Power Adapter -15 Volts US / EU Plug / Global Voltage Compatible 100 - 240V 

 

PRODUCTION SCHEDULE

February - Concept

APRIL - Design & Research

JULY - Built working prototype

NOVEMBER - Kickstarter campaign

DECEMBER - Test & finalize materials

FEBRUARY - Manufacturing & production

MAY - Shipping

 

THE TEAM

 

OUR VISION

We have spent the last year meticulously developing and fine tuning our design to retain a premium high quality product but at the same time we want to make it as affordable as possible. We understand our dream could not come true without the support of our backers, so we decided to give  our supporters the best possible price. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

(350 lumens: close to a 30W bulb)  WIRELESS LAMPGrab it from the base and it becomes your mobile friend, meaning you can take it anywhere. Also, great for guiding your way while walking in the dark.EASILY ATTACH IT TO ANY METAL SURFACE: The crystal is installed with a strong magnet, so you can stick it to almost any metal surface. BASE SYSTEMWHITE ACRYLIC - For a modern minimalist feel PRESS KIThttps://goo.gl/PcTOCf SPECIFICATIONSCrystal Dimensions: 12cm (outer most diameter) Crystal components: 12 attachable pieces -100% recyclable, water resistant polypropylene Base Dimensions: 11cm width, 2.7cm height Base finish: White acrylic Magnets: Super strong Neodymium magnets Light source / brightness: High output LED / 350 lumens Light temperature: 2700K (warm white) Battery specs: Rechargeable Lithium Ion Battery life full power mode: 8 hours battery life with constant use Battery life soft glow mode: 80 hours battery life with constant use Crystal lamp power: Universal USB charger Base power: Power Adapter -15 Volts US / EU Plug / Global Voltage Compatible 100 - 240V  PRODUCTION SCHEDULEFebruary - ConceptAPRIL - Design & ResearchJULY - Built working prototypeNOVEMBER - Kickstarter campaignDECEMBER - Test & finalize materialsFEBRUARY - Manufacturing & productionMAY - Shipping THE TEAM OUR VISIONWe have spent the last year meticulously developing and fine tuning our design to retain a premium high quality product but at the same time we want to make it as affordable as possible. We understand our dream could not come true without the support of our backers, so we decided to give  our supporters the best possible price. THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

story:
Short Summary

It seems that more and more children are being left in hot cars every day but why is this happening?  Yes, morning can be hectic and I, as a parent myself, have found myself easily forgetting things.  Maybe it was a long night and you are short on sleep.  Maybe you are fully focused on that important meeting you have this morning.  The one important thing you just forgot to do though is pull that sleeping child from their car seat as you rushed from your car.
The interior temperatures of cars can reach well over 100 degrees in a matter of minutes in certain areas of the US.  When a child's body temperature reaches 104 degrees their organs begin to shut down.  When that temperature reaches 107, they die.
This not only affects children but your pets as well.  They can suffer the same fate as too many children have.  Why take the chance when there is an easy solution that is low cost and easy to make?

What We Need

It may be hard to believe but I am not looking to make any money from this product.  I want to be able to provide something to everyone that can make a difference.  Honestly I would love to see this type of product be a mandatory feature in all car seats or pet carriers.  

The money raised from this campaign is strictly used for prototype development and paying for additional resources such as the development of cell phone apps and other devices.

Once everything is finalized and thoroughly tested, all product information (designs, programming, hardware requirements, cell phone apps) will be made available to the public.

    The Impact

    I can't see any reason that children or pets should suffer any more than they already have.  If we can work towards having one of these devices installed in every car seat, booster seat, or pet carrier we may never have to turn on the news and hear of another death related to heat again.

story:
Hello my fellow Tolkien fans and those not so Tolkien-inclined! I have summoned you to answer the threat of Mordor...

Or rather to emplore you to help me in my quest to renew the domain and hosting of my network, SnowAfterFire.net. Hosting a network is difficult work and quite a costly thing. I desperately desire to keep my network from going the way of Smaug, as I have big things planned for these websites in the not-so-distant future, such as a grand-scale revamp of Snow After Fire, an extensive informational format change to The Elfstone, and -- if I can handle it -- the continuation of the screen capture gallery.

For a return on your investment, I have devised some incentives, perks if you will (and Indiegogo will). If you would like to help me in this endeavour, simply pick one of the perks and contribute. If you can't afford to but wish me luck, head to the comments section.

Even the smallest dollar can change the course of the future. I truly appreciate anything that is contributed.

Warmest regards.

story:
The Story.


We are back on Indiegogo. Almost a year ago you, our Backers, supported our idea of magnetic wooden toys with switchable blocks and helped us to launch WUMBA Toys.

We do believe that children's toys can be interesting, playful and safe. We do also believe that wooden toys can be awesome and enjoyed by all ages. We took our passion for wood and enthusiasm for toys and made a big fat sandwich of engineering, manufacturing logistics, contemporary design, parenting experience and some sense of humor. The resulting blend gave simple and durable magnetic wooden toys that can literally boost kids' imagination due to the limitless mix & match combinations. The Kickstarter and Indiegogo campaigns we launched to give birth to our invention went on to prove that many people also liked toys consisting of 3 magnetic wooden blocks each, that have the same radius and smart magnet polarity, making them interchangeable and playing with them endlessly. 

Who knew - but we were happy to see a lot of appreciation from more than 40 countries across the world.

The success of the campaign kicked our start-up into high gear. We carefully selected the wood, magnets and twice carefully selected the lacquers. And we launched our small but real factory. The rest was history. Numerous late nights later, the last WUMBA set was sent to our backers.

And now we are ready with the follow-up. And as before, without your help, none of these new designs will come to life, at least not in the near future. We’ve learned a ton of lessons since our last campaign, improved our production and logistics and we’re keen to put all this experience to work. 

The Lineup.

We have a whole lot of excitement lined up: no less than 11 new completely distinct Characters! It’s ambitious, but we’ve been thinking hard about creating a WUMBA Universe, so this time will be about adding new creatures.

The last campaign proved that having only 5 animals might be not enough because many people preferred Big WUMBA Boxes with 10 different animals inside. And we wanted to try something fresh and different. We checked and studied dozens of ideas. Finally, we came up with 2 new collections - Cute Dinosaurs and Lovely Monsters. Furthermore, the original WUMBA Squad will also be significantly upgraded. But let's move on step-by-step and meet all of them.

The Animals.

 

This is an Elephant. WUMBA Elephant stands, eats grass, pours water on its back, runs, runs fast, and sometimes even flies and it is purple.  

 

This is a Crocodile. It has multiple action poses, 2 emotions, and a special gliding feature. 

 

This is a Zebra. It drinks, it runs, it looks forward and backward, it bows and even has 9 stripes and a blue tail.

 

This is a Lion. WUMBA Lion likes performing real circus stunts, doing yoga. It is beautiful and cute. It also has a unique nodding feature.

 

This is a Moose. WUMBA Moose likes doing work-out and likes standing on its horns.  

Just have a look who can come up if you dare to mix them.

 

The Dinosaurs.

 

This is a Parasaurolophus but we call him Parry. It likes playing with the tail and has the stripes like WUMBA Zebra.

 

This is a T-Rex. It is the only one green dino which can make the top twisted table pose.

 

This is a Chungkingosaurus aka Chucky. Its mountain-high and likes staring and the blue sky. Most probably because it is also blue.

 

This is a Triceratops Tracy. She is cute, pink and enjoys yoga like a WUMBA Lion.

 

This is a Brachiosaurus and his name is Brachio. It is as flexible and stretchable as only WUMBA Crocodile can be.

 

But look how many dinosaurs one can make mixing them. 

 

The Monsters.

 

This is a Troll. The cutest monster ever and it likes sunbathing.


This is a Pudding Monster. It snuggles up, fawns like a cat and it has many spots.

 

This is an Aquamonster. Obviously, it likes swimming. And it is always smiling.

 

This is a Mighty Multieye. It has at least 5 eyes. And It is always staring at you.

 

This is a Vampire. It has only 1 eye but has 2 wings. The WUMBA Vampire likes dancing and it is vegan.

 

Mixing monsters is a kind of threatening fun.

 

Never-ending Fun.

Consisting of 3 wooden blocks, each character can be assembled in multiple ways. But there’s more! Although each character has a different shape, they all have the same radius and smart magnet polarity, making the blocks interchangeable. With this feature, there is virtually no limit to the number of mix and match combinations. 

In short, kids can build as many wooden toy creatures as they want! The fun never ends!

 

Early Learning Pattern.

These toys are for small kids (1 yrs. +). The idea is a 3D version of popular early mix-and-match books. We took Montessori and Waldorf guidelines and brought them to life through wood and magnets. With our idea of the magnetic construction toys, kids can re-create the forms offered or come up with new forms. 

Specially developed shapes, prints, colors, and magnets allow children to build and create in ways they can't with standard building blocks!   

 

Safety.

Not only is it fun to see what kids come up with, but parents can also rest assured that these magnetic wooden toys with their smooth edges are completely safe. 


Made of natural solid beech wood from the Carpathians, WUMBA uses lead-free magnets and water-based paints. It is also impossible to see, touch or extract the magnets, so there is no danger of a child swallowing them. 


We have chosen beech wood as a perfect solution for our toys. It is oak-strong; therefore, each block is long-lasting. Also, beech wood has antiseptic properties. It is easy to work with and leaves fewer hooks and chips, so children can’t get hurt. An extra bonus of using beech wood is that it has a beautiful texture: the annual layers are well distinguished, so it looks amazing after polishing.
Beech trees regrow fast and we use only FSC certified wood meaning our toys are sustainable. 


The blocks are painted with water-based lacquers. It is 100% eco-friendly, as it’s based on acrylate, which dissolves in water and contains no toxic paint chemicals (lead-free). This covering allows the wood to adapt to the humidity of the environment, which increases the product’s lifespan. Blocks covered with such lacquers don’t lose their color after being exposed to sunlight for a long time. Our blocks contain no flammable substances and are therefore fireproof.  
Furthermore, it doesn’t totally overlay the wooden texture. So the result looks colorful but still natural. 

To connect the blocks, we use strong Neodymium magnets. They have the longest lifespan, losing only 1% of their strength in 100 years. The magnets are small, light-weight and lead-free. We use 7x7 mm cylindrical magnets with an axial magnetic field. Our magnets have a bonding force of 1.5 kg. 
Most importantly, they are implanted and securely sealed inside the wood. 

 

We take safety very seriously, and we use independent consumer labs to make sure that everything is safe and certified before we ship it out to you. The final product will be CE-marked and compliant with the European Standard for Toys covered by EN-71 and REACH, as well as the equivalent US standards covered by ASTM F963 and CPSIA. 

As such, we provide you with a lifetime warranty for our products, and we will replace any broken block free of charge including shipping. You will, however, have to send us the photo of the broken block to make sure it wasn’t misused. By the way, not a single replacement was claimed yet!
We are confident in our quality and can guarantee you everlasting, enjoyable play with WUMBA. 

 

Perks.

Essentially all of the above, broken down on the right, and further explained below. If you still have questions, don't hesitate to contact us. We will be shipping all rewards from Ukraine with priority airmail. All shipments will have the tracking and all shipping cost are included to the pledges. As such, the parcels should be customs-friendly for all EU, UK and US backers. However, customs fees or local sales taxes may rarely apply. Feel free to let us know if you have any specific requirements or need certain adjustments to the shipping documents.



 

Timeline.


Having successfully completed fulfillment for our previous campaign, we've learned quite a few things. We faced two bottlenecks - painting & printing and fulfillment logistics - and we took steps to address both.

On the production side, the flow is now well established: 
- we improved the painting technology for faster and more efficient painting; 
- we changed the supplier of the lacquers for brighter and rich colors; 
- we changed the printing technology and use silk-screen printing instead of tampo-printing;

The fulfillment is fully buttoned up now as well. Global shipping has a way of delivering surprises, from airport strikes to customs delays. Furthermore, the rewards after the last campaign were shipped too close to Chrismas and some of them stuck in the "postal jams". However, we had a chance to experience different couriers. Thus we know which will work better for us this time. Least of our worries.

That being said, creating a toy is always a challenge – you must make it safe, you should make it playful and you'd better make it nice and attractive. While absolutely nothing is 100% foolproof in this world and even pigs can fly (with the proper gear, of course) we feel pretty confident that everything will be successfully managed and handled professionally.

Nevertheless, we will keep you posted on every update and you can contact us at any time here and at team@wumba.toys

So here it is, this is our new lineup. We’ve spent the last 6 months working to develop sales, improving production and designing new toys. And we promise to keep going if you want us to.
 

If you believe in what we’re doing here, please lend a hand to turn these into reality and keep us moving forward – help fund this project. 

From all of us here at WUMBA toys, we thank you!

story:
With a quiet and powerful brushless motor that boasts up to 115,000 rpm, the T10 Home cordless vacuum delivers robust suction power for up to 58 minutes. It weighs at just over 1.5 kg (3.3 pounds) for a swift and easy cleaning under couches and in corners. It's your best choice for home cleaning.

 

The Unboxing Review

“The Puppyoo T10 Home has replaced all my vacuum cleaner and I never looked back. Honestly, it’s really hard to find any shortcomings with this device. Using it for more than one month I can easily recommend the Puppyoo T10 Home to anyone.” — Techline

 

 

 

The Puppyoo T10 Home can meet all your cleaning needs. Simply switch the heads when cleaning between your carpets, floors, beds, sofas, furniture, keyboards, or even cars. One machine solves all your needs!

 

 

 

 

T10 offers a powerful cleaning performance with a brushless motor spins up to 115,000 rpm, it has the ability to function as both a handheld and stick vacuum, allowing users to clean a variety of areas. With the Straight Wind Trajectory Design, T10 suction power reaches 250 watts, an increase of 15% than the previous vacuums.

 

 
 

 

 

With a 0.55 L large dust chamber with HEPA filter, T10 will help you to remove mites, pollen, and allergens from your home. It helps to relieve the reaction of Allergies. The HEPA filter can be cleaned with the small brush supplied.

 

 

 

This lightweight cordless vacuum takes the only 2.5 hours to charge fully. The battery gives you about 58 minutes of vacuuming time in normal mode for a space of 3800 square ft (400 square meters), and 15 minutes in maximum mode.

 

 

T10 Home's main machine weights only 3.3 pounds / 1.5 kg.The lightweight makes it easy to maneuver, both on the ground and when reaching above your head to suck up those ceiling cobwebs or curtains.

 

 

Built-in LED sensor light automatically illuminates any dark corners to allow you to clean at night and get the blind spots under the furniture. The low angle lights help you detect dust easier to you can clean better.

 

 

With the magnetic wall mount and charger, T10 can be docked and charged all while being lifted above the ground and out of the way. With its fast charging charger, fully charge the T10 Home in just 2.5 hours.

 

 

 

Its modular device comes with a variety of attachments that optimize it for various cleaning tasks. Simply click and lock to switch between roller heads, you can use T10 to clean all kinds of surface.

 


 

 

*The pack only comes with ONE main motorized brush, you can choose either Motorized Carpet Brush or Motorized Hard Floor Brush.

 

 

 

 

As the founders of Puppyoo, we have more than 20 years of experience in the vacuum industry. We hold a comprehensive understanding of the vacuum supply chain. As homeowners, we know a house requires daily cleaning and upkeep. We’ve designed a highly efficient and convenient vacuum to clean your home and free up more time for you do what you like. Our vision is to deliver a high quality, affordable vacuum to every home.

 

Puppyoo was founded by a group of experienced designers, product developers, and supply chain managers. After a ton of hard work and improvement, we are able to assess and mitigate all the foreseeable risks and challenges. Before launching our project on Indiegogo, we have already conducted two pilot productions as well as send our products to friends and professional photographers for testing and reviewing. We have improved the deficiency of the product design based on their feedback and suggestions.

 

Apart from that, we’ve also built out a specific plan for our manufacturing process. So we have confidence in shipping the Puppyoo T10 Home on time. If there are any changes due to materials, suppliers, or unforeseen events, we’ll ensure that we keep each of our supporters fully updated. Now, we had finalized the trial production and are ready to start the mass production, but we need your support. Your support not only gives us the ability to start mass production and build the best products we can imagine but allows us to continue to work on new ideas.

With the Straight Wind Trajectory Design, T10 suction power reaches 250 watts, an increase of 15% than the previous vacuums.
 


 
 



 

 
With a 0.55 L large dust chamber with HEPA filter, T10 will help you to remove mites, pollen, and allergens from your home. It helps to relieve the reaction of Allergies. The HEPA filter can be cleaned with the small brush supplied.
 

 

 
This lightweight cordless vacuum takes the only 2.5 hours to charge fully. The battery gives you about 58 minutes of vacuuming time in normal mode for a space of 3800 square ft (400 square meters), and 15 minutes in maximum mode.
 

 


T10 Home's main machine weights only 3.3 pounds / 1.5 kg.The lightweight makes it easy to maneuver, both on the ground and when reaching above your head to suck up those ceiling cobwebs or curtains.
 


 
Built-in LED sensor light automatically illuminates any dark corners to allow you to clean at night and get the blind spots under the furniture. The low angle lights help you detect dust easier to you can clean better.
 


 
With the magnetic wall mount and charger, T10 can be docked and charged all while being lifted above the ground and out of the way. With its fast charging charger, fully charge the T10 Home in just 2.5 hours.
 

 

 
Its modular device comes with a variety of attachments that optimize it for various cleaning tasks. Simply click and lock to switch between roller heads, you can use T10 to clean all kinds of surface.
 


 
 



*The pack only comes with ONE main motorized brush, you can choose either Motorized Carpet Brush or Motorized Hard Floor Brush.

 

 
 


 


As the founders of Puppyoo, we have more than 20 years of experience in the vacuum industry. We hold a comprehensive understanding of the vacuum supply chain. As homeowners, we know a house requires daily cleaning and upkeep. We’ve designed a highly efficient and convenient vacuum to clean your home and free up more time for you do what you like. Our vision is to deliver a high quality, affordable vacuum to every home.
 

Puppyoo was founded by a group of experienced designers, product developers, and supply chain managers. After a ton of hard work and improvement, we are able to assess and mitigate all the foreseeable risks and challenges. Before launching our project on Indiegogo, we have already conducted two pilot productions as well as send our products to friends and professional photographers for testing and reviewing. We have improved the deficiency of the product design based on their feedback and suggestions. Apart from that, we’ve also built out a specific plan for our manufacturing process. So we have confidence in shipping the Puppyoo T10 Home on time. If there are any changes due to materials, suppliers, or unforeseen events, we’ll ensure that we keep each of our supporters fully updated. Now, we had finalized the trial production and are ready to start the mass production, but we need your support. Your support not only gives us the ability to start mass production and build the best products we can imagine but allows us to continue to work on new ideas.

story:
Luma is a smart lamp for the 21st century. Charge your device, listen to music, make a call and set the mood all with this smart lamp controlled by your phone. It is perfect for your office, nursery, bedroom and home foyer.

We originally launched our product on Kickstarter and successfully raised enough money to start this product, but we decided to re-launch for three main reasons. 1) We want to raise the funds sufficient to make our lamp the first "HomeKit" compatible device. This will allow our product to be compatible with Siri on Apple's new OS. 2) We had multiple people still interested in backing additional lamps. Finally, 3) We had multiple people interested in buying our bulb separate from our lamp.

Value Proposition

Backing our project will help us deliver a smart lamp at an affordable cost. Buying these items separately would set you back over $300. Other items that combine a few of these functions, such as a dock speaker, run on average $100. Luma SmartLamp starts at $89.

Features

Luma SmartLamp comes with three main feature categories: light, sound and power.

Power (USB Charger):

Luma SmartLamp is equipped with a 2.1A USB Charger. This means it can charge tablets, smart phones, and all devices that use a USB charger at the fastest possible speed.

Stunning Sound (Built-in Speaker / Mic):

Luma SmartLamp is equipped with a high quality built-in bluetooth speaker and microphone. This means you can play all of your phone's audio output through Luma SmartLamp. You can even take calls from the lamp. It is outfitted with a wood base and acoustic outlets to enhance your listening experience. You can link two of the Luma SmartLamp speakers together if you want a surround sound experience. This bluetooth speaker provides the best sound at it's size.

Premium Speaker Specs:

Wirelessly play (stream) up to 2 lamps from once source.

3.5mm Auxiliary In

Maximum Sound Level SPL = 86dBC

Frequency Range = 130 Hz - 20 kHz

Driver = One 1.5", 4 Ohm Drivers; One 2" x 1.25" Passive Radiator

Light (Million Color LED):

Luma SmartLamp comes equipped with a bluetooth enabled million color LED which can be controlled by your phone. The light's default color is a standard white with the brightness equivalent of a 60 watt incandescent lightbulb while only using 9 watts. These LED lights use 20x less energy than a traditional bulb and can last up to 20 years. You can use a standard white light, or enjoy a variety of colors that fit your activity or mood. You can also dim the lighting to the intensity level you desire. If you do not have your phone around, simply touch the wood base to turn on and off a white light. 

Phone Controlled Features:

Luma SmartLamp can be controlled completely from your phone. There will be a free app download from the App store and from Google Play. This app will allow you to select a color, set the intensity and turn your lamp on/off. You will also be able to activate and deactivate different modes as described below.

Music Mode: When this mode is activated, your lights will dance to the music and change colors with the rhythm. In the app you can group multiple lamps into one set to enhance this experience. This feature is demonstrated in the introduction of our video. 

Notifications: When this mode is activated, your light will flash when you receive a notification. With the bluetooth speaker enabled you will also hear your notification through Luma SmartLamp's speaker. Through the app you can set what notifications you want interacting with Luma SmartLamp and what the light signal will be for each alert. The notification sound will be the sound you have selected through your phone's settings. The light can interact currently with these notifications:

  • Gmail App
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • We are working on notifications with phone specific apps (calls, voicemail & SMS)

Proximity: When this mode is activated, your light will turn on when you are near it and it will automatically turn off when you leave it's proximity. For example, as you come home at night, your foyer lamp will be activated, when you leave the room the light will automatically turn off. As with all modes, you can turn this feature on and off.

Alarm: With our app you can run your alarm through Luma SmartLamp. This mode will allow you to turn on your alarm sounds slowly over a set period of time. You can also sync it with the light, allowing you to turn on the light slowly over time. In the app you can set the speed and intensity of where the sound / light begin and end.

Lamp Grouping: You can connect multiple lamps into one grouping to allow control over an entire "room" or grouping. Once lamps are grouped you can change their colors, intensity and modes together or separately.

App: Our app will allow you to control your lamp, or a group of lamps. You will be able to enable all the above modes, select a color, dim your lighting, or turn on and off your light from within our free app. 

Dimensions & Specs

Short Lamp (inches): 10.25 high & just under 4.75 diameter. 

Tall Lamp (inches): 18.5 high & just under 4.75 diameter. 

Cord: The lamp ships with a twisted, cloth cord 5 feet in length. The plug socket type is a two prong US plug that is designed at a 90-degree angle. At the end of the project, if we reach our stretch goals, a survey will be sent to select your cord color. International backers will receive a survey to select their appropriate plug adaptor and voltage. 

Shade Shape: There are two shade styles, a modern bent shape and a traditional cylinder shape. While choosing a perk, you will select size and quantity. In a survey after the project closes you will select shade style.

Perks

When selecting a perk, you will be focusing on size (short or tall) and quantity (singles or sets). In a survey after the project is completed we will ask for your shade style, cord color (if we hit our stretch goal) and plug adaptor for international backers. 

Early Bird Specials:

Each of our lamp listings has an early bird special for the first  backers. 

Standard Rewards:

High-End, Customizable Perk:

Backer Options

When backing this project, you will focus on selecting your size (short or tall) and quantity (single or pairs). In a survey after the project closes we will ask backers for your specifics: 1) What style shade do you want (the traditional cylinder or the modern wave), 2) What cord color you want (if we reach our second stretch goal) and 3) What plug socket adaptor is needed (international buyers only).

Cord Options (Second Stretch Goal): White, Black, Aqua, Orange, Red.

Timeline

We originally launched our product on Kickstarter and successfully raised enough money to start this product, but we decided to re-launch for three main reasons. 1) We want to raise the funds sufficient to make our lamp the first "HomeKit" compatible device. This will allow our product to be compatible with Siri on Apple's new OS. 2) We had multiple people still interested in backing additional lamps. Finally, 3) We had multiple people interested in buying our bulb separate from our lamp.

Early Days

The idea for Luma SmartLamp originated from our desire to have a lamp that matched our personalities. Originally, we had two focuses: 1) Design and 2) USB charging. We wanted a device that would allow easy access for charging while we were in bed or at work. A great design team drove the modern and organic look of the lamp. Brennan shaped the lamp into a harmony of modern form and technology, without compromising either facet.

As we began designing the lamp we realized we had an opportunity to do much more. The team batted around the question, "If we are already creating a lamp that charges your phone, why not create a lamp that is controlled by it?" As we were tossing around ideas about how to de- clutter our bedside and work space, we happening upon the synergy of light and sound that could not only simplify those spaces, but enhance our time there. Power, sound, and light work perfectly together in these environments so we went to task developing something that we wanted to purchase but didn't exist yet. That is how Luma SmartLamp was born. 

Team

Every product has a great story behind it. The story of Luma SmartLamp involves great designers like Ryan Rousch, Tanner Slade, Drew Smith, Bryce Twede, Jonny Wilson and Carter Zufelt who were key in defining the silhouette, shaping the functionality and building our successful prototypes.

The founding partners of Luma SmartLamp are Brennan Crellin, Wes LaPorte and Dan Barnes. These three are also founding partners of PhoneSoap which was successfully launched on Kickstarter and is now being sold throughout the world. You can see their work at phonesoap.com.

Risks

This project has similar challenges to all manufacturing projects such as component quality and restraints, but we have mitigated our risk by leveraging manufacturing partners we currently have in place with PhoneSoap. Our first project taught us how to successfully manufacture overseas. With partners and factories now in place, this product is already in the hands of our current manufacturers to finalize and produce in mass. While it is unlikely that we experience delays, as with our last product, quality and safety are our top priorities and we will not ship a product until it meets our standards.
