story:
INTRODUCING

 

 

THE BEST HOME SECURITY SOLUTION

SENS8 OFFERS EVERYTHING YOU WOULD EXPECT IN A PREMIUM HOME SECURITY SYSTEM WITHOUT THE HIGH COST OR MONTHLY FEES

 

Everyone wants to keep their home safe, but most of us cannot afford the $1000s necessary to purchase and run a traditional home security system. And what's worse, other systems are plagued by false alarms caused by moving shadows, pets, or billowing curtains. For all these people, SENS8 is the answer.

SENS8 eliminates false alarms thanks to an algorithm that combines information from all six of its sensors. It combines all the features of other security systems into one elegant aluminum unibody design. And thanks to our direct API uploads to Google Drive and Dropbox, you'll never have to pay a monthly fee to access your 1080P HD night vision video recordings.

 

 

 

 

FEATURES

 

 

 

 

All-IN-ONE HOME SECURITY

SIX CUTTING-EDGE SENSORS COMBINED INTO ONE BEAUTIFUL, CAPABLE DEVICE

 

 

SENS8 can detect abnormal events happening throughout the home, thanks to a 1080P HD night vision camera, Passive Infrared motion detector, as well as temperature, humidity, light, and sound sensors. You can live stream video in the app, scare off intruders with a 95+ decibel alarm, and even track the health of your home environment with our Smart Health system.

 

 

 

A SYSTEM FOR ALL

WITH SENS8, EVERYONE CAN AFFORD TO PROTECT THEIR HOME

 

 

SENS8 comes at an unbeatable price, and has a huge advantage over the competition; absolutely no monthly fees, ever. Other security systems will charge you $20, $30, even $50 per month, just to use their service. SENS8 uploads all your data directly to Google Drive or Dropbox, giving you free cloud storage with no limits on video views, downloads, or uploads, and saving you $100s a year in the process.

 

SENS8's Camera offers live streaming 1080P HD video...

 

...And crystal clear night vision to detect break-ins!

Store all your videos for free with unlimited cloud storage!

 

 

 

SENS8 is…

 

 

​

Our sensor fusion algorithm combines results from the live streaming 1080p night vision camera, passive infra-red motion detector, and other sensors to drastically increase the accuracy of your device.

 

​

Our API allows direct uploads to Google Drive and Dropbox, which means no pesky monthly fees, saving you hundreds of dollars a year.

 

 

​

We designed SENS8 to be a beautiful work of art, combining form and function. The unibody design is intricately machined from solid aluminum.

 

 

​

Set up takes just minutes, and SENS8 can be placed anywhere with a WiFi signal and a power outlet. It is completely portable, light-weight, and requires no installation.

 

 

 

Camera & Motion Detector

Our Sensor Fusion Algorithm means no more false alarms. 

 

The SENS8’s 1080p HD night vision camera will live stream video to your phone from anywhere in the world. Unlike competing security devices, SENS8 uses a passive infrared motion detector, which is more accurate. It combines data from the PIR sensor and the camera with a patent-pending Sensor Fusion Algorithm to all but eliminate false alarms.

 

 

 

 

Additional Sensors

SENS8 isn't just a security camera - it's a full home security solution.

 

An ambient light sensor, microphone, and temperature and humidity sensor all can detect signals above a certain threshold, alerting you to threats like break ins, floods, leaking pipes, freezing temperatures, and more. You can select the alert threshold for all of SENS8's sensors.

 

 

 

 

Smart Alerts

Our proprietary SmartAlert system will trigger when it detects any abnormal activity.

 

 

Sens8 will send an immediate alert to your smart phone. You can even have a 95+ decibel alarm sound to scare off intruders. SENS8 will automatically arm itself when you leave the house.

 

 

FREE Secure Cloud Storage

You'll never have to pay for storage again.

 

SENS8 triggers a HD video recording when it detects a threat.  Our API allows direct uploads to Google Drive or Dropbox, and the SENS8 is one of the only security devices to offer local MicroSD storage as well - every SENS8 purchased during the Indiegogo campaign will ship with an 8GB MicroSD card.

Other security systems rely on proprietary cloud storage networks. If they ever go out of business or shut down their servers, you're out of luck, and your files are gone. SENS8 assures your videos remain privately held, and totally secure with bank-level encryption.

 

 

Smart Health Index

Make healthy choices and improve the quality of your home and living environment.

 

The SENS8 Smart Health Index is an amazing feature that can analyze your home environment, and help you make healthy choices to improve it.

 

 

Backup Power 

When the power goes out, SENS8 keeps working.

With other security devices, when an intruder cuts the power you are out of luck. SENS8 has them beat, with an internal battery that will keep the alarm sounding and the device running for up to half an hour.

 

 

 

SENS8 Offers Complete Protection

 

 

   

Detect Break-ins

All of SENS8's sensors are optimized to detect intruders entering the home, and will alert you to their presence. You can scare them off with an extremely loud alarm, and call the police from anywhere in the world.

​

   

 

​

  Peace of mind

With SENS8’s live streaming 1080p HD night vision camera, you can check in on the babysitter, your pets, or your kids while you’re away, saving you the anxiety of leaving them home alone.

 

 

Prevent Frozen Pipes

A burst pipe from freezing temperatures can cost homeowners over $4000. SENS8 will detect drops in air temperature, saving your home while you're on vacation.

​

   ​

Monitor Home Health

Our SmartHealth technology can give you the information you need to adopt healthier habits around the home, helping you to improve the state of your home atmosphere.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Making of SENS8

Our engineering team has perfected SENS8 over years of iteration.

                 

 

Our team has been working on iterations of SENS8 for nearly two years. We have gone through a multitude of design phases, prototypes, and proofs of concept before finally coming to the production-ready model you see in this campaign. SENS8 is a device you can trust to be built to the absolute highest standard.

 

 

Every SENS8 unit is precision machined from a block of solid aluminum, creating a beautiful aluminum unibody which will effortlessly match any home's decor.

  

     

 

 

 

Tech Specs

​

Weight: 0.88 lbs

Dimensions: 2.7inch x 2.7inch x 7.2inch

Materials: aluminum unibody

Operating Temperature: 32°F-104°F

Operating Humidity: 10～90%RH non-condensing

AC power: 100-240V

Power consumption: 8W

Max. current: 2A

WiFi: IEEE 802.11b/g/n; distance: 0-328 feet

Backup Battery: Li-polymer; capacity: 700 mAh, 30 minute life

App: iOS and Android

CPU: ARM 9 processor 

Camera: On SEMI 1080p HD night vision camera, 30fps, 1/2.7-inch, 127° wide angle lens

PIR motion detector: Nysenba AM312, 26 ft range, 0.5s response time

Temperature & humidity sensor: Silicon Labs high accuracy sensor, 14-131°F, 0-100%RH

Ambient light sensor: TI sensor, <200 ms response time, 0-1000 Lux range

Microphone: AOS mic, omnidirectional, -30dB sensitivity

 

 

 

 

Timeline

 

January 2015 ....................... Idea was born 

March 2015 ........................... Conceptual drawings 

March-June 2015 ................. Concept research 

August 2015 ......................... Industrial Design was finalized 

Sep 2015................................ First 3D model was printed

Oct 2015 ................................ First CNC model was fabricated

Dec 2015 ............................... The first generation of working prototypes 

April 2016 .............................. The optimization of hardware and software

July 2016 ............................... The second generation of working prototypes

Feb - August 2016 ................ Locking down component suppliers

September 2016 .................... Engineering pilot run

October 2016 ........................ Revising mechanical & electrical parts

October 2016 ........................ Launch Indiegogo campaign

November 2016 ..................... Production pilot run

December 2016 ..................... Apply FCC, CE, CCC and ROHS certification 

Feb 2017 ................................ Mass production begins

March 2017 ............................ Final production testing

April 2017 .............................. Ship to backers!
 

 

 

 

The SENS8 Team

 

 

 

 

WHY WE'RE CROWDFUNDING

  

The concept for "SENS8" grew out of founder’s Yang Liu’s personal misfortune: his home was burglarized. He was frustrated by the uneven performance of existing home security devices, and by high monthly fees. As a Ph.D. carrying electrical engineer, he decided to develop his own device for personal use. Everyone he showed his evolving prototype to responded overwhelmingly positively. They were looking for a true smart home security device at the most affordable price as well.

Many cannot afford a home security system. That motivated our team to produce the best and most affordable smart home security device. Yang Liu was so determined to create this unique product that he sold his house to bootstrap the business for a year. Later on, our team raised angel funding to further chase our dream. Our mission is to bring the best and most affordable smart home security device within reach of every family worldwide. With your support, we can make that dream a reality. Crowdfunding is our best opportunity to accomplish our goals; we're counting on your support and feedback!

 

 

FAQ

 

Is there any monthly fee with SENS8?

There is absolutely no monthly fee for using SENS8 - ever. Surveillance and unlimited cloud storage through our Dropbox/Google drive API are both absolutely free. These savings can add up to hundreds of dollars a year.


Can SENS8 record HD videos?

While armed, SENS8 features motion-activated HD video recording. The recorded HD video is stored in the local microSD card storage and your Dropbox or Google drive if you have accounts and storage space.

 

Is there a user accessible local storage?

Yes, Sens8 supports a MicroSD card as local video/image storage. It provides the option of additional privacy protection and storage. To show our gratitude, every Indiegogo backer will receive an 8G microSD card for each SENS8 they purchase during the crowdfunding campaign.

 

Can I share my SENS8 with others?

Yes, you can share your Sens8 with your family members to monitor your home. Sens8 supports up to 4 users per device.

 

Does SENS8 have a backup battery?

Yes, there is a backup battery to provide power to Sens8 even if the AC power is out, or sabotaged by intruders. Sens8 can function for at least 0.5 hour without AC power.


Does SENS8 support night vision?

Yes. A high quality night vision camera is included in Sens8.

 

Can I add multiple SENS8 units to my account?

Yes, you can add multiple units to a single account. For a bigger house, you might consider putting one SENS8 in the living room and another on the second floor.


What’s smartphone platforms does SENS8 support?

iOS and Android apps are both available for Sens8.

 

When is the soonest I can get a SENS8?

The SENS8 will be shipped to backers beginning April, 2017.


How many SENS8 do I need in my home?

It’s entirely dependent on your house or apartment. We recommend one SENS8 per floor.

 

How much is shipping and handling?

Free shipping to the US, Canada and China

International Shipping (ships anywhere in the world):

Single SENS8 - $30

2 pack - $40

3 pack - $50

 

What is the Warranty?

We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. 


What is the video resolution?

SENS8 supports three video resolutions, HD 1080p, SD 720p and LD 480p. It will automatically switch video resolution based on the network situation to provide the best user experience. 


How do I share my SENS8 with others?

There are two ways to share your SENS8 with family members. 1) Send an invitation email to the invitees; 2) Invitees scan the QR code of the shared Sens8.


Can I have multiple SENS8s and set them up in different locations?

You can set up as many SENS8 units as you want, and easily access all of them with the SENS8 app.


Do I need an Internet connection to use SENS8?

Yes. SENS8 must be connected to the Internet via Wi-Fi (2.4GHz). The setup process should only take a few minutes.

 

How does SENS8 send alerts when burglaries occur?

SENS8 will send notifications to users’ smartphones and trigger the 95dB+ alarm to deter burglaries. 

 

How does SENS8 monitor my home environments in addition to video surveillance?

SENS8 is equipped with many high-precision sensors (1080p HD camera with night vision, PIR motion sensor, temperature and humidity sensor, ambient light and sound sensor), which monitor the environmental information of your home. SENS8 can intelligently sense many abnormal events in houses such as break-ins, abnormal changes in temperature, humidity, ambient light, and sounds etc.

 

What is the effective range of SENS8?

SENS8 is designed to be effective in the range of 30-40ft. It can detect sounds through a whole house, and will detect indoor temperature and humidity near the device. We consulted with police departments, and statistics show that the most efficient place to put the device is the living room. In a smaller house or an apartment, one device is enough. In a large house, 2-3 devices will provide adequate coverage.


How does SENS8 tell the difference between an intruder and a pet?

SENS8 use patent-pending sensor fusion technology to tell the difference between an intruder and a pet. Currently, false alarms caused by small pets have been nearly eliminated, and we are optimizing SENS8 to discriminate between an intruder and big pets. 

 

Can I turn the alarm on or off using the app?

Yes. You can easily turn the alarm on or off using the SENS8 app. It’s your freedom to take actions when you receive the push notifications of any events.
story_txt:
INTRODUCING  THE BEST HOME SECURITY SOLUTIONSENS8 OFFERS EVERYTHING YOU WOULD EXPECT IN A PREMIUM HOME SECURITY SYSTEM WITHOUT THE HIGH COST OR MONTHLY FEES Everyone wants to keep their home safe, but most of us cannot afford the $1000s necessary to purchase and run a traditional home security system. And what's worse, other systems are plagued by false alarms caused by moving shadows, pets, or billowing curtains. For all these people, SENS8 is the answer.SENS8 eliminates false alarms thanks to an algorithm that combines information from all six of its sensors. It combines all the features of other security systems into one elegant aluminum unibody design. And thanks to our direct API uploads to Google Drive and Dropbox, you'll never have to pay a monthly fee to access your 1080P HD night vision video recordings.    FEATURES    All-IN-ONE HOME SECURITYSIX CUTTING-EDGE SENSORS COMBINED INTO ONE BEAUTIFUL, CAPABLE DEVICE  SENS8 can detect abnormal events happening throughout the home, thanks to a 1080P HD night vision camera, Passive Infrared motion detector, as well as temperature, humidity, light, and sound sensors. You can live stream video in the app, scare off intruders with a 95+ decibel alarm, and even track the health of your home environment with our Smart Health system.   A SYSTEM FOR ALLWITH SENS8, EVERYONE CAN AFFORD TO PROTECT THEIR HOME  SENS8 comes at an unbeatable price, and has a huge advantage over the competition; absolutely no monthly fees, ever. Other security systems will charge you $20, $30, even $50 per month, just to use their service. SENS8 uploads all your data directly to Google Drive or Dropbox, giving you free cloud storage with no limits on video views, downloads, or uploads, and saving you $100s a year in the process. SENS8's Camera offers live streaming 1080P HD video... ...And crystal clear night vision to detect break-ins!Store all your videos for free with unlimited cloud storage!   SENS8 is…  ​Our sensor fusion algorithm combines results from the live streaming 1080p night vision camera, passive infra-red motion detector, and other sensors to drastically increase the accuracy of your device. ​Our API allows direct uploads to Google Drive and Dropbox, which means no pesky monthly fees, saving you hundreds of dollars a year.  ​We designed SENS8 to be a beautiful work of art, combining form and function. The unibody design is intricately machined from solid aluminum.  ​Set up takes just minutes, and SENS8 can be placed anywhere with a WiFi signal and a power outlet. It is completely portable, light-weight, and requires no installation.   Camera & Motion DetectorOur Sensor Fusion Algorithm means no more false alarms.  The SENS8’s 1080p HD night vision camera will live stream video to your phone from anywhere in the world. Unlike competing security devices, SENS8 uses a passive infrared motion detector, which is more accurate. It combines data from the PIR sensor and the camera with a patent-pending Sensor Fusion Algorithm to all but eliminate false alarms.    Additional SensorsSENS8 isn't just a security camera - it's a full home security solution. An ambient light sensor, microphone, and temperature and humidity sensor all can detect signals above a certain threshold, alerting you to threats like break ins, floods, leaking pipes, freezing temperatures, and more. You can select the alert threshold for all of SENS8's sensors.    Smart AlertsOur proprietary SmartAlert system will trigger when it detects any abnormal activity.  Sens8 will send an immediate alert to your smart phone. You can even have a 95+ decibel alarm sound to scare off intruders. SENS8 will automatically arm itself when you leave the house.  FREE Secure Cloud StorageYou'll never have to pay for storage again. SENS8 triggers a HD video recording when it detects a threat.  Our API allows direct uploads to Google Drive or Dropbox, and the SENS8 is one of the only security devices to offer local MicroSD storage as well - every SENS8 purchased during the Indiegogo campaign will ship with an 8GB MicroSD card.Other security systems rely on proprietary cloud storage networks. If they ever go out of business or shut down their servers, you're out of luck, and your files are gone. SENS8 assures your videos remain privately held, and totally secure with bank-level encryption.  Smart Health IndexMake healthy choices and improve the quality of your home and living environment. The SENS8 Smart Health Index is an amazing feature that can analyze your home environment, and help you make healthy choices to improve it.  Backup Power When the power goes out, SENS8 keeps working.With other security devices, when an intruder cuts the power you are out of luck. SENS8 has them beat, with an internal battery that will keep the alarm sounding and the device running for up to half an hour.   SENS8 Offers Complete Protection     Detect Break-insAll of SENS8's sensors are optimized to detect intruders entering the home, and will alert you to their presence. You can scare them off with an extremely loud alarm, and call the police from anywhere in the world.​    ​
  Peace of mindWith SENS8’s live streaming 1080p HD night vision camera, you can check in on the babysitter, your pets, or your kids while you’re away, saving you the anxiety of leaving them home alone.  Prevent Frozen PipesA burst pipe from freezing temperatures can cost homeowners over $4000. SENS8 will detect drops in air temperature, saving your home while you're on vacation.​   ​
Monitor Home HealthOur SmartHealth technology can give you the information you need to adopt healthier habits around the home, helping you to improve the state of your home atmosphere.      Making of SENS8Our engineering team has perfected SENS8 over years of iteration.                  Our team has been working on iterations of SENS8 for nearly two years. We have gone through a multitude of design phases, prototypes, and proofs of concept before finally coming to the production-ready model you see in this campaign. SENS8 is a device you can trust to be built to the absolute highest standard.  Every SENS8 unit is precision machined from a block of solid aluminum, creating a beautiful aluminum unibody which will effortlessly match any home's decor.          Tech Specs​
Weight: 0.88 lbs 

Dimensions: 2.7inch x 2.7inch x 7.2inch 

Materials: aluminum unibody 

Operating Temperature: 32°F-104°F 

Operating Humidity: 10～90%RH non-condensing 

AC power: 100-240V 

Power consumption: 8W 

Max. current: 2A 

WiFi: IEEE 802.11b/g/n; distance: 0-328 feet 

Backup Battery: Li-polymer; capacity: 700 mAh, 30 minute life 

App: iOS and Android 

CPU: ARM 9 processor  

Camera: On SEMI 1080p HD night vision camera, 30fps, 1/2.7-inch, 127° wide angle lens 

PIR motion detector: Nysenba AM312, 26 ft range, 0.5s response time 

Temperature & humidity sensor: Silicon Labs high accuracy sensor, 14-131°F, 0-100%RH 

Ambient light sensor: TI sensor, <200 ms response time, 0-1000 Lux range 

Microphone: AOS mic, omnidirectional, -30dB sensitivity
    Timeline January 2015 ....................... Idea was born March 2015 ........................... Conceptual drawings March-June 2015 ................. Concept research August 2015 ......................... Industrial Design was finalized Sep 2015................................ First 3D model was printedOct 2015 ................................ First CNC model was fabricatedDec 2015 ............................... The first generation of working prototypes April 2016 .............................. The optimization of hardware and softwareJuly 2016 ............................... The second generation of working prototypesFeb - August 2016 ................ Locking down component suppliersSeptember 2016 .................... Engineering pilot runOctober 2016 ........................ Revising mechanical & electrical partsOctober 2016 ........................ Launch Indiegogo campaignNovember 2016 ..................... Production pilot runDecember 2016 ..................... Apply FCC, CE, CCC and ROHS certification Feb 2017 ................................ Mass production beginsMarch 2017 ............................ Final production testingApril 2017 .............................. Ship to backers!    The SENS8 Team    WHY WE'RE CROWDFUNDING  The concept for "SENS8" grew out of founder’s Yang Liu’s personal misfortune: his home was burglarized. He was frustrated by the uneven performance of existing home security devices, and by high monthly fees. As a Ph.D. carrying electrical engineer, he decided to develop his own device for personal use. Everyone he showed his evolving prototype to responded overwhelmingly positively. They were looking for a true smart home security device at the most affordable price as well.Many cannot afford a home security system. That motivated our team to produce the best and most affordable smart home security device. Yang Liu was so determined to create this unique product that he sold his house to bootstrap the business for a year. Later on, our team raised angel funding to further chase our dream. Our mission is to bring the best and most affordable smart home security device within reach of every family worldwide. With your support, we can make that dream a reality. Crowdfunding is our best opportunity to accomplish our goals; we're counting on your support and feedback!  FAQ Is there any monthly fee with SENS8?There is absolutely no monthly fee for using SENS8 - ever. Surveillance and unlimited cloud storage through our Dropbox/Google drive API are both absolutely free. These savings can add up to hundreds of dollars a year.Can SENS8 record HD videos?While armed, SENS8 features motion-activated HD video recording. The recorded HD video is stored in the local microSD card storage and your Dropbox or Google drive if you have accounts and storage space. Is there a user accessible local storage?Yes, Sens8 supports a MicroSD card as local video/image storage. It provides the option of additional privacy protection and storage. To show our gratitude, every Indiegogo backer will receive an 8G microSD card for each SENS8 they purchase during the crowdfunding campaign. Can I share my SENS8 with others?Yes, you can share your Sens8 with your family members to monitor your home. Sens8 supports up to 4 users per device. Does SENS8 have a backup battery?Yes, there is a backup battery to provide power to Sens8 even if the AC power is out, or sabotaged by intruders. Sens8 can function for at least 0.5 hour without AC power.Does SENS8 support night vision?Yes. A high quality night vision camera is included in Sens8. Can I add multiple SENS8 units to my account?Yes, you can add multiple units to a single account. For a bigger house, you might consider putting one SENS8 in the living room and another on the second floor.What’s smartphone platforms does SENS8 support?iOS and Android apps are both available for Sens8. When is the soonest I can get a SENS8?The SENS8 will be shipped to backers beginning April, 2017.How many SENS8 do I need in my home?It’s entirely dependent on your house or apartment. We recommend one SENS8 per floor. How much is shipping and handling?Free shipping to the US, Canada and ChinaInternational Shipping (ships anywhere in the world):Single SENS8 - $302 pack - $403 pack - $50 What is the Warranty?We provide a one (1) year limited warranty. What is the video resolution?SENS8 supports three video resolutions, HD 1080p, SD 720p and LD 480p. It can detect sounds through a whole house, and will detect indoor temperature and humidity near the device. We consulted with police departments, and statistics show that the most efficient place to put the device is the living room. In a smaller house or an apartment, one device is enough. In a large house, 2-3 devices will provide adequate coverage.How does SENS8 tell the difference between an intruder and a pet?SENS8 use patent-pending sensor fusion technology to tell the difference between an intruder and a pet. Currently, false alarms caused by small pets have been nearly eliminated, and we are optimizing SENS8 to discriminate between an intruder and big pets.  Can I turn the alarm on or off using the app?Yes. You can easily turn the alarm on or off using the SENS8 app. It’s your freedom to take actions when you receive the push notifications of any events.

story:
What is the Spoaster? 

Simply a better coaster. They say necessity is the mother of inventions and the Spoaster's early beginnings were no different. After spilling a drink one warm summer day, I questioned why there wasn't anything on the market that even attempted to tackle this problem. What started as a quest to create a spill resistant drink coaster turned into a passion for engineering a drink coaster everyone would want to use. Along the way, I studied reasons why some people didn't own coasters while others disliked the ones they owned. Their frustration were heard and their solutions were integrated into the Spoaster's design's initial design. Over 23 iterations later, I am proud to present you the Spoaster you see in front of you today. Even if you do not currently use coasters,  consider giving the Spoaster a try. I guarantee you will never go back to life without one!

Spoaster Features

  • Tip Resistant design prevents accidental spills!

  • No more annoying drips from condensation thanks to the Spoaster absorbent sponge insert. 

  • Patent pending design results from 2 years of testing and refinement

  • Arms help guide drink into Spoaster while allowing for easy one-handed carrying

  • Stackable design saves space between uses 

  • One size fits most glasses, cans, bottles, coffee mugs and more

How you can help

Due to color order minimums, I only had sufficient funds for 2 colors (blue and red) on the initial launch earlier this month. I am looking to raise funds for an additional 2 colors so that each Spoaster set will have 4 unique colors. This gives the added benefit of being able to keep track of one another's drinks. (how often have we gotten drinks mixed up at a party?) Please pledge to my campaign today and each set will contain a limited edition Indiegogo Magenta Spoaster. 

I truly believe that the Spoaster is something which anyone can benefit from using. There is no other product which offers you what the Spoaster does and I really hope you consider getting a set. 

The fun stuff - PERKS!

Spoaster set - Includes 4 Spoasters (one of which is Indiegogo Magenta) and 4 absorbent sponge inserts

Spoaster replacement sponge inserts - Pack of 5 - Bonus Included with all double sets and up! 

A low risk project to you

As the Spoaster is currently in production (albeit with just 2 colors) I have reduced the risk for you to a bare minimum. The tooling is in place as I have invested all the upfront capital needed to get the Spoaster up and running, I just need a little extra oomph to help cross that finish line! 

In a worse case scenario, the timeline may get slightly pushed out if there is an extreme volume of orders. However, I promise to keep all backers and interested parties up to date with progress from Pledge to Delivery along with answering any questions you might have. 

About me

My name is Sherwin and I graduated from UCSD with an Aerospace engineering degree (no, I never worked for NASA). Though I have never worked in the aerospace industry, I held various engineering jobs and currently work as a mechanical engineer. In my spare time I enjoy playing HOTS, board games and beach volleyball. 

My wife and I will be welcoming our first baby (Chexican girl!) this coming summer (2nd baby if you count the Spoaster as the 1st, somewhere I hear a shoe hurtling towards the back of my head). Personally, I have a lot riding on this but I believe in the Spoaster and its effectiveness so I really hope I can turn it into a household name. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not ready for the Spoaster at this very moment, please share this campaign with your friends and family as they could be interested. Every extra person that finds out about this campaign counts so the more the message is spread, the merrier! Thank you and have a wonderful day!

story:
You deserve better sleep.

 

With the constant hustle and grind, we sometimes forget that rest is just as important as work. But not just any type of rest. Good rest. Productive rest. We value work efficiency so much but don't seem to say the same for how we sleep.

ZEREMA is the ultimate sleep solution for those tired of never getting that productive rest. This pillow incorporates deep-learning AI to learn your sleep habits, automatically put you in a more comfortable sleeping position, and provide a personalized analysis on how you can sleep better. 

But with all this amazing tech underneath, ZEREMA still does its main job. Its soft open-cell marshmallow memory foam keeps your head comfortable and supported as a pillow should. 

 

 

 

 

 

With ZEREMA, you can make it your own. No need to Goldilocks your way through countless pillows. All you need to do is set the air cushion to the height of your liking on the ZEREMA app.

This adjustable feature also works automatically with our AI-powered snore detecting technology. When snoring is detected, ZEREMA will raise or lower the pillow height on its own to open up your airway. It does so so gently that it won't disturb your sleep.

 

 

 

Watch The Air Cushions Work! 

 

 

 

When these two air cushions work together, they ensure they feel just right on your head and neck.

 

Like a tailored suit, a pillow should not be one size fits all. With so many different variations in our height, weight, and spinal alignment, it's hard to believe a single pillow works for everyone. Comfort is relative and should not be generalized.

According to research conducted by the Harvard Medical School, how your head rests on your pillow plays a crucial role in your spine health. Matthew O'Rourke, a physical therapist at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital, explains that extended periods of misalignment can result in serious damage to your neck.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Having bad posture while working, studying, and watching Netflix damages your neck’s natural c-curve. There's even more damage when your pillow doesn’t support you properly in your sleep, causing excessive pain and tension in the neck. 

 

 

 

 

 

ZEREMA, on the other hand, supports your cervical vertebral by working the air cushions. When you find the right height and angle for your neck, it will minimize the number of times you toss and turn for a comfortable position.

 

 

 

 

ZEREMA detects snoring by inflating the air cushions inside the pillow. Snoring is the noisy result of a person's airway being obstructed. So when snoring is detected, the air cushions work to lift the neck and re-open that airway. 

This is the same principle as performing CPR. In order to allow proper breathing, the first step procedure is to tilt the head back and lift the chin up.

But for ZEREMA, this happens while you're asleep.

 

 

ZEREMA's app integrates deep-learning which takes data learned from over 10,000 sounds including snoring to more accurately detect new unique snoring sounds. It also teaches itself to distinguish snoring apart from other sounds, ensuring the air cushion adjustment is only activated when a distinct snore is heard.

 

 

ZEREMA's Snoring Detecting Skill.

 

 
We conducted a test to see how accurately ZEREMA detects snores. The results show it detected snoring in just 10-30 seconds and lifted up the pillow height right away. As the pillow height adjusted, it helped the user breathe better and decreased much of his snoring.
 

 

When put to the test against other anti-snore pillows, ZEREMA was proven to more accurately distinguish and activate only when an actual snore was detected.

 

 

A Sleep Clinic Is In Your Hand.

 

 

 

 

ZEREMA's intelligence derives from its mobile app. It acts as a real-time sleep monitor to track and provide insight on your sleeping habits. 

When you set up the app before going to bed, it monitors your sleep while you're asleep. When you wake up, the app shows your sleep index, sleep duration, snore duration, and provides a customized sleep report on a daily, weekly, monthly, and even yearly basis. The sleep report keeps you updated with your latest sleep data.

With ZEREMA, you can manage your sleep systematically. You can even set your own sleep goal and find out how to improve your sleep. Like a little sleep clinic in your hand!

 

 

ZEREMA is made with open-cell memory foam which promotes free-flowing ventilation. The micro-holes that give it the “open-cell” name allow air to slip in and out easily and stay more hygienic than most conventional closed-cell memory foam pillows.

This material is also softer to the touch. It almost feels like lying on a marshmallow - supportive yet giving.

 

 

 

ZEREMA’s rectangular shape keeps your head comfortably positioned and evenly distributes the head weight. When designing ZEREMA, we closely examined the natural structure of a human head and came up with a pillow that complements this curve.

ZEREMA also keeps side sleepers comfortably positioned. The left and right side of the pillow are raised slightly higher than the middle and have small ear rests that provide ultimate neck and head support for side sleepers.

 

 

Compared to the average pillow, ZEREMA’s structure provides superior head support. We conducted two experiments to test how well ZEREMA senses and distributes pressure. The results show the cracker remains perfectly intact and the sensor's measurements indicate the far even distribution of head weight.

 

 

 

ZEREMA Includes Special Covers. 

 

 

 

To wash the pillow cover, put it into a washer, or wash it by hand. We don’t recommend using a dryer as the pillow cover may shrink. If needed, tumble dry without heat.

 

 

Do NOT wash the inner cover. Instead, gently wipe with a wet tissue.

 

 

 

 

01.  Adjust the pillow height to align your posture in your natural c-curve
02.  Enjoy the soft comfort of open-cell memory foam and clean antibacterial cover

 

 

 

03.  App detects snoring
04.  Air pump gently auto-adjusts your pillow height to open up your airways 

 

 

 

05.  Read your real-time sleep analysis report
06.  Wake up to customized alarms
07.  Receive tips and advice on how to improve your sleep

 

 

 

 

 

 

How many people in the world use pillows every night? (We don’t know the exact figure but probably a lot!) Since all humans have different body shapes, neck heights, and personal preferences, there is no pillow on the market to satisfy every pillow user no matter how “fit-for-all” it may seem. This is why a term so-called “pillow nomad” was born. A lot of people are not satisfied with their pillow and can’t settle on one that is just right, even after trying dozens.

This is the reason we started our business with a new approach.

“What if a pillow could fit its users instead of the users trying to fit themselves to it?”

We envisioned a pillow suitable for everyone. An adjustable pillow.

Also, some of our team members face sleep problems. The biggest being snoring. Because of their snoring problem, they wake up tired. But that is not our only issue. According to a study, it was reported that habitual snoring occurs to 40 percent of men and 26 percent of women. Even if you don’t snore, we’re sure you’ve seen how seriously it affects your parents, spouses, friends, or relatives. This research made us decide to include an anti-snoring function to the pillow.

We added a mobile application as one of our pillow’s main functions as well. Since it’s the age of technology, we wanted to make it work with a familiar and helpful device. We decided to develop an app that connects to the pillow and provides easily accessible sleep information.

This was the basic scheme of our smart pillow, ZEREMA. It took almost 4 years to bring this idea to life. Starting from ZEREMA, we aim to continue designing products that provide a comfortable sleep environment for everyone. This is the first step to accomplish our ultimate goal.

 

 

Special Thanks to.

 

 

 

Open to Communications.

All you need to do is set the air cushion to the height of your liking on the ZEREMA app.This adjustable feature also works automatically with our AI-powered snore detecting technology. When snoring is detected, ZEREMA will raise or lower the pillow height on its own to open up your airway. It does so so gently that it won't disturb your sleep.   Watch The Air Cushions Work!    When these two air cushions work together, they ensure they feel just right on your head and neck. Like a tailored suit, a pillow should not be one size fits all. With so many different variations in our height, weight, and spinal alignment, it's hard to believe a single pillow works for everyone. Comfort is relative and should not be generalized.According to research conducted by the Harvard Medical School, how your head rests on your pillow plays a crucial role in your spine health. Matthew O'Rourke, a physical therapist at Spaulding Rehabilitation Hospital, explains that extended periods of misalignment can result in serious damage to your neck.      Having bad posture while working, studying, and watching Netflix damages your neck’s natural c-curve. There's even more damage when your pillow doesn’t support you properly in your sleep, causing excessive pain and tension in the neck.      ZEREMA, on the other hand, supports your cervical vertebral by working the air cushions. When you find the right height and angle for your neck, it will minimize the number of times you toss and turn for a comfortable position.    ZEREMA detects snoring by inflating the air cushions inside the pillow. Snoring is the noisy result of a person's airway being obstructed. So when snoring is detected, the air cushions work to lift the neck and re-open that airway. This is the same principle as performing CPR. In order to allow proper breathing, the first step procedure is to tilt the head back and lift the chin up.But for ZEREMA, this happens while you're asleep.  ZEREMA's app integrates deep-learning which takes data learned from over 10,000 sounds including snoring to more accurately detect new unique snoring sounds. It also teaches itself to distinguish snoring apart from other sounds, ensuring the air cushion adjustment is only activated when a distinct snore is heard.  ZEREMA's Snoring Detecting Skill.  We conducted a test to see how accurately ZEREMA detects snores. The results show it detected snoring in just 10-30 seconds and lifted up the pillow height right away. As the pillow height adjusted, it helped the user breathe better and decreased much of his snoring. 

 
When put to the test against other anti-snore pillows, ZEREMA was proven to more accurately distinguish and activate only when an actual snore was detected.
 
 
A Sleep Clinic Is In Your Hand.
    ZEREMA's intelligence derives from its mobile app. It acts as a real-time sleep monitor to track and provide insight on your sleeping habits. When you set up the app before going to bed, it monitors your sleep while you're asleep. When you wake up, the app shows your sleep index, sleep duration, snore duration, and provides a customized sleep report on a daily, weekly, monthly, and even yearly basis. The sleep report keeps you updated with your latest sleep data.With ZEREMA, you can manage your sleep systematically. You can even set your own sleep goal and find out how to improve your sleep. Like a little sleep clinic in your hand!  ZEREMA is made with open-cell memory foam which promotes free-flowing ventilation. The micro-holes that give it the “open-cell” name allow air to slip in and out easily and stay more hygienic than most conventional closed-cell memory foam pillows.This material is also softer to the touch. It almost feels like lying on a marshmallow - supportive yet giving.   ZEREMA’s rectangular shape keeps your head comfortably positioned and evenly distributes the head weight. When designing ZEREMA, we closely examined the natural structure of a human head and came up with a pillow that complements this curve.ZEREMA also keeps side sleepers comfortably positioned. The left and right side of the pillow are raised slightly higher than the middle and have small ear rests that provide ultimate neck and head support for side sleepers.  Compared to the average pillow, ZEREMA’s structure provides superior head support. We conducted two experiments to test how well ZEREMA senses and distributes pressure. The results show the cracker remains perfectly intact and the sensor's measurements indicate the far even distribution of head weight.   ZEREMA Includes Special Covers.    To wash the pillow cover, put it into a washer, or wash it by hand. We don’t recommend using a dryer as the pillow cover may shrink. If needed, tumble dry without heat.  Do NOT wash the inner cover. Instead, gently wipe with a wet tissue.    01.  Adjust the pillow height to align your posture in your natural c-curve02.  Enjoy the soft comfort of open-cell memory foam and clean antibacterial cover   03.  App detects snoring04.  Air pump gently auto-adjusts your pillow height to open up your airways    05.  Read your real-time sleep analysis report06.  Wake up to customized alarms07.  Receive tips and advice on how to improve your sleep      How many people in the world use pillows every night? (We don’t know the exact figure but probably a lot!) Since all humans have different body shapes, neck heights, and personal preferences, there is no pillow on the market to satisfy every pillow user no matter how “fit-for-all” it may seem. This is why a term so-called “pillow nomad” was born. A lot of people are not satisfied with their pillow and can’t settle on one that is just right, even after trying dozens.This is the reason we started our business with a new approach.“What if a pillow could fit its users instead of the users trying to fit themselves to it?”We envisioned a pillow suitable for everyone. An adjustable pillow.Also, some of our team members face sleep problems. The biggest being snoring. Because of their snoring problem, they wake up tired. But that is not our only issue. According to a study, it was reported that habitual snoring occurs to 40 percent of men and 26 percent of women. Even if you don’t snore, we’re sure you’ve seen how seriously it affects your parents, spouses, friends, or relatives. This research made us decide to include an anti-snoring function to the pillow.We added a mobile application as one of our pillow’s main functions as well. Since it’s the age of technology, we wanted to make it work with a familiar and helpful device. We decided to develop an app that connects to the pillow and provides easily accessible sleep information.This was the basic scheme of our smart pillow, ZEREMA. It took almost 4 years to bring this idea to life. Starting from ZEREMA, we aim to continue designing products that provide a comfortable sleep environment for everyone. This is the first step to accomplish our ultimate goal.  Special Thanks to.   Open to Communications.        Altos Business Group is a product launch consulting agency located in Costa Mesa, California and specializes in helping global tech startups launch their products in the United States.

story:
Our Crowdfunding Campaign is Over! 

 

 

Order your Mizu Towel now at mizutowel.com!

If you still have not received your order, please email us at team@mizutowel.com.

 

 

The​ smart towel that detects impurities and eliminates bacteria

The Best Towel Money Can Buy

Mizu Size Guide

Pure Silver in Every Fiber

Mizu Towel’s fibers are carefully coated with pure silver. This technology is proven to eliminate up to 99% of bacteria.

Tiny silver fibers are twisted with our Xinjiang cotton. This allows the Mizu to eliminate bacterial growth while remaining lusciously soft and absorbent.

Rest assured that our silver technology is permanently integrated into our fiber and will not wear out. In fact, we even offer a lifetime odor-free guarantee.

Craftsmanship​ ​and​ ​Technology​ ​in​ ​Harmony

​​Mizu​​ ​is​ ​a​ ​​spa-grade,​​ ​​Japanese​ ​inspired​ ​smart​ ​towel​​ ​that​ ​channels​ ​the​ ​power​ ​of proprietary ​color-changing​ ​dyes​​ ​to​ ​detect​ ​contaminants.​ ​It​ ​is​ ​​concept​ ​proven​ ​​and​ ​a​ ​​real product​,​ ​and​ ​as​ ​you​ ​can​ ​see​ ​we​ ​have​ ​a​ ​batch​ ​prepared​ ​for​ ​our​ ​amazing​ ​early​ ​backers!

Sensing​ ​areas​ ​change​ ​color​ ​from​ ​blue​ ​to​ ​red​ ​after​ ​contact​ ​with:

Mizu​ Red​:​ ​wash​ ​immediately​ ​to​ ​avoid​ ​dangerous​ impurities and chemicals.

Credibility​ ​Assured

Our​ ​team​ ​is​ ​composed​ ​of​ ​MIT​ ​PhD​ ​holders,​ ​and​ ​multiple​ ​degree​ ​holders​ ​from​ ​the​ ​world’s most​ ​prestigious​ ​universities.​ ​We’ve​ ​worked​ ​with​ ​the​ ​world’s​ ​best​ ​scientists​ ​and​ ​engineers through​ ​significant​ ​trial​ ​and​ ​error​ ​to​ ​create​ ​this​ ​patented​ ​product.​ ​Mizu’s​ ​extended​ ​family includes​ ​thought​ ​leaders​ ​from​ ​the​ ​Forbes’s​ ​premiere​ ​30​ ​Under​ ​30​ ​list,​ ​cross-disciplinary Professors​ ​as​ ​well​ ​as​ ​University​ ​Deans.

We'll do anything to avoid getting sick. Yet... most people don't realize the items getting us sick are what we use every day - towels

While being used, towels are contaminated with skin grease, sweat, and bodily secretions like dead skin cells

These contaminants cannot be seen with the naked eye, but can be harmful to your skin and overall health

The towel you used this morning is now breeding ground for potentially life-threatening bacteria

Your​ ​Towel’s​ ​Dirty​ ​Secret

Generic​ ​Won’t​ ​Cut​ ​It

Sick?​ ​Blame​ ​Your​ ​Towels

Lifecycle​ ​of​ ​a​ ​Towel

If​ ​the​ ​towel​ ​smells​ ​bad​ ​to​ ​you,​ ​it’s​ ​already​ ​way​ ​too​ ​late. Mizu​ ​is​ ​a​ ​reliable​ ​way​ ​to​ ​tell​ ​how​ ​dirty​ ​your​ ​towel​ ​is.

 

Standard​ ​towels​ ​have​ ​to​ ​be​ ​washed​ ​at​ ​low​ ​temperatures​ ​or​ ​they​ ​will​ ​break​ ​down.​ This lower​ ​temperature​ ​is​ ​where​ ​skin​ ​infecting​ ​bacteria​ ​like​ ​E​ ​coli​ ​thrive.​ These​ ​bacteria​ ​are especially​ ​potent​ ​to​ ​children.​ This​ ​is​ ​why​ ​it​ ​is​ ​important​ ​to​ ​wash​ ​and​ ​dry​ ​towels​ ​at​ ​high temperatures.

The​ ​Science​ ​Behind​ ​Mizu

Mizu’s​ ​Natural​ ​Detection​ ​System

​How​ ​Mizu​ ​Stacks​ ​Up

Mizu​ ​is​ ​made​ ​to​ ​be​ ​washed​ ​at​ ​high​ ​temperatures​ ​and​ ​won't​ ​lose​ ​softness​ ​or​ ​usability​ ​no matter​ ​how​ ​many​ ​times​ ​you​ ​put​ ​it​ ​through​ ​the​ ​wash.​ This​ ​is​ ​because​ ​of​ ​the​ ​rigid​ ​quality control​ ​standards​ ​modeled​ ​after​ ​the​ ​inspiration​ ​behind​ ​Mizu​ - ​perfectionist​ ​Japanese Craftsmanship.

Japanese Craftmanship

Luscious​ ​Absorbency

Due​ ​to​ ​soft​ ​water​ ​and​ ​purity​ ​from​ ​harsh​ ​chemicals,​ ​Mizu​ ​towels​ ​have​ ​unbelievable​ ​water absorbency.

Harmony​ ​in​ ​Quality

Most​ ​towels​ ​can​ ​dry​ ​you.​ ​Some are even soft.​ ​A​ ​few​ ​amazing​ ​towels​ ​even​ ​dry​ ​quickly. Mizu takes it a step further by​ ​weaving​ ​these​ ​qualities​ ​with​ ​​bacterial​ prevention and impurity detection​.

 

If​ ​you​ ​have​ ​children,​ ​you​ ​know​ ​they​ ​love​ ​two​ ​things:​ ​gross​ ​stuff​ ​and​ ​animals.​ ​ Mizu’s​ ​child​ ​towel and​ ​bib​ ​helps​ ​teach​ ​staying​ ​clean​ ​in​ ​a​ ​style​ ​kids​ ​love.

Technology​ ​&​ ​Tradition​ ​in​ ​Every​ ​Thread

The Story

Our​ ​story​ ​began​ ​in​ ​Imabari,​ ​Japan.

The​ ​city,​ ​nestled​ ​within​ ​the​ ​inland​ ​islands​ ​of​ ​the​ ​Ehime​ ​Prefecture,​ ​is​ ​known​ ​as​ ​the​ ​towel​ ​making capital​ ​of​ ​the​ ​world.​ ​At​ ​the​ ​world’s​ ​towel​ ​making​ ​capital​ ​we​ ​watched​ ​spinning,​ ​weaving,​ ​precision at​ ​levels​ ​of​ ​quality​ ​that​ ​challenged​ ​us​ ​to​ ​create​ ​something​ ​truly​ ​special​ ​for​ ​the​ ​folks​ ​at​ ​home.

We​ ​wanted​ ​to​ ​pull​ ​a​ ​​modern​,​ ​​hygienic​ ​​spin​ ​on​ ​a​ ​well-known​ ​product:​ ​the​ ​towel.​ ​The​ ​simple notion​ ​sparked​ ​a​ ​complex​ ​idea​ ​-​ ​what​ ​if​ ​we​ ​engineered​ ​home​ ​products​ ​that​ ​could​ ​detect​ ​and prevent​ ​bacteria?​ ​The​ ​potential​ ​for​ ​the​ ​technology​ ​would​ ​be​ ​endless,​ ​towels​ ​just​ ​being​ ​the​ ​start. After​ ​countless​ ​iterations,​ ​cups​ ​of​ ​coffee,​ ​meetings​ ​with​ ​factories,​ ​scientists,​ ​and​ ​engineers, Mizu​ ​​has​ ​finally​ ​come​ ​alive.​ ​We​ ​can’t​ ​wait​ ​for​ ​you​ ​to​ ​experience​ ​it.

Timeline

Manufacturing

It​ ​is​ ​our​ ​mission​ ​to​ ​maintain​ ​honest​ ​and​ ​open​ ​communication​ ​throughout​ ​the​ ​campaign, manufacturing​ ​phase,​ ​and​ ​post​ ​production​ ​phase.

Unlike​ ​some​ ​projects,​ ​you​ ​won’t​ ​need​ ​to​ ​wait​ ​years​ ​to​ ​receive​ ​your​ ​product,​ ​or​ ​find​ ​out​ ​that funding​ ​was​ ​inappropriately​ ​allocated​ ​on​ ​months​ ​of​ ​fruitless​ ​R&D.​ ​This​ ​Kickstarter​ ​campaign​ ​will avoid​ ​all​ ​of​ ​these​ ​problems.

Why?​ ​Because​ ​Mizu​ ​is​ ​already​ ​a​ ​real​ ​product​ ​that​ ​we’ve​ ​poured​ ​our​ ​hearts​ ​into.

We​ ​launched​ ​the​ ​first​ ​generation​ ​of​ ​Mizu​ ​Towel​ ​in​ ​Asia​ ​and​ ​received​ ​over​ ​3500​ ​backers​ ​and raised​ ​over​ ​​¥1,000,000 (more than $150,000). Since​ ​launching​ ​in​ ​Asia,​ ​we’ve​ ​massively​ ​improved​ ​the​ ​quality​ ​of​ ​the dye​ ​and​ ​fabric​ ​and​ ​have​ ​upgraded​ ​to​ ​Xinjiang​ ​cotton​ ​without​ ​raising​ ​our​ ​prices.

Mizu​ ​Towel​ ​is​ ​concept​ ​proven,​ ​prototyped,​ ​fully​ ​developed​ ​and​ ​heavily​ ​tested​ ​until​ ​perfection. We​ ​cannot​ ​stress​ ​enough​ ​that​ ​​this​ ​is​ ​a​​ ​​real​ ​product​​ ​that​ ​​we​ ​have​​ ​​already​ ​created​​ ​and​ ​​we can​ ​deliver​ ​within​ ​weeks​​ ​after​ ​the​ ​campaign​ ​ends​ ​and​ ​funding​ ​is​ ​released.

Our​ ​network​ ​of​ ​skilled​ ​towel​ ​manufacturers​ ​have​ ​looked​ ​at​ ​our​ ​sample​ ​run​ ​and​ ​are​ ​ready​ ​to produce​ ​a​ ​massive​ ​batch​ ​of​ ​towels.

• We’ve​ ​meticulously​ ​gone​ ​through​ ​every​ ​detail​ ​with​ ​them​ ​to​ ​make​ ​sure​ ​that​ ​our​ ​strict quality​ ​standards​ ​are​ ​being​ ​met.
• After​ ​vetting​ ​over​ ​five​ ​hundred​ ​factories,​ ​we’ve​ ​partnered​ ​with​ ​only​ ​the​ ​best​ ​and​ ​most skilled​ ​producers​ ​for​ ​the​ ​job.​ ​They​ ​manufacture​ ​luxury​ ​Japanese​ ​towels​ ​sold​ ​in​ ​Japan.
• We​ ​have​ ​built​ ​up​ ​relationships​ ​to​ ​cut​ ​down​ ​manufacturing​ ​and​ ​shipping​ ​costs​ ​for​ ​our backers.
• The​ ​product​ ​has​ ​been​ ​made.​​​There​ ​is​ ​no​ ​guesswork​ ​involved​ ​here​ ​-​ ​if​ ​you​ ​back​ ​the project​ ​and​ ​it​ ​succeeds,​ ​you​ ​will​ ​get​ ​a​ ​towel​ ​and​ ​it​ ​will​ ​be​ ​the​ ​best​ ​towel​ ​you’ve ever​ ​owned.

Backing​ ​crowdfunding​ ​campaigns​ ​is​ ​fun​ ​-​ ​we’re​ ​repeat​ ​backers​ ​ourselves​ ​-​ ​but​ ​nobody​ ​wants​ ​to pay​ ​a​ ​fifty​ ​percent​ ​price​ ​mark-up​ ​because​ ​of​ ​a​ ​creator’s​ ​inexperience.

We’ve​ ​made​ ​and​ ​sent​ ​out​ ​a​ ​run​ ​of​ ​samples​ ​that​ ​have​ ​been​ ​enjoyed​ ​by​ ​community​ ​members, friends,​ ​and​ ​family.

Backer​ ​Rewards

As​ ​a​ ​thank​ ​you​ ​for​ ​supporting​ ​our​ ​campaign​ ​and​ ​for​ ​being​ ​an​ ​early​ ​adopter​ ​to​ ​this​ ​incredible technology,​ ​we​ ​are​ ​offering​ ​incredible​ ​discounts​ ​off​ ​retail​ ​prices.​ ​Luxury​ ​towels​ ​today​ ​without​ ​our self-cleaning and impuprity detectiy ​technology​ ​already​ ​cost​ ​$80-120.​ ​Take​ ​advantage​ ​of​ ​this​ ​incredible Kickstarter-only deal​ ​while​ ​it​ ​lasts.

story:
Available for sale on the official website

HERE

www.ladywaitrose.weebly.com
 

What is KASUMI?

KASUMI is the word for “mist” in Japanese. This eco-friendly air humidifier is made of compressed fibres and effectively eases dryness of your room with the help of capillary phenomenon. Water evaporation through capillary phenomenon on a set of KASUMI achieves just around 50% of humidity in a few hours and maintains this level, so your room will not be over-humidified. No more worries about damaging your paper documents or valuable items near the humidifier!

A set of KASUMI evaporates water up to 30 times faster than the European winter tradition of keeping a small cup of water above the central heating.

Humidifiers are only for wintertime, no?

Did you know that it is actually early spring that the indoor humidity gets the driest?

In more than 10 different regions across the world: from Northern and Central Europe to North America and Japan, the indoor humidity without any humidification methods only achieves the range of 10-35% from November onwards with March recording its lowest level, according to the Research in Estonia.

All perks shall be shipped out from late January to mid February via air mail, so you can receive it before the indoor humidity hits the lowest!

Even in summertime in humid regions (e.g. Japan with over 90% humidity outdoors), the indoor humidity still easily gets dry when air conditioners are in use.

In fact, usage of humidifiers is very common in Japanese offices and hospitals throughout the year. Japanese society sees the importance of humidifiers in every season: spring against hay fever; summer against dry eyes from AC, and autumn and winter against the spread of cold and flu (now Covid-19 included).

Why is the air humidity around 50% so important?

Humidity actually matters.  Here is a quick video guidance for you!

[transcription]
When the air is too dry, you will be more susceptive to viruses in many aspects. It is not only Covid-19, but also other infectious viruses.
Transmission: In the range of 40-60% humidity, infectious droplets of the viruses fall onto the ground faster, reducing the duration of other people to breathe in the infectious droplets.
Access to your blood line: You all probably have experienced small tears and bleeding on your hands or feet during wintertime. In dry cold environment, your skin gets dried and eventually gets torn. These tears allow bacteria and viruses the easiest access to your blood line!

Your frontline immunity: Mucous membranes in your nose prevents bacteria and viruses to come further into your body. On a cell level, there are tiny hair-like organelles called cilia, which stand up to block the bacteria and viruses from passing through. In lower humidity, they cannot function effectively.

Remember, over-humidification is not good. Above 60% humidity will create the favourable environment for household moulds to grow. Covid-19 will also stay active longer on object surfaces in the environment above 65% humidity. This creates another layer of danger for an extended period of time, which we cannot avoid by social distancing. In the absence of hydrometre, electric humidifiers tends to over-humidify the room.

KASUMI maintains around 50% of humidity and will never over-humidifies your house because the natural water evaporation slows down when the air reaches 55% humidity.

If you are more curious on this topic, you can continue with these reading materials: quick / detailed

How many KASUMI do I need?

The speed of water evaporation through KASUMI depends on the temperature and default humidity level of its surrounding environment. Usually, one KASUMI per 5 square metres is optimal for keeping your rooms moist for at least 24 hours.
For instance, a double bed room is 15 square metres on average. That’s why KASUMI comes in the unit of 3 sets for sale!

Fundraising and your rewards

Perhaps you wondered why I’m pledging a fundraise here, having the luxury of living in a skyscraper penthouse overlooking the spectacular Manhattan landscape? Because I DON’T!
I did the visual and writing for this IndieGoGo campaign solely by myself over the “Stay Home” lonely Christmas 2020 inside my small bedroom in a locked down city of Tallinn.

Since I am asking for your financial support, I do not think it is justifiable to spend any unnecessary costs, such as making a fancy intro video involving filming crew and actors. I only spent €2 for the visual work. And because we are in the second lockdown in where I live, I also decided to do this all on my own in my little bedroom, observing the concept of “Stay Home” absolutely faithfully! The voiceover is my real voice, but those models are from free videos on Canva ;)

For your hearty contribution which can start from just less than a dollar, you will all get a reward: an exclusive access to the “behind the scenes” digital photo book via e-mail!

KASUMI sets are available from £14/€15/$18 (approximately). If you want more than a set of KASUMI, don’t miss out the early bird special packages which are valid until 23:59 GMT time on 30th January!

The compressed fibre used for making KASUMI are partially from recycle fabrics. This is more recognisable on the white swan. Please keep in mind that the white swans may contain a couple of tiny coloured fibres on their bodies, as we don’t use chemical bleach for completely whitening them.

If you have watched the explainer video, you can basically skip the rest and scroll down until you no longer see any photos to the “Risks and Challenges”.

How to use KASUMI?

1. Slide the slits together and wet KASUMI with 5% acidic vinegar water*

2. Stand KASUMI in up to 1cm of 5% acidic vinegar water. For example, you can keep KASUMI in the vinegar water just above the central heating.

3. KASUMI will keep your room humidified and become even cuter with snow-like cellulose crystals on the edges.

4. Wash or disinfect KASUMI and dry them completely at least once a week.

*If you are uncomfortable with the smell of the vinegar, infuse vinegar with your favourite fragrant essence or make citrus peel vinegar. Attention: Citrus peels are the best to mask the vinegar smell, however, the colour of the citrus fruit stains on KASUMI.

How to take care of KASUMI?

For hygienic usage, it is recommended to wash or disinfect KASUMI and the water container once a week and dry them completely.

Washing: It is best to handwash KASUMI in a small container of water around your body temperature or less with a few drops of laundry or kitchen detergent. Soak KASUMI for about 30 minutes, gently move them around inside the soapy water, drain, and then do this with just water for 2 more rounds. Then dry on a flat surface.

Not suitable for washing in the washing machine. If ironing, select “synthetic” or less than 100 degrees Celsius.

Disinfection: The disinfecting solution containing hypochlorite is not suitable for KASUMI. Hypochlorite will result in bleaching the colour of KASUMI.

Is KASUMI better than electronic humidifiers?

In comparison with electronic humidifier, KASUMI is the better option in many aspects.

Values: No electricity required, eco-friendly, and cheaper than the electronic ones!

Noise: KASUMI makes no sound. Your sleep will never be disturbed by KASUMI.

Comfort: KASUMI does not spray out the water. You don’t have to worry anymore about getting splashes onto your face or your valuable items with KASUMI in your life!

Optimal: KASUMI maintains around 50% of humidity and will never over-humidifies your house. (Above 60% of humidity should be avoided as it allows household moulds and extended active life of Covid-19 on object surfaces.)

Easy to care: KASUMI only requires a gentle hand wash once a week. Electronic humidifiers require more frequent and vigorous cleaning, yet the mineral buildup clots the water path, which tends to result in costly replacements every few years, especially in hard water regions.

Clean: KASUMI and your plate are both easily washable, hence the best option to maintain hygiene environment in your house. With electronic humidifiers, the water path in the machine can easily become the colony for bacteria and moulds, spreading out the hazardous aerosol to the room.

Are KASUMI reusable every year?

You may already know that the existing Japanese paper and fabric humidifiers in the market have quite a short life of only 1-3 months on average. It is because of the material’s limited durability, but more for the concern of growing bacteria and moulds on the material.
KASUMI is made of compressed fibre durable with 5% acidic vinegar water and hand-washing. This is how we can achieve protecting KASUMI and the water from household bacteria and moulds, resulting in longer product life.

The minerals in the tapped water will eventually clog the capillary paths and slow down the air humidifying effect of KASUMI. It depends on the hardness of your water, but it is recommended to replace KASUMI with a new set every 2-3 years.

The science behind KASUMI

The concept of KASUMI is very simple: stand, water and let it just be. But it is carefully crafted with some personal insights in physics and chemistry.

The natural water evaporation with the help of capillary phenomenon cannot over-humidify the air, as the evaporation slows down when the indoor air reaches 55% humidity.

Despite the simplicity, the self-standing structure in these adorable designs are unique and new for humidifiers, according to the global industrial design database. The length and angle of the slits are calibrated for stabilising the posture of this self-standing humidifier, and the air holes in the shape of snowflakes, stars and hearts enhance water evaporation.


registered for industrial designs

The use of 5% acidic vinegar water prevents household moulds and bacteria from growing in the water and on KASUMI, while producing snow-like crystals on the edges as the acetobacter xylinum in the air connects with vinegar and synthesises cellulose.

Why do KASUMI get white crystals?

We use 5% acidic vinegar water for protecting KASUMI and the water from harmful bacteria and mould in the house. As long as KASUMI are soaked in the 5% acidic water, there is almost no chance for common household bacteria or moulds to grow.

But there is one non-harmful genera in the air which likes vinegar: acetobacter xylinum of the acetic acid bacteria. These are the same bacteria that we use for making vinegar. KASUMI will get snow-like crystals on the edges as the acetobacter xylinum connects with vinegar and synthesises cellulose. If you make a citrus peel vinegar, you will see a shade of the citrus colour in the cellulose crystals. The cellulose is completely safe to touch. If you don’t like seeing them, you can simply wash them away.

Risks and challenges

New and stricter restrictions on movement and transportation due to Covid-19 may affect shipping schedule.

On a personal level, launching KASUMI is actually my means of survival for my legal stay in Estonia in order to comply with the stricter immigration policy in Estonia and Schengen countries.

Most of my one year of sabbatical was spent alone in my flat in Tallinn due to Covid-19 crisis and difficult time for Asian faces in the world out there. Upon expiry of my 1-year visa, life is now getting even more difficult for me as the immigration policy has been tightened due to the ongoing situation of Covid-19 and its economical effect in the region. The visa and residence permit for non-EU people are granted only when the study or job absolutely requires one’s physical existence in Estonia. I came to Estonia just before the outbreak of Covid-19, I learned Estonian language rather quickly since the lockdown, and yet I cannot operate my cultural workshop business as planned, I still want to live here and I’ve been sustaining my life from my own savings without any financial aid from any governments. But I am not allowed to stay here anymore if I am not absolutely needed to physically be in Estonia.

So I came up with the idea of launching 2 local businesses in Tallinn which cannot be operated remotely: (1) making and sales of KASUMI from Estonia to the world, and (2) cooking and sales of Japanese food in Tallinn. If you are curious, you can see more of what I do on my business website!

KASUMI from Lady Wait-Rose

Ever since I moved to Estonia in November 2019, I started to wake up with a sore throat because of the European dry climate. The right level of air humidity is important for our immune system, so I considered installing an air humidifier in my flat in the first autumn of Covid-19 era, but the existing humidifiers in the European market were all too expensive. Nothing was cheap like the Japanese paper humidifiers, which are usually sold around 7 Euros for 1 month. That is why I started experimenting to make my own humidifier, and I‘ve put together everything I wanted  in a humidifier: quiet, no splashes, and hygienic. And I also wanted to give it a role like a teddy bear, with whom I can cope through the lonely nights. To keep the water evaporation going, we need to water KASUMI from day to day. It’s like growing a plant or living with a pet. You can see the snow-like cellulose crystals to grow on KASUMI, and you check everyday if your KASUMI have enough vinegar water to evaporate. Having some routines and something to care about in our daily life is very important for our mind, now that we are going through this extended period of unusual reality with no place to escape in the world. That’s how the idea of KASUMI came into my life, and now it has become my means of survival for securing my legal residency in Estonia.

When I showed my prototypes in Estonia, many people asked how I got all these scientific knowledge whereas I am formerly known to be a legal professional. It is purely because law was not the most interesting and enjoyable subject for me to study or work with. Other than cultural and creative activities or English language education, I had more interests in medical field and self-studied quite a lot to the extent that I got appointed to tutor Japanese medical students for USMLE exam and to serve as a medical interpreter in the field of neuropsychology back in Tokyo.

And this is why I care about staying healthy, both in physical and psychological senses, especially while we all are going through this difficult time with Covid-19. KASUMI is not just about being cute/kawaii. If it were just like the other existing air humidifiers, I wouldn’t have chosen to create them for sale. It had to be hygienic, environmental, and effective for keeping our life comfortable. It’s more about introducing a healthy lifestyle while we all stay home and there is nowhere to escape to .

Yes, we have been physically separated from other folks, but no one is alone in this crisis. Together, we get through this! KASUMI is intended to support your healthy lifestyle in the area social distancing cannot help. That’s why I decided to sell my KASUMI to the world, online!

Other ways you can help

Please spread the word and let people know about my new invention!
If there is any demand, I am available for media coverage in English, Japanese, or possibly in Estonian language.

When I proceed to bulk production of KASUMI with your help, I can also continue making and selling KASUMI on my own website after this campaign. 
 

Photo gallery
