story:
SmartCharge™ is the world's first LED light bulb which works even during a power outage. User can turn ON/OFF from the same wall switch.  No hardware changes or rewiring required.

Featured:  

Boot camp -A light bulb that can power itself 

Giz Wiz Show - Very clever idea!

Dave Pogue, Yahoo Tech! - Seems like magic!!!

News Alert - Now we have Distribution Partners in India, Mexico, Canada, Chile, China, Argentina, Hog Kong, Germany and UK. Pre-Order here and we will ship the rewards to your loved ones in these countries. No overseas shipping charge. Just select "Overseas Freinds" Perk.



* If you feature SmartCharge 2.0 on your website, news channel please let us know about it so that we may feature you. Thank you!

** Feel free to use videos from our YouTube Channel as you wish!

Two years ago, we introduced SmartCharge LED bulb which worked like a normal bulb during power outages. It received a tremendous support worldwide. We shipped to 32 countries and started a worldwide movement to remove darkness due to power outages and rolling blackouts. Feedback from this global trial of our first design was extremely encouraging! Most importantly, it gave us insights into product use, cost and product/market fit. Now we  launch SmartCharge 2.0. which is:

 Brighter 


The light produced by the SmartCharge LED bulbs is increased from 350 lumen to 650 lumen. More lumen means brighter light.

Better - Enhanced Features

Control multiple bulbs with one switch

Even bulbs can be in any combination - replace only one, two... or all of the bulbs in that switch with SmartCharge bulbs.

Charge only mode

Very convenient for places where power goes out almost every night. Now you can charge it during the day time or while sleeping without turning the light on. 

Cheaper

Our aim is to make SmartCharge affordable to people everywhere in the world specially in developing countries. SmartCharge 2.0 has simple design and 35% lower cost.  

Ready for mass production. Available for distribution worldwide.

All Base Types: E26/27, B22;         All Supply Voltage - 110 V - 240V

We are partnering with Distributors in different countries. We have distributors in India and Mexico.  You can pre order and support us here in US and we will ship the rewards to an address of your loved ones in India or Mexico.  Avoid overseas shipping cost.

SmartCharge is the world’s first ultra-energy efficient LED light bulb that works like a normal light bulb even during a power outage. It is integrated with a rechargeable lithium ion battery and patented switch sensor technology. The user can turn it ON/OFF from the same wall switch even during a power outage. SmartCharge doesn’t require any hardware changes or rewiring—it fits right into standard light sockets. It works on a wide range of supply voltages, thus it is applicable to every country in the world.  Its built-in backup battery provides 4 hours of light. These 4 hours of charge can be "extended" by turning the bulb off if there’s no need for light at the moment. When the power comes back, SmartCharge automatically recharges the battery.


Simply Replace Your Old Bulbs

Simply replace any existing light bulb with a SmartCharge™ LED Bulb. 

There is no extra wiring, no ugly control box, no remote control or WiFi  or expensive electrical installation required.

Never notice a power outage - Like nothing happened

With SmartCharge™ Bulbs, you won’t even notice a power outage because the SmartCharge™ Bulb will continue to provide you with light. Turn On/Off your SmartCharge™ Bulbs by using the same light switch – it’s like a power outage never happened.

Endless Use – Anywhere – Everywhere

When the power goes out, the whole house goes dark except for rooms using SmartCharge™ Bulbs, which stay on, or are ready to be turned on in another room if needed.

"Peace of Mind" for Everyone

No need to use candles or oil burners risking safety of kids. SmartCharge is a non polluting and safe solution to darkness due to power outage.

"No hassle" during power outages

No need to look for a flashlight, candles, or emergency lamp.  You do what you do normally – just turn on the switch and the light comes ON. 

Energy Efficient – Environment Friendly - Long Lasting

The SmartCharge™ Bulb helps cut electricity usage for lighting by up to 85%, saving you money and reducing the impact on the environment.

SmartCharge™ Bulbs are also long lasting, rated up to 40,000 hours or 25 years of life.

Turn ON/OFF From The Same Switch Even During Power Outage"

The heart of the SmartCharge™ LED Bulb is our patented Grid & Switch Sensor technology. It is capable of distinguishing between a loss of power due to opening of the line switch and a loss of power resulting from a grid failure when the line switch is either open or close.


From the outside it looks like a normal LED light bulb. But we have added a battery, intelligent control technology and an inverter all inside the light bulb assembly to make it smart and efficient.

Grid & Switch Sensor technology consists of three blocks:

    1. Intelligent control circuit with grid sense and switch sense
    2. Battery and battery charging circuit
    3. Inverter along with few other elements

The resulting smart LED bulb is immune to grid power outages. It always knows, even during a power failure, the wall switch position and turns the bulb ON or OFF based on the switch position.

  • If switch was ON when power failed, then the SmartCharge™ Bulb will remain ON.
  • If switch was OFF, the SmartCharge™ Bulb will remain OFF.

During a power outage, the switch still has control of the light bulb.

Additionally, unlike other safety light bulbs that automatically switch on when the power goes out - regardless if you are in the room - the SmartCharge™ Bulb recognizes the light switch’s position to conserve its power and only draws from the battery when needed. Once power is restored, the bulb’s battery recharges itself to make sure you’re ready for another power outage or emergency.


Best Of CES 2015 - NBC Today Show 

NY Future Energy Investor Pitch 2014

Innovation Fund of North Carolina 2015

Pat McCrory International Entrepreneur Award 2015

   Top 33 - St. Andres Prize for Environment  2016


CleanTech Open Global Sustainability Award 2015
CleanTech Open National Energy Award 2015

Blue Diamond Awards 2015 - Finalist




We are a small startup company with three employees at present. We're focused on developing great consumer products, which bring "Peace of mind". We were founded in 2013, and the 8W SmartCharge™ LED Bulb is our first product. We started out by designing and prototyping our concept by a reputable design company from India. Then we collaborated with a world class LED bulb manufacturer in China. They integrated our technology into a 8W LED light bulb. 

We aim to pioneer the emerging world of LED lighting with our technology providing convenience and safety.

The idea behind the campaign is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle. By reaching out on Indiegogo, we aim to assess our demand, build a stronger relationship with our early adopters and wide range of distributors worldwide, and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.

The amount of human capital that can be unleashed from the 3 billion people around the world who have access to a grid, but an unreliable one, is staggering.Children can study, kerosene-related issues will not plague them, the price of this light will become increasingly affordable, and it lasts longer than any incandescent competitor. For human health, environmental sustainability, and economic/social well-being, SmartCharge is the product that can make a real impact on the planet. Indiegogo platform and you will make a diffrence.

We are production ready.  Our product is UL, CE, FCC approved. We have produced a small batch and tested extensively. Now we are ready for mass production and distribution. Indiegogo campaign funds will be used towards putting SmartCharge™ Bulbs into production. We're experienced in this field and have led the development and manufacturing of many hardware products in previous companies, including the GasWatch (Propane Tank Gauge) and iFi Smart Tag (a Bluetooth proximity sensor device) so we know what it takes to take a concept and turn it into reality. By supporting SmartCharge™ on this platform, you get in early and get a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make SmartCharge™ LED Bulb a reality.

Also, most light bulbs are based on century old technology and are not energy efficient, which impacts our environment. The SmartCharge™ Bulbs are not only energy efficient but also easy to use, long lasting and smarter- they ensure that you won't be left in the dark during a power outage.

The SmartCharge™ V2.0 LED bulb project is past the design stage and now we are looking forward to large scale production. As for ny new products, we should be aware of following risks:

  • Manufacturing issues and related problems
  • Delays in getting parts and shipment

Having launched several products successfully, we understand and are aware of the numerous risks and challenges faced by entrepreneurs.

A key challenge is quality control, as manufacturing starts we’ll keep a close eye on quality both in person, and by using experienced inspectors.

Finally, we promise to keep you all in the loop every step of the way, so you know how we are making progress.

Q. What are the specifications of the SmartCharge™ LED Bulb?

  • Wattage - 8 - 11 Watt
  • Lumen - 650, operating Voltage - 110 V - 240 V, Base Type - E26, E27 & B22
  • Color Temperature - 2700K - 5000K
  • Beam Angle > 150 degree
  • Dimmable - No
  • Battery Type - Rechargeable Li Ion Battery
  • Battery life - 3.5 hours of continuous use during power outage or back up mode
  • Battery charge time - 0 - 100% in 6 hours
  • Bulb Life - 30,000 hrs
  • Battery replacement cycle - 3 - 4 years
  • Dimensions - Φ 68 x 141 mm

Q. Where can SmartCharge 2.0 be shipped?

SmartCharge 2.0 will be shipped worldwide as long as USPS/FedEx  supports delivery to that location. Shipping charges as applicable.

Q. How long will the bulb stay on during a power failure?

A fully charged SmartCharge 2.0 LED bulb provides 3 1/2 hours of continuous use, or intermittent use controlled by the wall switch.(3 1/2 hours total).

Q. Do I need to change my switch to operate the bulb?

No change required.  Just replace your existing bulb with SmartCharge bulb.

Q. Will the bulb work in light fixtures which have one switch controlling many bulbs?

Yes. SmartCharge 2.0 works with multi bulb fixtures controlled by single switch.

Q. Is it OK if I replace only one of the many bulbs with a SmartCharge bulb in a multi-bulb fixture?

Yes. As long as the other bulbs in that fixture are LED or other energy efficient bulbs you can replace 1, 2 or as many you like with SmartCharge V2.0 LED bulbs.

It will not work with incandescent bulbs.

Q. What is the life of the Bulb?

This is a LED bulb with rated life of more than 20 years. Battery is Li-Ion rechargeable battery - approximately 300 - 400 cycles of charging so about 3 years of life before need to be replaced.

Q. How often do I have to replace the built-in battery?

Inside the bulb is a Li Ion rechargeable battery with about 300 charging cycles. This battery may need to be replaced every 3-4 years, depending on use.

Q. How often do I charge the battery?

After using the bulb during power outage it is recommended to charge it for up to 4-6 hours depending on how long the bulb was used during outage. The bulb charges on AC power during normal operation when turned ON. So using the bulb a minimum of 2 hours every week is recommended. Alternatively, you can use charge only mode for charging the battery. 

Q. Can the bulb be used in closed fixtures?

No, it cannot be used in closed fixtures.  UL testing and standards have very strict requirements around safety of the products.  The heat generated if not dissipated may result in a hazardous situation.  Enclosed fixtures do not allow proper ventilation for the heat sink.  That is why, for safety reasons (overheating), this bulb is not recommended to be used in enclosed fixtures.

Q. Is just unplugging the lamp the same as simulating a power outage?

No, it is not.  The reason is SmartCharge™ bulbs need a load (complete circuit) behind the switch to operate. In a general home situation, there are a number of loads (e.g appliances) behind the switch when the power is turned off therefore they complete the circuit for the SmartCharge™ bulb when it is plugged in.  If the circuit is not completed the SmartCharge bulb cannot distinguish between a power outage and the switch being turned off so the bulb would not stay on.

Q. How do I Simulate a Power Outage?

Note: Make sure the Smart Charge Bulb is sufficiently charged before simulating the power outage.

  1. Screw one SmartCharge bulb in a table lamp that has its own switch.
  2. Screw an incandescent bulb into another table lamp.
  3. Plug both lamps into a power strip.
  4. Plug in the power strip in a wall outlet.
  5. Turn ON the switch to see both the bulbs glow.
  6. Keep the bulbs ON as in step 5, and remove the plug of power strip from the wall outlet. (This simulates power outage).
  7. The normal light bulb will turn off (Since there is no power) but SmartCharge bulb remains ON.
  8. You can control the SmartCharge bulb from the table lamp switch (not from power strip switch).

Note: If you turn the regular lamp OFF, you cannot control the SmartCharge bulb in this set up. SmartCharge bulbs need a load (complete circuit) behind the switch to operate. In a general home situation, there are a lot of loads behind the switch.

Q. What certifications do these bulbs have?

CE, UL, FCC, RoHS Certifications.

Q. Distributors/Retailers:

Our first priority is to deliver the product to our Supporters, after the project is complete then we will be taking orders from distributors. You can purchase our distributor pack for initial samples and contact us at info@smartchargelight.com.

story:
Introducing Tressh 

Self-powered technology | Arrives before Christmas Eve

Tressh is a revolutionary flame lamp that designed with integrated body and self-powered technology which is never powered off. Its integrated functions mainly include smart sensor technology, waterproof materials, functional buttons. it's simple as this: collect solar energy and convert it into electricity , then release it automatically at night when the real-time visibility is lower than the setting. There are three colors for you to choose, and make your room or yard a little different this Christmas. 

​

There are different ways you can use it: hang it on your house ceilings, and walls or you can place it on your tables or desks, as well as your yards, to decorate your house with it, and make it special and warm

Smart sensor technology

Tressh is our first flame lamp that applies this smart sensor technology to make the most use of every power that collected on the daylight, then turns it into electric and lightens your life at night:

In daytime: The solar panels on it will store sunshine and convert solar energy into electricity. 

At night: The lamp will automatically turn on by the intelligent recognition technology when it's dark. All the energy are provided and released by those it collects in the daytime

There are solar panels on the top and USB charging port on the bottom. If sunshine is enough in the daytime, the energy will support its whole night's use. When it is rainy days, you can charge it with this USB port, and keep it working well.

 

The real flame lamp ever

 

 

Three different lights

 Controlled by buttons, you can switch it into three different light modes:​

                 Press once                                    Press twice                                Press three times

 

Waterproof

Tressh flame lamp was made by IP66 waterproof materials, it can place in your yard for years without worrying about the sunshine and rain. Its colors will remain the same as it is. 

 

Rechargeable battery

This battery is 2200mAh/8.14Wh with USB charging design, which makes it easier to charge in case there will be a long period of rain days, and this battery will make sure this lamp works well on those days. It takes 3 hours to fully charge it (12h when charged with solar energy). 

 

Place it in your room

It can be placed on your dinner table, reading desk, as well as your bedroom. Its light is soft but warm. As Christmas Eve is coming, it could be the best choice for your 2018 holiday as a home decoration. 

 

Yards decoration

Keep your yard bright with this lamp and you do not need to replace or charge it ever again. There is not only fashion and colorful lights that it provides, but also the convenience and changes. 

 

Use it for outdoor activities

It's a good device to carry with when you are going to do some outdoor activities. Hiking, camping, it's good to use it for lighting in an outdoor party.

 

Cutting-edge design for the modern home

 

Design manuscript

After so many times of modeling and design, we could successfully make this final work with fully functional as we wished. We put lots of work on it and hope to create a great product that most people love, also we hope you can enjoy it. 

 

Product details

 

Tech specs

 

Perks

 

Timeline

Our team--Founded in early 2017, Tressh Co,.Ltd is formed by a team of dynamic, creative designers and entrepreneurs who fond of the minimalist aesthetic, such passion and belief bring them together. We created this brand and strive to offer customers the highest quality Aas well as make their everyday life more convenient in a fast-paced world.

We love those awesome home design, and along with our pace, we also come to visit lots of homeowners to acknowledge their demands, and based on those, we successfully created our Tressh flame light before Christmas, and guarantee it will be shipped before Christmas Eve

Risk&Challenge--Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. However, with all accessories already, we can confidently say that we are already familiar with the Crowdfunding process. We well know what Christmas holiday means to us. Most importantly, the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will be there to help you and do not hesitate to let us know, we are glad to talk to every one of you.

 

Get it now for your Christmas gift

And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will be there to help you and do not hesitate to let us know, we are glad to talk to every one of you. Get it now for your Christmas gift

story:
Introducing Megi, an awe-inspiring floating lamp powered through the air like magic. As the name implies, Megi inspires memories of magic, mystery, and fantasy. Our busy lives and daily responsibilities are a heavy burden that we all carry. Watching Megi levitating in mid-air evokes a meditative feeling and helps you chill out after a busy day. Megi makes any room feel cozy with soothing ambient light that creates a calm, peaceful mood. Bring Megi home now!

 

Lately,  we have found there is another web selling our Megi. We are currently only selling it on Kickstarter and this web does not get any approval from our team. Please be aware of it and do not give away your bank detail, we can't assure and guarantee the credibility of it. 

 

 

For years people have been fascinated with the notion of levitation. Like the Earth itself, floating along in the universe. This year, time to elevate the style of your home with a completely unique lamp. Megi is a levitating lamp that hovers using magnetic levitation and its light is powered by induction. Illuminate any room with style using this stunning levitating light.

 

 
  • Adjustable Brightness In Mid Air

Megi is the world’s first floating lamp capable of 3 adjustable levels of brightness while floating like magic in mid-air. Easily brighten or dim the lamp with a single touch on the base or by using voice commands. 

  • Intuitive Smart Voice-control

Megi has a powerful integrated voice-control system. Based on your commands, you can just simply turn on/off the lamp or brighten/dim the light without leaving the comfort of your sofa or bed.

 

 
  • Megi Adds Magic To Any Room

This intriguing lamp provides great ambient lighting while amazing visitors with its unique metallic lampshade which levitates in mid-air. It’s more than a lamp, it’s an incredible sight and an interesting conversation starter.

 

  •  Perfectly Matches Your Home Style 

Megi has an enchanting modern minimalist design that easily fits into any interior design style in your living spaces. It is powerful enough to use in your living room, dining room, or kitchen and with its dimmable design, it is soft enough to be used as a nightlight at the bedside.

 

  • Never Falls or Breaks

Megi is safe around children and pets. The AI-powered electromagnetic field controls the safe operating temperature of the lamp and automatically detects any approaching conductive material in advance for auto power-cut. This safety feature automatically secures the floating lamp back to the holder, in case of power outage or unintentional bumping.

  • Charges Your Devices Through The Air

Megi is the world’s only lamp that provides 5W wired fast charging through the USB-A port and 15W wireless fast charging for your electronic devices. It’s a convenient way to juice up your smartphone while you sleep. 

 

  • The Light Remains On

Megi can also work as a normal lamp when the shade and bulb are attached to the base. Just long-press the touchpad and the LED bulb will be automatically lifted and secured to the base. 

 

  •  Patented Eye-Protecting Anti-Blue Lighting  

By imitating natural sunlight, Megi projects soft and cozy eye-protecting lighting for your bedroom or office. It is the perfect lamp for reading, relaxing or working. You might be surprised to find that you sleep better after using Megi. 

 

 
  •  Prototype Test Video 

 

For years people have been fascinated with the notion of levitation. Like the Earth itself, floating along in the universe, there is something natural and satisfying about its magical effect. 

 

For us, levitation is more than just a dream. After over a year of research, design, and development we have successfully conquered the intricacies of levitation. We took this intriguing phenomenon and combined it with craftsmanship and dedication to create our latest invention, the Megi Floating Lamp.

We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, and messages via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!

We took this intriguing phenomenon and combined it with craftsmanship and dedication to create our latest invention, the Megi Floating Lamp.
 

 
We’ll be adding new FAQs as we go along, and we’ll be keeping you up to date with Kickstarter Updates, and messages via the Comment wall. And please, feel free to reach out to us!

story:
Ohmni forever transforms how you stay connected to family miles away.  It's a totally different experience from any Skype or FaceTime call.

Just put Ohmni somewhere you want to be.  Maybe you have aging parents that live on their own, family on another continent, or work that takes you away from home often.

Now from anywhere in the world, call into Ohmni in one click.  You’re there instantly, in the robot. You have full control.  Look at what you want to.  Go where you want to.  It’s freeing, and feels amazingly natural.
 


The other side is also free from the burden of constantly managing what you see. They don’t have to lift a finger to hang out with you.  No setting up a laptop or tablet, no stopping what they’re doing just to answer a call.  

Ohmni lets you focus on what really matters - spending great time together.


"With my grandma living in her own house alone, it's so important to check on her frequently. In the past, phone calls have been short and it's hard to tell how she's really doing. Being able to see, hear, and connect with her at any time has been life changing. I've also noticed that my grandma gets really excited each time we call. It's really a new joy for her :)" - Anne Y., Ohmni beta user

 

"Rosie, the robot from 'The Jetsons', has arrived." - Constance Gustke, New York Times

"The Ohmni telepresence robot has already helped one man save his mother's life." - Kelly McSweeny, ZDNet

"Ohmni home robot makes video chats feel like they're IRL... Move over, FaceTime and Skype?", Kaya Yurieff, CNN

“Aging populations, and the issue of how to address changing modes of family life that can see members more distantly separated … Ohmni might be one answer that’s available now” - Darrell Etherington, TechCrunch

"Ohmni is a telepresence platform that can move around a home and allow distant family members to feel like they’re sitting right there around the table." - Dean Takahashi, Venture Beat
 

 


The most amazing thing about Ohmni is what people do with it.  We’ve gotten countless stories from our testers. From thousands of miles away, they’re doing things like:

  • cooking with grandma in the kitchen
  • watching a show or basketball game together
  • hanging out on the deck for family BBQ
  • helping troubleshooting electrical problems around the house
  • joining in for family movie night (yes, the whole movie!)

The incredible thing is none of this was pre-planned.  Families naturally did these types of things as they started using Ohmni.

Have more fun and do the stuff you miss too.  Don't let distance be a barrier. Check out more user stories further down on the page!

 

Ohmni sits on the charging dock so that it's always topped up and ready to go. Most people put Ohmni in a corner of their kitchen, living room, or study.


1. Call in with one click, from anywhere in the world

Log in from our website. You'll see your Ohmni robots. Click on one to call in.  

No one needs to answer on the other side. Ohmni announces your arrival so the people on the other side know you're there.


2. Enjoy hanging out together

Drive and look around easily using the arrow keys or mouse/touchpad. Roll up to the kitchen or dinner table, or over to the sofa.  Join in with whatever's going on. 


3. When you're done, go back to the dock

Drive near the dock and press a button to autodock.  Ohmni parks itself! The magnetic contacts lock in and the light turns blue to indicate charging.  Ready for the next call!

 


"I like it even better than Skype and FaceTime because it's like they're in a body here with me!" - Thelma A., Ohmni Beta User in SF Bay Area

Ohmni is specifically built to amplify human presence.  We tested generations of prototypes to hit upon the right combination of hardware, software, and design.
 


Ohmni is human height (4' 8") to give you the most natural view of the world, and allows the other side to interact with Ohmni naturally whether they're standing or sitting.

The fluid moving neck gives you huge freedom.  Look up to the ceiling or all the way down to the floor.

Our control interface, MotionMap, pulls everything together and makes it feel really human.   Small motions and gestures with the touchpad or mouse control how the robot moves and looks around, just like a first person game.  Nod with just a flick of the finger.
 


It's super easy too. Most people are comfortable controlling Ohmni after just a minute or two, and become pros once they've called in a few times.  It's the closest you can get to being there.

 


 

"The robot is a godsend, it's just like I am there with her.  I can't praise the product enough.  It's so simple, so incredibly simple."

- Nancy Zaslove, owner of Eiko's Sushi in Napa Valley, CA

Nancy lives an hour away from her mother. She used to drive back and forth just to say hi and spend 30 minutes together. With Ohmni, she now can visit her mother almost daily. Last week, they just played hide-and-seek together over Ohmni.


"I was amazed - no way can I get that kind of interaction with my family using Skype."

- Jonathan Rugge, CIO, Ohmni Beta User

Jonathan is a busy businessman who often travels abroad. He missed all the small but precious moments at home with his family. Now he can just call into Ohmni whenever he is away. Last time, his 5 yr old son held onto Ohmni and said, 'Dad come watch a show with me!'


"At first, we were skeptical grandma would accept a cutting-edge robot, but within seconds she understood its power - the ability to experience her loved ones in a new and profound way."

- Ping Y., CEO of Stemonix.

Ping lives 1000 miles from his 94-year-old grandma. He could only visit once in every few months. Now he can have a face to face chat over dinner with her, or have her see her great granddaughter dance and sing! He notices that their conversations are 10-20x longer.

 




 

 


 

 

Amazing video and audio

Dual ultra wide angle cameras with low-light optimization. See the whole room naturally and navigate with confidence.

Far field mic and powerful speaker. Hear and be heard across the whole house.


Effortless setup

Fully assembled and ready to go out of the box.  WiFi can be pre-programmed before shipping. Just unfold and turn on.  

Share access to Ohmni by Google/Facebook account, or by e-mail address.


Enhanced privacy

Toggles to Do Not Disturb mode with one touch. Faces the wall when docked to maximize privacy.

Encrypted end-to-end video and audio streaming - only accessible by you and your family.

 

Smooth and silent motion

Ultra-quiet Glide Drive technology minimizes disturbance.

 

Confident driving

Large front wheels. Handles any cables, small bumps, or carpets.


Light and portable design

Only 18 pounds. Bring it out on the patio or upstairs. Or fold it up and take it around in your car. Slim and unobtrusive.


Ultra-long battery life

5 hours in call + autodocking = never worry about keeping it charged.


Cloud management
 

Configure, manage, and update from the cloud.  Ohmni keeps getting better over time.

 

 


 

We're huge proponents of rapid prototyping and getting real world feedback. Over the last 2 years, we iterated through 9 generations of Ohmni, allowing us to tailor the design to meet our user’s needs. In the last 6 months, we have built and shipped 76 units as far as France, Japan, Taiwan, and Vietnam.

Most importantly, we're manufacturing in-house, in Silicon Valley, USA, for the following key reasons:

  1. Increased control over entire process and quality.
  2. Continuous improvement by applying Lean Manufacturing principles.
  3. Independence from overseas contract manufacturer schedules, delays, and large up-front costs.
  4. Optimal choices of BOM, suppliers and part alternatives for reduced lead-time and inventory management.
  5. Pull production with Kanban to achieve just-in-time manufacturing.

Although it was not an easy path, we achieved our vision of making a hardware company that iterates quickly and strives for continual improvement. We, in turn, expect to have less execution risk and reduced costs that we can pass on to our backers.



 




 


 


 

Q: Where do you ship?

We're shipping to most countries in the following regions. Any countries not in the region that we specified, please contact us directly.

North America: US, Canada

Asia Pacific : Taiwan, Singapore, Hong Kong, Japan, Vietnam, ...

Western Europe: UK, France, Sweden, Germany, Most of EU, ...

Australasia: Australia, New Zealand
 

Q: How much does shipping cost?

Shipping rates are based on region. If your country is not shown on this list but resides in the same region, it will likely have the same rates.

These are reference rates quoted by our shipper. We’ve experts working on reducing these costs right now and will likely get better rates as more orders come in. We’re only collecting shipping costs after the campaign ends so you’re guaranteed to pay only the lowest rates we’ve secured.

Base Rate: $60

Continental US: Base Rate

US Hawaii, Alaska:  Base Rate + $200

Canada: Base Rate + $100

Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Vietnam: Base Rate + $100

Japan, Korea: Base Rate + $200

Australia, New Zealand: Base Rate + $300  

Europe (UK, France, Germany, Italy): Base Rate + $120

Europe (Switzerland, Spain, Sweden): Base Rate + $170
 

Q: How do I pay for shipping?

Shipping will be charged separately from your claimed perks. We’ll be sending you a survey after the campaign ends to gather information like shipping addresses. A separate shipping charge invoice will be generated for you to pay online via your credit card after we’ve locked down on the lowest shipping costs.
 

Q: What about duties and taxes?

Duties and taxes differs significantly for different countries. We’re currently working with our shipping experts to determine duties and taxes for each country we will be shipping to. From our initial experience with shipping in the US and to Asia Pacific and European countries, there are no duties involved. Canada customs will likely charge duties + GST/PST.

Units shipped to California will require us to charge California sales tax.

Please contact us if you have more specific questions about duties and taxes.
 

Q: When will you start shipping?

Ohmni will be shipped according to the order of backers; the faster you claim your perks, the earlier you will get your Ohmni. We plan to start shipping by October 2017.
 

Q: Do I need to provide my own tablet for Ohmni?

No. Our goal is simplicity.  The tablet is fully integrated and installed and configured with our own Ohmni Android firmware.  
 

Q: Does Ohmni charge wirelessly?

No. Today's wireless charging technology would charge too slowly and would be more expensive. We use our custom designed magnetic contact system developed over 6 generations of charging docks.
 

Q: How long does it take Ohmni to charge?

For every hour of use, Ohmni needs one hour of charging.

 

Q: Does the dock change color when charging is complete?

No. You can check the battery levels on our web app anytime. 
 

Q: Can I take Ohmni outside?

Although Ohmni can handle small bumps in the home, it is not meant for outdoor terrains. It is also not waterproof. However, we do regularly take Ohmni out to show-off. We use hotspot sharing from our phones to supply an internet connection for Ohmni. Be careful and stick to smoother surfaces and Ohmni can definitely be taken outside. 
 

Q: What about stairs?

Ohmni does not handle stairs at the moment. However, at 18 lbs and foldable, it is light enough to carried up and down stairs. 
 

Q: What are the system requirements?
The caller should have access to the Chrome browser, a webcam, and a working mic. Ohmni needs only a WiFi connection to operate. Like any other video chat, good WiFi/internet connection is needed on both sides of the call to enjoy high-quality video and audio streams. We recommend at least a 5 Mbps download and 2 Mbps upload internet connection. 

Calling from iPhone Chrome browser is currently not supported but we are planning to add support later this year.

Ohmni needs only a WiFi connection to operate. Like any other video chat, good WiFi/internet connection is needed on both sides of the call to enjoy high-quality video and audio streams. We recommend at least a 5 Mbps download and 2 Mbps upload internet connection. Calling from iPhone Chrome browser is currently not supported but we are planning to add support later this year.

story:
Hello! my name is Takeshi and I am a mexican designer who lives in Italy...

I have long worked with functional objects and that is the reason I have created lautak, as a line of useful things that seek to be:

simple - like an old toy
pure - as the scent of wood
& honest - by showing exactly how things are built

 

 

 

- WHATCH THE SHOWREEL -

 

 

 

 

It all starts with the desk that you can open (to work) or close (if you want to see order or hide your precious laptop ). It then comes the trolley where to set the printer and extend the working surface and finally the stool-chair which you can use in many ways.

 

the desk: CHECK FUNCTIONS AND DIMENSIONS

 

 

 

 

the chair: CHECK FUNCTIONS AND DIMENSIONS

 

 
 
 

the trolley: CHECK FUNCTIONS AND DIMENSIONS

 

 

 

 

the whole SET

The three pieces complement each other to create a multifunctional and very comfortable place to work.

You can also stack them together and move them around if needed!

 

 

What We Need & What You Get

The minimum goal is to finance the production of 50 units of each piece of furniture;

every piece passes through more than one hand and process, some of them are simplified thanks to today's computer assisted machines but still most of lautak's furniture require a big deal of handcraft and its result is QUALITY!

After reaching the goal you will receive....:

a multi purpose, extremely useful object - made with real beech wood and birch plywood, treated with natural oils and antiscratch paint where most needed and most specially, designed with high care!

here are the times:

 

In the case that we do not reach our entire goal we will still produce whatever is requested in the agreed terms... but we strongly wish to achieve it in order to simplify the production process and cut down its cost!

 

The PRODUCTION team!

The production combines the workforce of local (italian) woodworking carpentries + the direct work of lautak team, meet the crew:

 

 

The Impact

It is not only about bringing some furniture to life, but about financing the production of objects made with quality, by all means.

Lautak's focus is on doing things that seem "right" among the many objects that are currently being produced and that after short or long end up being a hassle for us and the environment. I believe things done with quality are voice spreaders of "what is good".

 

Risks & Challenges

The risk started months ago, when i decided to gather all my energy and go for what I have long desired: to try and spread my ideas and designs.

The big initial challenge was to refine every detail of this furniture; I spent months fighting with screws that unscrewed, mechanisms that where not easy to handle, parts that risked to brake... and finally that is all over, detail after detail the final product has come to stay.

Now it is time to spread the voice and inspire curiosity by a large amount of people. The final challenge will be to handle a high quality applied handcraft production... but there is no other way than that. We are on the boat!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You can talk about it, share it by voice or finger!
may you wish you could afford some of these but still it is not on your budget...? there is a special reward for you!

story:
Designed in Italy, MUtable is the design-oriented alternative to your child’s everyday play table, but paired with the flexibility and durability of a table that will last your family for years.

MUtable 2.0 offers so many playing options that your kids will never stop having fun!   

MUtable 2.0 includes 4 double-sided playboards that stack on top of each other.     

Every MUtable includes all 4 height options, enabled by easily switching the table's legs. This way MUtable grows with your kid, all the way up to 8 years old!

 * MUtable is certified as toy for use from 3 years old

MUtable and its chairs come in five different colors, Mauve, Mint, White, Dove Gray and Tiffany, that you can mix and match according to your interior design style. 

When playtime's over, kids can easily push all the toys into the hole in the center to drop everything into the toy storage bag underneath. 

When they want to change games, they just need to flip the board and change bag. You can even organize different toys into different Toy Bags!

On each side of the table there is the option to attach up to 3 Side Toy Holders, a convenient cup-like container to store pencils and small toys. 

The Lego ® Tower is an extension of the Lego ® base, enabling kids to play on up to 3 different levels of Lego ®! Every level is double sided and compatible with both the Lego ® Duplo ® and classic Lego ®. 

Mix up the interchangeable scenarios to boost your kids' creativity!  More scenarios to choose from will be available after the campaign.

Pretend play has never been so much fun: with just one playhouse you will get 4 different environments to play and up to 24 rooms! No screws are needed to build the house and so it can be easily stored flat when is not used! You can choose between 2 different play houses:

Dolls House: includes a family house, a playground, a kindergarten and a museum!

Heroes House: includes a police station, a fireman station, a superhero cave and a mountain lodge

Board games are a fantastic way to exercise logic and tactical skills... but they can also be a way to learn new things! We developed 3 board games on 3 themes that are important for kids.

DISKcover Geography: On the double-sided map board, your child will travel around the globe and learn some of the main cultures and animals in the World! 

DISKcover History: Jump on your time machine and take a journey through time discovering some of the most relevant characters of human history! 

DISKcover Fruit & Vegetables: Two different games on one single board! On one side, an orchard where your child will take an adventurous trial picking fruit from trees and protecting it from spiteful insects, and twists. On the other side, a vegetable garden where to discover and grow many different vegetables! 

Puzzles are the best way to stimulate your kids creativity and critical thinking! We developed 6 round puzzles that perfectly fit the MUtable puzzle base. 

More space for more fun! The extension is a steady additional panel that will increase the surface of your MUtable. Up to 6 kids can play or have a seat at the same time...for twice the fun! Use the extension to let your kids play with their friends, have a meal or just have fun with bigger toys. And it is super easy to assemble; just place it on top of the table and fix it with the solid locks below. 

Included with the extension you will receive an additional disk to store pens and small toys and leave the surface even. 

With the cover, you can protect the MUtable and let your kids play without worries. This silicone top perfectly fits MUtable and shields it from any kind of damage from colors, water, food... 

Additionally, when you don't use it, the cover can be a convenient holder for all your MUtable disks!

Not only do MUtable chairs match perfectly with the table color of your choice, but they will also adjust to the four different heights with the table, ranging from a seat height of 23.5cm to 36cm. 

A backrest is included with each chair, but it can be removed to transform the MUtable chair into a stool comfortable for grown up players as well. 

You can add as many chairs as you wish with your MUtable... they are optional as we know that kids love to play in different ways!

   

Also featured in: 

MUtable is 71.6cm large and each playboard has a diameter of 54cm. The extension is 98cm (38.5in) large.

Here you also find a table with all possible heights you can adjust your MUtable and chairs too! 

We are so thankful for checking out our project and helping us spreading the word!

April 2017: First Campaign
June 2017: Indiegogo Campaign InDemand Launch 
November 2017: Delivery First Campaign
February 2018: Second Campaign
April 2018: Indiegogo Campaign InDemand Launch
February - July 2018: Production of New Games & Accessories
June 2018: Advanced delivery of only MUtable to North America and Europe
August - September 2018: Shipping & Delivery


 
 
 We are so thankful for checking out our project and helping us spreading the word!

story:
Short Summary

  • Am technology application engineer and consultant and have been developing technology solutions independently last 5 years - refer Design HMI LLC
  • Am a hot coffee and tea drinker both when at work and socially. Unfortunately hot coffee or tea gets cold very quickly in cup requiring frequent refills.Reheating the coffee or tea in cup reduces taste and is not user friendly and cumbersome.In addition fast (< 15 minutes) limits drinking pleasure in social / office environment.

  • Heating plates require beverage drinker to stay in place, make bottom part hot white top drinking area stays lukewarm, need very handy power outlet, hot touch – not kid friendly.

  • Solution: Integrate auto warming & temperature control in 8-10 oz. cup base with power pack for 25+ cup servings that only need to recharge once a week.Introduce yourself and your background.

  • Through your contribution hope to complete design, test and validate to make coffee cup which can then be styled based on consumers unique desires.

What We Need & What You Get

Need funding of $228,000 per details below.
  • # Particulars Amount
    1 Complete production intent design drawings w/CAD $20,000
    2 Molding tools for cup and lining $35,000
    3 Battery / power pack design and application specific tooling $45,000
    4 Soft insulation layer $4,000
    5 Temperature light guide ring $4,000
    6 PCBA design and testing $45,000
    7 Assembly testing and validation $35,000
    8 Reliability documentation $20,000
    9 Travel & other engineering overheads (10% of total) $20,800
    TOTAL $228,800
    For the contributor not only will you have contributed to the develoopment of a consumer oriantated solution but you will also be the 1st to get one free sample.
  • If I do not reach my entire goal will need to make up from family and friends or through a loan.

The Impact

Look waste is not good and we all deserve to use what we have to the maximum. Currently with the hot beverage getting cold before you have had chance to drink results in wastage. Very important if you are on a fixed budget.

As stated please review my WEB Site for current track record at www.designhmi.com

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute please recommend to others or coffee shops like STARBUCKS.

story:
We are a small company with a Vision, make faucets which have as Role model a Smartphone, affordable for everyone!

All products are selectable for the US and European market.

We only can reach our goal, if you help us. 

Thank you!


    Heating plumbing Krause was founded in 1989 as a workshop 

    2008, the expansion of the company with an embedded Online Store 

    since 2010 we have several own brands  

    the development of new digital valves has already been funded by us, your support will be invested completely and 100% in the production and acceptance of products developed 

    All fittings are of course protected in the Designs Register 

    A first glimpse of the products already developed and marketed, can be found in our webshop: www.hskshop24.com

We need financial support in the extensive Production / the result is that the operation of bathroom fittings such as can be performed on the smartphone, and that to affordable price and affordable for everyone

    80% of the required capital is used directly for the production costs, the remaining 20% goes to acceptance and transportation / or marketing costs 

    Think to continue on the success of smartphones, this is at your home in the bathroom by comfort and design 

    If the targeted amount can not be reached, we are depending on the amount, we invest this amount in the production of a smaller number of units.

The effect

    built new working places in production, marketing and selling

    intelligent bath control, more comfort, more effective use of energy than conventional faucets 

    saving water

    make the planet smarter

    Part One: get 20.000 € starts extensive & affordable basin faucet production





Part two: get 50.000 € starts
extensive & affordable basin faucet & shower production


Part three: get 75.000 € starts
extensive & affordable
basin faucet & shower & panel production 


                                                                                                                                                                                                      

Part four: get 100.000 € starts
extensive & affordable basin faucet & shower & panel & magic mirror production 






Other ways you can help

If you or your friend may have a remodeling your bathroom in mind, please do not hesitate our webshop / propose products. 

Maybe we already have the thing for you in the program, so you can also support our new projects.


Thank you !!!

your hskshop24 Team    
www.hskshop24.com

story:
Short Summary

A high percentage of America's low income population is wounded veterans. Heroes Housing Alliance is helping to correct this disparity in Santa Fe. We have secured 7 acres in the heart of town, with easy access to shopping and medical services. We will help build 32 green affordable homes for veterans and low income families that will accommodate special needs when necessary.

 

There are limited facilities where veterans with special needs can go when they are released from the hospital. Many are forced to rely on the generosity of relatives or friends. Others are forced to live in assisted care institutions where their freedom and privacy are limited. Heroes Housing Alliance is passionate about providing the independence and dignity that our veterans have earned by defending our country. Heroes Housing Alliance feels it is time for us to step up and give back to those who have given so much.

Heroes Housing Alliance is a New Mexico 501c3. the city of Santa Fe is our fiscal agent. State funding will become available as soon as the Morris Engineering divides the 32 lots into three phases.   This Indiegogo campaign will raise the $14,000 needed for Morris Engineering to this preliminary work. Our ribbon cutting ceremony was March 22, 2014.

Here is a recent newspaper article about Heroes Housing Alliance

http://www.santafenewmexican.com/news/business/oriject-aims-to-provide-affordable-housing-for-wounded-veterans/article_c9a6120e-686d-505b-821a-2fb042ee2821.html

Other Ways You Can Help

All contributions are tax deductible. If you can't make a contribution of money, you can still help realize our dream by getting the word out to friends and family. Please post our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or other social media. You can use the Indiegogo share tools. Thank you for your support!

story:
This is a long and horrible story and it only gets worse. My friends Tina and James who live aboard their Islander 29 just lost everything they own in a fire. They jumped the gun and cancelled their insurance a week ago because they had sold the boat to a friend but he had not yet taken possession, or title. They had hired a mechanic from Craigslist to work on their Atomic 4 engine before changing ownership. Somehow it burst into flames. He has 20 years experience, but hey, shit happens. The mechanic is a single dad raising his daughter alone. He now has third degree burns from his elbows down to his fingertips, and tons of medical bills.

Tina and James are homeless with just the clothes on their back. Imagine being at work an hour away and getting that call, "um, we think your boat is on fire". Imagine rushing home to find a pile of ash, and an even bigger pile of bills. Who knows what the USCG will fine them for polluting the marina, yet to be determined. Imagine starting over. We can all point fingers in any direction, clearly so many things happened here that shouldn't have happened. It doesn't change the bottom line which is, they lost everything. Please help them rebuild their lives. Please help them so all the bills they acquire aren't piled in the mailbox of a man who just lost the use of both hands. A small contribution from you is everything to them. 

Added: 

Tina and James have decided to split the funds raised with the mechanic to aid in his recovery. We have almost reached our goal in one day! I guess I underestimated everyone's generosity. Their boat cost $7000 so let's just keep the momentum up for both families! Thank you all again and again!!!

story:
Here's the Deal...

blueEnergy delivers energy, water, and sanitation to some of the world’s most isolated, marginalized communities, providing a foundation for health, education and economic opportunity in a climate change reality.  

We are focused on transforming lives on the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua, the poorest region of the second poorest country in the Western Hemisphere, where nearly 80% of the population does not have access to energy and clean water.  With your support, our work is turning a corner in this region, where we have served over 20,000 people and you can feel the momentum shift on the ground!  This year we introduced initiatives in solid waste management and climate change adaptation which are already having a tremendous impact.

You can feel confident that your investment will go a long way as we leverage our field work beyond Nicaragua through on-the-ground learning, training of future leaders and sharing through strategic partnerships.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $12,000 through this campaign to serve the people on the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua that are depending on us.  We could send you trinkets and knickknacks to thank you but that takes time and money and we're pretty sure you'd rather have us focus our attention and resources on changing lives in Nicaragua.

The Impact

Founded in 2004, blueEnergy works with isolated communities in Nicaragua to develop solutions that can be applied worldwide.  We have been extensively recognized for our innovative work by CNN Heroes, Larry King Live, the Tech Awards, the Energy Globe Awards, and the Ashoka Fellowship.

We have served over 20,000 people in Nicaragua and invite all of our supporters to come visit us in the field to see our impact firsthand.

You can read about our impact on the blueNews: http://bluenews.blueenergygroup.org/

Other Ways You Can Help,

You can help us spread the word by posting our campaign on your Facebook page and liking ours: https://www.facebook.com/like.blueEnergy.  If you want to follow our work, you can also subscribe to our newsletter, the blueNews: http://bluenews.blueenergygroup.org

---

Please note that the specific impacts listed with each donation amount are for illustrative purposes only and that every gift to blueEnergy represents a gift to our total mission of improving health, capacity and economic development opportunities for the isolated poor.

Contents

Meet FurniQi How does Wireless Charging work?
In the Media Our Perks
Compatibility Why Support FurniQi?
FAQ



While technology is getting more and more important to our everyday lives, it also brings a mass of cables and plugs with every single gadget you buy, cluttering our homes. FurniQi is an elegant solution to all that. A wireless charging side table that does its job so well it naturally fits into your life.


▲

In the Media

Don’t just take our word for it - see what others have to say!

 


▲

Check Out Video Impressions of FurniQi

Meet FurniQi

It is, first and foremost, a simple and elegant bamboo side table.

To make FurniQi extra special, we added some wireless charging magic!

Just drop your phone on the table to charge, then pick up & go!

FurniQi works with  many devices!

It is made of Mao Zhu Bamboo, an amazingly versatile and sustainable material that makes it a perfect starting point for FurniQi.

It fits anywhere.

FurniQi comes with a standard caramel-colored USB cable that matches the look of the table. As a result, you can use any of the USB wall adapters, or a myriad of other power sources including the QiStone+.

FurniQi is resistant to daily mishaps. Designed for living, made for life.


Thanks to an optional audible notification and a carefully lasered impression to indicate charging spot, FurniQi is easy to use even at night, without turning the lights on.

FurniQi is a breeze to assemble! You can be ready to charge in mere minutes.



▲

Our Perks


QiStone+ is an elegant portable Wireless Charging Power Bank that allows you to charge any Qi-enabled device on the go.

WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition is a stationary wireless charger for your home and office, crafted with all details considered using Mao Zhu Bamboo.


▲

What makes FurniQi different from IKEA?


Why support FurniQi?

We, Fonesalesman, made Wireless Charging for the iPhone possible here on Indiegogo with the iQi Mobile. We surpassed our initial goal by more than 500%. Next, we went Completely Wireless with the QiStone+ and brought design to wireless charging with the Nature-Infused WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition which was a proving ground for what would become FurniQi of today.

FurniQi is a whole different ball game for us as a team. We know our wireless charging, but are new to the world of furniture. We have decided that this risk was worth taking on as, in our eyes, FurniQi is the future of charging. In order to succeed in fighting the giants of the furniture world, we need your support and feedback; which is why Indiegogo is an ideal platform for FurniQi to materialize on.

But what’s in it for you, anyway? Obviously, an awesome wireless charging side table. However, you can also help us in realizing this project by selecting from the range of amazing perks - all of them incredibly useful and brilliantly easy to use. All the backers get our eternal gratitude & love, of course. 

Oh, and don’t forget to spread the word!


▲

How does Wireless Charging work?

Qi Wireless Charging isn’t all Hocus-Pocus and Mysterious Voodoo. Wireless power transfers through electromagnetic induction, which means that with inductive charging, power reaches the device through electromagnetic fields instead of through a traditional cable. You need a transmitter (a wireless charging pad) and a receiver to charge your device. Receivers are either built into the device already, such as with the Samsung S6, or they can be easily installed onto a device, like the iPhone.


▲

Is my phone compatible?

There are many Qi compatible devices on the market. Here are the main ones:


Qi built-in devices

Qi upgradeable devices

  • Motorola Google Nexus 6

  • Motorola Moto 360

  • Motorola Moto Droid Turbo

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 5

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge +

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge

  • Samsung Galaxy S6

  • LG Google Nexus 5

  • LG Google Nexus 4

  • LG G3

  • LG Optimus G Pro

  • Nokia Lumia 950 XL

  • Nokia Lumia 735

  • Nokia Lumia 830

  • Nokia Lumia 930

  • Nokia Lumia 929/Icon

  • HTC Droid DNA

  • HTC 8X (USA only)

  • HTC Thunderbolt

  • More

  • Apple iPhone 5 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5C with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 4 with N4 SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy Alpha with Alpha SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy S5 with S5 SlimPWRcard

  • LG G4 with G4 SlimPWRpatch*

  • More

Can't find your device? Please visit our dedicated compatibility page to find out if it is Qi compatible!


▲

FurniQi FAQ

1. What is FurniQi? 

FurniQi is a sleek and stylish side table that incorporates wireless charging stations to make recharging your phone that one step easier. It is a contemporary and functional concept of furniture, designed to fit seamlessly into the modern home.

2.  Why is it called FurniQi and how is it pronounced?

The Chinese term for energy is ‘Qi’ (pronounced ‘Chee’). Thus, the essence of the product: furniture and energy we merged to create FurniQi. Qi is also the most common wireless standard and has been around for a long time - large corporations like Samsung and Google have already implemented this technology in their phones, but it is also used in other devices like the Motorola Moto 360 Smartwatch.

3. How does it work?

FurniQi uses wireless charging technology to charge your phone just by placing it on the charging spot (no wires necessary!). Wireless power transfers through electromagnetic induction, which means that with inductive charging, power reaches the device through electromagnetic fields instead of through a traditional cable.

4. Is it completely wireless?

In terms of charging your phone, yes it is. However, in order to power the charging station, FurniQi will need to be plugged in (using a very discreet cable).

5. What is FurniQi made out of?

The FurniQi side table is built using Hand-Harvested Mao Zhu Bamboo (grown in China), surpassing the appearance of wood. This type of bamboo grows ten times quicker than wood, making it possible to be harvested and utilized in an incredibly sustainable way. Next, we infused the bamboo table with a dash of our Wireless Charging magic, making it pleasing for the eye, but also an unbelievably useful object.

6.  Does it come in different colours or sizes?

At this stage, FurniQi only comes in one size and colour. However, dependent on demand/success of the initial Indiegogo campaign, we will consider extending the FurniQi range.  

7. How many  charging spots are there?

At the moment, FurniQi has only one charging spot (except if you’re getting the ‘Table for Two’ perk which includes FurniQi with two charging spots). However, depending on feedback from the launch campaign, we will consider all options and the product may be updated. 

8.   Will all smartphones work with FurniQi?

FurniQi incorporates wireless charging that works with Qi compatible smartphones or receivers. Receivers are either built into the device already, such as with the Samsung S6, or they can be easily installed onto a device, like the iPhone. For more information on phone compatibility, please visit the following link:  http://www.fonesalesman.com/pages/qi-enabled-mobiles.

9. Can I use FurniQi like any other table?

Yes. With the function of a table in mind, the wireless charging station has been completely water sealed. Water on the surface of the table will not be a hazard or cause any damage to the wireless charger.

10. When will I receive my FurniQi?

A few early panda backers will be the lucky ones to receive their FurniQi’s before  Christmas; the rest will be shipped post-campaign in March 2016.

11. Is FurniQi compatible with Duracell Powermat?

No, FurniQi is not compatible with Duracell Powermat. Our devices are based on Qi Wireless Standard, supported by companies such as Samsung, Google, Microsoft, LG, Sony, others. Our devices are supported by a wide variety of retailers, including McDonalds, International Airports, Marriott Hotels, and many others.

Duracell Powermat products are based on PMA technology and are supported by companies such as AT&T. PMA devices can be used in the Starbucks chain of cafeterias. General Motors vehicles only support PMA.

We chose to pursue a more popular standard which is widely supported, has larger numbers of participating retailers and has larger numbers of supported accessories you could use our products with.

12. How do I add $10 to get a receiver for my phone?

Underneath every perk you can add 'Additional Gift' to your contribution, so if you put $10 in there we know that we need to send you the receivers. We will get in touch to find out which receiver you wish to get at a later date.


Sommaire

À la découverte de FurniQi Comment fonctionne la recharge sans fil ?
Dans les Médias Nos Avantages
Compatibilité Pourquoi soutenir FurniQi ?
FAQ



De plus en plus de technologie s'accumule dans votre maison, et des câbles s'ajoutent à tous les nouveaux gadgets que vous achetez. FurniQi est une solution élégante à ce désordre. Cette table basse avec recharge sans fil s’intègre naturellement dans votre vie.


▲

Dans les médias

Ne vous fiez pas uniquement à ce qu’on dit, voyez plutôt ce que les autres en pensent !

 


▲

À la découverte de FurniQi

FurniQi est avant tout une table basse élégante faite en bambou qui s'intègre aisément dans une multitude de pièces et de situations.

Pour rendre FurniQi très spéciale, nous avons ajouté un peu de magie grâce à la recharge sans fil !

Il suffit de déposer son téléphone sur la table pour le recharger, et voilà !

FurniQi fonctionne avec de  nombreux appareils !

Elle est fabriquée en Bambou Mao Zhu, un matériau incroyablement polyvalent et durable qui en a fait un point de départ idéal pour FurniQi.

FurniQi peut être installée de partout !

FurniQi est livrée avec un câble USB standard de couleur caramel qui correspond à l'apparence de la table. Ainsi, vous pouvez utiliser l'un des adaptateurs USB muraux, ou une myriade d'autres sources d'énergie, y compris la  QiStone+.

FurniQi est résistante aux accidents et gaffes du quotidien.


Grâce à une notification sonore optionnelle et une impression soigneusement gravée au laser pour indiquer la zone de recharge, FurniQi est facile à utiliser même pendant la nuit, toutes lumières éteintes.

FurniQi est un jeu d'enfant à assembler ! Vous pouvez être prêt à recharger en quelques minutes.



▲

Nos Perks


QiStone+ est une batterie externe rechargeable sans fil, élégante et portable, vous permettant de recharger tout appareil compatible Qi lors de vos déplacement.

WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition est un chargeur sans fil stationnaire pour votre maison et bureau, fait en Bambou Mao Zhu.


▲

Pourquoi soutenir FurniQi ?

Chez Fonesalesman, nous avons rendu possible la recharge sans fil pour iPhone grâce à Indiegogo et l’ iQi Mobile. Nous avons dépassé notre objectif initial de plus de 500%. Nous sommes donc passés à une option complètement sans-fil avec la QiStone+ et avons apporté une touche de design à la recharge sans fil avec le WoodPuck : Bamboo Edition qui était un terrain d'essai pour ce qui allait devenir FurniQi d'aujourd'hui.

FurniQi est un tout nouveau défi pour nous en tant qu’équipe. Nous connaissons bien notre domaine, mais nous sommes nouveaux dans le monde du mobilier. Nous avons décidé de prendre le risque car nous sommes persuadés qu’il en vaut la peine. À nos yeux, FurniQi est l'avenir du chargement des appareils technologiques. Afin de réussir dans la bataille contre les géants du monde du mobilier, nous avons besoin de votre soutien et de vos commentaires ; et c’est la raison pour laquelle Indiegogo est une plateforme idéale pour la concrétisation de FurniQi.

Mais quels sont les avantages pour vous ? Évidemment, une magnifique table basse pour la recharge sans fil. Cependant, vous pouvez également nous aider à la réalisation de ce projet en choisissant parmi un large éventail de perks, tous incroyablement utiles et très faciles à utiliser. Bien évidemment, tous ceux qui participeront au projet obtiennent notre reconnaissance & notre amour éternels.

Oh, et n'oubliez pas de prêcher la bonne parole !


▲

Comment la Recharge Sans Fil fonctionne ?

La Recharge Sans Fil Qi n’est pas du tout un Abracadabra ou un mystère Vaudou. L’énergie Sans Fil se transfère par induction électromagnétique, ce qui signifie que, avec la recharge inductive, l’énergie atteint l'appareil à travers les champs électromagnétiques au lieu de passer par un câble traditionnel. Vous avez besoin d'un émetteur (le chargeur sans fil) et d’un récepteur QI pour recharger votre appareil. Les récepteurs sont soit déjà intégrés dans l’appareil, c’est le cas du Samsung S6, ou bien ils peuvent être facilement installés sur un téléphone, comme avec l'iPhone par exemple.


▲

Mon téléphone est-il compatible ?

Il existe de nombreux appareils compatibles Qi sur le marché. En voici les principaux :


Appareils avec Qi intégré

Appareils pouvant être adapté à l’aide d’un récepteur Qi

  • Motorola Google Nexus 6

  • Motorola Moto 360

  • Motorola Moto Droid Turbo

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 5

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge +

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge

  • Samsung Galaxy S6

  • LG Google Nexus 5

  • LG Google Nexus 4

  • LG G3

  • LG Optimus G Pro

  • Nokia Lumia 950 XL

  • Nokia Lumia 735

  • Nokia Lumia 830

  • Nokia Lumia 930

  • Nokia Lumia 929/Icon

  • HTC Droid DNA

  • HTC 8X (USA only)

  • HTC Thunderbolt

  • Plus

  • Apple iPhone 5 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5C with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 4 with N4 SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy Alpha with Alpha SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy S5 with S5 SlimPWRcard

  • LG G4 with G4 SlimPWRpatch*

  • Plus

Vous ne trouvez pas votre appareil ? Veuillez visiter notre page de compatibilité dédiée pour avoir plus informations sur la compatibilité Qi !


▲

FurniQi FAQ



Contenuti

Conosci FurniQi Come Funziona la Ricarica Wireless?
Sui Media I Nostri Perks
Compatibilità Perché Supportare FurniQi?
FAQ



Mano a mano che la tecnologia diventa importante nella nostra vita quotidiana, porta con sé anche una massa di cavi e prese elettriche con ogni singolo gadget che acquistiamo, ingombrando le nostre abitazioni. FurniQi è una soluzione elegante per tutto questo. Un tavolino con ricarica wireless che fa il suo lavoro tanto bene da adattarsi naturalmente alla tua vita.


▲

Sui Media

Non credete alla nostra parola - vedete cosa hanno da dire gli altri!

 


▲

Conosci FurniQi

Si tratta, in primo luogo, di un tavolino in bambù semplice ed elegante.

Per rendere FurniQi extra speciale, abbiamo aggiunto un po' di magia della ricarica wireless!

Basta appoggiare il tuo telefono sul tavolino per caricarlo, poi prendilo & vai!

FurniQi funziona con  molti dispositivi!

È realizzato in bambù Mau Zhu, un materiale straordinariamente versatile e sostenibile che lo rende il punto di partenza perfetto per FurniQi.

Si adatta ovunque.

FurniQi è dotato di un cavo USB standard color caramello che si abbina al look del tavolo. Come risultato, potete utilizzare qualsiasi adattatore USB a muro, o una miriade di altre fonti di alimentazione inclusa la  QiStone+.

FurniQi resiste agli incidenti quotidiani. Progettato per vivere, fatto per la vita.


Grazie ad una notifica audio opzionale e ad intaglio scolpito attentamente a laser per indicare la ricarica, FurniQi è semplice da usare anche di notte, senza dover accendere le luci.

FurniQi si installa in un attimo! Potrai essere pronto a ricaricare in pochi minuti.



▲

I Nostri Perks


QiStone+ è un elegante Power Bank per la Ricarica Wireless portatile che ti consente di caricare qualsiasi dispositivo compatibile Qi in mobilità.

WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition è un caricatore wireless fisso per la casa e l'ufficio, realizzato con tutti i dettagli considerati usando Bambù Mao Zhu.


▲

Perché Supportare FurniQi?

Noi di Fonesalsesman abbiamo reso possibile la Ricarica Wireless per iPhone qui su Indiegogo con iQi Mobile. Abbiamo superato il nostro obiettivo iniziale di oltre il 500%. Successivamente, siamo andati Completamente Wireless con QiStone+ e abbiamo portato il design nella ricarica wireless con WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition ispirato alla natura, che si è dimostrato essere terreno fertile per quello che potrebbe diventare oggi FurniQi.

FurniQi rappresenta una partita totalmente diversa per noi come squadra. Conosciamo la ricarica wireless, ma siamo nuovi nel mondo dell'arredamento. Abbiamo deciso che valeva la pena correre questo rischio poiché, ai nostri occhi, FurniQi rappresenta il futuro della ricarica. Per poter avere successo nel combattere i giganti del mondo dell'arredamento, abbiamo bisogno del vostro supporto e feedback; ecco perché Indiegogo è la piattaforma ideale per far materializzare FurniQi.

Ma cosa ne guadagnate voi, ad ogni modo? Ovviamente, un fenomenale tavolino con ricarica wireless. Tuttavia, potete anche aiutarci a realizzare questo progetto selezionando dalla gamma di perks disponibili - tutti incredibilmente utili e brillantemente semplici da utilizzare. Tutti i sostenitori riceveranno naturalmente anche la nostra eterna gratitudine & amore.

Oh, e non dimenticate di spargere la voce!


▲

Come funziona la Ricarica Wireless?

La Ricarica Wireless Qi non è fatta di abracadabra e voodoo misterioso. L'alimentazione wireless viene trasferita attraverso l'induzione elettromagnetica, il che significa che con la carica induttiva, la corrente raggiunge il dispositivo attraverso i campi elettromagnetici invece che attraverso un cavo tradizionale. Avete bisogno di un trasmettitore (un pad di ricarica wireless) e di un ricevitore per caricare il vostro dispositivo. I ricevitori sono già inseriti nel dispositivo, come nel caso di Samsung S6, oppure possono essere facilmente installati in un dispositivo, come per iPhone.


▲

Il mio telefono è compatibile?

Ci sono molti dispositivi compatibili Qi sul mercato. Ecco quelli principali:


Dispositivi con Qi Incorporato

Dispositivi Aggiornabili Qi

  • Motorola Google Nexus 6

  • Motorola Moto 360

  • Motorola Moto Droid Turbo

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 5

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge +

  • Samsung Galaxy S6 Edge

  • Samsung Galaxy S6

  • LG Google Nexus 5

  • LG Google Nexus 4

  • LG G3

  • LG Optimus G Pro

  • Nokia Lumia 950 XL

  • Nokia Lumia 735

  • Nokia Lumia 830

  • Nokia Lumia 930

  • Nokia Lumia 929/Icon

  • HTC Droid DNA

  • HTC 8X (USA only)

  • HTC Thunderbolt

  • Altri

  • Apple iPhone 5 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 5C with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6 Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S with iQi Mobile

  • Apple iPhone 6S Plus with iQi Mobile

  • Samsung Galaxy Note 4 with N4 SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy Alpha with Alpha SlimPWRcard

  • Samsung Galaxy S5 with S5 SlimPWRcard

  • LG G4 with G4 SlimPWRpatch*

  • Altri

Non trovate il vostro dispositivo? Per favore visitate la nostra pagina compatibilità dedicata per scoprire se è compatibile Qi!


▲

FurniQi FAQ
