Can't find your device? Please visit our dedicated
	compatibility page
	to find out if it is Qi compatible!




▲

FurniQi FAQ


1.
	What is FurniQi? 

	FurniQi is a sleek and stylish side table that incorporates wireless charging
	stations to make recharging your phone that one step easier. It is a
	contemporary and functional concept of furniture, designed to fit seamlessly
	into the modern home.

2. 
	Why is it called FurniQi and how is it pronounced?


	The Chinese term for energy is ‘Qi’ (pronounced ‘Chee’). Thus, the essence of
	the product: furniture and energy we merged to create FurniQi. Qi is also the
	most common wireless standard and has been around for a long time - large
	corporations like Samsung and Google have already implemented this technology in
	their phones, but it is also used in other devices like the Motorola Moto 360
	Smartwatch.


	3.
	How does it work?


	FurniQi uses wireless charging technology to charge your phone just by placing
	it on the charging spot (no wires necessary!). Wireless power transfers through
	electromagnetic induction, which means that with inductive charging, power
	reaches the device through electromagnetic fields instead of through a
	traditional cable.


	4.
	Is it completely wireless?


	In terms of charging your phone, yes it is. However, in order to power the
	charging station, FurniQi will need to be plugged in (using a very discreet
	cable).


	5.
	What is FurniQi made out of?


	The FurniQi side table is built using Hand-Harvested Mao Zhu Bamboo (grown in
	China), surpassing the appearance of wood. This type of bamboo grows ten times
	quicker than wood, making it possible to be harvested and utilized in an
	incredibly sustainable way. Next, we infused the bamboo table with a dash of our
	Wireless Charging magic, making it pleasing for the eye, but also an
	unbelievably useful object.


	6. 
	Does it come in different colours or sizes?


	At this stage, FurniQi only comes in one size and colour. However, dependent on
	demand/success of the initial Indiegogo campaign, we will consider extending the
	FurniQi range.  


	7.
	How many 
charging spots are there?

At the moment, FurniQi has only one charging spot (except if you’re getting
	the ‘Table for Two’ perk which includes FurniQi with two charging spots).
	However, depending on feedback from the launch campaign, we will consider all
	options and the product may be updated. 
8.  
	Will all smartphones work with FurniQi?


	FurniQi incorporates wireless charging that works with Qi compatible smartphones
	or receivers. Receivers are either built into the device already, such as with
	the Samsung S6, or they can be easily installed onto a device, like the iPhone.
	For more information on phone compatibility, please visit the following
	link: 
	http://www.fonesalesman.com/pages/qi-enabled-mobiles.

9.
	Can I use FurniQi like any other table?

Yes. With the function of a table in mind, the wireless charging station has
	been completely water sealed. Water on the surface of the table will not be a
	hazard or cause any damage to the wireless charger.
10.
	When will I receive my FurniQi?


A few early panda backers will be the lucky ones to receive their FurniQi’s
	before  Christmas; the rest will be shipped post-campaign in March 2016.

11.
	Is FurniQi compatible with Duracell Powermat?

No, FurniQi is not compatible with Duracell Powermat. Our devices are based on Qi Wireless Standard, supported by companies such as Samsung, Google, Microsoft, LG, Sony, others. Our devices are supported by a wide variety of retailers, including McDonalds, International Airports, Marriott Hotels, and many others.

Duracell Powermat products are based on PMA technology and are supported by companies such as AT&T. PMA devices can be used in the Starbucks chain of cafeterias. General Motors vehicles only support PMA.

We chose to pursue a more popular standard which is widely supported, has larger numbers of participating retailers and has larger numbers of supported accessories you could use our products with.

12.
	How do I add $10 to get a receiver for my phone?

Underneath every perk you can add 'Additional Gift' to your contribution, so if you put $10 in there we know that we need to send you the receivers. We will get in touch to find out which receiver you wish to get at a later date.






Sommaire





À la découverte de FurniQi


Comment fonctionne la recharge sans fil ?




Dans les Médias


Nos Avantages




Compatibilité


Pourquoi soutenir FurniQi ?




FAQ








	De plus en plus de technologie  s'accumule dans votre maison, et des câbles s'ajoutent à tous les nouveaux gadgets que vous achetez. FurniQi est une solution élégante à ce désordre. Cette table basse avec recharge sans fil s’intègre naturellement dans votre vie.




▲

Dans les médias

	Ne vous fiez pas uniquement à ce qu’on dit, voyez plutôt ce que les autres en pensent !

 


































































▲

À la découverte de FurniQi

	FurniQi est avant tout une table basse élégante faite en bambou qui s'intègre aisément dans une multitude de pièces et de situations. 




	Pour rendre FurniQi très spéciale, nous avons ajouté un peu de magie grâce à la recharge sans fil !




	Il suffit de déposer son téléphone sur la table pour le recharger, et voilà !



	FurniQi fonctionne avec de 
	nombreux appareils !




	Elle est fabriquée en Bambou Mao Zhu, un matériau incroyablement polyvalent et durable qui en a fait un point de départ idéal pour FurniQi.







	FurniQi peut être installée de partout !



	FurniQi est livrée avec un câble USB standard de couleur caramel qui correspond à l'apparence de la table. Ainsi, vous pouvez utiliser l'un des adaptateurs USB muraux, ou une myriade d'autres sources d'énergie, y compris la 
	QiStone+.





	FurniQi est résistante aux accidents et gaffes du quotidien. 





	Grâce à une notification sonore optionnelle et une impression soigneusement gravée au laser pour indiquer la zone de recharge, FurniQi est facile à utiliser même pendant la nuit, toutes lumières éteintes.




	FurniQi est un jeu d'enfant à assembler ! Vous pouvez être prêt à recharger en quelques minutes.






▲

Nos Perks





QiStone+ est une batterie externe rechargeable sans fil, élégante et portable, vous permettant de recharger tout appareil compatible Qi lors de vos déplacement.


WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition est un chargeur sans fil stationnaire pour votre maison et bureau, fait en Bambou Mao Zhu.




▲

Pourquoi soutenir FurniQi ?




	Chez Fonesalesman, nous avons rendu possible la recharge sans fil pour iPhone grâce à Indiegogo et l’ iQi Mobile. Nous avons dépassé notre objectif initial de plus de 500%. Nous sommes donc passés à une option complètement sans-fil avec la  
	QiStone+
	et avons apporté une touche de design à la recharge sans fil avec le  
	WoodPuck : Bamboo Edition
	qui était un terrain d'essai pour ce qui allait devenir FurniQi d'aujourd'hui.


	FurniQi est un tout nouveau défi pour nous en tant qu’équipe. Nous connaissons bien notre domaine, mais nous sommes nouveaux dans le monde du mobilier. Nous avons décidé de prendre le risque car nous sommes persuadés qu’il en vaut la peine. À nos yeux, FurniQi est l'avenir du chargement des appareils technologiques. Afin de réussir dans la bataille contre les géants du monde du mobilier, nous avons besoin de votre soutien et de vos commentaires ; et c’est la raison pour laquelle Indiegogo est une plateforme idéale pour la concrétisation de FurniQi.


	Mais quels sont les avantages pour vous ? Évidemment, une magnifique table basse pour la recharge sans fil. Cependant, vous pouvez également nous aider à la réalisation de ce projet en choisissant parmi un large éventail de perks, tous incroyablement utiles et très faciles à utiliser. Bien évidemment, tous ceux qui participeront au projet obtiennent notre reconnaissance & notre amour éternels.

Oh, et n'oubliez pas de prêcher la bonne parole !








▲

Comment la Recharge Sans Fil fonctionne ?

	La Recharge Sans Fil Qi n’est pas du tout un Abracadabra ou un mystère Vaudou. L’énergie Sans Fil se transfère par induction électromagnétique, ce qui signifie que, avec la recharge inductive, l’énergie atteint l'appareil à travers les champs électromagnétiques au lieu de passer par un câble traditionnel. Vous avez besoin d'un émetteur (le chargeur sans fil) et d’un récepteur QI pour recharger votre appareil. Les récepteurs sont soit déjà intégrés dans l’appareil, c’est le cas du Samsung S6, ou bien ils peuvent être facilement installés sur un téléphone, comme avec l'iPhone par exemple.









▲

Mon téléphone est-il compatible ?




	Il existe de nombreux appareils compatibles Qi sur le marché. En voici les principaux :

	page de compatibilité
	dédiée pour avoir plus informations sur la compatibilité Qi !





▲

FurniQi FAQ










Contenuti





Conosci FurniQi


Come Funziona la Ricarica Wireless?




Sui Media


I Nostri Perks




Compatibilità


Perché Supportare FurniQi?




FAQ







Mano a mano che la tecnologia diventa importante nella nostra vita quotidiana, porta con sé anche una massa di cavi e prese elettriche con ogni singolo gadget che acquistiamo, ingombrando le nostre abitazioni. FurniQi è una soluzione elegante per tutto questo. Un tavolino con ricarica wireless che fa il suo lavoro tanto bene da adattarsi naturalmente alla tua vita.




▲

Sui Media

	Non credete alla nostra parola - vedete cosa hanno da dire gli altri!

 


































































▲

Conosci FurniQi

Si tratta, in primo luogo, di un tavolino in bambù semplice ed elegante.




	Per rendere FurniQi extra speciale, abbiamo aggiunto un po' di magia della ricarica wireless!




	Basta appoggiare il tuo telefono sul tavolino per caricarlo, poi prendilo & vai!



	FurniQi funziona con 
	molti dispositivi!




	È realizzato in bambù Mau Zhu, un materiale straordinariamente versatile e sostenibile che lo rende il punto di partenza perfetto per FurniQi.







	Si adatta ovunque.



	FurniQi è dotato di un cavo USB standard color caramello che si abbina al look del tavolo. Come risultato, potete utilizzare qualsiasi adattatore USB a muro, o una miriade di altre fonti di alimentazione inclusa la 
	QiStone+.





	FurniQi resiste agli incidenti quotidiani. Progettato per vivere, fatto per la vita.





	Grazie ad una notifica audio opzionale e ad intaglio scolpito attentamente a laser per indicare la ricarica, FurniQi è semplice da usare anche di notte, senza dover accendere le luci.




	FurniQi si installa in un attimo! Potrai essere pronto a ricaricare in pochi minuti.






▲

I Nostri Perks





QiStone+ è un elegante Power Bank per la Ricarica Wireless portatile che ti consente di caricare qualsiasi dispositivo compatibile Qi in mobilità.


WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition è un caricatore wireless fisso per la casa e l'ufficio, realizzato con tutti i dettagli considerati usando Bambù Mao Zhu.




▲

Perché Supportare FurniQi?




	Noi di Fonesalsesman abbiamo reso possibile la Ricarica Wireless per iPhone qui su Indiegogo con iQi Mobile. Abbiamo superato il nostro obiettivo iniziale di oltre il 500%. Successivamente, siamo andati Completamente Wireless con  
	QiStone+
	e abbiamo portato il design nella ricarica wireless con  
	WoodPuck: Bamboo Edition
	ispirato alla natura, che si è dimostrato essere terreno fertile per quello che potrebbe diventare oggi FurniQi.


	FurniQi rappresenta una partita totalmente diversa per noi come squadra. Conosciamo la ricarica wireless, ma siamo nuovi nel mondo dell'arredamento. Abbiamo deciso che valeva la pena correre questo rischio poiché, ai nostri occhi, FurniQi rappresenta il futuro della ricarica. Per poter avere successo nel combattere i giganti del mondo dell'arredamento, abbiamo bisogno del vostro supporto e feedback; ecco perché Indiegogo è la piattaforma ideale per far materializzare FurniQi.


	Ma cosa ne guadagnate voi, ad ogni modo? Ovviamente, un fenomenale tavolino con ricarica wireless. Tuttavia, potete anche aiutarci a realizzare questo progetto selezionando dalla gamma di perks disponibili - tutti incredibilmente utili e brillantemente semplici da utilizzare. Tutti i sostenitori riceveranno naturalmente anche la nostra eterna gratitudine & amore.

Oh, e non dimenticate di spargere la voce!








▲

Come funziona la Ricarica Wireless?

	La Ricarica Wireless Qi non è fatta di abracadabra e voodoo misterioso. L'alimentazione wireless viene trasferita attraverso l'induzione elettromagnetica, il che significa che con la carica induttiva, la corrente raggiunge il dispositivo attraverso i campi elettromagnetici invece che attraverso un cavo tradizionale. Avete bisogno di un trasmettitore (un pad di ricarica wireless) e di un ricevitore per caricare il vostro dispositivo. I ricevitori sono già inseriti nel dispositivo, come nel caso di Samsung S6, oppure possono essere facilmente installati in un dispositivo, come per iPhone.









▲

Il mio telefono è compatibile?




	Ci sono molti dispositivi compatibili Qi sul mercato. Ecco quelli principali:

story:
Meet the glass that brings Mt. Fuji to life

Welcome to the launch of our first project: Mt. Fuji Crystal Tumbler - a tumbler that brings Mt. Fuji to life.

It has Mount Fuji - Japanese's highest peak at 12,389 feet - molded into the base.

As a well-known symbol of Japan, Fujiyama is the highest mountain in Japan at 12,389 feet. A perfectly symmetrical volcanic cone, the mountain is a near-mythical national symbol immortalized in countless works of art. 

Mt. Fuji Crystal Tumbler delivers an enhanced experience when we are enjoying whiskey and other alcoholic drinks.

Inspired by Mount Fuji, we mold the beautiful mountain at the bottom of the glass.

Mount Fuji is snow-capped for about 5 months a year. The color of Mount Fuji changes with your drink, so the view of Fujiyama will always match your drink. 

Admire Mount Fuji from every angle. 

Smooth cup rim.

A clear mountain view that reflects the color of your drink. Snow on the top of the mountain has been beautifully represented by sandblasted glass.

Using the hand-blown technique of Edo Glass, each Mt. Fuji Tumbler is hand blown by expert craftsmen. Completely lead-free.

Mt.Fuji is perfect for whiskey, brandy, vodka, red wine, and other drinks.

Each tumbler features your own miniature Mount Fuji.

Red wine gives you a volcanic mountain view.

Make your own cocktail.

Cherry blossoms on Mt. Fuji :)

A golden Mt. Fuji with whiskey.

Add it to your collection! It’s an unusual and extraordinary gift. Delivered in an exquisite wooden gift box. Pledge now and get yours!

story:
SMARTDUVET in Action:

We are proud to bring you the world's first, easy, affordable and universal bed-making solution. 

Components:

The SMARTDUVET sheet:

This component is made very thin and lightweight space age material. The sheet has a grid shape that allows for natural air circulation and prevents heat accumulation.

The SMARTDUVET box:

This components is made of resistant ABS plastic. It houses the blower and electronic board that connect SMARTDUVET with your smartphone.

Our smartphone App : Allows you to preset bed-making time for each day. You can, for example, set the SMARTDUVET to make your bed all weekdays at 7:15 AM and set the time to 9:30 on weekends when you know you want to sleep in.

The connector: The purpose of this component is to allow the air from the SMARTDUVET air blower to fill the Smartduvet sheet.

The smart attach system: It attaches the bottom of your duvet cover to your top sheet placing the duvet and sheet simultaneously. It also attaches the fitted sheet to the duvet cover aligning it in position when SMARTDUVET is activated.

 

 

5 SIMPLE INSTALLATION STEPS:

 

TIMELINE:

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT:

We all wished at one point we had a self-making bed. Our reasons to wish for such a device are many. When we were kids we just didn't see the value in wasting precious play time on such a boring and repetitive task.

As we grow older it often makes sense to skip making our beds to get to work on time or prepare breakfast for the kids. And for people living with disability, making their bed can represent long and painful moments trying to preserve some comfort and a sense of dignity.

That is why we created SMARTDUVET!

Risks and challenges:

For every project there is risk involved. We've detailed below the 2 key risks involved with a project like ours:

1- Sourcing:

Sourcing is not an easy task, as many of you know, it is one of the most crucial parts of any project involving a physical product. Sourcing with the wrong suppliers can have disastrous consequences on quality and delivery schedule.

That is why we made the decision to work with an experienced family run sourcing company with family members living here as well as in Asia. This gives us the incredible advantage to be able to, not only find the best suppliers, but also achieve unrivaled quality control and total access to every step of the fulfillment process.

2.Unexpected high demand:

It might seem like the problem every entrepreneur wants to have, but in reality not planning for huge demand can cause delays and ruin client satisfaction.

We make sure that the suppliers we are working with have production capacity that would dwarf even the biggest success stories seen on Kickstarter. With production capacities of thousands of units per month these suppliers are working with well established companies that, just like us, demand the highest standards.

story:
CONTACT

Media, Investors, Updates

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

 

 iNyx - World's most advanced, futuristic bed. 18 features. Hi-tech yet affordable.

                       ______________________________________________________

                          iNyx at night

 

 

 

                       iNyx red model

 

 

 

iNyx: One of the world's most technologically advanced bed. 

 

iNyx bed is more like a self-contained bedroom. It comes with blinds that you can close to provide better sleeping conditions. It has a built-in lighting system, sound system, and a projector to watch movies in HD quality, play games or surf the web. And these are just a few of the multitude of iNyx features.

 

       Hi-tech yet comfortable 

 

 

 

 

Sleep - it's one of the things that we just can't seem to get enough of these days. Your bed should feel like the ultimate sanctuary and make you happy every time you get into it. King size of iNyx and its features, such as blinds, will guarantee an ultra-comfortable sleep environment for you.

                              ______________________________________________

 

              iNYX  FEATURES

        

 

1. Built-in retractable privacy blinds. You can cover the bed from all sides if you wish. They will shade you from the Sun, artificial light, provide intimacy if needed, or cinema-like conditions.

2. Built-in projector to watch movies, play video games, surf the Web, or work on your computer. You can also easily install your own projector or upgrade iNyx with the newest projector models available, as the time passes.

      

 

3. Built-in 5 point sound system.

4. Built-in LED lights. You can choose the colour between ambient red, blue, or white light.

5. Huge home theatre screen sliding down to the foot of the bed. By covering the bed from all sides and projecting a movie, you will have a cinema-like experience.

 

 

 

 

 

6. Drink holders where you can safely put drinks like coffee, juice, champagne, or other items.

7. Light system under and above the bed. Use it to create your own light show or set a sensual mood.

 

 

 

8. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Thanks to iNyx design, you can easily fit it into rooms with small door frames or move it to various localizations.

9. Elegant futuristic design.

10. King size bed dimensions (mattress size: 180 cm x 200 cm or 

193 cm × 203 cm (76x80 inches) for backers from USA.

 

11. Thanks to the blinds system iNyx provides high degree of privacy even when you share your bedroom with someone else (roommate, young child).

12. The entire bed can be customised according to your needs and wishes.

13. iNyx has also a built-in aroma dispenser system.

 

14. Therapeutic LED lighting mode that mimics the night sky. The ceiling of the iNyx is sprinkled with LED lights that look exactly like a peaceful blanket of stars.

The LED lighting feature along with your favourite relaxing music from the built-in sound system and the aromatic smells create ideal conditions in your bedroom before going to sleep.

Shape, size, and distribution of light points can be changed.

 

 

15. Bed frame features a built-in, foldable mechanism in the footboard to which you may attach a flat screen television.

16. Two foldable, adjustable built-in tables which may serve you as a work space or even as an eating table.

17. Detachable roof. iNyx is designed in such a way that you can easily detach and reattach the roof every time you want.

18. Chrome finishing transforms iNyx into a small work of art. 

 

 

 

 

 You will be able customise iNyx system. For example: buy and use different versions of blinds, or change the lighting system colours by changing the LED bulbs models.
 

 

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

 

Where and when I can purchase iNyx system/bed?

Follow our Facebook fanpage to be updated on this subject

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

For updates and news follow us on Facebook 

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

 

CONTACT

Media, Investors

https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/
story_txt:
CONTACTMedia, Investors, Updateshttps://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/   iNyx - World's most advanced, futuristic bed. 18 features. Hi-tech yet affordable.
                       ______________________________________________________                          iNyx at night                          iNyx red model   iNyx: One of the world's most technologically advanced bed.  iNyx bed is more like a self-contained bedroom. It comes with blinds that you can close to provide better sleeping conditions. It has a built-in lighting system, sound system, and a projector to watch movies in HD quality, play games or surf the web. And these are just a few of the multitude of iNyx features. 
       Hi-tech yet comfortable 
 
 
 
 
Sleep - it's one of the things that we just can't seem to get enough of these days. Your bed should feel like the ultimate sanctuary and make you happy every time you get into it. King size of iNyx and its features, such as blinds, will guarantee an ultra-comfortable sleep environment for you.

                              ______________________________________________ 
              iNYX  FEATURES
        
 
1. Built-in retractable privacy blinds. You can cover the bed from all sides if you wish. They will shade you from the Sun, artificial light, provide intimacy if needed, or cinema-like conditions.
2. Built-in projector to watch movies, play video games, surf the Web, or work on your computer. You can also easily install your own projector or upgrade iNyx with the newest projector models available, as the time passes.
      

 
3. Built-in 5 point sound system.
4. Built-in LED lights. You can choose the colour between ambient red, blue, or white light. 
5. Huge home theatre screen sliding down to the foot of the bed. By covering the bed from all sides and projecting a movie, you will have a cinema-like experience.
 
 

 
 

 

6. Drink holders where you can safely put drinks like coffee, juice, champagne, or other items.
7. Light system under and above the bed. Use it to create your own light show or set a sensual mood.
 

 
 
8. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Thanks to iNyx design, you can easily fit it into rooms with small door frames or move it to various localizations.
9. Elegant futuristic design. 
10. King size bed dimensions (mattress size: 180 cm x 200 cm or 
193 cm × 203 cm (76x80 inches) for backers from USA.
 
11. Thanks to the blinds system iNyx provides high degree of privacy even when you share your bedroom with someone else (roommate, young child).
12. The entire bed can be customised according to your needs and wishes. 
13. iNyx has also a built-in aroma dispenser system.
 
14. Therapeutic LED lighting mode that mimics the night sky. The ceiling of the iNyx is sprinkled with LED lights that look exactly like a peaceful blanket of stars. 
The LED lighting feature along with your favourite relaxing music from the built-in sound system and the aromatic smells create ideal conditions in your bedroom before going to sleep.
Shape, size, and distribution of light points can be changed.
 
 

15. Bed frame features a built-in, foldable mechanism in the footboard to which you may attach a flat screen television.
16. Two foldable, adjustable built-in tables which may serve you as a work space or even as an eating table.
17. Detachable roof. iNyx is designed in such a way that you can easily detach and reattach the roof every time you want.
18. Chrome finishing transforms iNyx into a small work of art.  
 
 

 

 

 You will be able customise iNyx system. For example: buy and use different versions of blinds, or change the lighting system colours by changing the LED bulbs models.  
FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)
 
Where and when I can purchase iNyx system/bed?
Follow our Facebook fanpage to be updated on this subject
https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/
 
For updates and news follow us on Facebook 
https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/
 
CONTACT
Media, Investors
https://www.facebook.com/iNyxBed/

story:
Check out MagnetCubes review：

Most of the marble runs include the track and the holes on the same molded pieces, limiting your options for how the pieces can be fitted together. With the modular design of MagnetCubes, you can easily connect multiple structures together.

The structure becomes a complex and impressive multi-level design. Build and rebuild whatever you can imagine. You could sit down again and again, with new creations every time.

MagnetCubes is a totally new modular magnetic building set for creating roller coaster themed marble runs and large structures. This intuitive building system is fun for all ages and can be configured in endless ways. 

This toy is a modern take on the simple building blocks and construction sets that we all grow up with. MagnetCubes is great for getting kids curious and interested in STEM concepts by challenging spatial reasoning and understanding of physics principles. 

Sets use open cubes with magnets in each corner that easily snap together without the need for special connectors or any prior experience. Simply unpack and build!   

With 64 cubes and multiple action pieces, the design possibilities are endless. Each set can be added onto the next, allowing you to build big and fantastic marble runs as you imagine!

Great for keeping your mind sharp, limber and most importantly, interested! 

The open design of MagnetCubes makes all the action visible. With the panels included in the AdvancedPack, you can weave marble tracks in and out of the architectural structures. 

This building set is not just for kids. Building MagnetCubes is also a joyful experience for parents and adults. Join in the fun and build with the kids to make more complex designs.  

Watching the kids learn as they played is one of the greatest joys

Keep stacking the modular and magnetic building blocks together. Be amazed at how easily, quickly and massively tall structures can be made without toppling over.It’s more fun to play together, with your friends, family, co-workers...
Great for quick breaks from the screen. Relieve stress by fidgeting with beautiful structures and relaxing kinetic movement. 
 

MagnetCubes is a building system that inspires children to learn STEM principles. The combination of play, exploration, and iterative testing will help children develop critical thinking skills needed to excel in multiple fields. In no time at all, you will have a creative engineer and designer on your hands.

 

 

What we used to build the following configurations.

New Configurations!?

DesignNest is an integrative open design platform founded by designers to help facilitate innovation. Our mission is to make design available by connecting designers with the resources they need to develop their ideas and reach consumers. MagnetCubes|CoasterCubes| was developed by our community member Steven Wolfe and brought to life through the platform’s resources after being granted the Golden Nest Award. Join us as we trailblaze the future of co-creation and product innovation by empowering the independent maker and design community.

story:
Fully funded on Kickstarter - now up for pre-order here on Indiegogo's InDemand. Still over 30% below retail price.

.

The perfect Christmas present. Pre-order now and download your set of Christmas gift cards to give to your loved ones or to enjoy yourself here.

 

Enjoy our Christmas cards while we will be working hard to get the knives to you as soon as possible. The package also contains a selection of non-Christmas cards for all the winter birthdays or other occasions for a gift card. (optimized for 10x15cm or 4x6" print)

Estimated delivery is March 2019. (see also chapter VI. below)

.

Read the whole story here:

The VEARK CK01 - as featured on:

 

Welcome to the VEARK - CK01: 

your Single Piece Stainless Steel Chef's Knife.

 

I. Design - a knife is a tool

The inspiration for the design of the VEARK CK01 was drawn from the believe that the knife is a tool - maybe even the most essential tool in your kitchen.

Based on that idea we took visual cues from the world of traditional metal tools as inspiration for the appearance of our knives.

Our aim was to create a piece that will generate it's beauty and character from it's raw appearance rather than by adding features like wood and rivets - less is more.

 

II. Ergonomics - not afraid of the blade

Looking at how professional chefs hold their knives we developed the open handle design: It invites you to slide your thumb onto the blade and grab the knife right at the balance point - making it a pleasure to work with.

 

III. Manufacturing - classic drop forge

The manufacturing is done in a classic drop forging process which takes place in the traditional knife forging town of Solingen, Germany. Experienced craftsmen use all their skill to produce a knife of highest quality.

The drop forging process leaves each knife with it's individual pattern on the handle, just like a fingerprint. 

So each knife is a unique piece - no two are alike. A beautiful detail that gives each knife it's own character.

 

IV. Hard facts - (58 Rockwell hard to be precise)

The CK01 features a 20cm (7,9") blade while the overall length is 32cm (12,6"). It is drop forged from stainless steel (X50CRMoV15) and weighs 200g (7oz.).

The typical Solingen knife has a hardness of 55-56 Rockwell, we even exceed that at 58 Rockwell. What that basically means is: a harder knife can get sharper and remain a sharp edge for longer (depending on use and maintenance of course - see also chapter V.).

left

top

 

right

 

V. Stay sharp - Diamond steel sharpening rod package offers

To keep your knife sharp as day one, we recommend the regular use of a sharpening rod. We will offer packages including a high quality diamond steel rod made in Germany. It's an oval steel rod, covered with microcrystalline diamonds, which will make it easy to maintain the sharp edge of your knife. We will provide proper instructions on how to sharpen your knife to all backers and we are also planning to make the sharpening rod available to all backers as an add on after the campaign.

Stay Sharp Package

 

VI. "Where's my knife, man?" - Estimated Timeline

We estimate to be ready to ship the knives out to original Kickstarter backers all end of February / beginning of March 2019 all Indiegogo orders will be handled right after but basically will go out more or less at the same time.

We will keep you updated during the whole production process.

Estimated timeline - Status Nov 2018

 

VII. That's it - Thanks for checking out our project.

We hope you like our Chef's Knife as much as we do and will happily support our campaign. Even better, share it with your family and friends to bring this product to as many people as possible to love and enjoy. Our goal is to kickstart a sustainable business of creating more high quality products like this one and we hope you want to help us to achieve that.

.

Thank you.

 

VIII. Hear what others are saying: Press features

.

 

YANKO DESIGN: "VEARK’s CK01 gives the knife blade the reverence it deserves. Literally designed to be a tool-of-trade, the knife’s design embodies aspects of tool-design, with a unibody construction, and a handle that feels firm and comfortable (...)"

.

COOL MATERIAL: "Know the difference between a cheap chef’s knife and a nice, expensive one? Proper balance and a solid tang that runs through the handle, among other things. VEARK achieved the balance and simply did away with the handle (...)"

.

GESSATO: "The single piece build complements a minimalist design that explores the concept of “less is more” while infusing the knife with personality."

.

Minimalissimo: "(...) if you need a sleek, robust, and exceptionally crafted kitchen knife, please show your support."

.

IMBOLDN: "One part strategic design, one part handcrafted art, and all parts balanced, the VEARK CK01 Chef’s Knife (...)"

.

HiConsumption: "In fact, the VEARK CK01 is proof positive as to just how beautiful a high-end cutting tool can be."

.

 

MANDESAGER: "Med en VEARK CK01 i hånden er du stærkt dækket ind, for det er en blæret dansk kokkekniv med et fedt design og en kvalitet fra øverste skuffe."

.

IMPROB: " (...) you’ll quickly note the knife is designed to be used and not admired for its looks. One of the most outstanding features is the ergonomic design and the way your thumb slides right into a working position with little or no thought at all."

.

__________________________________________________________________

story:
Because I live in Minneapolis and am so pleased that Nicole takes on projects that make my community a better place....

Because The Rehab Addict is my favorite of all the DIY shows....

Because everyone knows what its like when someone else doesn't keep up their end of the bargain...

Because we don't want Nicole selling her plasma to pay for her loss....


LET'S RESTORE NICOLE'S FAITH IN THE KINDNESS OF STRANGERS... JUST AS SHE RESTORES THE HOMES WE LOVE!

Read in Nicole's own words what happened to the home she was meant to live in with her family...

http://www.facebook.com/nicolecurtisrehabaddict

story:
Why Tea?

Aloha, my name is Elyse Petersen. Last year I began an exploration with my classmate and business partner Jane Gonsowshi into the global tea community. We first studied the feasibility of Hawai‘i developing a globally recognized tea industry. In the process we made many friends and learned that tea propogation and cultivation is one of many feasible solutions for Hawai‘i's food self-sufficiency crisis.

I then spent 4 months living and working with tea farmers in Wazuka, Kyoto, Japan. Here I was exposed to the challenges that independent tea farmers face around the world. 

With knowing the opportunity there is for tea to bring people together and to make agriculture profitable I decided I would become a "Global Tea Ambassador" or tea farm advocate.

Since returning to Hawai‘i I have dedicated my time to build a tool that can bridge tea growers and tea drinkers: Tealet.

We can build Tealet together

Here's the things we need:

  • engaged community
  • sophisticated virtual marketplace that makes the distribution of tea more efficient
  • and a little money to help get to the next steps

By utilizing crowdfunding you are able to help us with two of those pieces: community and money. The best part about it is that in return you get to experience some of the best teas the world has to offer!

If we don't reach our ultimate goal there is no need to worry. You still get tea and we will still continue to build Tealet. In fact, the most valuable goal of this campaign, community, will be achieved regardless.

Bridging Tea Growers and Drinkers

Tealet's value will:

  • optimize the tea experience for both grower and drinker
  • increase economic profit for growers that are struggling to build thriving communities
  • expose the US to tea culture direct from the source

Our goal is to make everyone aware of the ecosystem and create trust and transparancy!

Perks

If you are interested in supporting this campaign I recommend that you look at our awesome perks for helping. Find the one that is perfect for you:

  • $10 - You want to help any way you can. Join our community and Jane and I will personally thank you, and more than likely pour you a cup of tea the next time I see you. Also, we'll add your name to our "Tea Friends" page which will be displayed on Tealet after launch!

  • $25 - You want to experience direct from the grower specialty tea in your own home. Join our Global Tea Taster's Club and get prelaunch access to our inaugural tea curation program. We will ship one month's subscription (75g - yields about 75 cups) to your door. Also, we'll add your name to our "Tea Friends" page. *For all contributions made after July 23, 2012 GTT shipments will be sent in October
  • $60 - You want to become a Global Tea Taster for a half a year. Enjoy 3 different selections of Tealet teas direct from the grower and take advantage of a discounted rate ($5 savings per shipment). Also, we'll add your name to our "Tea Friends" page.
  • $100 - You are the ultimate tea head (or you want to be). Receive 6 shipments of GTT teas from around the world starting in August 2012. This is a great way to explore, learn, and determine your favorite teas ($8 savings per shipment). Also, we'll add your name to our "Tea Friends" page.
  • $200 - You want to experience tea for yourself and share. Join our GTT Club for a year and share it with a friend (6 shipments for each of you). This is also great for the office. Also, we'll add your friend's and your name to our "Tea Friends" page.
  • $500 - You want the authentic Japanese tea experience. Enjoy your GTT teas throughout the year with the best tea service utensils Japan has to offer. We are currently sourcing handmade kyusus (ceramic teapots) from Tokoname along with tea cups and a few other treats. These world renowned kyusus can usually only be purchased in Japan, but we will be sending them directly to your door. Also, we'll add your name to our "Tea Friends" page.
  • $3,500 - You want to experience tea on the farm in HAWAI‘I! See what's brewing in the Hawai‘i Grown Tea industry with all your senses and meet growers that are producing some of the world's most premier teas. This includes roundtrip flight (coach) to and from Hilo, Hawai‘i from the same airport (US destinations only), three nights stay at a 4-star hotel, personal tea farm tours at a variety of tea gardens, and an opportunity to learn with your own hands how tea is grown and processed. This is any tea lovers dream vacation. Also, we'll add your name in big, bold letters to our "Tea Friends" page!

You want to explore teas now?

Tealet is an experimental prototype now in which you can browse, buy, and review teas. Visit our marketplace to see teas from Japan and India. Also, connect with our network through your favorite tool

  • Tealet - specialty tea directly from growers
  • Email Newsletter
  • Tumblr
  • Facebook Page
  • Twitter Feed
  • Pinterest Boards
  • Google+ Page

The best way you can help us now is to share this campaign with your friends on Facebook and Twitter!

Pure Aloha Blessings!

Elyse Petersen

Founder, Tealet

story:
Introducing upgraded Travel Wooden Map by Enjoy The Wood

Enjoy The Wood 3D Wooden World Map - World Map 2.0 is even more fantastic and creative than before. Now it has 3 layers for different countries with different colours for each, real 3D design of World Map with highly detailed precision cut using high-quality technics as well as eco-friendly materials. 

 #woodenmap #map #enjoythewood #3d #design 

Travelling is life! The map is made for people who love freedom, travelling and life!  

                 “Better to see something once than hear about it a thousand times”

    Wanderlust: n.a strong desire for or impulse to wander or travel and explore the world

        “The most beautiful in the world is, of course, the world itself.” – Wallace Stevens

It is a high-quality minimalistic 3D wooden map, created with laser-cut precision and love of tender hands. 

The exclusive features is that you can mark all countries that you've visited or any future travels that you might have! 

So just mark as much countries as possible! Map already has holes so you can put a pin in it and you won't ruin your beautiful map.

   To see more photos of the map, we prepared some media Kit for you! 

⚡️Different designs – different styles⚡️ 

1. Full Pack = Map with country names and borderlines + states names of USA, Canada and Australia + capitals of countries.

2. Standard Map = Map with country names and borderlines + states names of USA, Canada and Australia

⚡️MAP FEATURES⚡️

  • Handmade of birch plywood.
  • Wooden wall compass, airplanes and boats are included. 
  • Easy installation in under an hour as each map piece has a number that matches a template, part of the included installation instructions.
  • Includes special sticky tape / double-sided removable adhesive that doesn't ruin your walls (however do not adhere to wallpaper).
  • This is not a true geographical map in that we don't include all countries and islands. However, if you wish to have certain islands or countries added, please contact us and we gladly add it to your order. Many islands are omitted due to size of the map. You can order more islands as add on.
  • Comes already gift wrapped, ready for gift giving.  

⚡️Novelty of 3D world map⚡️ 

  • 3 layers for different countries
  • 4 different colors of wood pieces (light, brown, dark brown and light brown)
  • New wooden push pins of 15 different sightseeings from all over the world
  • New option of ocean names 

⚡️LED OPTION⚡️

  • RGB LED (Neon colors) option, lights that glow in 7 main light options and couple of its illuminations. You can regulate the brightness of the light using a compact remote control.
  • Тhe lights are behind the continents. 
  • Map is placed on the acryl background ready to be placed on the wall. So you just have to place it on the wall and connect. 
  • Some of the islands (the smallest) are without acryl background and without light. You will have to stick them with tape. (which is included)
  • Easy installation instruction video. Installation is under 2 hours. You will have to drill the wall and place the map with framing nails. Everything is included. (only for LED option Map) 
  • Works on 110V/220V. EU/US electrical plugs are available. 

That's how it will look like in the darkness.

You will be able to add add-ons in pledge manager! :)

 

⚡️NEW WOODEN PUSH PINS (SIGHTSEEINGS)⚡️

✨15 Pieces in a pack. They are: 

  • Coliseum 
  • Eiffel Tower 
  • Sagrada Familia
  • Burg Khalifa
  • Pagoda
  • Pisa Tower
  • Big Ben
  • Pyramids
  • Parliament of Budapest
  • The Great Wall
  • Taj Mahal
  • Machu Picchu
  • Statue of Liberty
  • Sidney Opera House
  • Statue Jesus

⚡️AIRPLANE PUSH PIN OPTION⚡️

 Plane-shaped pins to stylish mark the places you’ve been.  

  • These maps already have ONE hole in each country and in each state, so you can put a pin in them. If you don't want holes, please let us know!
  • You can put pins in without the holes, but you have to make some efforts.
  • Pins are white metal, shaped like a plane, are very durable and measure 4 cm (1.6”) long. 

     ⚡️Also you can choose from 2 new colors - Blue and Grey⚡️

Assembling is a really fun process. You don't need any special tools to install the map on the wall because package includes sticky double sided adhesive (tape) and also on the each piece there are numbers which match template on the instructions you will get :) 

All pieces of the map are packed in polystyrene and also in gift wrapping so you don’t have to think about it.  

XXL - 92x66x20 cm (36x26x8 in), 24 kg (53 lb)

XL – 68x52x15 cm (27x20.5x5.9 in), 11 kg (15.5 lb)    

L – 53x42x16 cm (21x16.5x6.3  in), 7 kg (8.8 lb)  

M – 53x32x11 cm (21x12.6x4.3 in), 4 kg (4.5 lb)

☄️  New instruction for installation ☄️

We've created new feature for installation that makes it even easier than before. It's Corner template! Attach corner #1 to the top left point, measure the distance accordingly to your map's size (M, L, XL, XXL) and attach corner #2 on the top right side. That's all.  Now, you should begin sticking pieces to the wall starting from the side parts (pieces #3 and #17) and other pieces, they will fit perfectly on your wall and will be in the correct place. 

Approximate time to assemble: 40-60 minutes 

To find out the shipping fee, please sum up the weight of the maps in your pledge, and find the corresponding value in the table below.  Also there is  information in each pledge according to the shipping cost.

XXL - 24 kg (53 lb)

XL – 11 kg (15.5 lb)  

L – 7 kg (8.8 lb)  

M – 4 kg (4.5 lb)

Note, we count volume weight as it's higher than actual weight.

For example, if you would like Xl maps + L map + 2 M maps, you just have to add the weight: 11 + 7 + 2x4 = 26 kg all together. And Just find the right price in the table below. 

• If you want to buy push pins, simply add the cost of push pins to your pledge.

• If you have selected a few maps, the shipping cost will be less than if we send them one by one.  

• To find out the shipping fee, please sum up the weight of the maps in your pledge, including add-ons, and find the corresponding value in the table below.

We use the most convenient and reliable delivery method. ALL Orders for our buyers will be shipped from Ukraine with UPS post service.

We offer domestic and international tracking. 

We do not want to loose any orders. And we will assist you with the information all the way untill you receive the package.

Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery.

Awesome NEWS! We've created cool App where  you can check, try on and  fit a map on the wall with it. 

⚡️Here is a link to test beta version for map - https://testflight.apple.com/join/Qx0kRl80⚡️

Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.     

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from GFS Gateway, First Mile, or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

Every Enjoy The Wood map is manufactured at our own production facilities. We guarantee high quality of our products, really helpful customer service.

We are confident in our ability to create each map and bring joy to all those who supported us.

We have experience in delivery and international transportation.

We have a well thought out plan how to proceed after the end of the project.

Our team is constantly engaged in developing of some new ideas for maps. 

This project is an extension of what we have achieved till now.  

With the support of Indiegogo – your support – Enjoy The Wood team can cross the borders and create much more pleasure for the World.

We want to share with you things that are important for us. So, first of all this is a family business that started 5 years ago. Wow, five years? Time flows fast. This 5 year tought us a lot! 

We have great experience in production of quality products, more than 20 thousand happy customers all over the world and 5 years experience in international delivery - 100% guarantee that we won't let you down!

 Our family — is Igor, Maryna, our 3 daughters (Agneshka, Ameli and Ivory) and parents Tanya and Tolya. And we are happy that we can make things that others like!   

On Indiegogo we want to show the upgraded Map — our Wooden World Map 2.0. It inspires us every day because people like it, houses like it, we like it.

Additionally, the Enjoy The Wood 3D World Map is a Patent Pended right now!

And we definitely couldn't do it ourselves. So here is our Perfect TEAM!

In 2018 we successfully founded our first baby project that raised over $100000 - Wooden World Map and It had a great demand and hundreds of feedbacks were received that really makes us fly.

Thanks to your support we developed from just a small idea to bigger manufacture. We have expanded our product range to dozens of different products. All of that’s because of you. 

You guys inspired us so much soooo due to enormous enquires we created some even more awesome World Map 2.0

story:
Introducing a new, sustainable way to grow plants in your home. Eat and cook with what you grow, without any previous gardening experience necessary. Our Herb Garden Kit provides you with everything you need to grow delicious herbs indoors! 

 

To ensure steady indoor plant growth and a successful gardening season our Herb Garden Kit comes with a Grow Home featuring 3 full spectrum LED grow lights to give your plants the light they need year round.

For the seasoned gardeners with a system already in place, we've got something for you, too. With the Steady State™ Garden Fertilizer Combo, you'll receive enough fertilizer to apply one growing season's worth of nutrients to a garden up to 50 square feet in size.

And for the houseplant enthusiast, the Steady State™ Houseplant Fertilizer provides enough food to keep your houseplants happy for at least one year. 

Our team is stocked with soil scientists who know just what growing plants need at every stage of development, and we've formulated unique fertilizer blends that your garden and houseplants will love.

 

With Steady State Fertilizers, you can

 

And best of all

 

 


Nutrients are essential to all life on earth. Right now we're collectively allowing a whole lot of those vital nutrients to slip away and pollute our surface waters.

We're stepping in to capture those nutrients. We want you to join us.

 

Meet Phosphorus

Phosphorus is an essential plant nutrient. In other words, without it, plants can't thrive.

But sometimes phosphorus finds itself in our waterways. This happens for a variety of reasons (toilet flushes, agricultural runoff, industrial processes, fertilizer runoff from lawns, etc.) and when it does, it can lead to algae blooms, mass fish kills, and dead zones in oceans and lakes.
 

 


To make matters worse, phosphorus is a finite resource. Phosphorus mining, processing, and global transportation result in negative environmental impacts.


    You see the problem. Here's our solution:

We've developed a technology that recovers phosphorus in a pure form, so we can give it back to the plants and soils that need it. This creates a closed loop – a circular economy of phosphorus.

 

The Result

Reclaimed nutrients, reclaimed ecosystem health (and happy plants!)

 

Plants Love It

To be sure, we tested our recovered phosphorus to see just how much it helps plants grow.

Corn plants were given different amounts of recovered phosphorus. Results show just how much the recovered phosphorus increases healthy plant growth and development.
 

Phosphorus applied increases from left-most plants to right-most plants

 

 

1. Reclaimed Sustainable Plant Food


We’ve combined our reclaimed phosphorus with other plant nutrients to create five unique Steady State™ fertilizer blends: Houseplant Fertilizer, Garden Starter Fertilizer, Garden Maintenance Fertilizer, Herb Starter Fertilizer, and Herb Maintenance Fertilizer. ​

Our fertilizers are formulated to give plants what they need, when they need it-- no more and no less!  


2. The Grow Home

Lowered grow lights are perfect for seedlings, which need the warmth of the grow lights as well, while the extended settings gives taller plants plenty of room to grow.  

The outer two grow light bars swivel to allow a change of angle as plants' needs change.  

A durable metal tray at the base of the unit catches drainage water and is easily removable for cleaning and transplant.


3. Everything you need to grow!


Backers will receive a survey to choose which seeds they would like included in their kits. All seeds offered will be heirloom varieties, and we'll provide enough to allow for germination failures and other incidentals that might require a re-plant or two.


We're committed to sustainability, from our reclaimed fertilizer to the materials used in each reward. We've sourced products featuring biodegradable, renewable, recyclable, reusable, and post-consumer materials wherever possible. We're proud to use coconut coir, post-consumer packaging, cork, recycled glass, compost, bamboo, and plant bi-products rather than unsustainable materials and plastics wherever possible.


 


We are so excited to help you help your plants, and there are a few hurdles we need to jump before we can do that. Funds raised through this campaign will help us to:

  • Purchase the necessary machinery to blend and process our fertilizers into an optimal physical form
  • Finalize our Grow Home prototype and fund manufacturing
  • Finance registrations of our fertilizer products in backers' states
  • Fulfill orders  

 

We're thrilled and humbled to be sharing our work with the crowdfunding community. We love what it stands for, how it works, and the amazing support system it provides. 

If you like what we're doing please share our work with your friends, family, neighbors, mail carrier, delivery person, pets, plants (they'd love to hear about this), or anyone on social media! We're on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and Youtube: @newsteadystate.  


 


This Kickstarter would not have been possible without the help of our awesome collaborators:

  • Video by Anders Gurda
  • Photography by Gena Larson 
  • Graphics by Jared Kist and Sara Mertens
  • Grow Home design expertise from Greg Blake
  • Creative consulting from Katrina Atkin 
  • Shop prototyping work at Sector67 (Madison, WI)

story:
LumiPocket is a compact, high quality DLP 3D Printer. It has a printing area of 10cm diameter, 10cm tall, and supports many different types of printing materials, from a resin similar to PLA and ABS, to castable for jewelry. Other types include flexible or strong resins, even ceramic filled.


A big thank you to all our contributors! You made our LumiPocket a real product. We are currently producing our first batch.

The campaign is now closed.

Your support allows us to make high quality, affordable 3d printing available to everyone. We are still improving the quality, below you can see some of our latest printed parts!



What can you print with LumiPocket?

Check our instructables and learn how to print your own 3d printed speakers, how to make custom metal parts, or print jewelry designs with castable resin!

Lumi Industries supports now LibraryLyna, a company dedicated to bringing 3D models to blind students! Check their website: http://www.librarylyna.com/

LumiPocket, the story

We started this mission last year, when we were just Makers dreaming about Stereolitography 3d Printing being finally affordable. We designed and built a device so compact that it was even foldable! It was called LumiFold, and it started a revolution about compact and portable 3d printing. It gained a lot of popularity very quickly!

People were really interested and excited about a compact 3d printer which was affordable and also able to give them the results they expected when they first heard about 3d printing. They wanted a reliable and easy to use device, that didn't require any technical knowledge.

Thank to the supporters of our first IndieGoGo campaign and the enthusiatic comments we received every time we presented LumiFold to the public, from Maker Faires to international blogs, we decided to go furhter, and spent the last months designing and refining our next 3d printer, the LumiPocket, trying to make it as minimalistic as possible, removing everything that was unnecessary.

The result of all this work is the most compact 3d printer, with an high printing quality, easy to use and reliable!

(Above: samples printed at 100 micron)

is versatile!

Just by adjusting the projector height, you can go from printing very detailed object, like jewelry molds, from bigger parts up to 10cm diameter by 10 cm tall. This means that LumiPocket can be used to print many different objects, not just tiny parts!

is fast!

With the best projector we tested (AcerP1500) and our recommended resin (FuntToDo IB) the curing time per layer can be as low as 0,7 seconds, with a printing area of 10x5cm.

With a ~320$ projector like the Optoma DX325 or the Acer x1240/60, curing time per layer is about 3-7 seconds, that is still faster than even more expensive FDM printers, and remember that with DLP projection, printing speed is not affected by object complexity, or by the number of parts to be printed on the same tray.

    is reliable and requires little maintenance

    (Goodbye, disposable vats and expensive non-stick coating)
    With our top projection system, we removed one the most annoying parts related with light curing resin: the need to replace often the printing vat, a delicate transparent contianer for the resin, that does also need expensive anti-sticiing coatings, often difficult to apply that last only for a certain number of prints before start degrading.
    Projecting from above, we removed the need for a special vat, and it will double its function of printing vat and resin container with its cover for storing the resin. You can have one for each type of resin you have and changing material on your printer is as simple as swapping the vats.

      is really easy to use!

    We designed a cross plaftorm software that takes care of everything: you just need to load a .STL  file and it will take care of the slicing and printing. If you don't have 3d modeling knowledge, you can use our integrated 3d search engine that will let you browse online for 3d models , our use our basic templates to print many customizable objects, from Litophanes to personalized rings or keychains.

    It supports the newest input technologies like the Leap Motion, an innovative devide able to track your gestures and hands movements, providing a new way to explore and model 3d objects.

    The software we provide is also retrocompatible with our first printer LumiFold, and will also add support for the HoloDock, a visualization device that we launched on our first campaign.
    The program also assists you during the calibration of the projector.
    It will later be available on our website for free.



    Technical specifications

      LumiPocket

      Technology Stereolithography (DLP)
      Printer Dimensions 8 x 8 x 28 cm
      Build Volume 100 x 100 x 100 mm
      Layer curing time
      		 3000ms-8000ms
      Resolution X, Y axis 50/100 microns (depending on the projector used)
      Resolution Z 50/100 microns
      Electronics Arduino Micro
      Resins tested
      		 SpotGP, FunToDo

      LumiKit

      Includes Finishing tray, a set of tweezers, 2 scrapers, protective gloves and glasses.


        Supported projectors

        Almost every DLP projector can be used. We do not recommend any modification to your projector (unless you really know what you are doing and want to void its warranty): instead, we provide you with a list of compatible projectors we already tested. Should you want to buy another model, we also provide a set of technical specifications that meets our requirements.
        For jewelry and castable resin for metals a FullHD projector will provide the best results.

        Minimum Requirements 2000 lumen, 1024x768
        Recommended
        		2500+ lumen, 1280x720 or above
        Tested Optoma dx325, Acer x1260, Acer x1240, Acer 6510bd, Acer P1283, Acer P1500

        Why an external projector? Is it difficult to setup?

        This is the standard setup: the projector is mounted on a standard tripod. Then you use the auto calibration software included with your LumiPocket and it will help you to position it correctly. It is really simple and takes just a few minutes! And you are able to use the projector for normal use (watching movies, playing games) when not printing, since the projector is not permanently fixed to a frame or inside the printer.


        Resin

        An high quality, reliable and affordable resin is also important. We tested many different resins seaching for the one that worked best with our setup, and gave the most reproducible results. We can offer different resins, from a standard version, affordable and fast curing, to an industrial version, extra hard, to a castable resin, designed to cast your pieces in bronze, copper, tin or iron using standard vacuum investment casting methods and setting.

        Above: typical projector setup, the 3 different resins for different use and their logo , and UV curing after printing.


        With your support, we will continue designing high quality, easy to use and affordable 3d printing solutions. Thank you!


        FAQ

        There are other cheaper compact resin-based printers, why should I buy LumiPocket?
        Many cheaper resin-based printers have tiny printing areas, so their use is really limited. LumiPocket has a printing area of 10cm diam. by 10 cm height, so you can print objects that have some use, like miniatures, toys, molds for dental or jevelry use, and much more!

        I think that LumiPocket is still expensive.
        LumiPocket uses some precision parts, like IGUS miniature nuts and Misumi linear shafts, so it will last longer and will not require a lot of maintenance in order to work properly. We designed the electronic board to be modular and use standard parts, so if you need to replace the microcontroller or the motor board you will be able to use standard commercial parts.
        We also wanted to keep as much as possible the production in Italy.
        We are collaborating with Arduino , that is also based in Italy, and with Heliv, which produces the special UV ink featured in our logo on the LumiPocket cover.
        We could have just selected the cheapest suppliers, but we want to offer you a product that is really reliable and made to last without all the maintenance that many 3d printer require.
        This is not the cheapest resin-based printer: it is an affordable resin based 3d printer, with an high printing quality, easy to set up and use, with a printing area big enough to print useful parts and not just tiny objects. It is a product designed in Italy and we will do our best to select manufacturer and suppliers from Italy, to have full control on the quality and production.

        Can I use LumiPocket for casting jewelry?
        Yes, we offer FunToDo Castable Resin, that  has been designed to cast your pieces in bronze, copper, tin or iron using standard vacuum investment casting methods and settings.

        What materials are available on the LumiPocket?
        Our standard line consists of Standard, Industrial, Castable Resin. Available colors are black and red, since they offer the best quality and printing times. We recommend Industrial since it offers strong parts with a very fast curing time. Parts can be spray painted after curing. If you need a differently colored resin, or special resins like Ceramic or aluminium filled resins, for automotive, mediacal or research, just contact us.

        How much will it cost with the projector?
        The price range for a projector compatible with our LumiPocket is from ~300$ to 600$ if you want the best and need to print at the highest quality for jewelry use.
        Remember that unlike other 3d Printers we do not ask for modification on your projector, so you will not void the warranty, you will be able to use it for other uses when not printing (you can use it for watching movies, and when you need to 3d print, you just put it over the LumiPocket), and it will last longer!

         Will you make a kit with the printer and the projector?
        We are also offering a kit with all you need. It includes the printer, the projector, the tripod and 1Kg of resin.

        Is the software included?
        The software is included, and we spent a lot of time to make the whole printing process really intuitive, even if this is your first 3d printer!

        Production Challenges

        Development of the product has already completed. We have built and tested many generations of prototypes until we found the most cost effective option. We already have been dealing in the past months with suppliers in order to be able to provide all the parts in high enough volume to support production. Our initial plan is to scale our existing setup to meet the demand. We already have the parts designed and have received manufacturing quotes. With any project there may be unforeseen difficulties and delays. In such a case we ask that you be patient while will make every effort to minimize potential impact.


        Production Timeline

        The Team

        Davide: CEO and Founder, he developed and published many projects as a simple Maker, before working on 3d printers : you can find some of his works on Instructables, Design Boom, or on his blog.

        Manuela: after years of traveling and working all around the globe, from China to India, now she takes care of administration, customer care, and dealing with suppliers.

        Marco: software developer and R&D: when he is not working on the code, he loves spending hours trying to find the perfect alchemy bewteen resins, curing time and projectors to find the best solution (so you just have to follow our instructions to get perfect prints!)

        Dario: main software developer: if our software works so well on windows, OsX and Linux, and is so intuitive, is thanks to his exceptional programming skills.

        We are a startup incubated at H-Farm, a venture incubator in Italy.
        We would also like to thank Giovanni Gaio, for supporting us in the initial stage of our project, Beltramini and Paternich for their support on the design of LumiPocket, Technogroup and NuovaMacut for their software and hardware support!

        What if I was a backer of the first campaign?

        We never stop thanking all our first backers, they supported us and helped us improving both the hardware and software; their feedback was, and still is really important for us. So we decided they earned some special reward:

        If our campaign will reach its target, everyone who bought a LumiFold from our first campaign wil receive a LumiPocket, for FREE.

        (Shipping not included).

        So if you are a previous backer, and you still believe in us, we encourage you to spread the word to friends and collegues, in order to help us continue make affordable, high quality 3d printing available to everyone!


        Stretch Goals:

        Get us to 75,000 USD and we will include structured light 3D scanning functionality, that will allow you to use the same projector used for printing to scan real objects into 3d models; all you need is a webcam and our software.

        Get us to 100,000 USD and we will add an extra perk: a Raspberry Pi based docking station. It will provide a stable support for your projector, UV post processing area, and will remove the need for a dedicated PC or Mac for the printer control.

        [Update] LumiPocket Live!

        October 3-5: We are presenting LumiPocket to the public at the biggest Italian Maker Faire in Rome, so if you pass by, we would love to answer all your questions!

        We were reviewed on the official Maker Faire blog. Read more here!

        [Update] A 3D preview of LumiPocket

 is versatile!Just by adjusting the projector height, you can go from printing very detailed object, like jewelry molds, from bigger parts up to 10cm diameter by 10 cm tall. This means that LumiPocket can be used to print many different objects, not just tiny parts!

story:
Introduce TiJUMP: The world 1st PORTABLE & SMART clothes dryer

TiJUMP was designed to solve people's clothing problems. There must be some moments that you need your clothes to dry itself in minutes to join a meeting or attend a party, even get ready for business travel . With 1000 watts powerful machine and 360° recirculating ventilation system, TiJUMP can dry your clothes in minutes and make it soft and smooth. There is a remote control for you, you can start or turn it off the device at any time and anywhere you like. It takes little room so that you can carry it in your car to travel or place it in the corner of the room.

Key features

Portable

The whole weight of TiJUMP is only 10 Kg and with the size of 67X39.5X33.5cm (26.4X15.5X13.2''), it's small and light to place in your car to travel or in your room. Especially it’s available for your school dormitory, several people could share one and make you clothes soft and clean every day.  

 

Extendable room

TiJUMP can be adjusted its drying room by stretching or shortening braces length according to your clothes size. It can reaches as high as 68 inches, which over the most of people's clothes length . Particularly for children's clothes, shorten the braces will reduce the time of drying.

 

Smart control

This smart remote control is a handheld device that helps you easily operate TiJUMP and set the time, there are four buttons: On, Off, Time control. You can start or turn it off at any time and anywhere you want. 

This is a suit that dried in TiJUMP for 3 minutes, you can clearly see the difference. Also, the clothes will get softer and cleaner than dry itself under the sunlight, especially for children's clothes, which need a better and cleaner environment  because their tender skin.

It takes different time to dry your clothes: 

2 mins for shirts and soft clothes, 5-6 mins for the suits, pants, 10-12 mins for the coats, and other thick clothes. So you can set different time duration according to your clothes. 

Recirculating ventilation system

After you put your wet clothes in TiJUMP and start it, the 1000 watts heating machine works and there will be a lot of vapor, and those hot vapor will in return heat the wet clothes, when the inner temperature comes to the limit, the condenser begins to work and the vapor will be condensed and drain out. 

(TiJUMP drying technology will reduce the time effectively)

 

Functions

Overheat protection

Automatic cut-out

Drain vapor out 

This machine makes little noise that it will not bother your normal life at all

Huge capacity

It dries 5-6 clothes at one time, it will help you most on rainy days or when you need to wear some clothes in minutes for work. this capacity is huge enough for you and your family

 

Polyester cotton clothes

TiJUMP clothes were made of polyester cotton, which is soft to touch and breathable, it can keep dust and dander out from this dryer, this will keep your clothes cleaner.

Place the braces and wire back to bottom and store TiJUMP in the corner of your room, under your desk or in the balcony.

There are two colors for you to choose

 

Risks and challenges 

Honestly, Most campaigns have risks and challenges but we try to do our best to minimize them. Now, we have completed all the design task and already put some samples into producing, and send out for review.

Our TiJMUMP clothes dryer that you can see in the above videos and photos are working prototypes. What’s more, we have our own manufacturing factory, and once we get your confirmed with the perk, we will start to produce and make the duration from ends of the campaign to give you the tracking number in half a month. Also, we need your support to make it possible as well as spread the words for our campaign

 

FAQs

1. Is your TiJUMP extendable?

Yes, you can add or remove the braces to adjust the proper height according to the clothes you are going to dry, and this will help you reduce the drying time.

2. How many clothes with TiJUMP dry at one time?

You can put 5-6 different clothes in TiJUMP, and it can hold as much as 35 lbs clothes at one time

3. Is this available for children clothes?

Yes, children's clothes should be strictly handled, the clothes will be softer and cleaner after drying in it. and we suggest that, when you use this to dry your children's clothes, just add few braces and this would reduce the drying time.

4. Does your TiJUMP work worldwide?

Yes, Our TiJUMP is designed for global supporters, we provide you with US/UK/AU/EU and other areas plugs. Also, we will start a survey and make sure your get the right plugs according to your shipping country.

5. Do you offer product warranty?

We provide two years warranty in case there are any manufacturing or shipping issues, so if there are any problems after you receive it, let our team and we will help you.

6. How long will it take for shipment once this campaign ends?

Once our campaign ends, We will collect all perks information, like your chosen colors and shipping address to our logistic company. All this could take half a month to finish, then we will send you all a personal email and let you know the tracking number. 

We are committed to offer this clothes dryer to more people and make their life easier. and what's more, it could be a one of your modern household smart devices.

How long will it take for shipment once this campaign ends?Once our campaign ends, We will collect all perks information, like your chosen colors and shipping address to our logistic company. All this could take half a month to finish, then we will send you all a personal email and let you know the tracking number. We are committed to offer this clothes dryer to more people and make their life easier. and what's more, it could be a one of your modern household smart devices.

story:
Stage 1 is the sediment pre-filter. The water passes through a mechanical filter that removes larger particles like sediment, dirt, rust and sand.

Stage 2 is the activated pre/carbon filter that removes more than 99% of chlorine and chloramines.

In stage 3’s high-efficiency reverse osmosis filter, a high-pressure pump pushes the water through the reverse osmosis membrane filtering out dangerous pollutants, chemicals and contaminants including lead, chromium 6, radium, arsenic and nitrates.

In stage 4 the water passes through an activated coconut shell VOC carbon block filter, removing toxic organic chemicals including pesticides, fertilizer, rocket fuel and drug residue. This step also ensures pristine and great tasting water.

 

More than 50 billion plastic water bottles are used every year in the United States alone. With AquaTru, you’ll never need to use a plastic water bottle again. With just one set of filters, you’re saving 4500 single-use plastic water bottles.

We’re a seasoned team that’s been working together for years to develop and market healthy home environment products. We’ve already sold more than 50,000 units of our first-generation AquaTru purifier, and now we’re back with a new and improved product. 

We believe in products that support healthy lifestyles. That’s why we created AquaTru, so that you can rest assured you’re doing good for yourself and for the people you love the most. We’re committed to transforming tap water into clean, healthy water you can trust. 

 

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
*Please note that S2 can only heat up beverages but not cool them down. And S2 must stay on the charging base.

**Please note that S2 can only preserve the heat when placed on the charging base.

Prototypes of the S2 mug have already been manufactured and they have been keeping us hydrated and keeping our drinks at the perfect temperature! Our next step is to perfect the design and functionality even further. Our suppliers and partners are in place and ready to produce quality parts at our desired quantity, then the S2 mug can go into mass production!

We all know life isn’t predictable no matter how much planning we do! With this in mind there might be unforeseen circumstances, however we are fully prepared for any eventualities and will tackle any problems we face head on.

We will be sure to keep you updated throughout the campaign and into the distant future! Please ask us as many questions as you like and feel free to leave any feedback you have about S2 mug.

With your support we can make S2 happen!

1. Which mobile devices is S2 compatible with?
S2 has its own mobile app that is compatible with both IOS and Android phones which have Bluetooth 4.0 or later.

2. What languages does S2 support?
S2 currently supports English and Chinese.

3. How long does it take to charge S2?
S2 can be fully charged in approximately 2 hours.

4.  What type of materials will my drinks be in contact with?
You will only come into contact with stainless steel and BPA free plastics.

5. Can S2 switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit?
Yes, all you have to do is switch the setting using the S2 App.

6. How do I wash S2?
S2's waterproof design of IPX7 allows for only hand-washing. As S2 is an electronic device it shouldn’t be put in the microwave or the dishwasher.

7. Who is responsible for additional taxes, duties or VAT?
The backer is responsible for these costs.

8. When will you arrange shipment of S2?
Once we receive the funds from Indiegogo, we will send out the S2 within 10 days. We will track the shipping information and keep you notified of any changes.

9. If I have any questions, how can I reach your team?
For questions related to the Indiegogo operations, you can contact at support@indiegogo.com or click here Indiegogo Help Center. If you have any other questions regarding S2, please contact us at service@smart-show.com or visit our website http://en.smart-show.com/

10. Can I get a refund?
If it is before the end of the crowdfunding campaign please refer here: Refunds: Can I get my money back? . Then you can require a refund directly from Indiegogo.

If it is after the crowdfunding campaign has finished but before the dispatch date of your S2, please contact us at service@smart-show.com. We will arrange your refund as soon as possible.

If it is after the dispatch date but before you receive S2, all refund requirements will be held until you get S2.

You have one month from the day you received S2 (date shown in the shipping system). To receive a refund, Email us and then with our written permission please send back S2, which should be in the same condition as when you received it. You will have to pay the return shipping fee within 10 days and then we will return your money when the S2 mug gets delivered to us.  

If it is after a month from when you received S2 (based on the date shown in the shipping system), you won’t be able to receive a refund.

Thank you,
Your Smartshow Team
