story:
The Doppler is Amazon Alexa enabled, so you can communicate with the Doppler using your voice. Amazon Alexa is built in the cloud, so it is always getting smarter. The more you use Alexa, the more it adapts to your speech patterns, vocabulary, and preferences with new features continually being added. Ask Alexa to answer questions, hear the news, get weather and traffic reports, control your smart home, and more.

You can use most Amazon Alexa skills on the Doppler. These will expand its capabilities even further. Some examples include:

      

Tired of repeating yourself or need to be quiet? Use the Doppler's customizable smart buttons to repeat a command at the press of a button. Stream music or automate your home, the possibilities are endless. Want to turn on the lights or order pizza? The quick access buttons will allow you to activate tons of services at the touch of a button.

Quick Access examples: 

       

With acoustically and digitally tuned full-range stereo speakers, the Sandman Doppler plays music with amazing clarity.  

The Doppler connects via Bluetooth to your phone allowing you to stream your favorite music to the Doppler's speakers. 

Just like smartphones or computers, the Doppler connects to your home’s internet wirelessly via Wi-Fi. This allows features that most alarm clocks don’t have like weather notifications, Amazon Alexa, and automatic time syncing.

      

 At a glance, quickly view the traffic on your commute, today's weather, stock prices, or even your calendar. Don't need that information? You can turn it off leaving just the time on the Doppler's huge 1.8" display. The Doppler also has a built in light sensor so the screen will automatically adjust when the brightness in the room changes, you can even turn the display totally off if you'd prefer to sleep in total darkness.

Multi-color RGB LED's allow you to customize the Doppler's screen color. Teal? Ochre? Fuchsia? No problem!

      

Phones, smartwatches, fitness trackers, tablets, power banks, cameras, and anything else that charges via USB are no problem for the Doppler. It has 6 high power USB charging ports so you can charge all of your devices at once.

To eliminate the mess of all of these cables the Doppler has a simple and effective cable management system which allows you to route your cables underneath the Doppler to organize them. There is no power brick so only one power cable goes from the back of the Doppler to the wall. The Doppler's internal power supply is dual voltage (110/220) so it will work worldwide. 

      

 In case your devices have USB-C you won't be left without a charge. You can swap out three regular USB ports and get three USB-C ports (sold separately and will be available at launch).

       

It's a smart clock, so it must have an app! Easily setup and control all aspects of the Doppler from the intuitive and free Sandman app (iOS and Android). You’ll need to use the app when you setup the Doppler and to update the software on the Doppler. We will be able to update the Doppler’s feature remotely so you can look forward to new features all the time.

Using the app you’ll be able to control multiple alarms on different days of the week. You’ll also be able to set alarms with your voice or directly onto the Doppler using the buttons. A large snooze button on top delays the inevitable. 

Keep track of the time with large 1.8 inch auto-dimming numbers. Time can be displayable in 12 or 24 hour time modes.

       

The Doppler is powered by the Next Thing Co.’s C.H.I.P. Pro and are both open source products. Want to add your own features? Great! Access the C.H.I.P. Pro via a hidden Micro-USB port.

      

Some have said that the bedside Alarm is going the way of the dodo, we all have phones! Here is why the Doppler is going to save the alarm clock from extinction.

It's Better at Checking the Time

We have all been there before, you want to check the time in the middle of the night. When you look at your phone you get blinded even if you have your brightness set to the lowest settings. After you check the time you frequently get distracted by whatever else is on your phone causing restless sleep. With an alarm clock like the Doppler, it's huge 1.8" numbers can be easily seen from across the room or without your glasses on.

It's Better at Snoozing

The Doppler can't be easily knocked off, tilted, or moved on your nightstand. The Doppler's illuminated snooze button makes it easy to find, even in a sleepy daze.

It's Better at Playing Your Music

Phone speakers are getting better and better every generation, but they aren't anything compared to the stereo speakers on the Doppler.

It Comes at a Better Price

A comparable setup would cost you:

  • Amazon Echo Dot ($50)
  • 6-port USB Charging Station ($23)
  • Bluetooth Stereo Speaker ($75)
  • Alarm Clock ($19)
  • Power Strip ($10)
  • 6 USB extension cables ($30)

Comparable setup  = $207

Sandman Doppler = $119 (Indiegogo price)

  • + includes customizable RGB digits
  • + includes date, weather, temperature Dashboard indicators
  • + clean cable management

 

Have any questions? Post a comment here or Email us here: info@paloaltoinnovation.com

     

We are hoping to have the Sandman Doppler available in 7 colors. But in order to reach our manufacturer's minimums we are going to require a minimum of 100 Dopplers in each color in order to produce it. 

  • Black
  • Orange
  • Red
  • Off-white/light gray
  • Blue
  • Green
  • Pink

   

We founded PAI (Palo Alto Innovation)  

In early 2015 we wanted to make our own products and created the original Sandman, a 4 port USB charger alarm clock. 

We Brought Our Own Product to Market

We learned a lot about how to run a business, a crowdfunding campaign, and about our product, the Sandman Clock (available now on our site and Amazon). In general, people loved it, but they really wanted it to do more... and wanted speakers!

Soon after we shipped all of our Sandman pre-orders, we started development on what would become the Doppler. The main feature that separates the Doppler from the original Sandman? You got it, speakers!

Here are some early sketches of the Doppler showing it's design evolution:

Once we chose the design and form factor for the Doppler, we could get deep into the actual mechanical engineering. Because the Doppler has speakers we had to acoustically tune the design to get the best possible sound. To do this, we experimented with different methods of sealing the Doppler, having different bass port designs (that's what the hole in the back of the Doppler is). As well as different air volumes for the sound to resonate in. This was an iterative process of testing, designing, 3d printing, and testing again. We now have a design we are very happy with!

While all of the industrial design, mechanical, and electrical engineering was going on, our software guys were hard at work on the software for the Doppler. We broke down the components of the software and tackled them one at a time: Wifi connectivity, connecting to a phone app, playing sounds, recording sound from the microphones, communicating with Amazon's servers (for Alexa support), and changing the colors of the LEDs.  

About two months ago we "locked" down the features of the Doppler and started focusing on the plan to get it manufactured. We met with the head of our manufacturing partner about the Doppler, went through the manufacturing plan, the costs, and most importantly some very important feedback called DFM (design for manufacturing). Our manufacturing partner is very excited about the new product and is ready to bring it the life.

Why we need help from Indiegogo

The tooling required to make the Doppler at scale is very expensive and is a one-time, sunk cost. We needed Kickstarter's help to get this paid for so we can start selling Dopplers to the world. Now that the Kickstarter is over we are preselling the Doppler on Indiegogo. 

      

Below is our estimated timeline. Please note that we will do our best to stick to this timeline. If something slips due to us, our manufacturer, or other vendors, we will update you. 

UPDATE: As of 3/12 this is the latest schedule for Indiegogo backers. Check the updates for the most up to date info. 

       

For those who love the nitty gritty details, here they are!  

Dimensions

  • Width: 11.6" (29.5cm)
  • Height: 4" (10.2cm)
  • Depth: 4.7" (12cm)

Speakers

  • Stereo Speakers with Bass Port
  • 220 Hz - 20 kHz
  • 14 Watt

Display

  • Large 1.8" Digits
  • Auto-dimming
  • Customizable colors and brightness
  • Display can be turned off
  • Dashboard indicators with 29 RGB dots, traffic, weather, temperature, and day of the week lights
  • 12 & 24 hour time modes

Data Connection

  • Bluetooth 4.2
  • WiFi B/G/N
  • Hidden Micro-USB

Power

  • 6 USB ports total
  • 6 High Power (2.1 amp each)
  • 3 ports user upgradeable to USB-C (sold separately)
  • Internal rechargeable battery backup in case of loss of power for alarm

C.H.I.P. Pro

  • Hidden Micro-USB port access
  • Linux OS

Amazon Alexa

 Amazon Alexa is currently only available in the following countries (as of 7/2017).  

  • United States of America
  • United Kingdom
  • Germany

Amazon is quickly expanding Amazon Alexa to other countries. If you don't have Amazon Alexa available in your country the Doppler will still work great, it just won't have all the functionality listed on this page. Any other way to get Amazon Alexa working on the device is not supported.

     

Thanks for checking out our project and we hope you'll back us today. We can't wait to get you your Sandman Doppler!

Amazon, Alexa and all related logos are trademarks of Amazon.com, Inc. or its affiliates.

story:
The collection you choose will contain an envelope with 10 GUZNIK, made of recycled material and ready to be assembled easily in about a minute. Use a candle, LED candle, or any LED lamp as your light source, depending on the level of brightness you want.


Our friends and family already use this prototype of GUZNIK at home, at work, in restaurants or hotels, such as restaurants and hotels. Choose your favorite GUZNIK collection below and order it for yourself, your business, or for a friend.

Light is beautiful!

Roni, 10 years old, can't go to bed without her GUZNIK


 

Choose your 10 GUZNIK collection from the list below, and then order it in the "Perk" section above:

LAMPARAS collections:
SHINE collection


MAGELLAN collection


ATHENS collection


FLOW collection


SPRING collection


KARMA collections:


LEONARDO collection


DOUG & TONY collection


DOLLY collection


FOREVER collection


SOHO collection


How to assemble GUZNIK?

 

 

GUZNIK's Team

Uzi Batish & Yuval Hollander

** GUZNIK's pack comes in an envelope ready to be assembled, and  do'es not include a light source - Use a candle, LED candle, or any LED lamp as your light source, depending on the level of brightness you want.
*** The recyclable material that the GUZNIK is made of may catch fire. Therefore, if candles are used, they should be placed in a glass container to prevent direct contact with the GUZNIK. Purchasers and users remain responsible for the safe use of the GUZNIK. The manufacturer, distributor and seller disclaim responsibility for the use of this product.

How to assemble GUZNIK?

Therefore, if candles are used, they should be placed in a glass container to prevent direct contact with the GUZNIK. Purchasers and users remain responsible for the safe use of the GUZNIK. The manufacturer, distributor and seller disclaim responsibility for the use of this product.

story:
Thank you for your interest

 

 This campaign was organized to mobilize the necessary funds to develop, manufacture and distribute Comfort Cushion.

 Comfort Cushion is a revolutionary new product for tourism applications, professional and personal. This is a huge market because of its multiple functions. It will be particularly appreciated during the holidays. Growing concern for the comfort as well as the tendency for general relaxation have created a market for products that reduce tensions and problems associated with improper positioning.

 

 

         

       

 

 The products multiple use

Comfort Cushion is a comfortable cushion for the head that is placed on a lounge chair on the beach or on a bed.It can also serve as a rest for the plane. During your travels, you find that the hotels pillow is not comfortable, then you use the Comfort Cushion and sleep well. In an event where you have to sit use the cushion and you sit on it. The Comfort Cushion helps you make your vacantion more enjoyable. It provides comfort and reduces stiffness of wrong positioning when you are lying on your stomach during tanning sessions or on a bed during massage.

Customizing.

Several colors are available.

                                                                          

 

Heavy Duty

The Comfort Cushion has been designed to last. Built with quality materials. It is washable waterproof, lightweight and easy to transport.The cushion quickly regains its shape after being compressed in a suitcase.

 

                                                             

 

 Fabrication

The cushion has a dimension of 51x37x16 cm. Made with durable materiels, washable and waterproof. Its soft high grade fiber filling is the same used in stuffed toys for kids. The support bracket is made of PVC pipe. It weighs less than 2 pounds.

 

Maintenance

Wash the cushion with soap and water and dries in a short time.

 

 

                                                                          

The market

Hotels users, cruises, massage experts and individuals are all potential customers of the product. There is huge sale potential because of its possibilities.

The main market is :

The biggest market are hotels considering the number of long chair and beach chairs, just imagine how many hotels and chairs across the world.

Trades articles patios fourniture store

Massage accessory shops

Specialist in massage therapy

Individuals.

 

                                                                                                            

Production

The Comfort cushion will be manufactured by a specialized compagny. When funding is optained the development and manufacturing will start an soon as possible. The first order will be for investors who contribute to the campaign on Indiegogo.

 

Warranty

I offer a one year warranty for all purchases.

 

History

The idea came to me during a trip to the Dominicaine republic. There was couple near us on the beach. The lady was lying on her beach chair and wanted to read lying on her stomach with her book on the ground but it caused her discomfort in the neck and shoulders. She asked her hunsband to find a solution for her to be comfortable. Her hunsband has done everything possible to satisfy her but he did not find anything. That’s when I got the idea to create a comfortable cushion to install on a lounge chair in any possible positions. It’s after several prototypes that I finally managed to create the Comfort Cushion.

 

Who Am I

Inventor of the Comfort Cushion my name is Danielle Belanger. I was born in Quebec city in Canada. My main job is a waitress. I count a few years as secretary and accounting for the compagny of my hunsband. I make sure to surround myself with the wright people to help me ensure proper managment of the compagny in all areas.

 

Challenges

The biggest challenge is to reach the goal set by the campaign. Several efforts have been done to know the Comfort Cushion, ensuring that as many people as possible hear about this innovative product. The funding will be used to complete and develop the product organizing production and implant a dynamic marketing program.

 

Conclusion

The past ten years, people are looking for relaxing and comfortable products and my cushion is one of them.My product is versitile, comfortable with sale potentials. That has almost no limits.

The prototypes were tested, with people on vacantion at the beach and a massage therapist with 22 years experience. All people who have tried liked the cushion and are conviced that the comfort Cushion will be successful globally.

 

I thank all investors for the funds that will make my Comfort Cushion a world wide success.

story:
Short Summary

Hello,
My name is Marta and I live in a beautiful little town called Slunj in Croatia :)
I'm an artist and I am constantly inspired by the beautiful nature I am surrounded with.
I'm a nature lover and a tree huger :)
I love long walks through the forest, and what saddens me the most is when I see people throwing waste, especially large waste in ditches and beautiful groves in the forest.
As an environmentally conscious person I live by the rule:
Reduce, reuse, recycle, repair or make :)

I love junk! :)
And I often salvage old things from getting thrown in the dumpster,
like: old dishes, hand me down clothes and my favorite - old vintage furniture and antique trinkets and decorations :)
I believe that people need to be reminded of old life values and old ways. Modern lifestyle is unfortunately based on wasteful mentality and mass production of low quality goods.

I love crafting! :D 
My passion is creating something new and beautiful out of the old and rusty. Old stuff can be reused in so many creative ways and it gives me a lot of pleasure to give it a new purpose. Vintage things carry the story of their past owners and that almost makes them alive, and by renewing them I give them a new life :)

I want to share this passion with others and I want to teach people to create and surround themselves with beautiful things that have a story to them as well.

I've thought a lot about how I could combine my passions and experiences to make a difference in my local community.
Preaching has never worked well, so I thought maybe it would be best to just give the people a different choice, because, as Bob Merritt wrote - "A good choice today will lead to a better tomorrow. We have the power to choose." We have to use that power wisely.

A second hand shop seemed like the only logical solution.
So I decided to open the first Vintage Shop in town :)

What's special about my store is that I plan to create a small and cozy space for reading and relaxing where the customers could sit and maybe read a few lines of a book that intrigued them, or just observe the decorations and ornaments while listening to relaxing music. I believe that a warmly decorated environment in which the buyers would feel at home would have a relaxing effect and allow them to leisurely try on the items they like and leave the store with full hands without feeling a drastic decrease in their budget, which is the charm of shopping second hand.

I'm just trying to make an honest living by combining my experiences and passions.

Please help me achieve that.

 

What We Need & What You Get

  • I have done a lot of calculating and I have come to the amount of 5.000$ (3.700$ for products, 850$ for store interior design and 450$ for Web shop). I believe that would be enough to decorate the shop locality, create a Web shop and supply the store with all the products I would love to sell, which are:
  1. Second hand clothing and shoes for men, women and children
  2. Old renewed furniture and lighting appliances in vintage style
  3. A bunch of old books!, vinyls and antique decorations 
  4. Kitchen accessories in vintage style like - utensils, cookware, baking supplies, glasses, mugs, food storage containers made from glass and ceramics (not plastic).
  5. Handmade home decor textiles in vintage style - kitchen and bathroom towels, aprons, coasters, curtains, bed sheets, pillow covers and decor pillows etc.
  6. Arts and craft supplies
  7. All kinds of decorations, jewelry and art created by local artists
  • In the facility I plan to arrange a small cozy space for reading and relaxing for customers to feel more comfortable and to take their time to select clothes and small gifts for themselves or their loved ones, and maybe read a few lines of the book which they may have an interest in. I believe that a warmly decorated environment in which the buyers would feel at home would have a relaxing effect and allow the customers to go wild and try all the items they like and leave the store with full hands without feeling a drastic decrease in their household budget, which is the charm of shopping in a store with second-hand goods.
  • For customers that prefer to shop in the peaceful corner of their house, I would create a website and profiles on various social networks to provide information at all times about new collections and offers, and a variety of monthly sales, which of course would be successful marketing for the store and would attract new customers. I would also allow customers the ability to order their desired items if they weren't available in the store.
  • My goal is to create a family atmosphere where everyone would feel welcome.

Here are some ideas for the store's interior design:

https://www.pinterest.com/forestskyowl/vintage-...

 

  • If I don't reach my goal I would still use the funds to try to start the business. I would start with less supplies, but I would still try to make it work, since this is currently my only option to earn a living for me and my small family.

The Impact

I want to provide the local community with cheap but great quality products produced in our country. That way I would give them more for less, and I would also be supporting my country's economy. I believe that shopping second hand is ecological, and I would try to acquire kitchen supplies made from recyclable and more environmentally friendly materials, so in that way I would at least have a small impact in protecting our already highly polluted planet. I also want to encourage local artists to create and sell their art and products, to encourage buying local and to help some starving artists to put some funds in their home budgets. 

My long term goal is to create a successful business where my whole family could work. 
My mother is an experienced seamstress (among other things), and I would love to provide her an opportunity to sew home decor textiles and clothing which she really enjoys to do. I would love to sell homemade products made from organic fabrics.
My father is a self-learned carpenter (among other things) and I would love to create an opportunity for him to produce and fix furniture which he is really good at.
I also have 4 sisters and all of them are very artistic and would love to create decorations and jewelry to sell in the store. All of them are also lovers of vintage clothing and furniture and we would all be so happy to create a family business that we would all enjoy working in. 

Opening a Vintage shop would be a dream come true for me and my family.
We are a crafty family and we love it :)
Most of all, it would allow me to earn a living for myself, because it's very hard to find employment in our small community.

Risks & Challenges

Every business has it's risks and challenges. Even though I have a lot of experience in sale, I still can't be 100% sure that I will provide all the products that the potential customers need or like.
I will however do my best to listen to the customers and to be attuned to their needs so that I can adapt everything based on their feedback.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help. Tell your friends and family. Please share this campaign using the Indiegogo share tools!
Also visit my Facebook page that serves as a vision board for the future shop and please share 
https://www.facebook.com/MartasVintageShop/

story:
Summary of the Engine Project

U.S. industry consumes $100 billion worth of heat energy every year, largely in fossil fuels, and most of that energy just goes up the chimney.  There are 500,000 industrial stacks throwing off heat and pollution around America.  What if that wasted heat could be used as fuel to create electricity?  What if U.S. manufacturers could make enough electricity from their own waste heat to run their company plant; to light, heat and cool its offices; and produce extra electricity to feed into the grid to power homes and commercial buildings?  A pretty effective way to keep electricity independent, clean, efficient and inexpensive.

That is what we are working toward, and it could change everything for the American and world economy.  Basically, waste heat energy is free, since it would just be lost to the atmosphere.  The problem is that the most efficient heat engine to date, the Stirling engine, is still dropping a sizable portion of that available heat energy.

As a sculptor and as a problem solver, I'm comfortable working with complex forms– when I realized that the Stirling engine (the acknowledged cutting edge of engine efficiency) was throwing away a sizable portion of its energy – I set out to discover the reason why.  The human mind can only handle about three factors at a time, meaning that, if this complex problem in thermodynamics – involving temperature, pressure, the three dimensions of volume, entropy, fluid density, as well as an array of cycling characteristics, the flow rate, and the inertia of the mechanisms – was to be understood, I needed to establish a very complex, yet flexible, infrastructure of parameters and distill them down to a simple mechanism.  Ten years down the road, I have secured patents and built a working Soony engine prototype which promises a 20% leap in efficiency over state-of-the-art Stirling engines.

We are developing the most efficient reciprocating engine on the planet, and it will convert everyday heat into electricity.  Soony Systems, Inc., was established as an outgrowth of the thermodynamic discoveries surrounding the Soony cycle and near adiabatic engine.  The University of Maryland is poised to work on this project, and we are building a company to promote waste heat management that will utilize this engine.  Many companies have already provided expertise and components during the construction of the prototype -- including heat exchanger experts, seal experts, fitting experts, as well as milling machinists and fabricators.  With more than 20 related patents or patents pending, our company is exploring industrial sources and ways to integrate my breakthrough into a number of clean, energy-saving applications.  As a graduate in architecture from Georgia Institute of Technology with a strong background in math and geometry, I received a DOE Appropriate Energy Technology Small Grant (proposal #81-DC-0013-P-30,524) in 1981 to design and build a solar energy circulatory system, the embryonic stage of this breakthrough. Since then, while simultaneously pursuing my career as a sculptor, I have sought to design and achieve the most efficient Combined Heat to Power (CHP) engine in existence.

Despite the personal cost to me in time and money, the immeasurable good that this engine can do has kept me going.  The Mechanical Engineering Department of the University of Maryland has come on board, and in conjunction with Maryland Industrial Partnership (MIPS) will be working with us to develop the Soony Engine.  The partnership grant will allow us to conduct thorough testing and to refine the design into an Alpha prototype.  But MIPS funding also requires 10% cost sharing.  A vast majority of our funds have gone into securing domestic and international patents to protect this technology so that we can grow the company in America and provide jobs in the United States, setting an example for growth globally.  While securing the patents equity has been expensive and continues to drain our small budget, the bench prototype that was developed on a shoe-string has attracted the interest of several highly respected UMD experts who believe in the Soony technology and want to participate in bringing this highly efficient clean energy heat engine to the market.  So your help is essential.  Your contribution will have a phenomenal impact on the energy future in America and the world.

I don't expect you to give without a fair exchange.  As a sculptor, I have an inventory of artwork, see www.sculptorjohnston.com and can offer you a wide array of bronze sculptures, including those pieces listed as perks.  You can peruse through my website www.sculptorjohnston.com and, if you find another work that interests you more and that particular piece is available, we can work something out.  Even if you yourself don’t have the means to contribute, you may know someone who does and can grasp this vision. Indiegogo Share Tools are designed to reach out to potential contributors.  Take a moment to pass this on to a friend or colleague – it could be the best idea you ever give them.

 

This is the "Millennium Medal," 3" in diameter, available as a perk for $150

This medal is designed to stimulate reflection by looking at the relationship of "conscience and consciousness." The obverse side, "conscience," is represented by a female figure nurturing the core of her being, her inner world. From her center is born a deep inner knowing or conscience, where lies the heart of human awareness. This circle, also representing the earth, becomes a portal to the reverse side of the medal which addresses "consciousness" -- a greater awareness of our responsibilities to ourselves, others, and the world about us.

 

 

This is the "Nurtured Nurturer," 3" in diameter, available as a perk for $180

This is a two-sided medal of a Mother and child. After seeing the sensual female figure, the reverse side surprises the viewer with a loving mother embracing her child. This affordable gift is perfect for Mother's Day and for recognition of motherhood and childbirth.

 

 

This is the "Little Romantic Notion," a bronze, 12.5" x 8.5" x 4" for $3800

The height of romantic humor, a naked knight grabs his yearning damsel and carries her off to his castle so as to live happily ever after.

 

 

This is "Wedlock," bronze 26" x 8" x 5.5" available as a perk for $6500

This is the original maquette for the 19.5' bronze commissioned for the entrance of Lafayette Center in Washington, D.C.  Conceived vertically, it compels alignment and unity. At the core, a merger of extended arms captures a broad embrace, transferring energy inward and outward. The female, although physically supporting the male, is effortless as if the two are floating in space.

 

 

This is the "Bather," bronze, 18.5" x 17" x 8.5", available for $7000

As if a sun goddess, the "Bather" flinges her hair from out of the ocean with sensual vigor as she raises her face to the heavens.

 

 

This is the "DNA Maypole," bronze 39.5" x 14" x 11.5" for $9000

Suggesting a parallel between the double helix of a DNA and the spiraling Maypole as a fertility symbol, the descending couple joins hands and reaches down into the upward spiraling genetic pool of children.

 

This is the "King Lear," bronze 25" x 24" x 6" available for $9000

King Lear staggers through a raging storm, his cape flying wildly in the wind.  After having rejected his loving daughter Cornelia, he tragically realizes the consequences of his foolish alliance with his conniving older daughters.

 

 

This is the "Virgilance," bronze 23" x 12" x 9" available for $9000

She sits firm and vigilant, bearing the wisdom of experience - a judicious caretaker of the sword of strength. Vigilance guards against incursions, preserves her gains and remains cooly ready for the next battle. No longer young, her flesh shows as much the effect of gravity as her demeanor illustrates her gravitas.

 

 

This is the "Ballerina," bronze 32" x 42" x 18" available for $10000

Fully extended in a forward lunge, this piece was inspired by an instantaneous moment seen years earlier in the Broadway production, Dance. The gesture is strong from every view.

of its energy – I set out to discover the reason why.  The human mind can only handle about three factors at a time, meaning that, if this complex problem in thermodynamics – involving temperature, pressure, the three dimensions of volume, entropy, fluid density, as well as an array of cycling characteristics, the flow rate, and the inertia of the mechanisms – was to be understood, I needed to establish a very complex, yet flexible, infrastructure of parameters and distill them down to a simple mechanism.  Ten years down the road, I have secured patents and built a working Soony engine prototype which promises a 20% leap in efficiency over state-of-the-art Stirling engines.We are developing the most efficient reciprocating engine on the planet, and it will convert everyday heat into electricity.  Soony Systems, Inc., was established as an outgrowth of the thermodynamic discoveries surrounding the Soony cycle and near adiabatic engine.  The University of Maryland is poised to work on this project, and we are building a company to promote waste heat management that will utilize this engine.  Many companies have already provided expertise and components during the construction of the prototype -- including heat exchanger experts, seal experts, fitting experts, as well as milling machinists and fabricators.  With more than 20 related patents or patents pending, our company is exploring industrial sources and ways to integrate my breakthrough into a number of clean, energy-saving applications.  As a graduate in architecture from Georgia Institute of Technology with a strong background in math and geometry, I received a DOE Appropriate Energy Technology Small Grant (proposal #81-DC-0013-P-30,524) in 1981 to design and build a solar energy circulatory system, the embryonic stage of this breakthrough. Since then, while simultaneously pursuing my career as a sculptor, I have sought to design and achieve the most efficient Combined Heat to Power (CHP) engine in existence.Despite the personal cost to me in time and money, the immeasurable good that this engine can do has kept me going.  The Mechanical Engineering Department of the University of Maryland has come on board, and in conjunction with Maryland Industrial Partnership (MIPS) will be working with us to develop the Soony Engine.  The partnership grant will allow us to conduct thorough testing and to refine the design into an Alpha prototype.  But MIPS funding also requires 10% cost sharing.  A vast majority of our funds have gone into securing domestic and international patents to protect this technology so that we can grow the company in America and provide jobs in the United States, setting an example for growth globally.  While securing the patents equity has been expensive and continues to drain our small budget, the bench prototype that was developed on a shoe-string has attracted the interest of several highly respected UMD experts who believe in the Soony technology and want to participate in bringing this highly efficient clean energy heat engine to the market.  So your help is essential.  Your contribution will have a phenomenal impact on the energy future in America and the world.I don't expect you to give without a fair exchange.  As a sculptor, I have an inventory of artwork, see www.sculptorjohnston.com and can offer you a wide array of bronze sculptures, including those pieces listed as perks.  You can peruse through my website www.sculptorjohnston.com and, if you find another work that interests you more and that particular piece is available, we can work something out.  Even if you yourself don’t have the means to contribute, you may know someone who does and can grasp this vision. Indiegogo Share Tools are designed to reach out to potential contributors.  Take a moment to pass this on to a friend or colleague – it could be the best idea you ever give them.
 
This is the "Millennium Medal," 3" in diameter, available as a perk for $150

This medal is designed to stimulate reflection by looking at the relationship of "conscience and consciousness." The obverse side, "conscience," is represented by a female figure nurturing the core of her being, her inner world. From her center is born a deep inner knowing or conscience, where lies the heart of human awareness. This circle, also representing the earth, becomes a portal to the reverse side of the medal which addresses "consciousness" -- a greater awareness of our responsibilities to ourselves, others, and the world about us.
 
 
This is the "Nurtured Nurturer," 3" in diameter, available as a perk for $180



This is a two-sided medal of a Mother and child. After seeing the sensual female figure, the reverse side surprises the viewer with a loving mother embracing her child. This affordable gift is perfect for Mother's Day and for recognition of motherhood and childbirth.
 
 
This is the "Little Romantic Notion," a bronze, 12.5" x 8.5" x 4" for $3800



The height of romantic humor, a naked knight grabs his yearning damsel and carries her off to his castle so as to live happily ever after.
 
 
This is "Wedlock," bronze 26" x 8" x 5.5" available as a perk for $6500



This is the original maquette for the 19.5' bronze commissioned for the entrance of Lafayette Center in Washington, D.C.  Conceived vertically, it compels alignment and unity. At the core, a merger of extended arms captures a broad embrace, transferring energy inward and outward. The female, although physically supporting the male, is effortless as if the two are floating in space.
 
 
This is the "Bather," bronze, 18.5" x 17" x 8.5", available for $7000



As if a sun goddess, the "Bather" flinges her hair from out of the ocean with sensual vigor as she raises her face to the heavens.
 
 
This is the "DNA Maypole," bronze 39.5" x 14" x 11.5" for $9000



Suggesting a parallel between the double helix of a DNA and the spiraling Maypole as a fertility symbol, the descending couple joins hands and reaches down into the upward spiraling genetic pool of children.
 
This is the "King Lear," bronze 25" x 24" x 6" available for $9000

King Lear staggers through a raging storm, his cape flying wildly in the wind.  After having rejected his loving daughter Cornelia, he tragically realizes the consequences of his foolish alliance with his conniving older daughters.
 
 
This is the "Virgilance," bronze 23" x 12" x 9" available for $9000
She sits firm and vigilant, bearing the wisdom of experience - a judicious caretaker of the sword of strength. Vigilance guards against incursions, preserves her gains and remains cooly ready for the next battle. No longer young, her flesh shows as much the effect of gravity as her demeanor illustrates her gravitas.
 
 
This is the "Ballerina," bronze 32" x 42" x 18" available for $10000

Fully extended in a forward lunge, this piece was inspired by an instantaneous moment seen years earlier in the Broadway production, Dance. The gesture is strong from every view.

story:
Successfully Funded 

The Smart Lid products can now be purchased from www.smartlid.com


Distribution enquiries welcome: anthony@smartlid.com




What Is It About?

The Smart Lid is about Creating Awareness: For You, For Your Children & The Elderly.

 

What Is The Smart Lid?

Smart Lids are heat sensitive color changing disposable beverage lids.

Smart Lids turn bright red with heat. Smart Lids change back to dark colour as your drink cools. A visual indicator that your drink may be hot (or above 118oF). Patented sealing indicator shows lid attached properly.

 

The Smart Lid has been recognized the world-over for its innovative occupational health and safety features including Occupational Health & Safety New Product of the Year Award.

 

The Hot Coffee Problem

We all know coffee can be hot, but accidents and spillages still happen.

How do you know your drink is hot without trying it?

We set out to find a simple solution: THE SMART LID

 

The Smart Lid has been retooled from bottom up to have a clean ergonomic design while maximizing structural integrity, stackability and ease of use to place on a hot beverage while still being able to drink through the lid.

 

The Smart Lid Solution – How It Works

Place the heat sensitive smart lid on your drink and it changes colour to bright red, indicating when your coffee is hot enough to burn. The Smart Lid creates awareness that contents may be hot and decreasing the chance of lid being applied incorrectly.

 

All hot beverage drinkers having different heat tolerances, current lids and cups leave coffee drinkers no option but to test the coffee temperature with their mouth


The rewards above are solely based on Indiegogos' built-in Referrals Contest data collected using their tracking systems. More information at Indiegogo Support


What They Are Saying About Us

Psfk – “This helps drinkers avoid unnecessary mouth and hand burns.”

CNET – “Smart Lid silently screams, 'Hot coffee!'”

Ubergizmo – “be more careful whenever we see a red colored lid”

Trend Hunter – “Having come across this piece years earlier would have saved me a lot of burnt tongue incidents.”

 

All materials used in the production of the Smart Lid comply with the following direct food-contact regulations: USA - Food and Drug Administration FDA CFR 21; Europe - Council of Europe Committee of Ministers Resolution AP(89).

 

Social Media Links / Let’s Stay in Touch

Facebook   Twitter   Youtube   Pinterest   LinkedIn

 

Our Story

The Smart Lid journey was born 12 years ago when a father and two sons wanted to reinvent how all daily coffee drinkers enjoyed their hot beverage. 

We owned and operated local cafes in Sydney, Australia, and wished to offer customers a coffee lid that warned of the hot contents. 

This dream ignited the passion for a better designed coffee lid, one that turned bright red as heat was applied, and one which returned to the ‘cold’ colour as your drink cooled.

 

Based in Sydney, Australia, we have honed our specialty in heat sensitive technology for disposable containers over many years of R&D and testing.

Everyone we spoke to in the industry said we were trying to design a product that was technically not possible. After 12 years of research, we have gone through countless prototypes to perfect a set of ‘cold’ and ‘hot’ colours that make all coffee drinkers say ‘WOW’, we have the technical and production backing of Australia’s largest coffee lid manufacturer, we have received direct food-contact compliance, we have Granted patents, and along the way we have won 8 international awards for innovation and design.

 

Consumer Adaptation

Bringing the Smart Lid to USA coffee drinkers and major retailers.

Six months ago our first production run occurred for commercial quantity distribution to cafes in Australia. 

As the weeks went by the biggest response we received came from coffee drinkers who wanted the Smart Lid for their home, their office and for use around elderly family members. 

The Smart Lid has received a lot of international media attention and as a result we are asked everyday, mainly from the USA and from Europe, how daily coffee drinkers can get their hands on the Smart Lid.

 

Full thickness skin burns commence at 120°F / 48°C, however gradual temperature rises equate to dramatic decreases in scald times. Source: American Burn Association.

A successfully funded project will allow us to bring the Smart Lid to the USA and European markets in the form of consumer bundles, Smart Lids and cups in one package. Perfect for use at home, in the office, or for use around elderly family members.


Product Specs

Plastic Type: High Impact Polystyrene (HIPS); Carries a Recycle ‘6’ Symbol; Bisphenol A (BPA) Free; CFC Free; Manufactured in a HACCP and ISO 9001:2000 certified production facility.

 

The Smart Lid is a disposable hot coffee lid that turns bright red with the application of heat (above 118oF / 48oC), and returns to the cold colour as your hot drink cools. 

Material Plastic Composition HIPS, Recycle 6 

Thermochromic plastic additive : 

USA Direct Food-Contact Compliant (Food and Drug Administration FDA CFR 21) 

European Direct Food-Contact Compliant (Council of Europe Committee of Ministers Resolution AP 89) 

Meets the requirements of Food Standards Australia New Zealand (FSANZ) 

Smart Lid is Bisphenol A (BPA) Free. and CFC Free 

Smart Lid is not suitable for microwave use.

 

Funding

To bring the Smart Lid to the USA and Europe requires changes in our product assembly.  Working capital to establish a production line to bring the Smart Lid and associated cups direct to coffee drinkers is $8,000. This includes minimum orders for stock from our manufacturer, packaging, and volume export shipping to the USA for centralized distribution. 

Delivery and shipping is estimated to be about 90 days from the close of a successfully funded project.

 

Risks And Challenges

 

Plastic Type: High Impact Polystyrene (HIPS); Carries a Recycle ‘6’ Symbol; Bisphenol A (BPA) Free; CFC Free; Manufactured in a HACCP and ISO 9001:2000 certified production facility.

The majority of the risks and challenges have been resolved. The Smart Lid has already been undertaken its first mass produced test run, it has been tested and deemed direct food-contact compliant, we have a strong relationship with suppliers and already have manufacture contracts in place.


When To Expect Delivery

Early MARCH: Campaign Closes. Orders are finalized.

APRIL: Raw material production completed and shipped to factory.

Late APRIL: Main production and sorting of lid and cup combinations.

MAY: Products packed and shipped to distribution centers.

JUNE: Products arrive at distribution centres in USA to be sorted, labeled and shipped.

JULY: The Smart Lid arrives to you.

 

In Conclusion

Please pledge an amount you are comfortable with to receive the ultimate in Smart Packaging.


FAQ’s

Questions asked by coffee drinkers:

Q: Why does the Smart Lid glow RED?

A: The Smart Lid promotes safety awareness of hot beverages for coffee/tea drinkers and foodservice staff.

When the contents of the cup are hot, the Smart Lid turns red to warn you to be careful.

 

Q: Will the Smart Lid turn back to the brown cold colour?

A: Yes it does. The lid is a visual indicator for the present temperature of the contained liquids. Therefore as the beverage cools, the colour of the lid will indicate this appropriately, and slowly change back to its cold colour.

 

Q: Does the Smart Lid change colour on all types of hot beverages?

A: The Smart Lid reacts to heat, so the lid will change colour on all type of beverages. However, with coffee types like Cappuccinos and Lattes, the speed of which the lid will turn red is slower than very hot beverages like teas or black coffee.

 

Q: At what temperature does the colour change occur and why?

A: The Smart Lid turns Red at 120°F / 48°C.

The ideal brewing temperature for hot coffee is about 190°F, while full thickness skin burns can commence as low as 120°F. however gradual temperature rises equate to dramatic decreases in scald times.

 

Q: Why is the Smart Lid disposable?

A: The lid comes in contact with your mouth so bacteria has a higher propensity to accumulate on the lid, the most sanitary option is to dispose of it.

A: We wanted a product that could be used by both cafes and the home user.

A: The specialty plastic is extremely expensive, thus a reuseable plastic lid would be much more expensive.

 

Questions asked by café operators:

Q: How does it work?

A: The Smart Lid is infused with a colour changing additive, and when there is a change in temperature the lid responds by glowing red.

 

Q: How can I communicate the benefits of using the Smart Lid to my customers?

A: We strongly recommend promoting the benefits of the Smart Lid by displaying a point-of-sale brochure either affixed to the coffee machine or where the hot beverage is collected by the consumer.

story:
Have you ever experienced these frustrating problems?

1.Every smart device has a different charger and they always seem to end up in a big tangled mess of cables and charging bricks making it difficult to find what you need. 

2.Lack of a convenient portable option to replace bulky laptop wall charger. 

3.Different countries have different plugs and you need to carry extra converters and adapters while traveling.  

4.USB-C is becoming a standard for smart devices, but you find yourself needing a charger with more USB-C ports for future devices.
 

Now, all of those problems are solved with CHARGIC - the smallest yet most powerful 100W or 65W GaN charge with 3 USB-C & 1 USB-A ports, capable of quick charging up to 3 laptops simultaneously or charging 4 smart devices of any kind at the same time. Small enough to be carried anywhere, CHARGIC is the only charger you need. 
 

The Amazing 2020 iPad Pro & The New MacBook Air Just Released!! Let's Charge 3X Faster With  CHARGIC!!
 

  •  CHARGIC can charge your smart devices faster and charge your "Apple Package" at the same time! 
  •  100W Fast Charging Is The New Standard 

100W CHARGIC supports USB-C with 100W output and can fully charge MacBook Pro (16-inch, 2019) which requires 96W of power supply. It is the next-generation high-power charger that you need now, and in the future.  
 

  • Quick Charging 3 MacBooks Simultaneously

CHARGIC comes with 3 USB-C ports, supporting PD protocols and smart power splitting which is a first in the world. A single 100W CHARGIC can charge 3 MacBook laptops at fast speed simultaneously. 
 

  • Charging 4 Different Devices Simultaneously

Intelligent AI Power MCU (microcontroller unit) ensures fast charging speeds, as well as stable power distribution for all 4 devices that are plugged in. It is the ultimate charger to power-up all your different smart devices at the same time. 
 

  • Support for Multiple Phone Charging Protocols

There are many different charging protocols for iPhone and Android phones. CHARGIC can support all fast-charging protocols to ensure that your device charges at the fastest safe speed. 
 

  • Why 65W CHARGIC

The affordable 65W CHARGIC is the best value for your money available on the market today. It is compact, reliable and powerful for creators, designers, photographers and anyone who need to quickly charge multiple pieces of equipment at the same time.
 

  • Equally Powerful But Smaller

Both 100W & 65W CHARGIC offer you the ultimate value for connectivity, compatibility, and most importantly versatility. But the 65W version is much smaller, just about the same size as an AirPods case. It can quickly charge most smart devices at their maximum speed with the exception of laptops. 
 

 Just slightly larger than the 65W version, the 100W CHARGIC is about the same size as a cigarette pack. Both are smaller than any other chargers of the same output standard on the current market. Save more space in your bag or luggage while still enjoying lightning-fast charging. 
 

  • One Charger, Charges All

CHARGIC supports almost all electronic devices' fast charge protocols. It is the only charger that you need to charge all of your devices.  
 

  • Powered by Navitas GaNFast Tech

Both 100W and 65W CHARGIC use an advanced Navitas GaN chip. This high-end chip is exclusively made for CHARGIC. The compact, lightweight and space-saving chip allows for a smaller, more convenient form factor. GaN technology represents the next generation of power technology and CHARGIC is the only charger you need to step into the future. 
 

 
  • Safety Is No.1 Priority

With an intelligent safety temperature control chip built-in, CHARGIC delivers optimal quick charging for all smart devices, with protections against overloads, overvoltage, over-temperature, and short circuits to keep you and your electronics safe.
 

 CHARGIC’s convertible and foldable pin design supports 110V to 240V worldwide voltages, which can be used everywhere in the world. So for all professionals who travel or creators who need a quick boost on their equipment, CHARGIC is the only charger needed for work or leisure. 
 

  •  Choosing between the 65W & 100W CHARGIC is easy. Here is how:  

The 65W CHARGIC is perfect for creators, designers, students or for all consumers who are using several electronic devices. 
 

The 100W CHARGIC will be your handy tool in a group working environment, where 3 laptops can be charged with only one charger. Or use the 100W CHARGIC to charge up your more energy-intensive devices like gaming laptops. 
 

The idea behind the whole project is simple, perhaps I would say straight forward. We want to create a product that could provide values to all CHARGIC users.

  • CHARGIC has to be small and compact enough to be carried around. So we utilized the best materials (GaN) and adopted the most advanced changing technology (Navitas GaNFast Tech); 
  • CHARGIC has to be versatile enough to provide the most convenient charging experiences. So based on marketing research, we have included 3 USB-C & 1 USB-A on CHARGIC with convertible pin adapters, to allow you to charge up all of your smart devices at the same time, and bring it with you anywhere in the world.
  • CHARGIC has to be powerful enough and take advantage of GaN technology to cut down the charging time. So now we can proudly announce that CHARGIC is the world’s first GaN charger that capable of quick charging 3 laptops at the same time.
     

Unmistakeably, CHARGIC has been tested thoroughly and systematically to ensure safety during charging. So far CHARGIC passed all the tests necessary to be qualified for mass production. Therefore, we are confident to tell you the CHARGIC story. Because we love it, and we hope you will like it too!!

Equally Powerful But Smaller
Both 100W & 65W CHARGIC offer you the ultimate value for connectivity, compatibility, and most importantly versatility. But the 65W version is much smaller, just about the same size as an AirPods case. It can quickly charge most smart devices at their maximum speed with the exception of laptops.  
 
 
 Just slightly larger than the 65W version, the 100W CHARGIC is about the same size as a cigarette pack. Both are smaller than any other chargers of the same output standard on the current market. Save more space in your bag or luggage while still enjoying lightning-fast charging.  
 
 
 
One Charger, Charges All
CHARGIC supports almost all electronic devices' fast charge protocols. It is the only charger that you need to charge all of your devices.   
 
 
Powered by Navitas GaNFast Tech
Both 100W and 65W CHARGIC use an advanced Navitas GaN chip. This high-end chip is exclusively made for CHARGIC. The compact, lightweight and space-saving chip allows for a smaller, more convenient form factor. GaN technology represents the next generation of power technology and CHARGIC is the only charger you need to step into the future.  
 Safety Is No.1 Priority
With an intelligent safety temperature control chip built-in, CHARGIC delivers optimal quick charging for all smart devices, with protections against overloads, overvoltage, over-temperature, and short circuits to keep you and your electronics safe. 

 
 
 CHARGIC’s convertible and foldable pin design supports 110V to 240V worldwide voltages, which can be used everywhere in the world. So for all professionals who travel or creators who need a quick boost on their equipment, CHARGIC is the only charger needed for work or leisure.  
 
 
 Choosing between the 65W & 100W CHARGIC is easy. Here is how:  
The 65W CHARGIC is perfect for creators, designers, students or for all consumers who are using several electronic devices.  
 
The 100W CHARGIC will be your handy tool in a group working environment, where 3 laptops can be charged with only one charger. Or use the 100W CHARGIC to charge up your more energy-intensive devices like gaming laptops.  

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
The idea behind the whole project is simple, perhaps I would say straight forward. We want to create a product that could provide values to all CHARGIC users.

CHARGIC has to be small and compact enough to be carried around. So we utilized the best materials (GaN) and adopted the most advanced changing technology (Navitas GaNFast Tech); 
CHARGIC has to be versatile enough to provide the most convenient charging experiences. So based on marketing research, we have included 3 USB-C & 1 USB-A on CHARGIC with convertible pin adapters, to allow you to charge up all of your smart devices at the same time, and bring it with you anywhere in the world.
CHARGIC has to be powerful enough and take advantage of GaN technology to cut down the charging time. So now we can proudly announce that CHARGIC is the world’s first GaN charger that capable of quick charging 3 laptops at the same time. 


Unmistakeably, CHARGIC has been tested thoroughly and systematically to ensure safety during charging. So far CHARGIC passed all the tests necessary to be qualified for mass production. Therefore, we are confident to tell you the CHARGIC story. Because we love it, and we hope you will like it too!!

story:
Probably the hardest part besides writing a script and getting the budget ready for your film is the search of: Cast, Crew, Locations, Equipments, and all the stuff you'll need to shoot.

We have all been there. Posting on Facebook, spreading the word among friends or school bulletins, it's a hard process that we have just made easier....

We are creating a professional network where you'll be able to login, create a profile to post, and join projects.

 

Well it's simple, say you have your script ready, but really that's all you have. You could then login to The Film Network (TFN), create a user, a profile and post a project. 

Add a description or tagline of what your project or film is about, and specify what cast and crew you have, or are in need of. Once your project is posted other users can see it, if someone is interested in a certain position they can send you a notification or contact request. Then it's up to you, if you think that person is an ideal candidate to be your director, you can accept his notification and bam! your film now has a director. 

Just like you can post a project, you can also search projects. Maybe, you'll find yourself wanting to participate perhaps as an editor or cinematographer? You never know!

Not really, that is the main purpose of TFN, but we go further than that. We want our platform to really offer you everything you'll need for your projects. We are talking about listings of companies that sell or rent from equipment, products, services, locations to whatever you could need. 

Our idea encompasses a section with articles or reviews of software, books, products and how-to tutorials to help you along. And also a promotional tools section with listings of companies that offer discounts or services you will one day find yourself needing to promote your film (e.g. Website, Press Kit, Posters, etc.)

So, we really are talking about a network that will have everything you will need in one place. In other words we thought of the process you will undergo when you take a quantum leap and start working on your project, from beginning to the end. 

We need your help. We are in the process of finishing the final details for the design of our network, which we will share once completed. Furthermore we are developing and started coding some of the modules for the TFN.

We are looking at a 4 months development. Every penny helps and each cent will be spent on the developement so we can successfully launch The Film Network. We have so many ideas for The Film Network, and for you guys!

 

Of course each backer level has different stuff for you, among them a membership, where you'll be among the firsts to try our beta and finish version of the The Film Network. 

The are also some other cool stuff like our official pins, T-Shirt, stickers and portfolio. We also have in store some milestone rewards in case we reach or go beyond our initial funds request.

Over the course of this campaign we will keep you posted on any news and developments regarding TFN. For now, we can share with you our PIN designs you'll be able to choose one of our five designs, depending on your backers level, you could received all five of them.

In a few days we will be sharing our full T-shirt and portfolio designs. For now here's a sneak peek of the portfolio sample, front design TBA.

Here's a Breakdown of what you can receive:

Note: In case you want to support our project, but don't want any of the rewards... you can choose so once you go trough the donation process. We will get in touch with each any everyone of you once it's time to send out your rewards, if you don't want your name display on our site that will be the time to mention it :).

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have money to spare, there are still other ways you can help us! :). Share with a post in facebook or a tweet. And you'll get 3 cool profile images you can use on your social networks! Pay with a Tweat or Facebook post

story:
- English version below -

Vores lille bitte Væveri :)

Hej! Vi er Signe og Simon.

Vi har skabt et lille væveri helt fra bunden med en blanding af antikt og hjemmelavet maskineri.

Det har taget os et par år at få det hele op at køre, men nu er vi klar til at gå i gang med at lave vores egne originale produkter. Og for at kunne starte produktionen søger vi crowdfunding til vores første store garnindkøb.

Det er bare os to der står for det hele. Når du køber en plaid af os har vi selv designet og vævet det i vores lille værksted i Rhodopebjergene.

Se videoen i toppen og få hele historien!

Vi er super passionerede designere. Og kvalitet og dyrevelfærd er helt essentielt for os. Ulden vi bruger er den bedste kvalitet merino-uld der kan købes. Den er blød og lækker, kan tåle let vask uden at krympe og så er den mulesing-fri. 

(Hvis dyrevelfærd er vigtigt for dig, så undgå altid merinouldprodukter, hvis der ikke klart og tydeligt står 'mulesing-free' på mærket.)

Om Os

Signe Rand Ebbesen er en prisvindende tekstildesigner med en MA i Væv fra Royal College of Art, London og en BA i Tekstildesign fra Danmarks Designskole.

Simon Gylden er en selvlært billedkunster og musiker, som nu er gået hen og blevet Rand Gyldens vævetekniker og mekaniker.

Vi elsker håndværk, design og gør-det-selv-projekter.

Vores uld og produkter

Vi har ledt længe efter den perfekte merino uld og har omsider fundet et spinderi i Italien som kan levere et garn, der lever op til vores krav om kvalitet og dyrevelfærd.

Garnet er lavet af 100% øko-tex certificeret merino uld fra mulesing-fri uldproduktion. Garnet er ikke billigt, men kvaliteten er i top og meget allergi-venligt.

Vi har udviklet en særlig fyldig væve-struktur, der gør plaiden tyk og vamset, men stadig let og lækker.

Vores designkollektion

Til denne kampagne har vi valgt at fokusere på farver der 'fader' ind og ud af hinanden. En effekt der ikke er nem at opnå med vævede tekstiler og derfor sjældent set. 

Det er et design, der rammer en spændende balance mellem den skandinaviske enkelthed og et lille farvepust i indretningen, som vil se fantatisk ud i hjemmets hyggekroge.

Vi har også ensfarvede plaider og puder samt et stribet plaid-design vi kalder 'Stripe80' - inspireret af de tidlige 1980'eres kække designæstetik.

I bunden af siden (efter den engelske beskrivelse) kan du finde visualiseringer af alle de forskellige farvekombinationer og designs vi tilbyder.

Ekstra Bonus

Som en særligt ting, kun i forbindelse med denne kampagne, tilbyder vi nogle ganske få sæt af vores helt specielle gobelin-silkepuder i 5 forskellige varianter. De er at regne for samlerobjekter, da mindre end 5 sæt findes af hver farvevariant.

 

------ ENGLISH -----

Our Tiny Weaving Mill :)

Hi! We are Signe and Simon.

We have created a small weaving mill from the ground up utilizing a mix of antique and homemade machinery.

It has taken a few year to get everything up and running, but now we are ready to start making our own original products. In order to start production, we are seeking crowdfunding for our first major yarn purchase.

It's just the two of us, working on everything. When you buy a blanket from us, it has been designed and woven by us personally in our small workshop in the Rhodope Mountains.

Watch the video at the top of the page to get the whole story!

We are super passionate designers. And quality and animal welfare is essential to us. The wool we use is the best quality merino wool available. It is soft and luxurious, can take light washing without shrinkage and is mulesing-free.

(If you are concerned with animal welfare, always avoid merino wool if the tag does not specifically state 'mulesing-free' or 'non-mulesing'.)

About us

Signe Rand Ebbesen is an award winning textile designer with an MA in Weaving from Royal College of Art, London and a BA in Textile Design from the Royal Danish Academy's School of Design.

Simon Gylden is a self taught visual artist and musician, who has become the Rand Gylden weaving technician and mechanic.

We love craftmanship, design and DIY projects!

Our wool and products

We have searched far and wide for the perfect merino wool and have at long last found a yarn producer in Italy that can accomodate our wishes regarding quality and animal welfare.

The yarn is made from 100% oeko-tex certified merino wool from mulesing-free production. The yarn is not cheap, but the quality is perfect and it is very allergy friendly.

We have developed a special rich weave structure, that makes the blankets thick and cosy, but still light and luxurious.

Our design collection

For this campaign we have chosen to focus on colours that fade into one another. Which is an effect not easily achieved in woven textiles and therefore seldom seen.

It's a design that achieves an exciting balance between the simplicity of Scandinavian design and brings a touch of colour into the interior, that will look fantastic in the cosy spaces of your home.

We also have plain coloured blankets and cushions in our collection along with a blanket design we call 'Stripe80', which is inspired by the bold aesthetics of early 80s design.

Extra Bonus.

As a special item, only for this campain, we have added a super limited Tapestry Silk Cushion Set in 5 variants. These are collector items and very rare. Less that five sets exists of each design.

 

PRODUKT VARIANTER / PRODUCT VARIANTS:

 

 

 

 

 

Vi tilbyder vores tæpper i de samme farve-varianter som puderne!

 

I tæpper har vi desuden følgende 'Stripe80' design:

 

 

 

 

Mange tak for at tage et kig på vores kampagne!

Signe & Simon.

story:
Short Summary

In early March, Tina and Grayson Haver Currin were on their way to pick up lumber when they spotted a group of protestors holding hateful signs outside of a women's clinic. They had an idea: Why not playfully counter-protest the protestors and distract them from yelling at the people headed inside? They began to document their activities on their blog, Saturday Chores. 

In June, the counter-protest went viral, prompting pieces in the Huffington Post, Buzzfeed, Cosmopolitan, Elle, and Yahoo News. Since then, dozens of friends and allies have joined them on Saturday morning. But it hasn't been all fun and games.

What We Need & What You Get


Working in concert with the clinic director, the goal of Saturday Chores has always been to deflect the negative attention of anti-abortion protestors away from the people who need to use the services of the clinic. 

However, given recent media attention, the anti-abortionists have responded in kind. Their numbers, as well as their signage, have grown alongside Saturday Chores. Women are being called murderers. Men are being accosted outside.

To counteract this, Tina, Grayson, and the Saturday Chores crew plan to install approximately 80 feet of privacy fencing and landscaping along the property line of the clinic. This barrier between the protestors and the clinic will afford folks the privacy to which they're entitled.  

Initial estimates for wooden fencing, fifteen 6' Green Giant Arborvitae trees, plus water drip and mulching, is approximately $2000. The SC crew will spend a Saturday (or three) installing the screen, and probably holding up some funny signs, too. 

Goals for the privacy screen:

  • As much visual privacy and sound blocking for clinic front door, parking area and drive as possible

  • Solution should last for many years without replacement

  • Long-term maintenance requirements should be minimal or none

  • Solution should not be uninviting to clients

  • Solution needs to meet the needs of security at clinic

For a donation of $30 or more, you'll receive your choice of either a "Weird Hobby" or an "I Like Turtles" t-shirt, modeled after two of our original signs. Hand-screened in Raleigh, NC on American Apparel Ts, these soft shirts will show the world that you can do some good while also having a laugh. After all, that's the Saturday Chores way.

story:
KULERPRO is the world’s first high-performance portable cool off device for the food in the kitchen! It will change your kitchen and dining routine forever! KULERPRO will cool off any hot dish or beverage in a minute, without any harm or any side effect for the food. The cooling off process starts to cool off food immediately after turning on. Our engineers designed a special system that guarantees the fastest cooling off process! You can regulate the height of the dishware to maximize the cool off effect! A non contact temperature sensor will measure the temperature of the dish and show it on the display.  KULERPRO is fast, simple and beautiful!!! It is small and fits any kitchen perfectly!

 

Have you ever had a big dilemma:  you burn your mouth or you have to wait up to 15 minutes to begin to eat your favorite dish?

And the bigger problem is to feed babies – you have done everything to cool off  the food for them to eat faster: you put the hot plate in refrigerator or  in open window, but what if you  live in Florida, Spain or Brazil??? And  the temperature of the food for the babies should be more cooler than for adults. So the time to simply cool off the oatmeal for the baby is up to 15 minutes!!

 

 

So we made a solution for this big pгoblem:  we introduce you the  KULERPRO , the device that will revolutionize  the cool off process forever!!!

In our busy lives  every minute counts! You simply can’t wait for so long!!!

And now when you preparing your favorite pumpkin cream soup you will not wait for 15 minutes for it to cool off, transfusing it  from one plate to another!

 

 

Whether you’re an expert chef or a humble home cook, all of us want to save time in the kitchen. It means more time spent eating at the table with our family and friends. But it doesn’t always have to be about waiting for 15 minutes for your favorite meal to cool off! 

                     

 

 

 

 

 

                                     

 

 

 

 

     

 

 

 

                                                 

 

 

                     

 

                           Choose from two stylish colours

Do you like to make a statement and stand out from the crowd? We have no doubt our striking Bronze KULERPRO is the one you’ll choose. It has become the favorite colour with the samples that we showed to potential customers  and we know you are going to go crazy for it! If you tend to opt for the slightly understated look and prefer your gadgets a little more sleek and stealth-like, don’t worry we’ve got you covered! Our cream and silver colours are simple, dramatic and effortlessly cool.

 

We started creating KULERPRO in 2015 and have made two prototypes before the working sample you see now.  When we  introduced our working sample to the local market the response was overwhelming.

We already found an audience for our product, but we also found a community of people who  really were waiting for this device in the kitchen for so long!!!.

We met with potential customers and were hearing directly from them about how much they love our product! And with help of great engineers and marketers in our team  we've built the  original innovative device that revolutionize the way we have our meal!!!

                                                   

              

 

 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Our team has worked on KULERPRO for years and we’re finally ready to bring our revolutionized device  to the global market. We have developed multiple prototypes, tested all of them  and sought out trusted manufacturers. Because we believe in our product, we only seek the best team members, developers and manufacturers for our product.
We also understand that there is a small possibility of certain risks and challenges  with any first run production of a new product. We have been working hard to ensure that the device’s various functions work perfectly. However, there may still be some unpredictable issues that potentially lead to minor delivery delays. Just like any other mass produced product, we face potential issues during the manufacturing process. We chose the best manufacturer on household appliance market that has lots of experience for big companies.  Supply Chain Risk: We're incredibly proud of our supply chain, and have a lot of confidence that we can make what we say we'll make, when we say we'll make it.
Please know we are prepared should there be any unforeseen delay in our production timeline. We are confident in our abilities to develop, manufacture and deliver KULERPRO to you, on time. At KULERPRO, we promise to be transparent throughout our production phase and will keep you updated throughout, and after, the Indiegogo campaign.

 

FAQ

 

1) What are the dimensions of the device?

Dimensions
11” H x 10,15” W x 8,20” D (28 H x 26 W x 21 D cm)

Weight -2 kg

2) How do I clean the device?

You will have a full instruction to do inside cleaning sometime, it is very simple. As for the device, please wipe it with drenched cloth.

3) Is the device safe for food?

Yes, absolutely! Our engineers had a lot of experience working in world leaders household applience companies.

4) How long does it take for KULERPRO to start the cooling off process?

KULERPRO starts to cool off the dish immediately after you press the «on» button.

5) What is the average time to cool off the extremly hot dish or beverage?

It depends what temperature do you need. If you need the hot tea to start drink it would be 50 seconds and if you like your oatmeal or soup or casserole to be soft warm it would be around 120 seconds.

-hot dish – 50-70 seconds

-hot beverage – 40-50 seconds

6) Does KULERPRO show temperature in Celsius or Fahrenheit?

The device works with both scales you can change it for the one you want.

7) Does KULERPRO have any other colours?

Yes, we have Bronze, Cream and Metallic colours.

9) Does KULERPRO operates manually or by remote control?

You can operate KULERPRO manually and by remote control. You can also change colour which lights up the dish during the cooling off process. It’s very beautiful!!!

9) Do you ship internattionally?

Yes we do!

10) Does the price include shipping?

No, as long as we ship internationally the price does not include shipping. But our logistic team will do anything we can to make it not expensive and very fast for you.

11) Is KULERPRO covered by warranty?

One year warranty starting from the month you receive KULERPRO. Please contact us if the unit is not working without any personal misuse.

12) Shipping. When I receive my KULERPRO?

We are planning to start shipping the device in July 2017. But our team will do anything to make it happen faster.
story_txt:
KULERPRO is the world’s first high-performance portable cool off device for the food in the kitchen! It will change your kitchen and dining routine forever! KULERPRO will cool off any hot dish or beverage in a minute, without any harm or any side effect for the food. The cooling off process starts to cool off food immediately after turning on. Our engineers designed a special system that guarantees the fastest cooling off process! You can regulate the height of the dishware to maximize the cool off effect! A non contact temperature sensor will measure the temperature of the dish and show it on the display.  KULERPRO is fast, simple and beautiful!!! It is small and fits any kitchen perfectly! Have you ever had a big dilemma:  you burn your mouth or you have to wait up to 15 minutes to begin to eat your favorite dish?And the bigger problem is to feed babies – you have done everything to cool off  the food for them to eat faster: you put the hot plate in refrigerator or  in open window, but what if you  live in Florida, Spain or Brazil??? And  the temperature of the food for the babies should be more cooler than for adults. So the time to simply cool off the oatmeal for the baby is up to 15 minutes!! 


 
So we made a solution for this big pгoblem:  we introduce you the  KULERPRO , the device that will revolutionize  the cool off process forever!!!In our busy lives  every minute counts! You simply can’t wait for so long!!!And now when you preparing your favorite pumpkin cream soup you will not wait for 15 minutes for it to cool off, transfusing it  from one plate to another!  Whether you’re an expert chef or a humble home cook, all of us want to save time in the kitchen. It means more time spent eating at the table with our family and friends. But it doesn’t always have to be about waiting for 15 minutes for your favorite meal to cool off!

It has become the favorite colour with the samples that we showed to potential customers  and we know you are going to go crazy for it!
