story:
Hi.  We are Thanasis Zografos and Lazaros Agapides.  We're two guys who have an idea and a vision that we're passionate about.  Our vision is to allow anyone to easily create a high quality free access wi-fi network of ANY size and to offer multiple services over that network that will add value as well as bring in revenue.

Wefrii uses wireless mesh technology as well as the wefrii cloud controller (WCC) that allows you to easily manage the whole network online.  OK, we admit, there are already such solutions out there.  Actually, we've even used and installed some of the most popular cloud controlled wireless mesh networks in the world, but what we found is that the cloud controller was seriously lacking in features and services.  What's different about wefrii?  Well, the most innovative part of wefrii is the additional services wefrii provides and the way that they are offered over the network.

We’d like to introduce you to our "wefrii suite of services.“  This is a set of services that are integrated into the wefrii devices as well as the wefrii control panel.  These include (but are not limited to) basic internet access, wefrii wireless advertising, wefrii VPN, wefrii telephony as well as wefrii sensor grids.  The whole network, along with all of these services can easily be managed centrally and as one entity from the wefrii cloud controller.

Wefrii Wireless Advertising

This service is an innovative way to provide free wireless internet access while at the same time, advertising your business as well as other local businesses within or near the range of your wi-fi network.  This goes way beyond simple Internet advertising as it has a targeted local audience.  The potential customers that see your ad will literally be within walking distance to your location.  It’s what’s called hyper-local advertising.

Wefrii VPN

This service allows you to connect two or more of your locations via a secure VPN.  It doesn't matter where these locations are geographically.  They can be anywhere in the world.  The only prerequisite is that each location have at least one active wefrii point.  This is a very powerful service as it allows you to securely interconnect your company's applications such as invoicing and inventory databases as well as many other such applications.

Wefrii Telephony

With wefrii telephony you'll be able to enjoy IP telephony service on any wefrii network.  This way, you can easily fully integrate the telephony systems of many of your locations or create an internal telephony network.  If you offer a free network at a hotel, or within a municipality, you can add this as a value added service for your network users.


Wefrii Sensor Grids

The Internet of Things (IoT) is a concept that is quickly and inevitably becoming reality.  A major part of IoT is the collection, analysis and visualisation of sensor data as well as systems automation.  A wefrii network allows the seamless integration of wefrii sensor nodes where each node can support a number of sensors that can monitor up to 50 different values within the following categories: environment, smart cities, water, metering, smart buildings, building automation, logistics and eHealth.  These sensors send their data to the wefrii cloud controller which stores their historical values, displays their values in real time and creates heat maps and data visualisation for you to analyse and display your data.  We feel that this service is one of the most exciting, innovative and ambitious of the project. 

Future Services

By no means are we limiting the use of the wefrii network to the above services.  The truth is that only one's imagination is the limit.  That's why we want to build the wefrii cloud controller in a modular way so that additional services will be able to be added quickly and easily.  We're also relying on your ideas and input to prepare for future add-ons to the wefrii suite of services.  Some ideas that we want to keep in mind for the future are video conferencing services, video surveillance, content filtering and others.


Wefrii is based on wireless mesh technology.  What we want to do is customize and optimize this technology for use with the wefrii suite of services.  Specifically, we want to further develop our network infrastructure as well as the services that will run on that network:

Network Infrastructure Development

  • The wefrii point, a plug and play access point for the wefrii network
  • The mobi wefrii point, a device that will allow you to connect multiple wefrii points to the internet via a 3G or 4G (LTE) network and will offer GPS coordinates of its location in real time.
  • The exti wefrii point to point extender, a pair of devices that will allow you to extend your network over larger distances (thousands of metres) without the need of additional broadband connections.
  • The sensi wefrii sensor node, the device that will collect sensor data and send it to the wefrii control panel.
  • A future goal will be the addition of the sati wefrii point, a device that will allow you to connect several wefrii points to the Internet via a satellite internet connection for use on vehicles or in areas where other connections to the Internet are unavailable.


Wefrii Suite of Services Development

  • The wefrii cloud controller (WCC) is an easy to use web based dashboard that will allow you insert your wefrii devices of all types and to customize and monitor your network.  From this easy to use interface, you'll be able to set up and manage all of your wefrii services as well.
  • The wefrii wireless advertising service allows you can configure your splash page and your location and time based advertising in an easy and intuitive way.
  • Wefrii VPN, a service that allows you to interconnect several locations over a secure network.
  • Wefrii telephony, a telephony service you'll be able to use over your wireless network
  • Wefrii sensor grid, a service that allows you to collect sensor data from the wefrii sensor nodes, stores it and allows you to analyse and visualise it.

In short we want to develop a flexible and powerful product that you can easily install and configure yourself from which you, your company and your community will immediately benefit from.  You'll have all the guidelines, instructions and tech support you need from us to get the job done.

If you help us, we'll acknowledge your help in the most visible way.  You can see our perks on the right.  The more you contribute, the more you can take part in creating this new wi-fi reality.

You may not be able to contribute financially.  That's OK!  Even an encouraging message just to tell us that you share our vision would be awesome!  Keep in mind as well that there may be applications for wefrii that we just haven't thought of yet and we'd like to hear from  you about them!  Please let us know so we can add them to our ideas.

You don't need to donate money to be a contributor!  Even just liking our campaign on Facebook or letting others know about our vision is extremely valuable to us.

Thanassis is a mathematician with a IT degree in databases. For many years he has tought maths and programming languages, while working as a systems engineer. For the last six years he operates an IT company specialising in creating eshop platforms as well as custom software solutions for its customers.

Lazaros is a telecommunications professional with almost fifteen years of professional experience.  He has designed and installed high capacity municipal wi-fi networks and has substantial experience in voice and data network design in the telecommunications industry both in Greece and abroad.

A while back, Thanassis and Lazaros, who are next door neighbours, met at a wedding.  They began talking about what they do.  Things kind of came together and the idea of wefrii was born.  Unfortunately, due to lack of time and, more vitally, lack of funds, wefrii was unable to get off the ground.  Today, with a revamped plan, a more focused vision and a little bit of help from you, we're optimistic that wefrii will take off!

Stop right there!

Everything about this campaign above the STOP sign is enough for you to get a pretty good feeling of what we're up to.  If you are interested in obtaining a deeper understanding of more technical and logistical issues, then please keep reading.

Below you will find some real world examples of wefrii in action.  Keep in mind that all services described are able to be managed centrally from the wefrii cloud controller, a web based control panel in the cloud that you can access from anywhere!

Wefrii wireless advertising example

Let’s say you own three corner stores in your town.  Each has a broadband connection for your business use.  Imagine you install a wefrii point at each of your locations offering free wi-fi to the area around each store.  You can easily configure these points so that any user connecting to your network will see what’s called your “splash page,” a web page that you design yourself to promote your products, services, your locations as well as any special offers you may have on any particular day.  As people around your business locations begin to use your network, they will all be informed of what you have to offer.  Once they see your splash page, they have the option of browsing through your site before they continue on to the site of their choice.

Imagine now that the businesses across the street, your partners, or any other interested businesses in the area ask you to advertise them on your splash page.  For a fee you can add them to your site and make some money.  Or, even better, you can ask them to install a wefrii point on their premises that will either connect to their broadband connection or will mesh wirelessly via your connection thereby creating a wireless advertising community in your neighbourhood.  In this way, you as well as the businesses in your area will increase the size of the wireless network, and thereby increase the number of local people that will see your ads.

This network then has the potential to continue to grow as you add wefrii points at your home, your relative’s homes and businesses, other businesses with which you cooperate and anywhere else you have access to a broadband connection.  Because of the way that wireless mesh technology works, you can add wefrii points and have them mesh wirelessly with each other allowing multiple points within an area to connect via one broadband connection.  Such a network can grow endlessly offering free wi-fi along with high quality hyper-local advertising.

You can further customize the splash page so that depending on where the user is, different ads will show up or they will show up in a different order.  If you connect to the wefrii point near “Johnny’s Grocery Store” the first thing you’ll see are today’s specials at Johnny’s.  If you’re across the street at “Sam’s Meat Market,” you’ll see what’s on sale at Sam’s first, and farther down you’ll see Johnny’s specials.  You can even customize what the user sees based on the time of day or whether it’s a weekday or the weekend.  Customization and flexibility are key features.

Beyond this, the potential applications are endless.  Through wefrii points, restaurants can promote their menus or sell their brand name products used in their cooking.  Hotels can offer free wi-fi while informing their customers of sightseeing services, room service, car rental and tourist activities offered by the hotel and its partners.  Airports, hospitals and sports complexes will benefit greatly by informing users of where they can go for refreshments, food, emergency services and yes, even where to go when nature calls.  Malls and shopping centres will be able to advertise all of their shops and services based on your location.  Municipal wi-fi can truly be free, viable and sustainable by creating a business framework that is mutually beneficial for local businesses, the citizens of cities and the municipalities themselves. 

This is a simple example of a splash page that you will be able to create with our dashboard.  If the content is all Greek to you, don't worry, it really is in Greek!

 With the addition of our mobi-wefrii option, that is, mobile wefrii points, public transit buses, trains and tour buses can provide free wi-fi access to travellers while informing all those connected of restaurants, stores and services that exist at the next few stops.  In addition, one of our future stretch goals may be the development of a sati-wefrii point, an option that will allow wefrii points to connect via satellite.  These can be installed on ferry boats, airplanes as well as cruise ships to offer free wi-fi while informing all users on board of food menus, duty free products, entertainment programmes or specials on future tickets.

Wefrii VPN Example

Using the above scenario, at your central location, you are running a network service that is vital to your company, such as an inventory database.  When you sell an item at one of your other locations, you want that database to be updated in real time.  Wefrii VPN service allows you to do that.  Just by having one wefrii point at each of your locations and regardless of how these wefrii points connect to the Internet (either via their own broadband connection or via a wireless mesh) you have an almost zero configuration secure VPN service between your locations.  Essentially, as shown in the following diagram, you'll have a network that will allow you to run client server or peer to peer applications between your locations securely and reliably without any additional software whether you are using a wired or wireless connection to a wefrii point.

Note that the wefrii points don't have to be connected to each other directly.  You can have one wefrii point connected to your broadband connection and another one anywhere else in the world connected to another broadband connection and still create a successful VPN, and you can activate the VPN service from the wefrii cloud controller for whichever wefrii points you want.

Wefrii Telephony Example

IP telephony and VoIP technologies are quickly moving from the cutting edge to the mainstream as more and more providers and businesses are adopting the technology.  Wefrii, however, comes to add a new dimention to voice services.  With wefrii, you'll be able to enjoy a service we call Voice over wefrii (VoW).  With this service, wefrii allows you to install one or more IP telephones anywhere there is a wefrii point: at your store locations and, with a mobi wefrii point, even on a tour bus! 

You'll be able to have free inter-location calling through the wefrii network, and, if you connect the network to a PSTN connection at one of your locations, you'll be able to enjoy external calling as well.  Additionally, you'll be able to connect any SIP client app to integrate your smartphone into the wefrii telephony services as well. 

Wefrii Sensor Grid Example

Imagine we deploy a number of sensors within a city that measure temperature, air pressure, humidity, noise pollution and air pollution.  These devices are installed and registered within the wefrii cloud controller by placing them on a map, just like you would with a wefrii point.

Each wefrii sensor sends its data to the controller in the cloud via the wefrii network infrastructure.  The data is then visualised in many different ways.

These devices can send their measurements every certain time interval, say 30 seconds via the wefrii infrastructure to the wefrii cloud controller.  The controller then acts as a sensor information database.  These data are stored and can be presented and visualised in different ways, such as on a point by point basis or as a heat map overlaid upon the map of wefrii sensor nodes.  Historical trends in specific areas of the sensor network can also be viewed and analysed.

Sensor data can be visualised in real time or historically with heat maps, line graphs, table format or specific values from specific points as show in the above image.

These data can then be stored in an open format to be used as open data or as a closed and private data set that's securely protected.

For applications within buildings such as hotels, airports or hospitals for example, there is also the option of including remote control functions for lights, windows, heating, cooling and other systems.  This is essential in improving energy efficiency of buildings.

For more information take a look at our gallery.  There we'll be continually updating our content throughout the campaign to keep you informed.  In the gallery, you'll soon find videos, images as well as documents that you can use to learn more about wefrii.

If you can't find what your looking for in the gallery, you can always contact us via the comments section or via email/facebook/twitter or any other social media!  We do really live in a connected world.  Let's make it even more connected!
story_txt:
Hi.  We are Thanasis Zografos and Lazaros Agapides.  We're two guys who have an idea and a vision that we're passionate about.  Our vision is to allow anyone to easily create a high quality free access wi-fi network of ANY size and to offer multiple services over that network that will add value as well as bring in revenue.
Wefrii uses wireless mesh technology as well as the wefrii cloud controller (WCC) that allows you to easily manage the whole network online.  OK, we admit, there are already such solutions out there.  Actually, we've even used and installed some of the most popular cloud controlled wireless mesh networks in the world, but what we found is that the cloud controller was seriously lacking in features and services.  What's different about wefrii?  Well, the most innovative part of wefrii is the additional services wefrii provides and the way that they are offered over the network.
We’d
like to introduce you to our "wefrii suite of services.“  This is a set of services that are integrated into the wefrii devices as well as the wefrii control panel.  These include (but are not limited to) basic internet access, wefrii wireless advertising, wefrii VPN, wefrii telephony as well as wefrii sensor grids.  The whole network, along with all of these services can easily be managed centrally and as one entity from the wefrii cloud controller.


Wefrii Wireless Advertising
This service is an innovative way to provide free wireless internet access while at the same
time, advertising your business as well as other local businesses within or
near the range of your wi-fi network.  This
goes way beyond simple Internet advertising as it has a targeted local
audience.  The potential customers that
see your ad will literally be within walking distance to your location.  It’s what’s called hyper-local advertising.
Wefrii VPN
This service allows you to connect two or more of your locations via a secure VPN.  It doesn't matter where these locations are geographically.  They can be anywhere in the world.  The only prerequisite is that each location have at least one active wefrii point.  This is a very powerful service as it allows you to securely interconnect your company's applications such as invoicing and inventory databases as well as many other such applications.
Wefrii Telephony
With wefrii telephony you'll be able to enjoy IP telephony service on any wefrii network.  This way, you can easily fully integrate the telephony systems of many of your locations or create an internal telephony network.  If you offer a free network at a hotel, or within a municipality, you can add this as a value added service for your network users.

Wefrii Sensor Grids
The Internet of Things (IoT) is a concept that is quickly and inevitably becoming reality.  A major part of IoT is the collection, analysis and visualisation of sensor data as well as systems automation.  A wefrii network allows the seamless integration of wefrii sensor nodes where each node can support a number of sensors that can monitor up to 50 different values within the following categories: environment, smart cities, water, metering, smart buildings, building automation, logistics and eHealth.  These sensors send their data to the wefrii cloud controller which stores their historical values, displays their values in real time and creates heat maps and data visualisation for you to analyse and display your data.  We feel that this service is one of the most exciting, innovative and ambitious of the project. 
Future Services
By no means are we limiting the use of the wefrii network to the above services.  The truth is that only one's imagination is the limit.  That's why we want to build the wefrii cloud controller in a modular way so that additional services will be able to be added quickly and easily.  We're also relying on your ideas and input to prepare for future add-ons to the wefrii suite of services.  Some ideas that we want to keep in mind for the future are video conferencing services, video surveillance, content filtering and others.

Wefrii is based on wireless mesh technology. 
What we want to do is customize and optimize this technology for use with the wefrii suite of services.  Specifically, we want to further develop our network infrastructure as well as the services that will run on that network:
Network Infrastructure Development



The wefrii
point, a plug and play access point for the wefrii network


The mobi wefrii point, a device that will allow you to connect multiple wefrii points to the internet via a 3G or 4G (LTE) network and will offer GPS coordinates of its location in real time.

story:
So Karen the bus monitor has made over $650,000 for getting picked on by a group of little asshole kids.

Help her out, its cool, what happened to her was pretty f'd up.

http://www.indiegogo.com/loveforkarenhklein?a=749704

That Canadian guy really hooked her up, this is a life changing amount of money for her.

 

So I came up with this crazy idea.

 

I want to own a house sooner than later in life, and after findng this website I figured what the hell lets give it a shot.

 

Apartment livng SUCKS.

  • The deaf lady who stomps around upstairs all day and night runs a sewing business out of her spare bedroom.
  • Aparment complexes suck, I am giving a substantial portion of my paycheck to some rich guys wallet.
  • Parking really sucks here, out the door and all the way down is where I park.
  • There aren't any sidewalks; for us to take the baby for a walk we either have to walk on the complexs roads or take a drive to somewhere else (the safer option).
  • There is no privacy, we have quite a large "backyard" which is communal betweeen 4 buildings with 8 units in each. I do not want to spend my weekends or evenings with a dozen other families in the same small space.
  • Management doesn't want to do anything; our fridge was acting silly, we called and and got it taken care of but the guy was an absolute prick about it.

 

Houses RULE.

  • No upstairs neighbors.
  • Our own driveway to park in.
  • NEIGHBORHOOD to walk in, without having to drive to another one.
  • Every dime spent to live there is $0.10 closer to that house being 100% mine as opposed to the apartment still belonging to the rich guy.
  • Privacy, our back yard is ours, we are separated from the neighbors by fencing, landscaping and trees.
  • If it breaks, I can fix it, no more reliance on someone elses attitude to ensure that the job is done right.

 

I know $35,000 is a lot of money.

I am probably not even going to get close to it, but a guy can dream right?

I plan on spending 80-100 thousand on a house and hopefully being able to make a 20% down payment. That is 16-20 thousand dollars, money I don't currently have. Since the economic disaster the banks created a few years ago good credit alone isn't enough to buy a house.

Should I hit the 35k mark that is an even larger down payment and a much cheaper mortgage payment every month.

Karen Klien had over half a million dollars donated to her in the first week alone so I know the internet is generous when it comes to helping others.

We have one more year of apartment living to give us time to save and find the house we want.

So lets give it a try, help us buy a house.

I know $35,000 is a lot of money.
I am probably not even going to get close to it, but a guy can dream right?
I plan on spending 80-100 thousand on a house and hopefully being able to make a 20% down payment. That is 16-20 thousand dollars, money I don't currently have. Since the economic disaster the banks created a few years ago good credit alone isn't enough to buy a house.
Should I hit the 35k mark that is an even larger down payment and a much cheaper mortgage payment every month.
Karen Klien had over half a million dollars donated to her in the first week alone so I know the internet is generous when it comes to helping others.
We have one more year of apartment living to give us time to save and find the house we want.
So lets give it a try, help us buy a house.

story:
FAQ

  • Background

What is DS3? 

DS3 is a line of grooming and home care cleaning products that provide a new way to clean you and your home. DS3 is made with a breakthrough process that eliminates water from the final product. Each swatch contains the minimum amount of safe and effective cleaning ingredients that can be activated with just a touch of water.

How does DS3 work? 

Use a steady stream of water to activate the cleaning potential of DS3. Swatches can easily be dissolved in a broad-range of water temperatures and hardness. You know the swatch is fully dissolved when the suds begin to lather in your hand.

Where is DS3 made? 

DS3 is proudly made in Cincinnati, Ohio.

  • Environmental

Does DS3 contain harmful ingredients? 

No. DS3 products are specially designed with only the specific, effective and safe ingredients to perform the job. The dry form allows us to completely eliminate water and minimize the use of many ingredients found in common cleaning products.

  • Value

How many swatches come in a package? 

The number of swatches per package varies by product type. For each product, we try to provide enough swatches to last about 4 weeks. The personal care products are packaged in 1 container with 30 swatches. Our home care products come in various amounts (see chart below).

 

Does DS3 work better than my existing cleaning products? 

For DS3, we are working to deliver the best possible solutions in our new form. And we want to hear from you how they work. We're constantly improving all our products.

Do the swatches have an expiration date? 

DS3 performs best when used 1 year after the date of purchase.

Are all DS3 products made using the same ingredients? 

Nope. We tailor each DS3 product for specific cleaning applications.

  • Safety

Are there any risks associated with use? 

It is important that DS3 products are used as directed. Like all cleaning products, DS3 should be handled with similar care in storage and use.

Is DS3 safe for kids to use? 

Do not let children handle the swatches, even if supervised. Store DS3 where children cannot reach or climb to it, out of sight and in a secure place. Keep package fully closed. Never leave any swatches out of the package.

  • Product Attributes

Do DS3 products contain fragrance? 

Yes. We hope you enjoy our light, natural signature fragrance across the entire line-up of DS3 products. Yes, it's that good.

How fast do the swatches dissolve? 

The swatches will instantly begin to dissolve when you add water.

Can I take them with me when I travel? 

Yes. DS3 is perfect for travel.

  • Usage Instructions

How do I use DS3 grooming products? 

DS3 products are simple to use. For grooming products, be sure to first dissolve the swatch in your hands with water. Then, apply to wet skin/hair, lather, and then rinse.

How do I use DS3 home care products? 

For laundry, place the swatch in the bottom of the drum before loading your clothes. To clean your toilet, drop in the swatch, close the lid, go to sleep and flush in the morning. Wow, that was easy. To clean surfaces, just drop the swatch into a spray bottle, fill with water, and boom you have enough surface cleaner to last for weeks.

How many swatches do I need to use? 

Each swatch has been uniquely designed to give you exactly what you need for the specific job that you are using it for. Whether you are washing your hair or cleaning the toilet, you only need to use one swatch. However, you will need to use 2 swatches if you are doing a large/extra-large load of laundry.

  • Miscellaneous

If I have other questions, who should I contact? 

If you have any additional questions regarding DS3 products, please send us an email at customercare@ds3clean.com.

When will I be able to start using my membership to get DS3 products? 

You will receive a welcome email from customercare@ds3clean.com after the end of the campaign to confirm your membership. You will receive your first shipment of products in 6 months.
